Summary: Another great stay at the Pacific inn, This place never disappoints. Convenient to main street and the beach, friendly staff and nice rooms. Nice breakfast to start the day. I highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: I always love my stays at The Pacific Inn. The entire staff is friendly and helpful. The lobby looked beautiful during the holiday. The snacks and soda available in the lobby look great and make it so easy to make a purchase. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The balconies are a great feature with a table and chairs. Anything you need is provided with a smile. The breakfast room is open with lots to choose from. The waffles you make yourself are really very delicious. The pool area is always clean with plenty of towels. The Pacific Inn is my happy place. Seal Beach is a great place for a vacation.  Nice beach, lots of restaurants and shopping. Will be visiting as soon as we can.
Room tip: The hotel has free parking. Main Street is a two minute walk from the hotel.

Summary: I'd like to start off by saying this hotel had a decent choice of breakfast even if a couple of breakfast items were skipped on (bagels the size of small donuts). You could hear everything from the next room including the men who were on a business trip with their tools and hammers as well as people at breakfast who we could hear from the opposite side of the second floor. This isn't the place for you if you sleep past 530 am. Everything is clean and the open pool area was a delight with the fresh morning air. The real issue though, we had some booking issues and instead of waiting for me to finish work to sort it out, they threw my family out on the street at night with nowhere to go. I had to leave work and drive 3 hours to get back so they werent left out in the cold for

Summary: This hotel is great! We enjoy staying there several times a year the night before our cruise. The Hotel is within walking distance to the beach and many shops and restaurants. after a long day of driving, it is great to unwind and head down to the town for fun and food! The hotel staff is wonderful with a great Concierge, very friendly and welcoming. Great coffee and tea in the lobby area and fresh cookies at night. The rooms are spacious with balconies. Each have a microwave, Keurig and a mini fridge. The beds are so comfortable. The hot breakfast in the morning is very good, it is more than a cold continental. You can get eggs, breakfast meats, waffles and more.  We generally do the Park and Cruise Package. We feel very comfortable leaving our car there for a week or more,
Room tip: Book early and save. They will price match with proof.

Summary Heading: Amazing location and service ABOVE AND BEYOND!
Summary: WOW,  Montse Sanchez at the Pacific Inn is amazing and provided us the MOST amazing service!!!!!!  We left a backpack on the curb across the street from the Pacific Inn and then drove off to N. California. Local realtor Nat Ferguson found it and returned it to Montse and she contacted us to retrieve it!!!!!  She was a lifesaver.  We will definitely be staying at the Pacific Inn for all our future visits (our son and daughter in law live a couple blocks away) as the location is IDEAL - walk to the beach, and restaurants and Devyns across the street is a terrific gift shop/ florist!!!!  Seal Beach is the most awesome, friendly, local feeling town - no glitz or pretense, just really friendly, warm, happy people!!!!  Such a breath of fresh air compared to the intensity of big city

Summary: We stayed here pre and post cruise. Such a nicer option than being right near the airport. The town, beach, and pier are all in very close proximity with plenty of eating options. Only about a 20 minute ride from the airport. Be certain to reserve free airport shuttle in advance of your stay. Breakfast was excellent with many well thought out options, much better choices than an average hotel. Accounted for little things like almond milk, a variety of sweeteners, berries, and gluten free muffins. Everything is kept fully stocked from beginning to the end of breakfast hours. What sets this place apart from the competition is the extreme helpfulness and diligence of the staff- exceeds all expectations.

Summary: We had such a wonderful time at this hotel! Great location, super friendly staff, beautiful room. I managed to demagnetize both door cards in my phone case and the front staff was very generous in re-issuing them.  I called a couple days in advance when we knew we'd be arriving early and asked for an early check-in. The earliest we could check-in was at noon and we arrived about 30 min early. Our room wasn't ready yet and we sat in the lobby which was very comfortable. They had a nice coffee machine and nice seating.  When we checked out at 11 our flight wasn't for a while, so the hotel held our luggage while we spend time in the town which we super appreciated.  The location was perfect. The walk over to the little town was quick, only took about 10-15 min. Great food and shops

Summary: We loved how close the hotel was to Main Street and the beach. We walked over and had a lovely dinner outside. The backside of the hotel is located on Electric Avenue,  and even features one of the vintage cable cars. It was done up for Halloween.  Our hotel has a lovely indoor pool and a breakfast room. We spent time nearby in San Pedro and Long Beach. Both nearby.

Summary: We drove in from Fresno after visiting family and dropped our car at Long Beach airport. Called the hotel for a shuttle. Shuttle driver was tied up so hotel called a Lyft for us. Communication is outstanding and hotel covered the Lyft ride. Got to hotel and room wasn’t quite ready but housekeeping g contacted the main desk a few minute later when ready. Room is up to date and very clean. Have a balcony which is a plus. Breakfast was typical, not bad and hotel is within walking distance of Main Street in seal beach which has lots of restaurants. We will definitely stay here again if we come to California for a cruise out of Long Beach.

They don't loan towels,  but to be honest, unless you are a really strong,  experienced swimmer, I wouldn't recommend swimming off Seal beach. Breakfast room has a good selection of food,  including non dairy milk. The hot food was different the second morning plus there were croissants. The place does whatever it takes to get to & from the cruise port - whether it is their shuttle or Lyft. We highly recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: Nice place close to dive boat and restaurants
Summary: We chose this place for its proximity to the scuba boat (Sundiver) and it was great for that.  Walked to highly rated Japanese restaurant close by. Breakfast started at 5:30 a.m. (great for early rising boaters) and featured eggs, sausage, potatoes, and waffles in addition to standard hotel breakfast fare. Lobby features snacks and free cookies. Rooms were very clean and freshly painted.  Staff very friendly.   Otherwise the hotel was pretty uninteresting with stucco and architecture centered around a pool and jacuzzi.  But they are really doing a lot with what they’ve got.  I would stay here again.

Summary Heading: The little known gem of a hotel
Summary: I've been staying at the Pacific Inn in Seal Beach for many years.  The hotel staff is friendly and supremely helpful.  I've never had a hotel call me to confirm my reservation before and for this particular trip, it was very helpful.  The newly updated rooms are very clean and comfortable.  The beds are comfortable (huge plus for me).  The in-room coffee is handy.  Although the hotel is in a slightly busy area, once the room door is closed, the room is quiet.  There is a nice swimming pool and spa.   I love the balcony for sitting outside and enjoying the pleasant weather.  Great restaurants and the beach are within walking distance.  Free parking and fast internet are included.  Breakfast is included and has fresh cooked items, along with waffles, cereal, pastries, fresh fruit

Great restaurants close by and Long Beach where there’s more action is just 1-2 miles away. The staff was friendly and helpful, and even lent us some beach paraphernalia. And they had free parking, free cookies and water bottles! (Who does that nowadays??) We felt that they are honestly making an effort to make your stay wonderful and reasonable. Summary: We have stayed here many times for over 3 yrs now. For the first time we were able to book an Executive Suite. This was by far the best way to stay when more than a few days. So roomy. We will continue to stay here when we go to Ca.
Manager Response: ForeverFamily1995,  thank you for taking the time to rate your recent stay here with us. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your visit! We love that you were able to enjoy the Family Suite! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon

Summary: This was our first time here and we will be back. We were in town because my daughter will be attending Long Beach State and this was the perfect place to stay. The room was clean and tidy. Staff was helpful when we arrived. We could walk to local restaurants, the ocean and do some shopping. This is a great place to stay and the location is perfect for everything that we had planned.
Manager Response: Erika, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent visit here with us! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: The room was clean and neat.  The employees were very polite and happy to help. It was just a short walk to main street and the beach.  There were shuttles to take you anywhere.  I even got a trip to Del Taco to pick up my food.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you so much for the 5 star review, we are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: This was our third time staying. The location is absolutely perfect. Just a few blocks from the beach and close to restaurants and shops. All within walking distance. All the staff are extremely friendly. What a great little inn.  Highly re commend.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  thank you so much for taking the time to rate your stay here with us! We are thrilled to know that this is your third time staying with us!! Summary: We have visited this hotel many times as my friend lives nearby with a home too small for my husband and I to stay at.  Each stay at Pacific Inn, we encounter the kindest and most courteous, friendly staff.  Even prior to our visit, I need assistance with our booking, and they were beyond helpful and gracious with me.  The rooms vary from a bit older to updated but they are always clean with a very comfortable bed and pillows.  There are so many activities near that are walkable, but we always bring our bikes and go all day around Seal Beach, Huntington or Belmont Shores.  There are bike rentals nearby as well.  Naples Rib Company is a favorite and their food is consistently delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed yet another stay here with us! Summary: My sister and I have stayed here the last 3 visit. We ❤ that they accept dogs and the location is close to Huntington and Newport Beaches. This is at Crystal Coves Shake Shack with a beautiful view in the background

Summary: The Pacific Inn is the best place to stay in Seal Beach!  Close to main street and just a short walk to the beach.  All of the staff are super friendly and helpful.  We stay here one to two weeks per year.  Clean rooms and a great breakfast!  Would highly recommend this hotel to everyone!
Manager Response: Amy M, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed yet another stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your recurring business  and look forward to welcoming you back again next summer!

The room was spacious and very clean and included a refrigerator and microwave. Added bonus was free bottles of cold water. I will be back for sure before the summer ends.
Manager Response: CynthiaC, thank you for takin the time to rate your recent stay here with us. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! We take great pride in our customer service and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Seal Beach is our family’s favorite place to visit in California, and a lot of this is because of the Pacific Inn. The hotel is close to everything, the staff is extremely accommodating, the rooms are great, and we absolutely love the open atrium pool and hot tub.

Summary: Accommodations were great. The location to the main street and beach was awesome.  The front desk lady (Kelby) was so kind and went over the top to make our stay even more outstanding. Perfect place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Passenger539526, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! Thank you for leaving such a nice, detailed review. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: This is a plain inn, well located very near the centre of Seal Beach, which is an exceptionally laid back little resort just south of LA. The best thing about it is that it is a 5 minute walk to Seal Beach Old Town, which is a delight -- great restaurants and bars and a very relaxed easy small town resort, not far from the actual beach and also near the Seal Beach Centre, which is a pretty handy mall. The inn itself is an unpretentious 3-storey, although the architecture is actually quite interesting as it's triangular with a big internal atrium down to a couple of small pools. It's like halfway between a motel and a hotel. Parking is easy on the ground floor. The pool is on the 2nd floor, where people chill with a can of beer. Our room was large and comfortable, with slightly
Manager Response: Dear Oldfather_John,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Pacific Inn for location, cleanliness, and a great breakfast!
Summary: We had a great stay at the Pacific Inn.  Located in a great part of Seal Beach and within walking distance of pier, shopping and restaurants.  They told us if we got their before room was ready, we could park our car and go walk around the town.  Very convenient.  Staff are so friendly!  Stayed here several times and will continue to.

It is definitely more a nice hotel with large rooms and hallways.  We enjoyed our stay very much.

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for nearby wedding venues, walks to beach, and Seal Beach!

It is located close to the beach and downtown Seal Beach, a great bike ride!  Parking was in a covered structure.    Breakfast was not a buffet but simple enough for a family.  Lobby was clean and appealing with beverage machine.

Summary Heading: Good, clean room close to Seal Beach
Summary: My review is based on a few simple things- Service, hospitality, location, cleanliness and affordability. I have been to nicer hotels but this was a different trip than most. I loved how close we were to everything. We were able to walk for meals and time at the beach. We even walked to the shopping mall, although that was a bit more lengthy than some people prefer The staff were polite, friendly and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. Even though we stayed in a room facing the street, I didn't hear too much road noise at night and it didn't keep me awake. The price was very reasonable for the location. I would definitely consider coming here again. One thing this place shared with other lower cost hotels is the hallway noise that can be heard inside the room. That was
Manager Response: Dear Lightpacker683054 , thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! Summary: We were in Seal Beach for a family affair and stayed for one night.  We were pleased with the  facilities and felt safe and comfortable.  The staff was great, very helpful and breakfast was a nice treat.  We will be back for future family functions.
Manager Response: Lu58, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Fun to walk the town and to the beach
Summary: We stayed 3 nights.  The room had clean sheets and towels. The floor had crumbs on it, the sofa had pet hair, the bathroom floor had not been swept (I do not have long black hair) much less washed. The narrow closet had 4 hangers (all that would fit). The pool is open to the air but surrounded by the rooms, making it an echo chamber for young children who were delighted to scream and hear their amplified voice. The staff was friendly. The wooden furnishings were worn out.
Manager Response: Andrea, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We would like to sincerely apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay. Guest satisfaction is our highest priority and we will ensure that these issues you mentioned are taken care of to avoid this from happening again in the future. Our management team will be getting in contact with you as soon as possible.

Summary: We just stayed at The Pacific Inn this past weekend, and had a wonderful stay.  The rooms had been recently renovated with a fresh new look. The rooms are spacious, with a fridge and microwave, and an outside balcony. The hot breakfast was a nice surprise an omelette, turkey sausage, potatoes, hot waffles, bread, yogurt and cereal. We did not use the pool but, the area was spacious with a lot of seating available. This hotel is very close to the downtown area with a variety of restaurants and shops.  If you want to walk down to the beach the walk is not that bad.
Manager Response: DearCherylzuhn , thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! Summary: Just to note: rooms are pricey everywhere. and I know it. So yes it's always upsetting when you pay a lot for a few hours. But for the one forty-ish spent it was fine! I desperately needed a room by my place of business, at the last minute on Wednesday night. I had dealt with horrible issue earlier, was filthy and looked like a hobo! At the the end of spring break and beginning of summer Finding some place decent is not easy! Not only did the gentleman accommodate me , but waited till midnight to check me in, and allowed me to leave my car in a check-in parking space for the remainder of the night. The room was nice and clean with a balcony and fridge and most of all a hot shower. Got a hot breakfast , coffee, and grabbed a danish before checking out. I wanted to thank him for
Manager Response: Dear Nflight2Night, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! Summary: Come here every year (well almost…not during Covid)  for our meetings in LA and this hotel is always the bright spot of our trip.  Everything about this lovely inn is special and near and dear to me and my team’s heart.  Can’t wait for next year!!!
Manager Response: Rodh605, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon!

Summary: Great hotel!  We have been staying here once each year for the better part of two decades. We keep coming back for the great location, amenities, and service! We will be there again next April! Almost forgot, YOU CAN WALK TO TOWN!
Manager Response: Kule50, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Summary Heading: Great location with friendly, responsive staff!
Summary: We stay here whenever we come to visit our daughter.  The location is perfect.  The rooms are always clean and roomy.  Parking garage is a huge plus.  Only a few blocks to Main Street.  No need to drive! Breakfast area is nice and the attendant very helpful.  Had a few roudy (hopefully teenagers who don't know how loud they can get) guests next to us one night.  Didn't have the heart to notify the front desk.  Plan to continue to stay here!
Manager Response: Dear shematt78, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity to the restaurants/bars in the area truly is such a perk! We are so sorry to hear about that noisy night. Please don't hesitate to call in the future! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We were fortunate to stay at The Pacific Inn for one night of our 51st Wedding Anniversary trip to California.  It was well located, quiet, clean, comfortable, friendly and free parking.  We will definitely stay again when we are in the area!
Manager Response: Dear Roxann, we greatly appreciate your kind and detailed review! Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to accommodate your lodging in the future should your travel plans bring you back to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: Amazing hotel. Super clean room and quiet neighborhood. Our room looked recently renovated. Check in and out was easy. Just a few blocks from shopping and the beach. Breakfast was good the next morning. We got the room with the jacuzzi tub …… totally worth it to relax. Only con was the little 3 pillows on each bed. I’ll be back for sure !!!
Manager Response: Dear Chantal, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity to the restaurants/bars in the area truly is such a perk! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Front desk staff were amazingly nice and helpful but...
Summary: A crew of noisy. rambunctious high school students on a field trip were staying in the rooms beside and across from us. They ran up and down the hallways shouting and slamming doors, even after I politely said hello and asked them to keep it down and even after I called the front desk and a staff member came up to speak to them. They did quiet down later around 11 pm but one wonders why we were given a room right smack dab in the middle of this large group of rowdy youngster. Our room was clean and the bed comfortable. The "hot" breakfast was so-so. The hallways were drab and in need of an update. Finally, none of this helped justify the room rate of $245 for a Monday night in April!
Manager Response: Dear Nenyvr, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for you Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate the time you took to tell us about your recent visit. We would like to sincerely apologize for the noise level experienced here with us. Thank you for bringing the decor to our attention, we hope to renovate soon! Thanks again for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future and allow us to remedy these issues.

Summary: Coming back. Restaurants in walking distance + Shuttle from Airport. Great Staff. We cannot wait to return.  They also had shuttle to cruise port which saved us a cab ride. I recommend this hotel . 5 Stars overall.
Manager Response: Dear Karlb385, we greatly appreciate your kind and detailed review! Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to accommodate your lodging in the future should your travel plans bring you back to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: Stayed here before a cruise out of Long Beach. Staff was friendly, informing us our room was not ready arriving early, but was ready by 3:00. The balcony king room was clean and comfortable. The hotel itself was well kept including a pool and hot tub. Breakfast was limited but very tasty. The shuttle to the cruise port was timely and a good value. Pacific Inn's location is great, being walkable to the pier and main street bars & restaurants. Would definitely stay here again when in town.
Manager Response: Kevin, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity to the restaurants/bars in the area truly is such a perk! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Our kids request this hotel year after year for Spring Break. They love the breakfasts, the pool, and that we can walk to the shops on Main Street. I love that the beach is only blocks away. Staff is helpful and friendly. Our room always looks nice when we arrive. I love the black out curtains that were hung so they work! Weekends can be more noisy when the 20-something set arrives, but weekdays are blissfully quiet. We feel safe here and will stay here again. My only wish is for no more of those wasteful little bottles of toiletries and instead the refillable dispensers, and recycling in the rooms.
Manager Response: Katherine, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We greatly appreciate the feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve!  We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This is my happy place.  I love staying at the Pacific Inn.  The entire staff if friendly and very helpful.  the rooms are comfortable and clean.  Everything is really when we check in.  Refrigerator is turned on and there are extra hangers.  I requested to have may room cleaned and when I returned it was all ready and just what Ii would have expected. The I wouldn't stay anywhere elsehot cookies in the late afternoon are such a welcome treat each day.  The coffee machine in the lobby makes the best hot chocolate.  All COVID protocols are followed and Ik feel safe in all areas of the hotel.  I made reservations for two addition stays before I even left after my recent stay. I wouldn't stay anywhere else when ink the area.
Manager Response: Ruth, as always, thank you for choosing to stay with us! We greatly appreciate your recurring business and look forward to the many more visits here with us! Until then! :-)

Summary: Everything about my stay here was perfect! The front desk service is kind, friendly, and super attentive even at 10 pm when we asked for assistance.The room was beautiful with a perfect view for a balcony sunset. The hotel itself is such a short walk from the beach and from the pier. I would recommend to all and will be coming back myself.
Manager Response: Teilert, thank you so very much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are so glad you found our front desk staff to be helpful and the layout of your room and property to be just what you were looking for. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: I love this place! I stay here everytime I'm in the area. It's in the perfect location and has all the amenities I need. It even has a shuttle the will take you anywhere you need to go within a 5 mile radius. 5 stars!
Manager Response: MattT, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay and the amenities our hotel has to offer! We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to Seal Beach.

Summary: I stayed here for a business trip and really loved my stay! The rooms are close to a jacuzzi, there are restaurants in walking distance, and breakfast starts at 5:30am which allowed me to grab food before work. I’ll be staying here again!
Manager Response: Kayleee412, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations!  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Thank you for leaving such a nice, detailed review! We are glad that you were able to enjoy all the ammentities we have to offer! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Cute small hotel in fantastic location.
Summary: We stayed for two nights in March of 2022.  Great location. Easy to walk to restaurants and shops.  Staff were very nice.  Clean room with a supportive mattress.  Nice breakfast included.  Pool and spa looked inviting, even though I did not get a chance to use them.  Will have to take a dip next time!
Manager Response: Jhart525, we greatly appreciate your kind and detailed review! Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to accommodate your lodging in the future should your travel plans bring you back to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: I always stay at Pacific Inn when I go to Seal Beach. Walking distance to the beach and have never had a bad experience there, even when things were a little off the management and team quickly remedied the issue. The staff has always been kind, professional and accommodating. I know we made the right choice the first time booking with them.
Manager Response: Beac648, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enoyed your stay here with us and were able to enjoy everything within walking distance! We greatly appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great convenient place to stay in lovely area
Summary: Had a great stay.  Nothing fancy.  Clean, great location and very helpful staff.  We had a very pleasant stay.  Walkable to a lovely main street with restuarants & shops.  Easy walk to the beach.  We will be back.
Manager Response: Mandy, thank you so much for the kind review. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here! Welook forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: It’s better than a lot of places I’ve stayed in Southern CA.  The price was very reasonable.  I’d give 5 stars were it not for the ultra-firm mattresses in 207.  Maybe they aren’t in all the rooms.  They were so uncomfortable and my daughter and I couldn’t sleep most of the one night we were there because of it.  The shower door also leaked water onto the floor, which was inconvenient.  Other than that, the staff is wonderful, the location is good, the room was pretty quiet, breakfast had a good variety of foods, and everything was clean.  I’d really stay again if the mattresses were softer.
Manager Response: Hi Triab18, Thank you for choosing to stay at The Pacific Inn. We appreciate all the feedback in regards to your room, we are currently undergoing improvements and will take these into accounts. We hope to welcome you back to The Pacific Inn soon.

Summary: We brought our grandson to skateboard with his Cali friends. We try to stay here whenever we travel to Seal Beach/ Long Beach area. The staff is friendly and check in&out is a breeze. Hotel is just a short walk to the beach and downtown Seal Beach.
Manager Response: Bill, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Excellent stay. Very clean . Coffee and cookies and breakfast all great. Good location and friendly staff. We had a terrific stay. Pool and spa were nice and all the rooms face inward over the pool area.
Manager Response: Anthony B, thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay. We are glad to know we were able to provide a clean and comfortable atmosphere during your visit. Until next time!

Summary: Seal is the ideal Southern California laid back beach getaway.  Situated ideally between LA and Orange County, secluded and peaceful. And Pacific Inn is a great spot. Our room was spacious and clean with a king bed, fridge and freezer, jetted tub, solid water pressure (no given in socal), 2 sinks. Plus great pool and hot tub for the kids. Look at the ridiculous prices of vacation rentals in seal and Pacific Inn is a no brainer.
Manager Response: Bill K, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! It was our pleasure to provide lodging accommodations for you and your family. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Hi, very clean and on site amenities were great to experience. The local area is peaceful with the small beach town vibe. The dog friendly policy was a deciding factor, it all worked. We will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Y8628QMdanc, we greatly appreciate this kind and detailed review. Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to accommodate your lodging in the future should your travel plans bring you back to the Seal Beach area.

Summary Heading: Nice room, nice location, nice overall.
Summary: Neighborhood is upscale, lots of restaurants within walking distance and pretty easy to get around.  Staff were friendly prompt and attentive. Room was fine, outstanding no, but perfectly fine for my needs.
Manager Response: Tomdforr, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! Thank you for the nice compliments, and we are glad you were able to enjoy the close proximity of the restaurants! We appreciate your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Convenient, affordable and good for kids
Summary: We stayed in the family suite, which had 2 balconies and a large "living room" type of setup with a sofa bed, chairs and table. My kids loved the pool and hot tub. My only concern was that the pool area is located in a small central courtyard, and I felt bad for the other guests that had to listen to my children shrieking with joy. We enjoyed the daily breakfasts and found the front desk staff to be friendly and responsive. The shuttle bus to the Long Beach airport was a huge plus. Would stay here again!
Manager Response: Aleah N, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations!  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Thank you for leaving such a nice, detailed review! We are glad that you were able to enjoy all the ammentities we have to offer! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Seal Beach
Summary: The Pacific Inn is THE place to stay in Seal Beach. The rooms are big and nicely updated, breakfast was great, and enjoyed the swimming pool and hot tub in the atrium. The best part is the location - just minutes from the beach, pier, and Main Street (with tons of shops and restaurants). We didn’t have a car and never missed it - we could easily walk to everything we wanted. They also have an airport shuttle - just call ahead to make sure they’re not already booked. We will definitely stay here if we’re ever in the area again.
Manager Response: 473GlennZ, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enoyed your stay here with us and were able to enjoy everything within walking distance! We greatly appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This hotel is in a great location. Close to beautiful areas and shops. The staff was friendly, helpful and quickly addressed any concerns. The pool and hot tub are in an open area, it feels very tropical in design. Will definitely stay there again.  FYI, eat at the Yucatan Grill across the street, you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: Patrick, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your time here with us. We take great pride in providing excellent customer service.. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: I stayed for a week while I stayed here and everytime I came 'home' from work there were fresh cookies waiting for me (and other guests too, I guess!) I was also greeted when I walked in and always felt welcome! Great location!
Manager Response: Casey, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are pleased to know that you enjoyed our fresh baked cookies during your stay. We greatly appreciate the kind review and rating. Until next time!

Summary: Very Very friendly and attentive staff! Room is great...fresh air with balcony and sliding doors, microwave, fridge AND coffee maker. Clean Clean Clean.Plus a decent breakfast offering!!! The Inn is walking distance to the beach without beachfront prices. Also, walking sort distance to the town of Seal beach...restaurant offerings are terrific. Lovely pier to walk to. Also, beaches empty this time of year. It is a perfect destination if you are covid worried. Did I mention that when you call the hotel you actually speak with someone at the hotel? They email you to ask if there is anything they can do for you prior to arrival. 5 STARS in all areas!
Manager Response: Tracy M, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enoyed your stay here with us and found out staff to be helpful and attentive! We greatly appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We chose the Pacific Inn because they advertised a shuttle from the Long Beach Airport as well as a shuttle to the Carnival Cruise Port in Long Beach.  We booked two rooms for one night and wish we could have stayed longer.  The rooms were clean, the staff was outstanding and the location was wonderful.  We were charged $30 for the shuttle to pick up 4 people at the airport then take us to the port!  Our flight was delayed and I had a number to text them to notify them we'd be late.  They worked with us and we had our ride.  They had breakfast included plus we just a few blocks from the charming Seal Beach downtown area and the port.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Kim, thank you so much for the kind review and rating! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay. Until next time!

Summary: 10 out of 10. Big, clean king bed with pull out sofa. Breakfast has large variety. Pool and hot tub are nice. Parking on site with handicap spaces. Would highly recommend. Loved it and will be going again soon.
Manager Response: Camper92406, thank you so much to the kind rating and review. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We stayed at this lovely hotel for two nights before our Carnival cruise. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. When their shuttle to to cruise terminal was full they called Uber for the other guests.
Manager Response: Al W, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay prior to the cruise. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: This Hotel is the absolute best place to stay in Seal Beach. Walking distance to everything including Main street and the beach. Great staff very helpful and the pool and jacuzzi provide a great way just chill out!!!
Manager Response: Kevin, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn.  We greatly appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Absolutely loved this location! We stayed 1 nt after returning from a cruise. Hotel was clean, comfortable and staff was super nice. They allowed us to store out luggage prior to check in as we got in around 11am and room wasn't available until 3. Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Kate H, thank you for taking the time to rate your recent visit. We greatly appreciate the kind rating and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: I've stayed at The Pacific Inn several times and have enjoyed the convenience of the transportation package they offer for those going to the cruise port.  Their shuttle service is excellent and they do their best to accommodate everyone's needs.  With free airport transfers and then cruise port transfers when purchasing the package (very reasonable) plus free transportation within 5 miles it makes for a very convenient stay!  Their drivers, Sylvester, Arturo, and Angel are very pleasant and really do their best to make your transportation enjoyable and on time!  Their rooms are clean and comfortable, the pool and jacuzzi are very nice, the hot breakfast included each morning is a nice touch, and their front desk staff is friendly and very accommodating.  They even offer free
Manager Response: Pauls, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Had a great stay at the Pacific Inn over Super Bowl weekend. clean room, nice hotel, lots of parking and a quiet safe area. Quick walk down Main st. to the pier. Lots of places to eat within walking distance.  Oh and dont forget the sunsets !
Manager Response: gmhgmh61, thank you so much for the kind review and rating. We hope to see you again next time!

Summary: Alway like this little independent hotel whenever I'm in this area of LA county. Room is not this biggest but is very well organized in the layout. The balcony is an extra little bit of luxury too. Bed is comfy and lots of pillows for hanging out on the bed. Management handled a potential noisy neighbor situation in an timely manner before things got out of hand. The breakfast is a nice setup of options. We will be back.
Manager Response: Hi John,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel.  We apologize about the noise level but are grateful that management was able to assist you promptly. We hope to welcome you back to The Pacific Inn soon!

Summary Heading: Nice stay but check your invoice
Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn before our recent cruise. It was a perfect location with a lot of nearby stores and restaurants to choose from. The Seal Beach Pier is a short walk away. One of the reasons we chose this hotel is because it provided transportation form the airport. Their shuttle was not working that day so we had to take a cab which they paid for. When we got our bill we noticed they charged us $60 to park. We didn't have a car!!! They did make the adjustment while we were there. California prices are high enough without over charging. The rooms were neat and clean. On the plus side everyone we talked to on the phone beforehand and while we were there could not have been more friendly or helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Nwmdlm, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate the rating. Our Park & Cruise package is a $60 add on package which includes 7 days parking, transportation to and from the cruise port in Long Beach, and all of the amenities our hotel has to offer. (breakfast, pool/jacuzzi area, fitness room, and unlimited coffee in our lobby) For those who are flying in for a cruise and are not leaving their vehicle with us, the package added would then be the Fly & Cruise which is $30. This still includes all of the same amenities the only difference is your vehicle wouldn't be left on our property. Another note to keep in mind is that we only have 1 shuttle so it books up very quickly. It is first come first serve so after it is full, we can no longer accommodate transportation for additional guests.  I hope this cleared up any confusion. Until next time!

Summary: Probably a 3.5/5… the parking and check-in are perfectly ok, and the rooms are fine too. But the continuous slamming of doors late at night and early morning prevented much sleep. This may be because in order to close the doors, they need more than a gentle close (I don’t know if this was the case particularly). But we must have heard everybody close their door.   Plus, the cleaner continued to vacuum post 4pm in the room above us! And during breakfast the cleaner yet again was vacuuming in close proximity on the 3rd floor whilst we ate.   Breakfast was fairly ok. Nothing great, but we’ve had worse. It was great to see gluten free muffins and almond milk, thank you.   This is a fairly old property in terms of building … but the bed rooms are ok with nice tv’s etc.
Manager Response: Dear Richard O, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for you Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate the time you took to tell us about your recent visit. We would like to sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced here with us.  Our housekeepers are regularly scheduled from 9am-5pm so our guests can be subject to some cleaning noise during this time. Still, we will work to come up with a solution to further limit any noise, especially from vacuuming. I have also made a note of the door slamming issue and will be passing it along to our maintenance team to inspect our doors. Thanks again for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future and allow us to remedy these issues.

Summary: Great place to stay! The room was nice, staff was great. The shuttle was very convenient. We utilized the early and late check-in. Less than 10 minute walk to Main St and the pier. We’ll definitely come back!
Manager Response: Jdverona, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Guest satisfaction is our top priority so we are thrilled to know you enjoyed our location, customer service, and the cleanliness of our boutique hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This is our second stay here at The Pacific Inn.  Great staff, accommodating to individual needs, & terrific rooms, breakfast, gym, & spa/pool. Within walking to so many sites, shops, & restaurants. Although there is a complimentary airport/local shuttle we have never taken advantage.   Can't recommend them highly enough.
Manager Response: Dear Randy, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Thank you for you kind review. Our close proximity to the restaurants/bars in the area truly is such a perk! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: BEST HOTEL IN LONG BEACH/SEAL BEACH AREA HANDS DOWN!
Summary: Exceptionally well maintained hotel rooms and grounds.  Rooms are so comfortable & decorated beautifully with all the amenities a guest could ask for to enjoy, including their free breakfast.  So close to restaurants, shopping and beach walking. Beautiful quaint city we so enjoyed our trip and even extended it with one more night than planned.  Their staff are all very professional and nice too.  Will be our go to hotel whenever we visit Seal Beach again as we have family there, meaning we'll keep on booking The Pacific Inn and tell everyone about this hotel property!
Manager Response: R1107UDdeborahp, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Thank you for leaving such a nice, detailed review! Our close proximity to the beach/restaurants/bars in the area truly is such a perk! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Good place to stay in Seal Beach
Summary: This hotel is located just a short walk from the beach and Main Street (shops and restaurants) in Seal Beach. In fact, if you're stay is limited to Seal Beach you wouldn't even need a car. The hotel is efficiently run by a friendly staff. Our room was a good size and comfortable, with mini fridge and microwave. There is a small indoor pool and exercise room, and they serve a nice Continental breakfast. All in all, this is good place to stay in a great location where there are limited options, especially in the mid-price range.
Manager Response: Dear Mbennett, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity to the shops and restaurants truly is such a perk! Thank you for such kind comments about our ammenties. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: Our experience started before our stay. We were contacted with a courtesy call prior to our stay telling us how staff is looking forward to our visit. The hotel was clean and spacious. The included breakfast was a nice surprise. Plenty of options to start your day.. The location was great. It’s two short blocks from Main Street where you’ll find many great restaurants and a short walk down to the beach. John’s Philly Grille across the street from the hotel was delicious. For those with a sweet tooth, Jill’s Sweet bakery can’t be missed. We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: cpg20162017, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit! We are so glad we were able to provide excellent customer service even before you arrived. We look forward to providing lodging accommodations for you and your family again in the future. Until then!

Summary Heading: Clean, in good location, nice stay!
Summary: Stayed 2 nights, check-in was pleasant and very accommodating when we had to stay an extra night unexpectedly.  Room was clean and bright.   Breakfast had cereals, pastries, breads all individually wrapped for safety as well as waffles which is a favorite. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Susan, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity to the restaurants/bars in the area truly is such a perk! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We enjoy the indoor pool/spa, Breakfast is plentiful and many options to choose from, the hot meals are delicious 😋  We like walking down to the beach and the town always has great restaurants to choose from.   We eat Ketovore and we found BUTTER coffee at Bogart's coffee house ☕🧈
Manager Response: Dear Jojodragon12, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your recent visit! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast!   We hope you choose to stay with us for your future lodging accomodations!

Summary: Planned my trip to the LA area, found the great deal I booked on Expedia. I recommend The Pacific Inn for its beautiful location. Lots of places to eat close by. The rooms were very clean and comfy! Staff were all very nice. Due to COVID restrictions and precautions, housekeeping was not able to clean rooms during our stay. Despite, my partner and I were still able to enjoy our stay! Also, a nice touch was they had fresh warm baked cookies in the lobby for the guests to enjoy.. nice touch!! This was a nice break from the cold Chicago winters!!
Manager Response: Chicagovince1971, thank you so much for your kind review and rating! We are glad you were to able enjoy your little get away from the Chicago cold!  We hope you choose to stay with us again during your next visit to Seal Beach!

Summary: The Pacific Inn was wonderful.  The location is within walking distance to the beach and many stores, restaurants, bars etc.  All the staff I encountered were friendly and helpful.  Would not hesitate to stay here again.  Also, Seal beach itself is fabulous and a hidden gem.
Manager Response: Dear Dgraff87, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Thank you for your warm comments about our town and staff! We are so glad you enjoyed everything the hotel we have to offer! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: I love this hotel . My room was recently renovated. The colors are cheerful and the room was spotless .  I have stayed there numerous times over the past 10 years. Every time I have been very pleased with the room and especially the staff. The staff is genuinely friendly and knowledgeable. The morning breakfast is perfect and the hostess very personable .
Manager Response: Sue, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.  We are excited to hear you enjoyed our newly remodeled room! Thank you for leaving such kind compliments about our staff. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great for our New Years get away
Summary: We have been coming here for 20 years and its always fun. This Holiday was excellent.. We had a blast and love the walking distance to everything. The area is clean and restaurants and bar5s are close, and we rent bikes and go along the coast  site seeing taking in the ocean air.
Manager Response: Kathy, thank you choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.  We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity to the restaurants/bars in the area truly is such a perk! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: This hotel has everything. The rooms are clean and spacious. The beds are so comfortable and the linens and pillows are clean and cozy. The outside of the hotel is clean, quiet and safe. Free safe parking. A wonderful outdoor pool and jacuzzi. A delicious FULL breakfast from 5:30 - 10 am. Free coffee, cookies and water in the office and the most friendly helpful staff I have ever encountered. A true gem in Seal Beach.
Manager Response: Noreen, thank you so much for your kind review and rating! We were thrilled to provide lodging accomodations for you and your family. We hope you choose to stay with us again during your next visit to Seal Beach.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for quick overnight before cruise
Summary: Stayed here for one night before a Carnival cruise. Very friendly and helpful staff. Great location, near by Main St. great for a walk, window shopping. Wonderful breakfast included. Their Cruise Shuttle was not available either to or from the port, but they arranged a ride share both ways. Will definitely stay here again for our next cruise out of Long Beach.
Manager Response: Mike, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad we were able to assist in having a smooth transition to the cruise. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your visit. Until next time!

Summary: We really liked this place for our stay in Seal Beach.  Our room was very comfortable and well equipped.  Even though our balcony overlooked the street , we enjoyed the fresh ocean air breezes and we noticed no noise from the street. The underground parking was also a plus!   It was great to be able to walk into the village or to the beach.....perfect location!!  We didn't use it but the pool and hot tub area looked wonderful, centered in the hotel as it was.   We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed everything the hotel we have to offer! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: I love this hotel.  It is older but I feel safe here and there is shopping and restaurants across the street.  The staff are amazing and getting the shuttle to and from the ship makes things so nice. I parked my car in their covered garage and had no worries about it while cruising.
Manager Response: BRUMMITTL,  thank you for taking the time to tell us about your visit! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We had an issue with our key card not working.  The staff responded immediately.  Very clean. Very walkable to restaurants, and the beach.  The pier is a great place to walk. Definitely will stay here again.  The daily breakfast had numerous items to choose from.
Manager Response: bburgemptynester, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your visit! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I was expecting it to be a good stay at the Inn, but they exceeded those expectations! The area is nice - walkable to the beach and cute little downtown area and a short drive to Long Beach. The courtyard hot tub was fun to enjoy, and their breakfast coffee was surprisingly good. Comfy beds, clean room. Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Lodders25, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to knoe you enjoyed your recent visit here with us! We take great pride in providing excellent customer service and we are so glad we were able to do just that during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Been coming here for 20 years , always great ..😄 Had a great New Years experience.✨✨Always clean and courteous.. I love the morning continental breakfast, the area is centrally located to everything. It’s nice to be able to walk everywhere and be in a clean and safe area..
Manager Response: Squeezydogs, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accomodations. We are thrilled to know you you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We stayed here for one night before our cruise out of Long Beach. We did the parking package, included a shuttle to and from the port and parking for the week. The front desk staff was phenomenal. Very helpful and friendly. The breakfast staff was great as well. The breakfast itself was good. Omelet with turkey sausage and hash browns, along with waffles, bagels, cereal, baked goods, yogurt and more. The shuttle driver was very friendly and on-time. Room was nicely remodeled and clean. We will be staying here again and hope to have more time to explore the area.
Manager Response: Dear Beth , thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed the amenities we have to offer! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn for one night to attend a birthday part at a near by restaurant and not drive back to our home in LA after drinking.  Not only was it a perfect, quiet, clean hotel, but when we inquired the best way to get the half mile to the restaurant, they offered their shuttle--free!!.  And we were able to call the shuttle to come pick us up and take us back, Lovely receptionist, great shuttle driver.  A really perfect experience.
Manager Response: Dear PlanariaP, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed the amenities we have to offer! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: We like quiet accommodations and found it in Seal Beach at the Pacific Inn. Check in was easy and quick. Stairs and elevators were well marked and in the right places. Half a block from Pacific Coast Highway so there was no traffic noise. Parking is under the hotel, I found a space in the evening. One time I couldn't, parked for free on the street steps away from the lobby. Breakfast is better than most. They need to update their printed channel list!
Manager Response: Harry H, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your recent visit! We have made a note to review our channel directory and update where needed. Thank you again for your kind review and suggestions. Until next time!

Summary: Friendly staff, no nickel and diming for stuff like water bottles, nice location - easy walk to beach, free parking, free basic breakfast.  Close to many shopping areas as well. Easy accessto interstate.  If I were to come back and stay around here, I would definitely stay in this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Value Guest, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity to the shops and restaurants truly is such a perk! Thank you for such kind comments about our ammenties. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: My daughter and I just stayed at The Pacific Inn Saturday and Sunday. This is our go to when we are in town! We enjoyed all facilities and the staff was friendly and helpful.  Highly recommend when visiting Seal Beach.  Bobbi Orel from Tennessee.
Manager Response: Bobbi , thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! Customer service is our top priority so we are thrilled to know we were able to provide just that during your trip. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: This was our first time at seal beach and we were looking spend time with my husband since his ship was stationed at the base.  I loved that this hotel was walking distance to a lot of the shops and restaurants.  The hotel was clean and the hot tub was a nice feature.
Manager Response: Doreen, thank you for the awesome review! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your visit with us! We hope to provide lodging accommodations for you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: We stayed here for one night before our cruise and used the Park and Cruise package.  Great hotel, and a great time in Seal Beach.  We appreciated being able to leave our car here during the cruise which was a big savings over the cruise port parking.  Hubby enjoyed his specialty coffees available in the lobby!  The ride to the port was much appreciated too.  We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: plrmafamily, thank you so much for your review! We so appreciate your recurring business! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The location and price are unbeatable. Excellent staff and service. Lots of amenities and extras. I have stayed here 4 times and will come back again. Best of all - they take dogs and there is a beautiful park rigHt across the street. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dianne, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! Your recurring business is very much appreciated. We hope to welcome you and your family back soon! Have a wonderful day.

Summary: Everyone person I came in contact with was so friendly, helpful and just really nice. You can tell they all like their job and do whatever they can to make ones stay very nice. The rooms themselves were very clean and comfortable. We had a executive room (231) that was really large with a great bathroom and shower. We didn’t do breakfast so can’t comment on that but if it’s done as well as everything else, I’m sure it was great. Parking was so easy and the location seriously can’t be beat. I’d definitely stay again and highly recommend.
Manager Response: Mlbchris, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! Customer service is our top priority so we are thrilled to know we were able to provide just that during your trip. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Ever time we cruise out of Long Beach this is the only hotel we will stay at as it’s a great location and excellent customer services. Rooms always are very clean. Staff is very helpful. The coffee machine in the lobby is an extra perk with MANY choices.
Manager Response: Teebird60, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate your recurring business! Our Park and Cruise package truly is one of our most popular packages. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your visit and look forward to welcoming you back again for the next crusie! :-)

Summary: I raised my 3 daughters in Seal Beach.  My youngest still lives here.  She planned her wedding in Seal November 30th so our entire family, me, her dad, her sister and family, her Bride Maid, and other guests all stayed at the Pacific Inn for almost a week.  It is the only place I will stay when I come to visit.  Your hotel has a nice atmosphere, is clean, has a friendly staff, and has the perfect location. It's always a pleasure to stay with you.
Manager Response: Lisa, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad we were able to make your wedding trip extra special. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future. Until next time!

Summary: I will be updating my review after my stay next week, but after getting off the phone with them, I feel compelled to review my booking process. I had the good fortune of speaking with a person named Kahn, who was so incredibly polite and professional. He helped arrange my stay,  and told me about their optional add on for people going on a cruise. They will let us keep our car in their lot for the duration of our cruise, and transport us to and from the port. This makes things so much easier and is a fraction of the price of parking at port. I'm just so thankful to Kahn for his kindness, knowledge, and patience. Really good vibes from him. Thank you!
Manager Response: Kina, thank you for the wonderful review!  We are so glad Khan was able to help you with the booking process. We look forward to your visit!

Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay at the Pacific Inn. Nice rooms, great covered parking and wonderful complimentary breakfast and newspaper! We went to a show at Spaghettini’s and we were delighted to learn they had a shuttle to drive us there and pick us up later. They had a very small gym and I was able to even get my workout in.  Definitely recommend !
Manager Response: Robertaa5854, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Perfect location, spacious clean rooms, free parking and nice breakfast. The room was clean. The lobby was nice. I gave it a 4 out of 5 because the door lock didn’t work properly and had to get a new key everyday. Room 231 door lock needs to be fixed.
Manager Response: Scenic400282, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit. We greatly appreciate the honest feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: We absolutely enjoyed our stay at The Pacific Inn. It was clean, cozy, the staff was helpful and polite. Loved that I only had to walk across the hall way to pick up breakfast :) Location is perfect. Close to shopping, restaurants and the beach. Can’t wait to return for summertime and enjoy a weekend here with my daughters.
Manager Response: Vivian, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your weekend here with us! Our close proximity to the shops and restaurants truly is such a perk! We look forward to welcoming you back in the summertime!

Summary Heading: Great stay. Perfect location for where we were going
Summary: Great breakfast. Perfect location. Clean rooms, plenty of towels. Would recommend this hotel for sure. Fiance was in the parade and location was great. Love the view from the balcony. Definitely worth checking out if you need a hotel in the area
Manager Response: mattkY3358UZ, thank you for choosing the Pacific In for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay during the holiday event. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: I came down to visit my daughter who is attending UC Irvine.  Check in was easy and there were cookies and an espresso machine in the lobby. Free parking is amazing as I had to pay $30/ night at a hotel in Long Beach last time. Room was decent as was the breakfast. My only issue was that the fitness center didn’t open until 8pm. It would be nice to have it open by 5-6 am for people that want to get their workout in when they have other things planned for the day.  Staff was friendly and professional. Convenient location near lots of shops and restaurants.  Cute town.
Manager Response: Christinemds, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad we were able to provide comfortable accommodations during your visit to UC Irvine. Our current hours of operation for the fitness center are from 8am to 10pm but we have made a note of your feedback and will take it into consideration for the future. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your visit as we are always looking for ways to improve our facility.  Until next time!

Summary: This was our first stay at the Pacific Inn. We will definitely stay there again. It’s less than a 1/2 mile walk to the beach and a 10 min walk to Main Street. The free breakfast and cappuccino machine in lobby were lovely.  We had an executive room with 2 queens and balcony. Rooms aren’t fancy but clean and nice. + room fridge, Keurig and microwave were all nice.
Manager Response: Montiong, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your recent visit here with us! Our close proximity to Main St and to the Seal Beach Pier truly is such a perk! We look forward to welcoming you back should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, great location, nice room
Summary: We had a room with 2 queen beds and a balcony. The mattresses were comfortable and the room was clean and roomy. The room had the amenities we like: refrigerator/freezer and coffee maker and the hotel has a pool and jacuzzi. The continental breakfast has many options and the omelet, potato and sausage combo was really good! The hotel's location is very close to Main street and the beach, so it's nice to leave the car parked at the hotel and take the nice stroll downtown. The front desk staff were really nice and friendly, making us feel very welcome. This was a nice stay and we will be back!
Manager Response: rebecamU8886JD,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We live on Catalina island and are 8 months pregnant. After a minor scare we needed to stay on the mail land for a few days. The pacific inn is close to Long Beach memorial and we enjoyed being able to enjoy Main Street in seal beach. It’s so close to all the restaurants and shops and beach. It was a perfect location.  The staff was friendly. The room was clean and their continental breakfast was lovely.
Manager Response: 00HuntersMomm, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you were able to find comfort in staying at The Pacific Inn. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I enjoyed the location near the beach and the nearby restaurants. Free parking. Nice front desk staff. However, I wouldn't stay again due to the discomfort of the ultra firm beds in our room. Poor vending machine selection.
Manager Response: Ms. Brown, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your visit. We sincerely apologize it was anything less than satisfactory. Our front desk team is available 24/7 to provide aid to any issue you may have. In order to accommodate all our guest on mattresses preferences, we have a mix of firm and pillow top mattresses throughout the hotel. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, we will make sure to inspect the mattress and replace as needed to provide all our guest with comfortable beds.   The vending machine we have on our second floor hallway belongs to a 3rd party. However, we are currently looking for better alternatives to provide an excellent selection for our guests.  We hope  you choose to stay with us again and allow us to remedy these issues! Have a wonderful day!

Summary: I have stayed here twice and both times have had an amazing experience.  It’s quiet and VERY conveniently located.  We flew in and didn’t have a car but were able to walk downtown and to the nearby marina with ease.  The surrounding neighborhood is incredibly charming too.  The room was clean and up to date. The patio porch was perfect for sitting with our morning coffee.  Breakfast was ok but there were so many healthy options close we always did that instead.   The staff was very responsive to our needs and always courteous.   My only issue with leaving this positive feedback is that if more people know what a gem this is, they won’t have openings for me.  Thanks pacific inn for a great weekend!!
Manager Response: Debbursell, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Guest satisfaction is our top priority so we are thrilled to know you enjoyed our location, customer service, and the cleanliness of our boutique hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I was visiting my daughter who attends CSULB. Had a wonderful time staying at the Pacific Inn. It is a perfect location and staff is always helpful and friendly. We walked to the shops, restaurants and the beach several times.
Manager Response: AubrynK, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent visit! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: My husband and our two dogs and I always stay at the Pacific Inn when we visit California to see my dad. The location is PERFECT- walking distance to the beach and a sweet little beach town “main” street with shops and restaurants. Just off Pacific Coast Highway, so a gorgeous drive awaits that can take you all the way to San Diego. Positioned nicely between LA and San Diego, so the world is your oyster. Two thumbs up!
Manager Response: Jen S, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are thrilled to know you have enjoyed your stay with us time and time again. We greatly appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: This place is super convenient, clean and just an overall great place to stay. Staff is very friendly, our room was nice and quiet and we immensely enjoyed our stay here! It was our anniversary and the staff even left us plates and cutlery so we could enjoy our annivesary cake.
Manager Response: Jennifer, thank you for taking the time to stay with us! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: I have been coming to this hotel for years. It’s consistently clean and welcoming. I recommend this hotel to anyone I know. The area is a perfect walk to the beach and all the restaurants you could really want. The coffee machine in the lobby is my favorite as well, makes the perfect lattes!
Manager Response: Samantha, thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent visit. We are so glad you've foudn our hotel to be clean and our staff to be welcoming. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Overall, my spouse and I really enjoyed this hotel. It offered a wonderful clean pool indoors that our daughter could enjoy. The continental breakfast was just above average compared to other hotels. Our room was clean and no odor. The fact the rooms came with a fridge, microwave, and keurig was such a nice touch. Made the experience more homey. The location was outstanding too. Lots of cute shops and delicious restaurants. Our only issue was the bed. Our backs were not happy campers, and we had pretty light sleep.
Manager Response: 508cassieh, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit here with us! We're sorry to hear about the mattress. We have made a note and will inspect the room and make the changes necessary. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: Very nice, clean accommodations at The Pacific Inn.  The hotel is just a short walk to downtown & the pier.  Very nice breakfast.  Evening cookies were a nice treat!  All of the staff members we encountered were great!
Manager Response: David, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit. We are so glad you found our staff to be great. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is my happy place. We spent a week and was awesome. All COVID protocols were followed and I felt very safe. The lobby looks beautiful and is clean and well maintained as is the rest of the hotel. I always enjoy the individually wrapped cookies in the late afternoon. The entire staff is friendly and very helpful. I love my special room with its comfy bed and lots of pillows. Looking forward to our December  visit. A gem of a hotel in a great little town.
Manager Response: Ruth, thank you again for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so thrilled to be able to provide an excellent stay throughout each of your stays here with us! We look forward to welcoming you back in December. Until then! :-)

Summary: One of my favorite places to stay !  Location is perfect. Short walk to the beach. Nice rooms. Staff is always helpful and very attentive . They serve breakfast but my favorite is their coffee machine in the lobby !! It’s my home away from home. Great place for a get away!!
Manager Response: Tamarah,  thank you for the kind review and rating! We are happy to provide a home away from home! :-) We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: What can I say bad about this hotel. NOTHING! First of all staff was amazingly nice, picked us up at the airport, fresh cookies and coffee in lobby, free breakfast that was organized clean and freshly cooked. Room extremely clean.  A plus stay. Clean! Walking distance to seal Beach and cute stores and local restaurants. Wonderful pleasant  surprise.
Manager Response: Michele P,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay. We strive to deliver excellent service at all times and we are so glad we were able to do so during your visit. Until next time!

Summary: The price of this hotel and location was why I booked it. It was my birthday and my dad had just passed and I really need to have some quiet, alone time. The hotel was older but cute and clean. They were not ready for me (and a few other guests) to check in at 4p and seemed surprised that people were trying to check in. The door to my room was a pain and it would take several minutes and a special jiggle to get the key to work. This was super annoying and a huge problem when I was in a hurry. The pillows could definitely be updated and replaced.  Mine were as flat as pancakes. But, the staff was amazingly friendly and that went a long way. There was also free bottles of water. And the coffee machine in the lobby was super fun and yummy.  Plus, it was within walking distance to
Manager Response: mom2my4, thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your experience. We greatly appreciate the feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve. We have made a note of these issues as will do our very best to improve in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Although the staff is extremely nice, I was bothered that the executive suite I booked a month ago was already given away. My husband and I had to settle for the double queen executive suite which was anything but. I was assured it was the same as the king bed exec suite but I doubt it, as in the pic there was a couch in the room I booked (no couch in the double queen suite).   I thought from reading the reviews, this place was super clean, it was not. Really old, nasty carpet and a lovely view of a restaurant trash dump from my balcony. Also there was a strong “marinara” odor coming from the refrigerator and sink. It was nauseating.
