This trip was not a vacation, it was a quick stay while our home was being fumigated for termites, but I expected more. In hindsight I wish I
Manager Response: none

Summary: Employees are always super friendly!   Rooms are always clean and complementary breakfast is delicious.   We stay in the family suite, it’s absolutely perfect for our family of 5.   We will absolutely  be back!
Manager Response: Kristi, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your visit. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Updated Vibe and Best Breakfast Around
Summary: Location is right across the street from a Tacobell/PizzaHut and McDonalds for fast food ease. The rooms have been updated and look very modern. LOVE the large bathroom area with barndoor closure door. Breakfast is great-large variety of foods, cereal, bagels/toast, muffins, pastries, make a waffle, juice/milk/coffee. We will stay here everytime we are in the area- I love this place.
Manager Response: alexandermichelleh, thank you so much for the kind review and rating! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Loved everything about this hotel. The room, staff, the pool, the breakfast. It was all so wonderful. Will definitely be staying again in the future. This was my first time in California and the hotel made it an even better vacation.
Manager Response: Mirandab, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: It was a really nice stay and I would highly recommend to stay here! Very nice and friendly staff and the rooms are really nice and clean, it is really close to the beach, and the breakfast was amazing
Manager Response: Stubeajo90kp, thank you for the kind review and rating!! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: For our overnighta between flight and ferry travel we picked a great spot! Free shuttle, very comfy, stylish, clean room with a verandah. Great coffee in reception, a good breaky and great location. Perfect for an enjoyable walk to Seal Beach Pier and the village with heaps of food choices and cool shops. Thankyou for the very friendly accommodating welcome! We are from NZ but will tell our friends!
Manager Response: Sandra, thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your visit! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed yoour short stop here at our hotel. We truly hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to Seal Beach.

Summary: This was a great experience. We were on the road traveling for 2 weeks and this was one of only 4 motels we would stay at again or recommend to friends. The staff was friendly and very helpful. Our room was very clean and the exterior of the motel was clean also. The breakfast was good and hot with a variety of choices and the breakfast room was clean. We will stay here again if we are in this area.
Manager Response: Edward, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit here with us! It was our pleasure to provide lodging accommodations during your 2 week roadtrip! We look forward to welcoming you back soon! We hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: I have stayed at The Pacific Inn on several occasions and always been happy!  The staff are extremely nice and go out of their way to help you!  It is a very convenient location with great local food and shopping and walking distance to the beach!  I was there for work, but had time to enjoy the local area!  I would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Mandy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so happy to know we were able to provide excellent customer service during your quick work trip.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The room was not renovated…..the carpet smelled and the bathroom Door would not stay open! The bed was hard as a rock and there were these tiny square pillows that were also hard as rocks!   Great location if you do not require a comfy bed!  Staff was very friendly and the lobby coffee was good!
Manager Response: Kara, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your visit. We are so sorry it was anything less than satisfactory. Our building has been around for over a decade so we have been slowly renovating the hotel all while staying open! :) In regards to the bed and pillows, our front desk team is available 24/7 to provide aid to any issue you may have. We have a few rooms with firm beds and others with soft mattresses for those who prefer a softer mattress. We hope you choose to stay with us again and allow us to remedy these issues! Have a wonderful day!

Summary: I enjoyed my recent repeat stay at Pacific Inn. It's a great location & all the staff were very friendly. The room was very clean & had everything I needed. I enjoyed the nice breakfast every morning & the pool/hot tub area is nice as well.
Manager Response: cmh0123, thank you for taking the time to rate and leave a review of your recent visit! We are thrilled to know we were able to provide just what you needed during your trip. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!!

Summary: Staff were friendly, courteous, and helpful! Room was clean and comfortable! Many different styles of restaurants within walking distant. Room had all the amenities that we needed. We would definitely stay here again when we are in Seal Beach!
Manager Response: Lizzie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay and found out staff to be courteous. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: Not fancy but very clean, comfortable and within walking distance to everything. What made it so enjoyable was they allowed dogs making both of us happy. Very courteous staff and the breakfast was well worth going to. Next time I visit Seal Beach I will be staying at the Pacific Inn.
Manager Response: Jean, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!!

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel twice already and Plan on returning. Both times were great experiences. Location is great. Walking distance to restaurants and shops. Very close to the beach although I still drove since I had my son and his toys . It was less than 5 minutes to get there. The staff is very friendly and have always been greeted with a smile. From the young lady who answers the phone to the young man at the counter . Everyone is great. I definitely recommend to anyone who is looking for a little getaway .
Manager Response: Lizette, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you had outstanding experiences both times you were here with us! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Absolutely the ONLY place I’ll stay when visiting my friends!  Friendly, courteous service from the entire staff.I’m planning another visit in October!   Can hardly wait!  You’ll be happy to stay there soon.
Manager Response: Bonnie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed yet another stay here with us. We are thrilled to know that we are your go to hotel when visiting Seal beach. We look forward to welcoming you back in October!

Summary: We only stayed at the Pacific Inn 1 night, but wished it was longer. The location is great, close to the beach and all sorts of places to eat. It's so much easier to  park here (FREE, safe parking) and walk to the beach than worry about finding a spot at the beach and paying all day.  Our room was right next to the pool, which was great, but it was still quiet and relaxing. The breakfast was great too. Things are a little different because of COVID, but there were still lots of great options for hot breakfast, as well as cereal, bagels, etc.   Everyone we interacted with was great ... I can't say enough great things about this place. It felt like finding a hidden gem that checks all of the boxes for a beach vacation!
Manager Response: Scohaus, thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a kind review and rating! We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your recent visit. We truly look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This is the third time that we stayed at the Pacific Inn.  Our pleasant room was an adequate size with a small balcony (that unfortunately overlooked a noisy highway).  However, the pool area outside our room was a bonus as it is indoors but has an open roof so that we could relax there and read as well as use the pool and hot tub. The staff was very accommodating and provided necessities as we were on our own to take care of room needs-due to the covid situation. And the manager, Freeman made sure that our stay was pleasant and positive.  Plenty of  bottles of water, free breakfast, and the second bonus was the shuttle which took us to and from the airport as well as to a local restaurant.  The location is ideal (especially if you don't have a car) as there are stores and
Manager Response: Idelle, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your time here with us. We hope to provide lodging accommodations for you again soon.

Summary: We found the whole Pacific Inn experience mixed at best. On the positive side, the rooms were clean and well kept; the beds were comfortable. The location was great from our point of view, an easy walk to Main Street and to the beaches.  And they are certainly trying to take the covid situation seriously.   On the negative side: there were a large series of weird things, stuff that was just "off."  When we arrived, a woman ahead of us was arguing with the front desk clerk about getting extra towels for her room.  He refused.  She was also having her room card re-keyed.  We checked in (two rooms to accomodate my wife and me, and our daughter and her friend), and proceeded to our rooms, and  found that our keys didn't work.  That wasn't quite true: after half a dozen tries, we
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff are very friendly and accommodating. This location is dog friendly! Breakfast is perfect daily. Rooms are clean and beds are comfortable. The only issue was parking. If you come back to the hotel too late it’s hard to find a parking spot on the property. Finding a spot on the street is nearly impossible. If you have anything more than a car you are definitely limited with a spot as the back parking lot only has just a few you can park a bigger vehicle in. But the hotel staff allowed us to park in the 10 min parking by the lobby.  This hotel is just a 5 min walk to Main St that has many stores and restaurants that lead to the beach. This was our second year visiting and we will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent visit. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Five minute walk to the lovely downtown.
Summary: We loved our stay, nice room, very clean, balcony was great with ocean breezes, pool area was nice. They even give evening chocolate chip cookies in the lobby. We will definitely stay again. We will tell friends and family about this nice hotel, we liked it a lot.
Manager Response: Angela, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. The chocolate chip cookies are our thank you to all of our wonderful guests. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Air conditioner was blocked by a couch, so it wasn't as cold as it could of been but overall I love the place
Summary: It was a great relaxation and mini break before reporting back to Arizona and the heatttt. Freeman the General Manager was very helpful and great person.  The front desk were very helpful and friendly and found out I could use boogie boards and umbrellas if needed the next time.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you for the honest feedback! We will take a look at the layout of the room you were in and remedy the issues you experienced during your visit! We hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: The visit to The Pacific in was transcending even though I was on a business trip. They made me feel like I was the only guest at the Inn. Just a short walk from great restaurants and the beautiful beach.
Manager Response: Troy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled we were able to provide excellent customer service during your stay! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here for combo family visit & business trip and requested room on top floor away from elevators.  Request accommodated. Room was comfortable, clean and spacious and happened to be close to breakfast room where we could fill our portable mugs with fresh brewed coffee rather than using the Keurig (not a fan) in the room. Breakfast was just ok but understandable limitation due to COVID restrictions.  Great location within walking distance to restaurants. Parking is always an issue close to the beach. Unfortunate timing of our stay during street construction. Could use more ventilation in bathroom area with towels not drying quickly/well. But front desk staff very pleasant and accommodating with providing new towels, etc.  All in all, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Yamagobo, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate the feedback as we are always looking to improve our hotel. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: I must have enjoyed it I am already booked to stay again in February
Summary: The absolute best part about this Inn is the location.  A 3 block walk to the beach which is well maintained and was not crowded. It is a 2 block walk to a historic shopping street, lined with quaint little shops and eateries. The staff at this hotel were extremely friendly during my reservation process. During the check in process it was a little difficult for me to hear through the plexiglass and the masks. It was an easy process (with the exception of I have never before been charged an additional amount for checking in a 2 hours and 15 minutes early.) It was a very nice room. Everything we could want was waiting for us. We were quite pleased by the size and performance of the refrigerator in the room. The coffee pot in our room was not the Keurig I had prepared for, but was
Manager Response: Susan, thank you so very much for your detailed review. We pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service and we are so glad we were able to do that for you despite our covid regulations. In the near future we will be expanding our breakfast options to what they were before the pandemic. (veggie omelet, scrambled eggs, Canadian bacon, and sausage links)  We greatly appreciate your recurring business and look forward to seeing you again in February.

Summary: Walking distance to the beach and downtown area.  Older hotel that has had some updates.  The staircase by our room at the end of the hallway showed it’s age and could use an update. Breakfast was provided and was adequate but the same every day.  The waffles were popular and with only one waffle maker I was never able to get one. The hot breakfast- egg patty, turkey sausage links and potatoes were served in a container. The potatoes would have been better if baked to crisp but were just warmed up. There were gluten free blueberry muffins which was nice for my husband with Celiac’s. GF bread would be nice addition. The coffee machine in the lobby gave you lots of choices but had a sign that stated it was out of order the last couple days we were there. Housekeeping was not
Manager Response: Nellie,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accomodations. We appreciate the suggestions as we are always looking for ways to improve and promote guest satisfaction. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Nice room, great "free breakfast". Friendly staff. This is a quiet place within walking distance to the beach, the Seal Beach pier, and many great pubs and restaurants. It is also a short drive to many fun locations in Long Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations! We are so glad you found our hotel to be quiet and convenient! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I wish I could give this hotel more, but unfortunately not what I was expecting. The staff was very nice and accommodating. Although the room was ok, it was not worth the money paid. The beach wasn't as close as I initially thought it was going to be; it was about 1/2 mile. If you have issues walking  be prepared to reserve a shuttle. They do have the merchant street to shop which was nice, but it took a bit to find. Seems that the walls were very thin; meaning we heard everything outside and next door including toilet flushing. :(
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you for  choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your visit. We would like to apologize for the issues you experienced with us.  Guest satisfaction is our highest priority and we will ensure that these issues you mentioned are taken care of to avoid this from happening again in the future. Thank you again for giving us the opportunity to improve our product and service.

Summary: This is a nice, family hotel. Rooms and onsite pool were clean. Staff was friendly and helpful. It's also very close the beach and on the other side, close to shopping. Enjoyed this town and our stay very much!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your recent visit. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel with a great location
Summary: We had a wonderful stay.  This is our 2nd stay at The Pacific Inn.  Hotel staff are great and rooms are clean and beds are comfy.  Forgot our toothbrush and they gave us one on the spot.  So glad they offer a good breakfast.  We used the pool and hot tub-nice! This hotel is within walking distance of great restaurants, shops and the Seal Beach Pier.  Will always stay here when visiting the area!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you for coming back for a second time! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit and that we were able to provide assistance where needed. Our location and close proximity to Old Town Seal Beach truly is such a perk! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This place was beyond my expectations.  Very accommodating & friendly staff.  Clean & comfortable room.  They accept pets for an additional fee.  Walking distance from a small park & Main St. for  shopping & dining. I will be returning.
Manager Response: Kimberly, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit. We were thrilled to offer lodging accommodations for you and your furry friend. Until next time!

Summary Heading: Close to Everything Seal Beach, Bars, Restaurants, Pier and Beach
Summary: This is a very clean hotel, quiet, and close to everything Seal Beach. The rooms are well appointed and clean. The breakfasts are a great way to jump start your day, very yummy! They have a wonderful coffee machine in the lobby that makes Cappuccinos, and Lattes from double shot to triple shot, A real day starter!! The staff was knowledgeable, more importantly, They were very friendly and helpful. Plenty of Bars and Restaurants surround the Inn, all within walking distance, to include the beach and pier Trip type Friends · Family Rooms5.0 Location5.0 Service5.0
Manager Response: Craig, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to accommodate your lodging in the future should your travel plans bring you back to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: Had a great stay, room and beds were great as always. Been staying at the Pacific Inn for years and won’t stay anywhere else when I visit. Really enjoy the central location for downtown Seal Beach, all restaurants and shops and beach within walking distance.
Manager Response: Bruce,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations! We are so glad you have been a loyal guest of ours! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: A well taken care of, older hotel. Our room was spacious and overlooked the park. Towels were too small. We stayed on the 2nd floor but we could hear loud footsteps from 3rd floor. Breakfast basic but adequate with a good choice. Liked the off road parking. Staff were very friendly and helpful.  Hotel was very convenient to Main St at Seal beach with plenty of restaurants to chose from.
Manager Response: Sally, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to rate and review your recent visit here with us! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Finally discovered Seal Beach and The Pacific Inn
Summary: This was our first visit to Seal Beach in over 30 years of living in So Cal. Quaint town and best deal was The Pacific Inn! Loved being able to walk into old town and to the pier and beach. Hotel staff was very professional and friendly. Hotel was clean. Breakfast was fantastic. They honored an online discount I had. We'll be back! Thanks!
Manager Response: Diane, thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent visit. We are so happy to know you enjoyed all aspects of your stay. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This is our 2nd year staying at The Pacific Inn and we are always pleased. We got to stay in a newly remodeled room this year and it was very nice. The staff is always attentive and helpful.      Suzanne CP
Manager Response: Suzanne, thank you for taking the time to rate and leave a kind review! We are thilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Nice place in quaint beach town
Summary: Clean comfortable rooms and a short walk to Main Street, Seal Beach.  Nice restaurants next door.  Friendly staff.  There is plenty of parking which is at a premium in town.  The hotel rooms seem to have been remodeled within the last few years.  Had a great time.
Manager Response: S298RWbrianw, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Once again, a good stay over
Summary: We are repeat customers.  This time we stayed in Room 233 near the pool. Our balcony overlooked a residential street.  Room was slightly smaller than the rooms along the longer wing, but it was quieter and darker.  It had excellent acoustical dampening, because there was a great family party taking place poolside.  When the door was closed, we heard nothing.   We were surprised by the road construction taking place in front of the hotel.  Fortunately, we know the area well - so we found our way to the parking lot  easily.  I was a little surprised they didn't mention this possibility when I made the reservation, two days prior. The parking is tight and we got the last space.  Can't comment on the breakfast: muffin was fresh.  Otherwise, enjoyed our stay as usual. This hotel is
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit! We greatly appreciate the feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: great location, within walking distance to downtown and beach. clean rooms with balcony,  reservation for pool and jacuzzi is perfect, we enjoyed that was only us and 1 other couple. I wish they keep that reservation system even after covid.  free breakfast which was great, free parking and hotel close to a lot of restaurants. There's coffee, tea & hot water available all time in the lobby.  They offer us bottles of water. professional and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Amal M, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Great walkability! One of my favorite places in SoCal!! Quite, close to everything, friendly staff. Love the 80’s vibe of  the  building and the daily breakfast ( good choices) is an added bonus. I will be back for sure!
Manager Response: Gabriele,  thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit here with us!! We take great pride in guest satisfaction. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: A delightful place to stay. Nice room, pleasant staff, a short walk to the beach and Main Street of Seal Beach.  Have stay here twice during Covid restrictions and felt very safe doing so. My second stay here, and will definitely come again.  Originally recommended by a local.
Manager Response: Vickie P,  thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit. We greatly appreciate your recurring business and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Fun in the sun with family ♡
Summary: OMG  our stay at Pacific Inn was great. It was more than what I expected.  The only bad thing was the City cutting the water off with no notice at all.. no wrong on pacific inn... we will be back hopefully soon. Very soon.  Thank you all at PACIFIC INN..
Manager Response: 606elainaa, thank you for taking the time to leave a kind review and rating. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I spent two nights at the Pacific Inn. The room was spotless and very tastefully decorated.  I had a nice balcony with a view of the park.   Location was great and was able to walk through the parking lot to a favorite restaurant. The Seal Beach shopping is the best and all walkable.   The staff was very accomodating at both the front desk and the breakfast room.  I strongly recommend this boutique hotel.
Manager Response: Maureen B, thank you for the kind review!! We are thrilled to know you enoyed your stay and our staff! :) We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great location! Clean! The friendliest staff
Summary: We give this a 4 star vs 5 is because our hot water was not super hot. It was a tolerable shower, hopefully just a glitch with our room. Otherwise, everything else was great especially for the price!! What a great value. It's a straight shot down to the beach, for our purposes it was very convenient. The room was a good size, free parking (parking lot felt totally safe and we were comfortable leaving the car no sketchiness) we did not use like we intended to, but there is a free shuttle that will take you within a few miles around so you could save uber $. We did not use the pool area, but saw it was being used every time we passed and it's actually nicer than the pictures in that it's open air atrium.  Guests seemed to be enjoying themselves, but not out of hand.  The lot was
Manager Response: jammycat5000,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit here with us. Feedback is always  welome as we are always trying to improve. We have noted the issue with the shower temperature and will have our maintenance team take a look at that. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: Great place to stay with super friendly employees!! Includes breakfast and they have beach chairs if you need them. Best coffee machine in the lobby ! Only a short walk to the beach ! Can’t wait to book my next trip😊
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind review, Tamara!

Summary: The Pacific Inn truly was a gem of a place. The room was perfect in every sense from the bed to the shower. The room was well kept and the bed was amazingly comfortable. The bathroom was also very nice with the body products provided have been of the best quality of any stay I’ve had. The customer service was also top tier with every single staff member we came across being nice and accommodating for anything we could ask about. They also allow the pool use with a reservation of course, which itself was also a great experience. I could go on longer about how great the stay was but I don’t want to drag it out any further. I will close this off with saying that the pacific inn truly was an amazing location and I will recommend it to anyone with the upmost confidence that you will
Manager Response: Henry, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are delighted to know you enjoyed your visit here with us! We take great pride in the cleanliness of our hotel and our customer service! We greatly appreciate the generous review an rating. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!!

Summary: This hotel is extremely  unprofessional  during my stay a bag was left behind because I had been rushed by ambulance  to the hospital  with kidney infection  . My family rushed to my side. The management  does greet or even look at you and it took 3 trips to this small hotel to locate my bag , 3 times finally when located and RETURNED threw  a friend ( cause I was hospitalized) money was missing around estimated  $ 9, 024.00 it was in a sealed  money band broke with a $50 and a 1 surviving  now the cameras dont show who took the money cause it would have taken place in the room .However the (manager who falsified  himself to me ) does feel the hotel is responsible  . STAY SOMEWHERE  ELSE THIS ISNT A SECURE PLACE , HONEST OR FRIENDLY
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. As we shared with you, the Security Camera footage clearly showed that we returned all your items that you left in the room. CA Civil Code requires you to place any valuables in the hotel safe. Unfortunately you did not do that. We have safety deposit boxes at the front desk, and every room has a written notice that a safe is available to you. The hotel is not responsible for guest property brought into the hotel, or any property alleged to be left behind.

Summary: We had a wonderful visit. The Pacific Inn maintained all COVID protocols. As always the staff was very friendly and helpful. The hotel was clean and care was taken everywhere to keep guests safe. The breakfast room had a great setup. Our room was clean and comfy. We are looking forward to our October and December trips. The Pacific Inn is my happy place. Thank you one and all for making our stay a great one.
Manager Response: Ruth, thank you so much for taking the time to leave a kind review and rating! As always, it was a pleasure to have you and your family stay with us! We greatly appreciate your recurring business. We look forward to your upcoming visits!! Until next time! :)

Summary Heading: Gave it a try, now we only like to stay here.
Summary: We travel for medical purposes on a regular basis.  I am so glad we tried out Pacific Inn.  Here is what we like: friendly staff, location, free parking, & warm pool.  As for the location, there is so much to enjoy.  It is a pleasurable walk if about two blocks to get to seal beach.  The landscaping of the houses is like pictures out of HGTV magazine.  There is McDonald's and Taco bell right across the street, bonus if you travel with kids.  Main street, with dinning and cute shopping is also a short walkable distance from hotel.  I like this location and feel safe staying here. Photos shared were taken from walk to the beach.
Manager Response: sanddreamer77,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations! We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your recent visit here with us. Our location and lose proximity to all the shops and restaurants on Main St truly is such a perk! We take great pride in providing friendly service and a safe environment for all of our guests. :) We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I have stayed at the Pacific Inn numerous times over the past several years. The Pacific Inn is a lovely hotel. The rooms are very clean, roomy and comfortable. The breakfast is delicious with several options. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  The location is excellent and it is within walking distance to Main Street. I would definitely highly recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Sandra, thank you so much for your recurring business!  We are thrilled to know that you have found our hotel to be clean and our staff to be friendly and helpful. We strive to deliver excellent customer service at all times and we are glad to know we have done just that over the years. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: End of our trip departure hitel
Summary: For our last night in LA area from Alaska. Great location, close to the beach/pier, and shops. Breakfast was great! Front desk was friendly, only thing was the carpet was damp, not sure if was just cleaned or something else. Also, was not aware prior to arrival we would have to reserve to pool area prior to use. My son and his friend were not able to use the pool due to another party having it reserved, yet the pool was empty. Otherwise, it was good.
Manager Response: Erma, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. During this time we are only allowing 2 parties in the pool area at a time for a total of 45min per reservation. Our front desk is available 24/7 to answer any questions, concerns, or in this case, follow up with exsisting pool/jac reservation. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: The climate is comfortable, there is no traffic, and the service is first-rate. I am going to buy this hotel.The breakfast is very rich and the service staff are very patient. The entire service area is clean and tidy
Manager Response: 378wanga, thank you so much for the positive review! We are so thrilled to know you enjoyed your visit. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Nice, clean hotel in great location. Impressed with safe, plentiful breakfast options. Beds were nice BUT please, please replace your pillows. Appreciate the fact these are washable BUT the neck ache and headache and poor night’s sleep just brought down my rating. Simple fix.
Manager Response: SBetchkal, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We would like to apologize for the issues you experienced here with us. We have made a note of these issues and will do our very best to correct them for the future. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to Seal Beach.

Summary: This is an understated hotel with a great location in Seal Beach! Walking distance to the Pacific Ocean, Main Street Seal Beach which is nicknamed Mayberry By The Sea for its quaint feel. Lots of great restaurants are nearby including American, French, Thai, Mexican and bbq. The rooms are fresh and modern with updated decor. They allow dogs! Get your free breakfast and sit on your balcony, free parking and it’s also next to Taco Bell and Macdonald’s for a quick meal. Will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Tessreal, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent visit here with us! We truly look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.

Summary: the location is great and the staff is friendly - my go to place when i am in socal. seal beach is very close and if you need a bit to eat, you can walk down main street which is a couple of block away. the location is prime.
Manager Response: 234on, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to now you enjoyed your recent visit here with us. Our close proximity to the restaurants on Main St truly is such a perk! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: BAD Driver of the courtesy van
Summary: This hotel is nice and very close to the beach.  The hotel staff and front desk are very nice and professional,  EXCEPT there's a Hispanic driver that took us to the beach and he was NOT friendly at all or professional.  At the end of the trip I told him "Thank you" and he did not said anything back RUDE!   so it kind of ruin  our day but we tried to ignore him.  And one day we seemed to be in the elevator at the same time and he started letting people in and it clearly says only 4 people in the elevator!! someone needs to train him please.   The hotel has a courtesy van that takes you around the area and I don't think they should ask him to be the driver, he is ruining your reputation!!
Manager Response: C3610LWmonical, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn and for taking the time to tell us about your experience here with us.  We would like to extend our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced regarding our shuttle driver. The customer service you experienced regarding this issue is not our standard, and does not match what we strive to provide to our guests during their time with us. Corrective action has been taken to ensure an interaction of this nature does not happen in the future.  We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future and allow us to remedy these issues.

Summary: We made a last minute decision to stay the night in Seal Beach. We took a chance on Pacific Inn. Fortunately they had a room available. The accommodations were excellent. I only wish that we could’ve stayed longer. I will definitely be back. By the way, it was an easy walk to Main Street.
Manager Response: johnsB6391YU, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your quick stay here with us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Our two kids, 6 and 9, request Pacific Inn whenever we talk of a SoCal beach getaway. They love the pool and spa best, and mom and dad love the location close to beach, food and shopping. Staff are professional and kind. The only area for improvement is environmental-friendliness. We appreciated that the plates, bowls and trays we're paper-based and not plastic. Yet, without obvious facilities, we brought all of our recycling home. Another eco-suggestion is having a filtered water bottle filling station in the lobby. This idea was inspired by all of the single use water bottle caps we found on the shore.🐬 We love Seal Beach and the Pacific Inn and will be back!❤️
Manager Response: Katherine,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to know this is your go to spot when visiting SoCal. We greatly appreciate your feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve! The water bottle filling station sounds pretty neat. Ill be sure to pass this along to our management team. :-)  Until next time.

Summary: Having been away from Seal Beach for a couple of years and needing to get back to the best beach community in Southern California, there was our old home at the Pacific Inn. ALWAYS friendly, local, clean and located in a great area. Spent my college years in Seal Beach and this still feels like home. REAL home town Inn,Enjoy
Manager Response: LostinWaihi, thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay here with us! We are thrilled to know that we are your home away from home. We greatly appreciate your recurring business and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Very conveniently located near beaches, restaurants, bars, and a nearby mall. The Long Beach airport is nearby too and so easy to fly in and out of. Great for walking around to look at shops, eat, get a coffee or gelato, etc. There is a free shuttle for destinations within 5 miles  (and to/from the Long Beach airport).  They were good about following COVID safety protocols. The pool and spa were by reservation only for now. That was a bit inconvenient but understandable in today's environment. Free hot to-go breakfast and free bottled water at the front desk. The coffee machine in the lobby made a surprisingly good cup of coffee.
Manager Response: Pats, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent visit here with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service even under these circumstances.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I chose this hotel based on the positive reviews and proximity to the beach. Hotel was clean, employees were personable, location was walking distance to a lot of restaurants and the beach. Only minor complaint was the limited access to the hot tub and the thin walls, but everything else overshadowed this and I would definitely return. I appreciated the parking and daily breakfast. Loved the small community and watching the sunset every night from either the pier or the beach. What a great find!
Manager Response: elizabethmU4102WG, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your recent experience. Due to COVID we are limiting the amount of guests we allow in the pool/jac area at a time. It is also first come first serve so we recommend making a reservation upon arrival. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: This is a modest hotel with a great location.   All the rooms have balconies...hint...ask for a room that is not on the street side.       Easy walking distance to town with lots of eating and shopping choices.    Customer service is excellent with easy check in.   Very nice pool area which is open with reservations due to COVID.     Includes breakfast which was OK even with COVID restrictions.  The only cons is that you must eat breakfast in your room as there is not an outdoor dining area and there isn't a table to put your food on.
Manager Response: yvonnemD8482FD, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodation! You are absolutely correct! Our guests have the option of asking for one of our Executive rooms which have park side view. These are newly renovated rooms and are sold at a bit higher rate than the standard rooms. We greatly appreciate your honest feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve. Thank you for staying with us! Until next time.

Summary: The hotel provided a great home base for adventures w/family nearby. The Seal Beach  neighborhood is extremely walkable w/a vibrant Main Street teaming w/shops & restaurants. The hotel breakfast is great w/waffles, sausage, eggs, pastries, & more! Our room appeared newly renovated & quite comfortable as well as spacious. The pool & hot tub area was great. Front desk staff went above & beyond in accommodation changes & assistance w/any requests.
Manager Response: randybeth12, thank you for choosing The pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit here with us! We strive to deliver excellent customer service in all aspects and we are thrilled to know we did just that. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: My room was on the second floor and had a wrap-around balcony. I had a great view of my favorite restaurant, Yucatan, across the street! All the staff was very friendly and courteous. The continental breakfast was very nice.
Manager Response: 676beckiec, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your visit! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: Perfect location! You can walk to everything. Staff was very nice. Great restaurant and shops.  Hotel was clean and had good covid measures. Great coffee and offered free breakfast. No charge for parking!
Manager Response: Carrie! Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed you had a fun birthday staying at our hotel.  We strive to deliver excellent customer service in all aspects and we are glad we did just that for you. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: The location of this hotel was perfect and close to the beach, shopping and dinning. The room was super clean and newly remodeled. Everything was great. I will definitely stay at this place again. The room was very spacious and very clean.
Manager Response: joseab111, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodation. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit and found your room to be spacious and clean! :-) We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: I'm very happy to write this review. The room was very clean. it overlooked the little green park directly behind the hotel. Beds were large and very comfortable. Everything in the room was working and in excellent condition. I was awakened by the stomping around in the room above us in the wee hours and you can clearly hear conversations in the hallway but THAT is the only negative thing I have to mention about this hotel. Attentive staff. Awesome coffee machine in lobby. Everything covid prepared. I appreciate that. We will continue to use The Pacific Inn every time we come out this way. They have accomodated us in some challenging ways. Nice hotel, super nice people and a nice walk to the beach!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay! We are so glad you found out rooms and hotel to be clean and comfortable. We would like to sincerelt apologize for the issue you experienced during your stay here with us. In the future please dont hesitate to call out FD team should a problem like that arise. They are available 24/7! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: The room was rellly clean. The hotel was really clean. The staff were very professional and nice. Walked to beach with my 4, 8,8,9,21 year old children nice short walk. Great place to stay. Beds were comfortable pull out sofa was a twin smaller than the picture looked, but did the job for older son. all around nice hotel. Reteraunts of all types right out side your door , cool balcony. They even let us swin for an hour at a time.
Manager Response: Paul, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know that you and your family enjoyed the amenities our hotel has to offer! The close proximity of the beach truly is such a treat! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: The stay was wonderful. Check in was a breeze and the staff were personable and helpful. The room was immaculate and the location was perfect, just a few blocks away from the main street heading toward the beach. The hot breakfast in the morning was exactly what I was looking for, even though it was limited due to COVID-19 precautions. Overall, for the price and area, this hotel is unbeatable. I can't wait to be back.
Manager Response: Cody, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thirlled to know you enjoyed your visit and found our staff to be helpful. We greatly appreciate the 5 star review and rating. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon! Have a wonderful day. :-)

Summary: My stay at the Pacic Inn with my family was exactly what I needed The beds were comfy and the room was immaculate.  I love how the pool is inside the hotel.  The staff was very kind and the free breakfast was delicious.
Manager Response: Tammy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay! We strive to deliver excellent service in all aspects so we are thrilled to know our amenities met your expectations. Until next time! :-)

Summary Heading: I had the place all to myself!
Summary: I was so excited to find this little treasure so last minute.  The staff was amazing and courteous and they were following strict Covid guidelines.  It brought me great joy to be able to reserve the pool and hot tub all to myself. The Continental Breakfast was awesome and they had a fresh waffle maker.  Will definitely come back. 🤙🏼
Manager Response: RootsdeChile, thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a  kind review and rating. We are working hard to keep everyone safe and still provide our special amenities.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Convenience and Comfort at a Fair Price
Summary: I frequently visit Orange County to see family in the area, and my last trip a friend recommended i try the Pacific Inn. Choosing this small boutique hotel made all the difference in my experience and move it to the outstanding category.  I was able to stay right off of PCH, withing a few blocks of the beach, and the town of Seal Beach, for the same price I had paid for a chain hotel close to 405. This allowed me to navigate to all of my favorite places and avoid having to deal with freeway traffic, as well as having the convenience of walk-ability to many food and beverage options.  In addition, the rooms were very large, clean and comfortable, and the breakfast room far exceeded expectations. Most hotels have resorted to a quick brown bag breakfast during COVID, but this place
Manager Response: Dear Michelle, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! Our close proximity to Old Town Seal Beach truly is such a perk!  We look forward to welcoming you back should you return to the area.

Summary: We just needed a place to crash before heading back out on the road. We were impressed with the service and cleanliness. Everyone is so kind and helpful. There is a pool, hot tub, and gym! Gym is currently unavailable due to Covid but we were impressed with the hotel over all. It is a simple cute hotel at good prices.  We booked an executive king room and I loved the room, simple yet luxurious. I’d definitely stay here again :D
Manager Response: y0alip, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to rate and review your recent stay here with us. We are so glad you enjoyed your short visit. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We needed somewhere to spend the holidays, and this was the place. We so enjoyed our visit here at the Pacific.  It has been our go-to rendezvous spot.  It truly meets all of our needs, from the quaint and quiet neighborhood park, for badminton to the stroll down main street to the beautiful 19i pacific paradise.  What a view from the pier!  This spot is really exceptional; a must for those in search of tranquility and the wonderful Southern California sun!
Manager Response: Curious565847, thank you for choosing us for your holiday getaway! We are so happy you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to having you back with us soon! - The Pacific Inn Team

Summary: This is an absolute great place to stay. Very clean and all the employees were very kind. Also its so very close to seal beach. Loved our stay and hoping to come back and visit again soon. The rooms had everything you needed, and if you forgot something like I did they had it down stairs for me. Also it was great that you could make reservations to go to the pool and hot tub. There was a 10 person max to make sure Covid rules were followed. It was a wonderful trip!
Manager Response: Amanda, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your visit! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The Pacific inn was beautiful safe clean great amenities pool is awesome the view is great view from my balcony linens were clean I couldn't say anything bad about this place If i tried .. beautiful beautiful place I recommend this place to anyone traveling for business family or just to get away for the weekend
Manager Response: SummerShinehblocal, thank you for taking the time to rate your recent visit here with us! We are so glad  our hotel was able to match your needs during your stay. We hope to see you again soon! :-)

Summary: Front desk professional and friendly. Premises immaculate. Pool and hot tub refreshing  Rooms are spacious with a fridge and microwave. Accommodated near restaurants and main street in Seal  Beach. Nice and secure hotel that offers ample parking on site.
Manager Response: Brenda, We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: My biggest gripe would be that check in isn't till later at 4pm and check out is 11am. Also when I got there for check-in they still needed time to finish cleaning my room. Otherwise I really loved it here! Clean rooms, good size rooms, everything worked well....thanks Pacific Inn.
Manager Response: Razerpops, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your experience here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to Seal Beach! :-)

Summary: Great hotel, room and location. Staff is awesome and beds are extremely comfortable. 24hr good coffee, easy and convenient free parking. I will put this hotel up against all the fancy ones. Shopping and beach minutes away walking distance.
Manager Response: I4164YZkenc, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. Our location truly is such a perk of staying at our hotel. :-) We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn was a perfect place for a safe, clean and quiet get away for New Year's Eve during the COVID pandemic. With 71 rooms it felt more like a resort without crowds. Staff members were always wearing masks, were polite and friendly. The building is very well maintained. Really loved the artwork in the hallways etc.  Very clean, nice room with a big bathroom. Absolutely enjoyed the private balcony and in room coffee maker. Good complimentary hot breakfast served individually, including additional choices of self service waffle maker,fresh fruit, cereal,  yogurt.  The room had Excellent sound proofing!  Didn't hear other guests once the door was closed. Great location to walk to the beach and pier without being charged a resort fee, plus free safe parking. The option to
Manager Response: MandraPearl, thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your visit at The Pacific Inn. We are glad you enjoyed your time with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service even under the circumstances. :-)  We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: I have stayed at this property several times and have not been disappointed. The rooms are clean and uo to date. The  staff is attentive and very helpful when I have requested anything. the hotel is within walking distance to everything including the beach.
Manager Response: johnwO7713QF, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay and look ffg forward to staying again. Rooms are very clean . Breakfast is great. Not many motels can compete with the pacific inn. I recomend everyone stay here. Friendly frontdesk and the accommodation are very helpful
Manager Response: 23flexz, thank you for taking the time to leave a kind review of your recent visit. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Amazing staff! All were great, I needed a couple of specialty requests handled and they came through with five stars! My 2019 truck battery died and they hooked me up with some power and then a mechanic!
Manager Response: Michael,  thank you for taking the time to leave a kind rating and review!  We are so glad we were able to offer you assistance with your truck! We look forward to welcoming you back should you return to Seal Beach.

Summary Heading: Convenient and comfortable for a SCUBA diver
Summary: After a long drive to Long Beach and a day of boat diving at Catalina, I needed a comfortable and convent place near the Seal Beach marina to get a night’s rest before going home. The Pacific Inn fit the bill perfectly. Comfortable, clean, and quiet in a friendly part of town.  With many dining options within a block and hot breakfast in the morning (even under COVID protocols), weary divers can’t go wrong.
Manager Response: 452arthury, thank you for choosing the Pacific Inn. We are so glad to know you have a comfortable stay here with us. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to rate your stay and leave a review for any future guests. Until next time!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a great stay! Rooms are newly remodeled. Refrigerator, freeze, microwave and coffee maker. No resort or parking fees. It is affordable! The rooms have a great balcony with chairs so you can open the screen door for fresh air. Breakfast included. Town and beach short walks away. Has been our covid escape....no one on the beach....
Manager Response: ski14,  thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit. We are so glad to know you enjoyed you stay here with us especially during these times. We do our very best to ensure all guests have an excellent stay here with us.  We truly hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: This Inn is immaculate!  The balcony is cute, the shower/bathroom is gorgeous and the room was immaculate and I had zero worries re Covid 19 protocols.  It had a mini fridge, microwave, a Keurig maker and even a Breakfast Room with outside seating in fresh air in an open air center atrium.
Manager Response: deboral880, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you such such an enjoyable time here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: I absolutely love staying at The Pacific Inn. The walk from the hotel to the beach is just perfect to see all the wonders of Main Street along the way. I’ve stayed solo, with a friend, and will soon be bringing my family again! I look forward to my stay every time !
Manager Response: 289karsene, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your visit! We greatly appreciate your recurring business and look forward to many more visits to come. Until next time!

Summary: Nice quiet hotel with a cozy room, good breakfast, and a quick walk to Seal Beach Main Street. Also good WiFi with no connectivity issues. We had just come from a hotel in the San Diego area that limited how many people per room could use the WiFi and had a ridiculously long password - it slightly soured our time there but the Pacific Inn was so much better! Oh, we also really enjoyed the fall decorations in the lobby as well as the coffee machine there, fun little personal touch.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review, 725charityg! We are thrilled to know that your visit was enjoyable and stress-free. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: We have stayed here many times over the years and every time is awesome. It feels like a second hime for us. The staff are the best and the location cannot be beat. Close to shopping and restaurants. Easy walking to everything.
Manager Response: bobbyl280, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate your recurring business and loyalty! We look forward to your next visit here with us.

Summary Heading: A very pleasant stay and friendly staff.
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by this gem of a hotel in beautiful downtown Seal Beach. The staff are friendly and can't do enough to ensure the best possible experience. I will definitely be returning there on my next visit to Seal Beach.
Manager Response: TridentWarrior, thank you so much for the kind review and rating! We do our very best to provide an excellent stay and expereince. We truly hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: I have been staying here two to three nights a week while I am working nearby. The freeway access is very handy and I love walking to eat dinner and look at the beautiful ocean. The staff is very accommodating and I will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to rate your recent visit, SonjiPVR! We are thrilled to know you found our staff to be accommodating and our loaction handy! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: Before I even arrived, customer service texted me and said they were available any time to assist. I did text them several times over my 5 day stay and they were very responsive! Everyone from the van driver to the breakfast helper was very kind and friendly and offered helpful ideas! Will definitely be coming back!
Manager Response: Pdowswell, thank you so much for taking the time to leave a kind review and rating. We are thrilled to know you were pleased with our team and establishment. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay here and grew to like Seal Beach even more. The hotel rooms are updated nicely. The neighborhood around was quiet during the week and a nice walking distance to everything. The staff were kind and I will be coming back.
Manager Response: StiiizySteve, thank you so much for the review and rating. We're glad you enjoyed your recent stay in Seal Beach. It truly is such a gem. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Lovely hotel in an excellent location! Reception & breakfast room staff are very friendly. Surrounding area of hotel safe, no ‘riff raff’ hanging around with a great little park for my dogs right behind the hotel & felt safe, even at 4am, to take dogs out to go toilet! Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: J8771VZalib, thank you for your kind review! We hope to see to again soon.

Summary: Both the night and morning staff were so amazing and kind. They really went above and beyond to make sure the guests are happy.   The hotel itself isn’t anything fancy, but the price is just right. They do offer a delicious breakfast and the lady manning the breakfast are was extremely kind.
Manager Response: Mladen1223, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are  thrilled to know you found our staff to be kind and helpful during your stay here with us. We look forward to your next visits here with us.

Summary: This is our third stay at The Pacific Inn in Seal Beach. We truly love it and in fact stayed here twice in October. Love the location and convenience of it being minutes away to the beach and good eats and shops. The customer service has always been superb.
Manager Response: 234on, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations! We are thrilled to know you  enjoyed yet another stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to Seal Beach.

Summary: We were evacuated due to a wildfire and the hotel staff was wonderful. They accommodated our day to day stay, as we weren't sure when we would be able to go home. We enjoyed the hot breakfast as well as the free parking. Its in a great location, just 2 blocks from the beach. The rooms could use some updating, but they were very clean.
Manager Response: lindagU1000WA, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you and your family were able to remain safe during these crazy times. We greatly appreciate your feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: I love staying here at the Pacific Inn! The rooms are really clean and the toiletries are bath and body works!The location is great and you can walk to the beach and visit restaurants and storefronts along the way! Nice and quiet we will be returning!
Manager Response: rachellemcdon, thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay here with us. We greatly appreciate kind words. Until next time!

Summary Heading: Friendly & helpful staff...very clean (COVID measures taken)
Summary: The title says a lot that is positive.  Suggestions, at least for someone like me who does not know the area:    DIRECTIONS TO YOUR PLACE:  It's a bit of a maze in the area with various waterways (as well as the ocean!), so instructions from various freeways would be helpful.  Perhaps they are on their website, but didn't see them.    Once there, you are walking distance to "old town" of Seal Beach - a real charmer - leading to the very long Seal Beach Pier (way out over the ocean) with no commercial enterprises cluttering that pier.  Back at Main Street - the old town area - you'll find plenty of outdoor cafes and interesting shops.  My room was very clean, and if you ask about COVID measures taken, you'll hear a litany of thorough cleaning, disinfecting beyond the usual.
Manager Response: peacenow2, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay here with us! We appreciate your honesty :-)  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Awesome location. Everything we needed for a quick stay by the beach; pet friendly, clean, great service with a smile, pool, hot tub, beautiful short walk to the beach, shopping and awesome restaurants. We definitely will stay here again.
Manager Response: JP5LLC, we're so glad you enjoyed your stay! We hope to provide lodging accommodations for you and your family again in the future.

Summary Heading: Depends on the room you get
Summary: Basically, it comes down to this-if you can afford to get an oceanfront room, this place is awesome. Rooms are updated and fresh and the views are amazing. Ocean so loud you can't leave door open while you watch TV. I have stayed in a few oceanfront hotels and this view was the best. HOWEVER, if you have to stay in a room in the building that faces the street or the alley, don't bother! They are not updated, not nice at all and you will feel like you are staying in a cheap motel even though you payed over $200 a night. With all that being said, the staff is very nice and there are two restaurants that are right there in the same parking lot and have great food and drinks. There is a Ralph's and an awesome taco stand right across the street, and you can walk into the town also.
Manager Response: ChristinaD922, we greatly appreciate your kind rating! We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. The ocean itself is still a few blocks away from our hotel so we actually do not have an ocean view room here at our location. However, our park side view rooms are beautiful and the room balconies sure make it easy to enjoy the sea breeze every morning and night.  We appreciate your feedback in regards to our standard rooms! We will definitely make a note of your concerns and strive to correct them for any future visit. Thank you again, have a wonderful day!

Summary: The Pacific Inn was a welcome surprise. It is in a great location. Older, but it has been updated. The rooms were roomy, and the balcony with chairs was nice to sit in and enjoy the outside. The clothesline was an added bonus! We were only able to be there one night, but we both decided we will come again and spend a few days walking the lovely town. Beach was close and wonderful, of course. The rooms were clean and beds were comfy, as well as the single chair bed. Pleasantly surprised by a few things! Want to have the time to use the pool next time. Breakfast was fresh and not continental - they had someone cooking or you could do the basic if you wanted. The microwave was missing a leg, but that was very minor compared to the cleanliness and excellent customer service we
Manager Response: CarrieAr, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! We greatly appreciate you taking the time to leave such a detailed review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: This is a motel not a boutique hotel
Summary: We were charged a "boutique hotel" room rate but had an experience akin to a Hampton Inn or Holiday Inn. On the positive side, the interior and rooms are clean, and the staff take their COVID precautions seriously. But there are a number of negatives that you should be aware of before booking:  1. Interior access only -- they are lacking one of the best features of a motel: exterior room access. All access is governed by a single elevator with capacity of 4.  2. Depressing rooms -- flimsy plastic cups for water, leaking paper cups for coffee. Archaic heating cooling system not controlled by a wall thermostat. Sad rooms, but clean.  3. Insufficient parking -- they do not have enough parking places to accommodate all guests, so we were forced to find overnight street parking in
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, walking distance to beach and dining. Main Street has a lot to offer. Great hotel staff. Nice breakfast every morning. Balconies are roomy and the little clothes line came in handy. Nice pool area. I will come here again. And the shuttle is handy too!
Manager Response: maeriel_13, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your detailed review and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The inn staff is very nice and accomodating.  The location is perfect for my needs.  Pool is great.  Good coffee and mints.  The balconies are great for being outdoors in the day and evening.  Bathing suit drying line on balcony.  Shower stall is big and nice.
Manager Response: Localoldperson, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to leave a detailed review. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: we love coming to seal beach.  we always stay at the pacific inn, its close to everything.  we walk to the beach, old town, green belt.  the new texting feature is nice too  - you don't need to call the front desk for anything, just text them your request and they reply quickly.  i definitely recommend staying here.
Manager Response: D2950VPannp, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! Our new texting feature sure makes it easy to stay in contact with our guest should any request come up. We truly hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We just got back from our wonderful stay at The Pacific Inn in Seal Beach. We had a great time! The staff was super friendly and helpful. The room was nice and very clean, I thought the bathroom was especially nice. The breakfast was filling and good and the breakfast attendant was such a lovely sweet woman. Check in and check out were seamless. The best thing about the Pacific Inn though is the location. I am 8.5 months pregnant and the walk to downtown was easy and quick, even for me. We enjoyed the dining and sweet slow pace of Seal Beach so much on our little get away. We've stayed here before and will continue to do so any chance we get. Thanks for the memories.
Manager Response: deannacV2535PB, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed yet another stay here with us. Our close proximity to Old Town Seal Beach truly is what makes our boutique hotel so special. Congratulations on expecting! Wishing you a healthy and happy pregnancy. Until next time!

Summary: First time staying at the Pacific Inn. Room and common areas felt very clean and looked well taken care of. The room itself was comfortable, the bed didn’t destroy my back, and I really enjoyed sitting on the balcony. Staff was friendly and accommodating. There are also plenty of restaurants and shops (and the beach!) to explore within walking distance. I plan on staying at the Pacific Inn again soon.
Manager Response: F1036QBlauraf, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know that our hotel fit all of your need during your visit. We strive to deliver a clean and welcoming atmosphere at all times and we are happy to know that we did just that. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Felt safe property is clean inside & out. Staff is amazing. Polite and friendly. Walking distance to ALL local locations including a nice 10 minute walk to the beach. Thank you for ALL the staff including room service Irma!
Manager Response: Umana1026, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you not only enjoyed your stay here with us but felt safe at our location. We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your  visit. Until next time!

Summary: I wanted to get away for a weekend with my daughter’s and we chose Pacific Inn. I chose this hotel for it’s location from Main St., beach n pier. It’s just a couple blocks from away and a quick  10 minute walk to dining and shops. It has everything we needed, room was clean, bed was comfortable, tv, microwave, fridge and coffee maker. I did enjoy relaxing in the jacuzzi tub. Overall me an my girls enjoyed our stay and had a great time, thank you Pacific Inn., you made our weekend!
Manager Response: G6446KAvictorl, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your positive feedback regarding our rooms, amenities and staff. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and we are pleased you had an excellent experience! Our downtown location puts guests only minutes from many dining and shopping options, as well as the beach! We look forward to seeing you on your next visit

Summary: We've been coming to the pacific inn since 2013.  They are always friendly, the rooms are always clean and they are very accommodating to our needs.  The kids can go swimming in the evening and we can grab some breakfast before we head out to the beacgIts the only place we will stay when we come to the beach for the weekend.
Manager Response: Beachfam4life, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. As always, we are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Here at The PI, we strive to ensure every guest feels right at home, and is always welcomed back for all of their travel needs.  We are always looking to improve and make each experience enjoyable, and we are so happy to have been able to accommodate you and your family over the years. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We love this hidden Seal Beach gem. We've visited a few times during the summer as a quick get away from the stay at home stress and were impressed by the cleanliness and care the staff takes to make us feel welcome and comfortable.  The rooms are spacious and super comfy.  Its become our favorite spot for a get-away.  The breakfast with fresh made Belgian waffles is scrumptious!
Manager Response: Rakoons, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our close proximity to both downtown Seal Beach and the ocean make us a great stop at this time of year! Our staff works hard to ensure each guest has a comfortable stay in all aspects, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi, and open-air pool and hot tub area. We greatly appreciate your recurring business. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great customer service and an amazing location
Summary: I stayed over for Labor day weekend and the Pacific Inn staff did great overall. ..  Pacific Inn Check In & Lobby:  This is an older locally owned hotel with renovations to provide for a more modern look.   The Pacific Inn is definitely aging well. The lobby was smaller in size but clean and spacious.  The front desk staff was very friendly and pleasant throughout the visit.  They had beach towels to purchase for $10 in case you forgot to pack one like we did.  Pacific Inn Rooms:  We had a queen suite with a balcony which provided a view of the park behind the hotel.  Our room was freshly remodeled as the new paint gave the room a nice look.  The bed sheets and pillows were comfortable and I slept well.  The old school air conditioner on the floor worked well and kept the
Manager Response: Ninong247, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your visit and found our rooms and amenities to fit your needs. We greatly appreciaye you taking the time to leave such a detailed review. We look forward to seein you again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Went on a family get away ...
Summary: Jacuzzi wasn’t operating properly after pushing the button water went everywhere room small for a suite food was decent for high amount with few selections nice enough to sleep just not my go to vacation
Manager Response: Neeneejackson27, thank you for your honest feedback. We would like to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your visit here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again and allow us to remedy these issues.

Summary Heading: The Pacific Inn Seal Beach California
Summary: First time visit and we will be back for sure! Great location. Modern clean and comfortable room. Attentive and friendly staff. Walking distance to Main Street and the beach. Couldn’t ask for more. Best keep secret!
Manager Response: William H, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit. Until next time!

Summary: Solid value and location. Friendly and competent staff. Ample parking. The only issue we had was when another guest let her kids run wild in the hallways at 10:30pm. We can't blame that on the hotel or its staff. The staff handled the situation effectively and within a reasonable amount of time.
Manager Response: GiantsMetsOregon. thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your honesty and will strive to correct the issues for any future visits. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to Seal Beach.

Summary: My family and I stayed at this inn over Labor Day weekend as the temperatures were scorching hot and we wanted to find relief at the beach. Because we booked last minute, there were not too many options around the coast but as luck would have it, this wonderful property had rooms available!  First, let's level set. If you are looking for the Four Seasons or the St. Regis experience and level of accommodation, don't book here. However,  if you are looking for sincere customer service, COVID caution, and easy access to the beach, check this place out. The pool reservations limit how many people can go at once (we were by ourselves both times we went). The 5 mile radius shuttle service is ready to go quickly and droppedus of at the beach each morning and picked us up IB the
Manager Response: Practicalalaland, thank you so much for taking the time to leave our property such a thoughtful review!
