We are thrilled to know that our hotel appropriatlely fit your needs during your stay here with us! We greatly appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I almost selfishly didn’t want to write a review to keep it our little secret but this place is amazing and deserves all the kudos! Hands down welcoming, rooms were nice, clean and had fridge/freezer and microwave. Breakfast, pool, jacuzzi all wonderful. Everything is in walking distance, beach, Main Street, the marina etc. Staff was great, very accommodating especially with COVID and safety protocols. Felt safe and secure. Covered parking etc. The list just goes on and on. Absolutely fabulous and will definitely being staying there again and again!
Manager Response: Mfaz3, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations! We greatly appreciate you taking the time to leave such a kind review! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Staff was fantastic, room was clean, hot tub awesome. We were there during covid and everyone was wearing masks and being very courteous. Whatever we needed they got for us..Amazing I will be back. The hotel was very clean and breakfast was great.
Manager Response: MKWiseman, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit here with us. Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit. Our main goal is to keep both our staff and guests safe during these tumulchuous times. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Really nice place, close to everything, this hotel is in the best place to enjoy seal beach, the rooms are ok with a great A/C (no noisy) I got the park view, I got the opportunity to try the breakfast and I think was great for COVID situation, no complains on my stay I totally recommend you to enjoy the marina while you stay here. The pool is not cold and the jacuzzi was great.
Manager Response: fregya2020,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your visit and the amenities we have to offer. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect boutique hotel that has everything at a great price
Summary: Our second time at the hotel the bedding is very comfortable, the towels the shower water pressure the amenities the soap size of the room all great. There is a refrigerator microwave in the room nice size television. The staff on the phone and in person friendly. being able to walk to the beach, the pier and many local restaurants a plus. The 5 mile complimentary shuttle another plus. Great value and free parking *****-5 star!
Manager Response: terrysA5188CF, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice, simple place in a great location
Summary: We stayed here as a weekend getaway. We brought the beach cruisers as it’s walkable to the pier and the cute town center. It’s covid time so we were able to get margaritas to go (from the hangout) and drink them on the beach and walk right back to our room.   The place is similar feel to a holiday inn, has a patio with chairs, you can sleep with the sliding doors open for the breeze. Overall, nice comfortable place and excellent location.
Manager Response: kellyraes, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us especially during these crazy times. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: We have been staying at the Pacific Inn for the past 15 years and have stayed almost every year and at times, twice a year. We enjoy the location as it is close to the beach and Old Town with a variety of restaurants. Our daughter is already trying to figure out next year’s plan!
Manager Response: Sandraschl0sser, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so honored to have such loyal guests! We greatly appreciate your recurring business and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Price was right and experience was perfect! Booked a two night stay for a family of 4 in their normal room - after 20 minutes of walking in our “neighbor” called to tell us we were walking too loud. We were actually watching tv and not making a sound. I called front desk disturbed that our neighbor hadn’t relayed the message to the front desk first but Sara(h) E. completely put us at ease and moved us to a family suite within minutes. When that neighbor called it completely set the wrong tone to start our mini vacation BUT front desk REALLY SAVED our trip!! So staff are beyond nice and attentive. Everything was clean! And the breakfast bar was good as well! Great location (walking distance to Main St and Restaurants/Bars/Stores and beach!) and had no problem parking. Cute
Manager Response: Jenbrad2020, thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your experience here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: Perfect location, never super crowded, friendly staff, big room. They offered breakfast even in the midst of Covid. The little balcony added an extra bonus and was great to enjoy the evening and morning hours.
Manager Response: gabrielesR9688YF, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Nrach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent visit here with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The main feature of this hotel that attracted me was it was pet friendly. The rooms were very clean and spacious for 2 adults, a big dog and a baby. It was also close to Main Street and a short walk to the beach in a very quiet, cute neighborhood. We will definitely be going back.
Manager Response: E2868SLreginam, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you had a pleasent stay here with us. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel many times over the years.  I usually stay here when I come home to visit the family in Seal Beach.    The hotel is good.  It's clean and the location is great.  I had a couple of issues with this stay.    I requested an early check in.  I was informed that would not be a problem.  It would only cost 15.00.  Never heard of such a thing.  I declined.    We stayed for three nights.  For some reason, the room was not cleaned during our stay.  I'm sure it's covid related but it's strange to pay full price for a room and not get it cleaned once.  I had to request coffee supplies every day.  Not a big deal but paying for a room and getting no service sucks.  The price should reflect the reduced level of service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our favorite hotel ever, been coming here for many years and it always is perfect. The staff is amazing, rooms perfectly clean and even in this Pandemic thing, we were still able to enjoy the pool, spa and breakfast that we love.
Manager Response: Compass785153,  thank you for taking the time to rate your recent stay here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: Great stay in a great room! Due to covid I have been very cautious doing anything but, had to travel for a burial. I felt safe staying here and location was wonderful. Would definitely stay again! I highly recommend.
Manager Response: N9765GPpatriciat , thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodation. Our deepest condolences for your loss. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to leave a kind review. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: Loved how clean the rooms were (my sanitizing wipes remained white even after wiping high-touch areas upon room arrival). The "executive" room had a modern/relaxed feel & was thoughtfully designed to maximize limited space. Mini fridge had surprisingly great freezer space too. Toiletries from Bath & Body Stress Relief collection was a treat. Even the wifi password was thoughtfully created to infuse joy.  Fantastic location: 5-10min walk to beach/"Main Street" attractions, easy biking to neighboring cities/beaches, lots of food choices nearby (ex: Thai, McDonald's/Taco Bell, coffee/flower shop steps away). Outside building decor isn't much, but inside is wonderful & functional.   Terrific staff - Efficient, friendly & responsive - went out of their way to help us with special
Manager Response: Mtglbyaky, thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a detailed review! We strive to deliver excellent customer service at all times. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: FANTASTIC place for weekend getaway with family!
Summary: Staff was Excellent , rooms comfy & clean.  Spent day at Seal Beach and pool/jacuzzi 2nd half of day.  Family had a great time.  Kids loved the fact McDonald’s is across the street.  There is also a delicious philly cheese steak spot across the way too!!
Manager Response: Javier123078, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: They are looking to suck as much money out of you as possible.Place was noisy pool and jaquzzi small.Supposed to get a credit to my account and it's been a week already.Room 218 does not have a jacuzzi it's a bathtub with jets false advertising.Masks were not inforced
Manager Response: none

Summary: This will be our 4th stay for my partner and I. We always have a special experience here. Staff is courteous and friendly. Make sure to stop by for a latte in the lobby.  Room is always a little oasis to unwind after a long work week for the both of us. Pacific Inn also takes all necessary precautions during COVID, making us feel safe during these uncertain times. We stepped out to pick up dinner minutes away and have a chill night watching C list action films,and America Ninja Warrior(they have ALL the channels, that's just what we chose. 😂) They have awesome wifi connection. Thank you Pacific Inn. We will keep coming back!!
Manager Response: Locaporlorca, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: Great super clean spotless room.  Updated bathroom, very comfortable bed, balcony with ocean breezes, walking distance to lots of restaurants  (Finbars Italian was our favorite). All the staff were friendly an polite....5 star experience!!
Manager Response: JosephB3632, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodation. We are so glad you found our hotel to be spotless and comfortable. Thank you for taking the time to rate your stay. Until next time!

Summary: First of all, I loved the location, which was very close to the beach (5 min walk), close to the main street and the restaurants (5 min walk) as well as close to Trader Joes and Whole Foods (3 min by car). The hotel staff was amazing, as they were accommodating and courteous. Rooms were clean and well equipped with a mini fridge and a coffee machine. The breakfast was basic, as it seems that due to COVID they had to eliminate open foods. However, as Trader Joe's was close, we had no problem adding more nutritious stuff. What I mostly liked, was the fact that the hotel had an open indoor court (where the pool and Jacuzzi were) and so it was eating breakfast in the open air. I am so looking forward to return!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very clean. The bathroom smelled and looked immaculate. Even in the 2nd floor bathroom. Everytime we stepped out of our room , maintenance was in the halls. Cleaning & taking out trash. The gals at the front desk were extremely helpful. I forgot some batteries and home and they were quick to give me what they had on hand. The pool and Jacuzzis was great. Looked and felt clean. The only yucky thing was that the fridge smelled. Other than that. It was a great stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My daughters and Grand Daughters selected the Pacific Inn as it's close to downtown Seal Beach where they were born and it's always a walk down memory lane.  We rented the family suite which worked out perfectly, 2 balconies and pool just outside our door.  The staff was excellent, from the phone reservation (you must rent suites directly) to the check in.  One of the nice surprises is the option to text questions and I ordered a pool reservation as well as a roll away bed before we even checked in.  Just perfect, it's my second stay here and booking again for my husband and I soon.  Thanks Freeman and your staff for caring so much.  Kay
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice hotel with an excellent location. Easy walk to the beach and Main Street shops and restaurants. Eager to please staff. Quiet and very clean room with a balcony. Well organized for COVID  prevention. All in all, a very nice getaway to my favorite Southern California beach town.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed with my daughter at this hotel. Enjoyed everything. The bathroom and room are up to date, nice and clean. No need to fly for 5 hours to Hawaii, can enjoy the ocean right here, water is little cooler but enjoyable. Will definitely return.
Manager Response: panteleyi, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach loding accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your visit.

Summary: The room was cleaned and the bed super comfortable. Close to beach and places to eat. The staff were friendly and attentive to listen and help. I enjoyed my stay at the hotel for my staycation. Most importantly, They are taking all the precautions during this pandemic times.
Manager Response: 799ceciliaw, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate your visit and you taking the time to tell us about your visit. Saftey of both our employees and guests are top priority.  Until next time!

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel close to the beach and ery affordable!
Summary: We were on the 2nd floor on a corner king suite that had a giant wraparound patio. This was great as the weather was beautiful and we spent a little time out on the deck before the wedding we came for. Room was very clean, the bed was very comfortable and the room was laid out well. You could watch TV from either the bed or the couch comfortably. The bathroom was also clean and the shampoo/conditioner they supply were very nice, actually made us go out and buy some after our trip! The staff was very friendly and accommodating, especially during these Covid months. The overall experience was great and we will definitely be back soon!
Manager Response: drumeister, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! We greatly appreciate you taking the time to rate your recent stay here with us. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Very clean rooms and amazing location, very walkable.  We found this hotel online and it is one of the few properties in Seal Beach.  This property was following guidance to protect its guests during the COVID pandemic and were very hospitable.
Manager Response: Islandgirl1188, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Staff was very friendly.  Our room was immaculate and had not only a coffee maker and refrigerator, but also a freezer!  The hotel is not ocean front, but it's just a few blocks away from the beach and lots of shops and restaurants.  There is a breakfast room at the hotel with a nice selection of items.  Parking is covered which is great. Definitely will be returning.
Manager Response: Companion227678 , thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: very clean place to stay with great bed and nice sheets and pillows that are fresh, nice location a couple blocks from main st and pier, very nice staff and good coffee - complementary- they serve breakfast but we slept in - across street from lots of fast food so it was nice
Manager Response: 2kitty2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your recent visit here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: I booked for 6 nights, and extended 3 more nights since it was such a pleasant experience. Staff is super helpful, great location, everything is clean.   Definitely would return. Would also recommend to anyone looking to stay in this area
Manager Response: laurabO4894ZL,  thank you so much for your kind review and rating. We strive to deliver excellent customer service at all times and we are glad we were able to do just that during your visit. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: The Pacific Inn is conveniently located to an array of restaurants, fast food locations,  pharmacies, shops, and the beach.  The staff provided great service.  We asked for a change of rooms after our first night and the staff was very gracious in providing us with a new room.  We asked for a couple of bottles of water and they were provided immediately at no additional charge which is not always the case at other hotels.  The people of the city are also the most friendly we have ever encountered.
Manager Response: acdccampos, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit here with us. We are so glad you enjoyed your fist visit here in Seal Beach. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Fun in seal beach 😎 home away from home
Summary: This is my go to hotel when I go to the beach. They serve you breakfast in the morning the girl in The breakfast room is very nice very helpful. It's always been a positive experience.  Their beds are comfortable. Its always been very clean. Employees very nice.  It just need more towels in the room, especially when you have more than one person. It's a great family place really love it. Great coffee in the lobby if you're interested.
Manager Response: naomisK412WM, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you found our hotel to be comfortable and clean. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: We absolutely love this place is top notch service each and every time personalized the best treatment we could ask for we have been coming here for over 10 years and we love it each and every time and thank you to all of the staff we appreciate everything you do.  Freeman, Angel, and Victoria you are amazing and a large part of why we continue to come back. Thank you for providing exceptional service.See you all Soon.  Stay safe and Healthy. Room 230

Summary: This place was so freaking clean! Staff were super friendly and accommodating! There's a small pool and spa, but the beach is real close so who needs a huge pool?! We're definitely coming back for another staycation soon!!!
Manager Response: mikebC1607OL,  thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit. We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating! Until next time!

Summary: I loved being in Seal Beach Community, Crab Pot restaurant and the Pacific Inn were hospitable. Also shopped the stores on Main St. Ordered Pizza to go and ate on the lawn area of the beach. Next morning ate breakfast at Hennessy’s the breakfast menu was okay.
Manager Response: davidfG3454LB,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for you Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Old Town Seal Beach truly is such a gem! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: We stay at the Pacific Inn on a weekly basis for business. The entire staff is very helpful, professional, and friendly!! Our rooms are comfortable and meticulously clean!! Great location...close to Main Street Seal Beach and many fantastic restaurants!!
Manager Response: rhondabE6075QK,  thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The Pacific Inn was lovely!  Great accommodations that were CLEAN & comfortable. Pricier than I was hoping when we arrived ($200.) but it was good to feel safe - clean & I could bring my dog.  Reservations needed for the pool & Jacuzzi (due to COVID). No fresh fruit at breakfast, but that was the only disappointment. Would love the opportunity to stay again!
Manager Response: DurangoCOLyn,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you found our boutique hotel to be clean and comfortable! 4th of July weekend truly is one of our busiest times. With all of our rooms on high demands, the prices may be subject to increase. Due to COVID-19, we have taken extra steps to ensure the safety of our staff and most importantly our guests. Luckily, Garden District is just a few steps away from the hotel; they offer delicious acai bowls and organic fruit/veggie smoothies! Yum!  Thank you again for taking the time to tell us about your visit. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon! Have a wonderful day.

Summary: Best spot in town! Such a nice environment to come to. I love the room, very clean and comfortable. I can’t find one thing that’s wrong about this spot. I will for sure be coming back to stay again when ever I’m around seal beach :)
Manager Response: Rewco805, thank you for taking the time to leave our page such a kind review and rating. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: First off let me start by saying The room was really nice and clean which state again 100%  The amenities that the inn Offers are Amazing  pool is clean  Staff is really  friendly and always willing to help Everything is a walk away from the in  Amazing restaurants all different type of  Cuisine
Manager Response: Johnnytokyoo, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: This was a great location, close to the beach.  It was  also very comfortable and clean, which is very important these days. Staff was friendly and helpful. Super value! Good breakfast. We are planning on staying there again very soon.
Manager Response: CLA333, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We greatly appreciate the kind review and rating. Until next time!

Summary: wonderful hotel great pool and hot tub  Staff super friendly the rooms was very big with balcony and free morning breakfast 😋  Came in for one night and had to book another night right after. Even the beds felt like I was sleeping in the clouds!
Manager Response: Dominick00, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent stay here with us! We are so glad you enjoyed the amenities our boutique hotel has to offer!

Summary: The pacific Inn was a great place to stay. The staff treated us great and there was a complimentary breakfast. Short walk to the beach and to the restaurants. We are definitely staying there every time we go to seal beach which will be in July.
Manager Response: G8624CGmichaelc, we greatly appreciate your kind review and rating! We look forward to seeing you again. Stay safe!

Summary: As always, the Pacific Inn was a comfortable place to stay and the location can't be beat.  Staff was exceptionally friendly and accommodating! The beds are sooo comfortable and there are plenty of dining options nearby. Can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Q7011UIbethw, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you found your staff to be friendly and your visit to be accommodating! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: we enjoyed our stay. Friendly staff and clean, updated rooms. We will definitely return. Hot tub was nice and good grab and go breakfast. nice neighborhood and easy walk to beach and Main Street dining
Manager Response: nschaefer914, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: We’ve enjoyed the Pacific Inn a couple previous times... and once again we had a great visit. Love the location, perfect for a short bike ride to Main Street, pier, and beach! Lots of great food close by too!!
Manager Response: Camster11, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and the location of our hotel.  We are located just a few minutes away from the beach and the downtown area or Seal Beach. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Comfortable stay;short walk to downtown and beach
Summary: The entire stay, those short, was pleasant. Those I dealt with at the Inn were helpful and nice. The room was clean and fresh. A little hot when I entered, but the AC/Fan was more than adequate and the room temp was were I wanted it in short order, and stayed that way during my entire stay, even with the AC off.
Manager Response: uncleroyh, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us.  We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your visit. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at Pacific Inn and both times it has been such an awesome stay. From the time we check in to the time we check out the staff is so courteous! Facility is clean and tidy and not to mention the amazing location. Thank you for making our stay here such a pleasure!
Manager Response: ShannaMar1e, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us! We strive to deliver excellent customer service and we are thrilled to know we did just that during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: very friendly staff, clean establishment, yummy breakfast available in the mornings as-well as fresh baked cookies when we arrived. We will definitely stay again. Has a retro look which was charming and covered parking was a plus.
Manager Response: alexandermichelleh, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: excellent rooms, great customer service and everything was very clean!!! We will definitely be back! The breakfast was easy and convenient...our only problem was the hot tub was not working but the pool was awesome!!!
Manager Response: rynkysmom, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We would like to sincerely apologize for our hot tub being temporarily out of service. We are currently working on getting it up and running! Thank you for your patience and positive review. 'Till next time.

Summary: Please stay elsewhere. Gangs gather in the parking "court" at night. They shout obscenities, rev their engines and flaunt their affiliations. If you must stay here, please let someone know where you are for safety reasons. Do not open your door and do not leave your room. Don't count on management to help you. You are on your own, Be safe and check out as early as possible.
Manager Response: ter1950, We sincerely apologize if at any point you felt unsafe during your time at our hotel. We have not had any issues with gangs in Seal Beach as they do not exist. Did you call down to the front desk when you saw these activities taking place? There is always someone on the property to assist in any need or capacity. Seal Beach PD is very responsive and we will call them straight away if at any point we see something that may be a danger to the safety to not only our guests, but our employees as well. We have cameras all around the property and our doors are locked and safe. Security is our #1 priority and we do not take it lightly. We hope you stay safe and encourage you to give us a try again. Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you!

Summary: The hotel was clean, neat and the staff was awesome. They above and ego do to make our stay pleasant. The location is perfect. There are a ton of great restaurants, coffee stores and gelato shops within walking distance, as is the pier and beach. I left my expensive wetsuit in the closet and they next day shipped it to me. I definitely Italy recommend staying here.
Manager Response: melaniebR5601SI,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Our location truly is such a perk! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: I stay at pacific in for a night . Very clean room and nice location not far from the beach. Breakfast included. Pool and Jaccuzi enjoyable after the beach .  Reception desk is very professional.i ll be back.
Manager Response: A9183WDcarolinel,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your recent stay here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to Seal Beach.

Summary: Great place to stay for your easy beach get away. Walk to the beach, enjoy some lunch & shopping on Main Street. The Staff was amazing ! So warm & friendly ! The pool was fun to use at the hotel . The parking was a breeze & the room was nice & clean .
Manager Response: Vacationer364997, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay here with us. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great staff and service. Very clean rooms and overall, had a great time. Very thankful for the team that was on shift while I was in town visiting. My date also had a really great time and had nothing but nice thing to say about the room and staff. Great pricing as well to be so close to the beach. Kudos!
Manager Response: 278tnd, thank you so much for your kind review and rating! We are so glad we were able to provide lodging accommodations for you and your date during your visit in Seal Beach. We greatly appreciate you business and look forward to your future visit to Seal Beach.

Summary: I have stayed here a few times and every time I enjoy my stay. They have a wonderful hot tub, awesome free breakfast. The rooms have refrigerators, freezer, and microwaves. Beds are comfortable. My favorite part of the room though is the balcony! Walking distance from the beach and Main Street shops. Tons of perks, definitely a lot of bang for your buck.
Manager Response: desiraeraceanu, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you took advantage of the wonderful amenities our boutique hotel has to offer.  We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to Seal Beach.

Summary: I stayed here yesterday with my fiancée and the ambiance is so calm and inviting , with helpful employees, a nice little hidden gem that I wish I knew existed before I was very surprised I never heard of this hotel before only from word of mouth that said great things. I had a bit of a mix up with being set up with the wrong room (deluxe instead of executive) but was reimbursed for it the next morning when I brought it up. I will definitely come back for sure this place is amazing.
Manager Response: resortdude562, thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit. We are so glad you enjoyed your visit and found the ambiance of our boutique hotel to be calm and inviting. We strive to deliver stress-free visits for all of our guests. Thank you for bringing the room mix up to our attention. We hope we were able to make things right for you during your stay. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Seal Beach.

Summary: The Pacific Inn was great with the accommodations and service. We will definitely be returning to the Inn when we return to the area. Breakfast was good and the pool with hot tub was very relaxing. Very clean establishment.
Manager Response: alfredomR7341QA,  thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent visit at The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you found our establishment to be clean and relaxing. Thank you for considering us for your future visits.

Summary: My partner and I have now been here twice, once to celebrate my birthday and this last time for a quick get away to relax. Pacific Inn is a cozy,clean, hotel that will take care of you! From the coffee&frappuccino machine in the lobby to the private balcony outside of our room, our stay in their suite was spacious beautiful and made us feel like royalty. Their staff is so helpful and friendly. Oh, and it's down the street from the beach! Thank you Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: Locaporlorca, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you and your partner had a pleasant stay here with us! We strive to deliver excellent customer service and we are glad you had such a memorable time. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: This place is hidden in plan sight next to pch in seal Beach private it's dog friendly an Nice clean, very cool staff I enjoyed my stay an I will be staying in the future, my dog an I both had a restful sleep...👍
Manager Response: Codybeara, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our pet friendly policy truly is such a perk for those traveling with their furry companions. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to Seal Beach.

Summary: I stayed here for two nights. The room was comfortable. Bed is super comfortable and bathroom is modern. The Pacific Inn is in a convenient location and is just a few blocks away from the Seal Beach pier.
Manager Response: teamsmithtv, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon! Have a wonderful day!

Summary: This is the 2nd time we've stayed at the Pacific Inn.  The rooms are extremely clean, bathrooms are exceptional, and the room sizes are very generous.  We especially enjoyed their free breakfast, it was great.  During our first visit we ate out at recommended restaurants for breakfast, we were very disappointed even with highly recommended restaurants. During our most recent stay we decided to eat breakfast at the Pacific Inn.  The food was great, good flavor, large selection, and the coffee was very good!  The front desk service was very efficient, checking in and out was extremely quick.  They offered to go above and beyond their normal requirements on a couple of occasions!
Manager Response: acdccampos, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! All of the wonderful amenities our hotel and the area has to offer truly makes the visit to Seal Beach that much more enjoyable. We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Room was up to date, very nice and clean.  The bed was comfortable!  Breakfast was ok.  Warm foods a little on the cool side.  Staff very friendly and accomodating. Had a 4 day cruise and was able to park for a nominal fee!  Would stay here again definitely!!
Manager Response: Jomontrose, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Thank you for telling us a little bit about your experience. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Staff went out of their way to accomodate us!!
Summary: After spending 12 hrs at the Long Beach Port and not being able to board our cruise ship the staff were able to offer us another night at a discounted rate.  Everyone who works here did everything possible to make our unexpected delays easier on all of us.  Also offer a great breakfast with alot of choices for everyone.
Manager Response: Maps37545, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: The Pacific Inn is everything described on their website, Friendly and Courtesy front desk service, Super Clean room,peaceful and quiet,i expected the Continental breakfast to be doughnuts and coffee but it was a full breakfast with many choices to choose from, EXCELLENT!, and Victoria ( the lady work there) is SUPER NICE and Friendly and helpful, i truly enjoyed my stay. This hotel deserves more than 5 stars. Thank you Pacific Inn for making my stay very pleasant.
Manager Response: Pa3wtyz, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Providing excellent customer service is what we strive for! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We love staying here and it's our fourth annual trip.  Everyone makes you feel welcome and the staff remembers you when you go get your  free breakfast every morning. We also  loved the free waters and yummy cookies.
Manager Response: ambermO6574EZ,  thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay here with us! We are so glad you enjoyed all of the wonderful amenities our boutique hotel has to offer. We truly enjoy providing lodging accommodations for you and your family time after time. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We loved our stay at the Pacific Inn.  It's not new and flashy but rooms are updated and clean.  Staff was very accommodating.   Great location, especially for us rural Montanans.  Easy walk to Main street and Seal Beach pier.  Driving along coastal highway was very doable.  Hope we can visit agajn.
Manager Response: maltamt,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great place to stay! Price is reasonable and location is great. Everything is within walking distance to shops, dining and beach. Rooms were very clean the front desk was very helpful and friendly. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: NRomero1969, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us!  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Located in the heart of Seal Beach, this boutique style hotel was just what we were looking for prior to our cruise. We traveled in a couple of days early to avoid any potential weather/flight delays and wanted a location that provided entertainment & dining within easy walking distance. The Pacific Inn is modern and very well maintained. The inclusive breakfast was great and the staff was extremely professional and friendly.  We loved being able to walk the short distance to the famous Seal Beach pier and beautiful sandy beaches.  The historic downtown area is also within easy walking distance = just 2 or 3 blocks, wherein there are lots of wonderful shops and plenty of eating establishments, both casual and upscale. Yes, we’ll definitely be back before our next cruise.
Manager Response: Cowley64, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed you stay here with us. Our close proximity to Main St and all of the little shops truly is such an advantage! We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Pre Cruise Stay
Summary: We did the Park, Sleep, Cruise package. We drove from Arizona the day before our cruise, spent the night, parked our car there for 7 nights and their shuttle took us to the cruise terminal and picked us up. It was very convenient and a great value. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.  The bathroom was big and had a huge shower. There were Bath and Body Works amenities in the newly remodeled bathroom.  There was also a refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker in the room. We had a small balcony, with patio furniture, but was a little too cool to use.  We loved the location as it was walking distance to restaurants, shops and the Seal Beach pier.  The staff was very friendly and helpful and kept in touch with us before our stay. They also called us when the shuttle was
Manager Response: cabodeb, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We greatly appreciate you taking the time to rate and review your visit. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: I thoroughly enjoyed my brief stay at the Pacific Inn.  My next one will be a longer, for sure. My room was spotlessly clean and tastefully furnished. The bed was very comfortable and it was so pleasant to have a view of Seal Beach's Greenbelt park.  I left the sliding glass porch door open all night long in order to take full advantage of the refreshing ocean air. I'll be back soon!
Manager Response: Sayyes108, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! That ocean breeze really is to die for! We greatly appreciate your kind words regarding our rooms☺ We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Seal Beach.

Summary Heading: stayed while my house was getting painted
Summary: I live and own a restaurant business in Seal Beach. Stayed here while my house was being painted...best place to stay in Seal Breach. Friendly service, great location, clean modern rooms Joseph Barbara Proprietor Finbars Italian Kitchen
Manager Response: JosephB3632, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed you r stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your business and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: The hotel is very welcoming and feels like home with the hospitality extended by the staff and the open, airy feel of the property. Its proximity to Seal Beach, Belmont Shore and other beach cities is perfect for vacationers, business people or people like us who used to live in the area but now just come for a visit.
Manager Response: Mamaseal60, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate your thoughtful review! It was our pleasure to provide lodging for you and your family during your visit! We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Had a 15 day cruise so stayed here. The hotel is AMAZING BEAUTIFUL AND HAPPY!  We had a bump in the road for our shuttle to and fro, we worked together to make it ok for us both. The staff is well trained and so very nice. Looking forward to staying there again in December as we head to Mexico. Thank you Pacific Inn!!
Manager Response: Lynda, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you had such a fun time during your stay with us and your amazing 15 day cruise... How exciting! We would like to sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced in regards to our shuttle. We do our very best to accommodate all guests during their trip and we greatly appreciate your patience and friendly demeanor. We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Nice clean hotel, comfortable bed, very simple but it was perfect for 3 days stay. Great location to beach, shops and restaurants. Good breakfast to start the day. I will come back to stay in this hotel. Thank you.
Manager Response: Passenger364664, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your stay here with us!  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Summary: Perfect beach type hotel.  Great location to beach, shops , and restaurants.  I had a newly renovated room and loved it!  The staff was so helpful.   The free breakfast had everything.  Will definately come back!
Manager Response: Dbolla33, Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate our returning guests like you. We are glad that you found our staff to be beneficial during your stay. We strive to go above and beyond to make our guests stay more enjoyable. We also agree with you about the location. Seal Beach as a perfect little town that has so much to offer. We hope you come back and visit again :)

Summary: Room was clean and very well appointed. The bed was comfortable and the refrigerator and microwave were a nice bonus. Just a 5 minute walk to the boardwalk. We also appreciated free parking and breakfast.
Manager Response: robbs439,  we love your feedback and we are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. We always like to have guests leave happy and anything else we could improve on just let us know! Can't wait to have you back!

Summary: We have been staying here for over 8 years now at least three to five times a year and absolutely love everything about it! The closeness to Main Street in Seal Beach snd the pier for a nice walk is a morning and evening ritual for us. Great shops to browse and wonderful eateries and coffee places are just an added bonus! Love the newly remodeled “blue” tones  and great beds/bedding and showers the rooms have to offer. We will be back in March!
Manager Response: kellymK5360GB, Thank you so much for the encouraging review of The Pacific Inn hotel. We really strive to exceed all guests expectations are are glad to hear that you enjoyed the various amenities we offer here. Thank you for choosing our location! We look forward to having you here again in the future!

Summary: Great place to stay if going on a cruise. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The shuttle to the cruise port was great. We really liked our room and the breakfast was good. We will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Judy W, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. The Park&Cruise package truly is a guest favorite. We hope yo choose to stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Loved being close to the Ocean
Summary: The best thing was being close to LGB airport and close to the beach. I am allergic to the soap/shampoo/lotion provided, as it all had eucalyptus, but front desk had different kind available. Bed was a little hard and pillows too soft, but that is a personal preference. I like how the swimming pool and hot tub was in the middle not out in the open. Breakfast was good, loved the denver omelet.
Manager Response: Kaepac, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! So sorry about your allergy! In regards to the bed, we do offer mattress tops for guests who prefer a softer mattress. We are more than happy to provide any additional pillows or blankets if needed as well. Our front desk team is available 24/7 and ready to help! We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We spent two days here while attending a Bat Mitzvah in Long Beach and enjoyed the laid back, somewhat retro vibe. Clean rooms with comfortable beds. Bit of traffic noise but mostly quiet. Heated pool was nice and filling breakfast. Good value for the money.
Manager Response: Wuor, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed you enjoyed your stay here with us. It was our pleasure to provide lodging for your group during the Bat Mitzvah in Long Beach. The heated pool and complimentary breakfast truly make for a comfortable stay. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area!

Summary Heading: The best customer service we have encountered throughout our travels
Summary: The staff was amazing from the booking all the way through the driver who dropped us back off at the airport.  We were a large group heading out on a Carnival cruise in December.  They offered to pick us up at the airport (on time), checked us in early for our clean rooms.  Breakfast was clean and full all all times the next morning.  They not only picked us up from the airport but took us to the cruise, then brought us back from the cruise watched our luggage while we shopped Long Beach and killed time then took us back to the airport.  We didnt stay a night on the way back and they still took care of us!!  Everyone we encountered in the building and the driver truly cared about our experiance.  You dont find that kind of staff often!  I will deffinatly go back when I am in the
Manager Response: GS450900, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service at all times and we are glad we exceeded your expectations during your stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Stayed a couple of nights in early January. Check in was a breeze. Carrier for bags was right there in office for easy transporting to our room. We took advantage of the balcony right off the bat and just relaxed after a long trip from the north. Plenty of places to eat close by. Only real complaint was the hot tub(and pool) were unavailable for both nights we stayed. Overall we enjoyed our stay and will return.
Manager Response: Voyager818333, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you took advantage of our balcony and the fresh sea breeze that comes with it. Due to some maintenance issues we did have to close the pool for 24 hours until it was thoroughly cleaned. However, our jacuzzi was indeed open to our guests throughout that time. If you ever have questions about our amenities, out front desk team is available 24/7. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: We visited Oct. 2nd to Oct. 8th and Dec. 23rd to Dec. 29th. Both visits were great.  The hotel is always so welcoming with their warm and friendly staff.  The new bathroom amenities are really easy to use and have really nice product.  The breakfast room is always friendly and clean.  The variety of items is great.  Love the fresh made waffles.  The coffee machine in the lobby has the best hot chocolate.  Warm cookies late in the afternoon is a great treat after a long day out and about with our grandson.  The pool area is always clean and well stocked with towels.  I can't say enough good things about my happy place The Pacific Inn.  Can't wait to return this summer.
Manager Response: rlipschutz, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad to have you as one of our loyal guests. We look forward to your next visit and many more after that!

Summary: This property was in such a great location. The service was so very friendly. It has a good breakfast  included. Even though there isn't an in house restaurant, there are plenty of dining options around. We will stay again!
Manager Response: ruthiek2014, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Although we do not have an in house restaurant, we do offer complimentary hot breakfast every morning throughout your stay! Our close proximity to Main St truly is such an advantage! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: The employees made this a pleasant stay. The room was very clean with a tailored business ambiance. The balcony overlooking the greenbelt park and setting sun was a tranquil sight. The atrium, unfortunately, echoes, however, the rooms have solid walls which gives one the sense of privacy. I wish there was a way we could access our Netflix & PrimeVideo accounts to watch better shows and, or, movies. I have been coming to this Inn off and on for a decade and father stayed several times when it was the Radisson Hotel.
Manager Response: s0phiaannm, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed yet another stay here with us. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Wife and I love this hotel. Location is perfect! Third time staying at this hotel in the past 5 years and will definitely return. Pacific Inn was our final hotel for our 2 week 2019 X-mas trip, and it couldn't have been better. Very large room, wrap around deck, walking distance to Main street restaurants and Seal Beach pier. Very accommodating, but never any problems.
Manager Response: Joemoe228, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed yet another stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This place is my stand-by. Always clean and respectable. I use it anytime that I need a place to stay in that Orange County-Long Beach area. In the middle of lots of restaurants as well as downtown Seal Beach
Manager Response: Brad B, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed yet another stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your recurring business and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: My wife and I decided to stay at this place over a year in advance of our cruise out of long beach based on good reviews and long term parking options. The ability to park our vehicle on the premises and shuttle service to and from the port for a nominal surcharge seemed very convenient as we had previously used a similar service from a different motel out of San Ysidro in the past.  Over the course of the year I called in three separate occasions confirming our reservation and our shuttle pick up and drop off times. Additionally upon check in we verified our shuttle drop off and pick up times. At that time we also verified that the hotel had our cell phone number to contact us if any problems arise with our pick up.  We were dropped off on time with no problems and had very
Manager Response: Vcatnguy, thank you for taking the time to share your experience at The Pacific Inn. We would like to express our sincerest apologies for the issues you encountered during your stay here with us. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most highly booked packages and it is extremely out of character that an issue like this arose. We do indeed have one shuttle that fits a total of 8 passengers along with limited space for suitcases. It is a 30 min drive from the hotel and it runs hourly, depending on traffic it may take a little longer to get inside the cruise terminal - which comes with a designated parking area. In any case that the shuttle is full or behind your desired schedule we do offer Uber or Lyft rides at our expense. We’ll be increasing our efforts when it comes to our shuttle schedule and front desk to guest communication so that this situation won’t repeat itself. I can promise you that the highest quality standards will be met moving forward.  If you would like to further discuss your experience please feel free to contact me personally at info@thepacificinn.com or at 562-493-7501. We appreciate your comments and honesty. We hope you choose to stay with us again and allow us to remedy these issues.

Summary: I keep returning to this place. The front desk representatives are wonderful and always so helpful  The rooms are clean and have the right temperature even when is cold outside  It’s my favorite place in Seal Beach
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach accommodations. We are glad to hear that you have enjoyed your multiple stays with us. We appreciate that you took the time out of your day to give us some feedback! Although the weather around this area relatively stays the same through out the year, our heaters can give an extra boost for those cold winter nights. Please let us know when you plan to come back to the area and we will be sure to set it up ASAP. Thank you again!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is an excellent place to stay for couples, families and groups! The staff is superb and goes above and beyond to insure the best in customer service! We arrived extremely early to check in after a 21 hour drive and the night auditor, Joon, was more than courteous in getting us checked in at 3am! Max and Selena were so helpful prior to arriving with assistance via phone conversations and the young man who initially booked our reservation had everything in order for our Park & Cruise when we arrived! This was the first trip to California for my kids and I and Amanda and her staff at The Pacific Inn got it started off perfect! The process to and from the port was streamlined to go as quickly and effortlessly as one could imagine! Thank you so much to the entire
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your California accommodations. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed your trip with us. Your feedback about our staff is very sweet and we are all grateful for it. We try our absolute best to ensure a smooth experience from check-in all the way to check-out. Please give us a call as soon as you figure out your plans to come back and we will get started on that immediately. Thank you for the 5-star review and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: This is the best hotel ever!
Summary: Our family of three have stayed here twice now in the last 2 years. We drive here from CO to see family.  We love all the amenities and the warm people. The rooms are so comfortable and clean.  We get a suite.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your repeated patronages to the Seal Beach area. We are always happy to see and accommodate your needs. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to enhance upon your experiences here at the hotel. Thank you for taking the time to give us a 5-star review. We hope to be able to see you again soon!

Summary: Pacific Inn was a wonderful place to stay.  The staff was extremely helpful and friendly, the rooms were clean and the location to the beach was perfect.  We also very much enjoyed the pool, spa and breakfast   Thank you

Summary: Another great room (actually the best that we’ve had), the always friendly staff and an excellent location in a beautiful community made for yet another amazing stay!  We look forward to our stay at the Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: Phil-LindaR, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to know you enjoyed yet another stay here with us! We greatly appreciate your recurring business and look forward to welcoming you back very soon. Happy Holidays!

Summary: I have lived in the Seal Beach area my whole life and we decided to stay because of the holidays.  It was perfect.  Loved the shuttle that took us down 2nd street and the breakfast! I was also pleased with the cleanliness of the hotel room with the great balcony!
Manager Response: Knimi2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad yo enjoyed your stay here with us! We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating, we look forward to seeing you again should you return to the area.

Manager Response: P3611OKcindyb, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We really loved loved our stay at your very hospitable & beautiful hotel indeed. 💖 The breakfast was fantastic tasting.  We've had free breakfasts at other hotels and your chef makes the breakfast very tasty and fresh.  Love love the lobby coffee maker for lattes etc. The room was very clean and comfortable and nicely decorated.  Your location is a perfect spot for walking down main street where their is plenty of restaurants and shopping and the walk down to the beach is a perfect distance.  Yes we definitely want to be your guests again and again.  We have family in Long Beach next door to Seal Beach and want to continue booking  your hotel whenever possible when we visit.  So congratulations to your all staff members for doing an amazing job.  Thank you for the $25 offer

Our location truly is a plus! Thank you again for your kind review. We look forward to seeing you again very soon!

Summary: We liked the location of the hotel it was within walking distance to restaurants and main St. The staff was nice and professional.  The  rooms were very clean.The breakfasts were just perfect to start the day off right.
Manager Response: shannonpM8760UH, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Reservation and check in process was great. The young lady was able to get us into our room early! I brought our luggage to the front door of the lobby and it all fell off in the lobby (lousy small carts).  So....the luggage is everywhere and a young man who was working in the lobby stood there and stared at the mess I had made......turned around and walked away!!!!!! I asked if he could give me a hand but he walked away and closed the door to the office.  I picked everything up and continued to our room.  Rude service (lack of).  Everything else was excellent except for this incident,
Manager Response: A8400UJjackh, we would like to extend our sincerest apologies for the experience you had with one of our front desk members. I will be sure to pass along your comments to our management team and ensure that this does not happen again. Please accept our deepest apologies.   Other than this incident, we are glad you found the rest of your stay to be excellent and enjoyable. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Our stay on 11/16/2019 was our third stay at the Pacific Inn.  It is a quality motel, very clean, very spacious.
Summary: This was our third stay at the Pacific Inn.  We stayed the night of 11/16/2019.  The room and all surroundings were very clean.  Very spacious room. They have an elevator to take your luggage, etc. to the floors. Also, they have the luggage carrier to put your bags on.  Underground parking is great.  We use them because they have the park and cruise special. We can keep our car at the motel where it is nice and safe for 7 days while we are cruising.  They take you to the cruise terminal and pick you back up.  This trip my wife had her power scooter with her and they simply put it on the van with the rest of our belongings.  On the return trip we were able to disembark from the ship earlier than originally planned.  I placed a call to the motel and a nice young man by the name of
Manager Response: rogersJ2121DM, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn! We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your stay here with us! Ty truly is a rockstar! Guest satisfaction is our top priority an we are so glad to know you received just that and more. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Very comfortable with everything I needed.
Summary: I stayed in a newly remodeled  room with my granddaughter. The room had a coffee maker and refrigerator and was spacious and clean.  I liked the central location of the pool and hot tub. The breakfast was great. Everything was clean. There was a coffee machine in the lobby which provided a variety of beverages. Free parking was much appreciated. My granddaughter had a wonderful time. I enjoyed our stay and plan to return.
Manager Response: Catherine K,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We truly appreciate your kind review and detailed experience. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back very soon.

Manager Response: Madaline2018, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Summary Heading: Nice place to stay pre cruise
Summary: Stayed here the night before our cruise out of Long Beach,  had 2 queen beds. Very friendly staff and close to restaurant & stores. Also paid 20.00 dollars for parking for our 4 day cruise. Free shuttle to & from cruise port. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: BLAZERFAN40, thank you for telling us about your stay. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our Park & Cruise package truly is a favorite among our guests. With a one time fee of $20, our package includes up to 7 days parking, shuttle ride to and from the cruise terminal and breakfast throughout your stay. It is also available year round ;-)  Can't get any better than that!  We look forward to seeing you again should you return to the area.

Summary: A wonderful hotel.  Quiet and comfortable and 2 blocks to Main Street and all the shops and restaurants.  So close to the pier and wonderful walking.  The customer service is excellent.  Also the other guests are friendly and have frequented the hotel many times.  This is my 2nd visit this fall.  I will returning next year because it was so lovely.
Manager Response: Wander4075, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Summary: The staff was pleasant and friendly, the room was comfortable and clean! This location is close to Main Street Seal Beach with amazing restaurants, shops and bars and only a few blocks to the beach!  Great stay.
Manager Response: JerseyjoeKC, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity is definitely a guest favorite! We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

From the great complimentary breakfast to the shuttle that will drop off/pick up (took us to to In ‘n Out Burger!), this hotel provides outstanding service. We were offered cold water for our walks to the pier, cookies in the lobby on our return and the folks behind the desk were simply fantastic! We paid $20 per person for shuttle to the cruise terminal in Long Beach, personable and professional driver that got us right to the drop off point. Highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Dream280707, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Close to everything, great restaurants in area and shopping with shuttle service.  Great staff and housekeeping, eager to please. I love Seal Beach and the Pacific Inn.
Manager Response: Richardblack2019, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Summary: Room was clean and bed was very comfortable. Loved how close it was to the shops. We walked to the pier and ate at a local restaurant. People were very friendly and felt very safe. Hotel stay was awesome we will be back

Manager Response: MKandLK, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Manager Response: Jo Anne Y, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay here with us. Summary: My group has been coming to the Pacific Inn for 4 or 5 years. The 6 of us have known each other since the 1950’s.  We are the Classmates that never want to say Goodbye.  We love the adjoining rooms.  The best deal is we can walk to most restaurants.... Two of us have walking issues... so the accommodations have been excellent. We just checked out this morning and our comments we're... 1) love the refurbishing. 2) Noticed that the staff was super friendly and helpful during our three days. 3) why go anywhere else? We tried to get together every 6 months.  We are already planning the next trip.  Love Love, Love the Pacific Inn💕🥰💕💁‍♀️
Manager Response: 1960jordan, thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn. It is always a pleasure having you stay with us. We greatly appreciate your recurring business and look forward to welcoming you back soon. Till next time!

Manager Response: GaleL S, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations!  Wow, 20 years!! We are ever grateful to have such loyal guests! Summary Heading: Great place to stay in the Seal Beach/Long Beach area
Summary: This is an older hotel, but the room updates make it very nice. The rooms all open out to overlook the pool and hot tub in an atrium-like setting. It has a boutique feel, and was good to get away from large chains in other parts of Long Beach. There were amenities like welcome chocolates, and cookies and water bottles available in the lobby. The breakfast room is small, and the breakfast was standard waffle maker, eggs and breakfast meats. The fresh blueberries were a pleasant surprise. The staff was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: ezmom, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for you Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Guest satisfaction is our top priority and we are thrilled to know we have exceeded your expectations. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: This is a great place to stay when in Seal Beach, so close to Main Street with all the restaurants and bars and shops. Hotel was clean with nice rooms. Common areas clean and staff friendly. Good breakfast and loved the coffee machine in the lobby. Parking is free and covered. My only complaint would be that the water pressure in the shower was a little low. Don’t hesitate to stay at this nice hotel in Seal Beach. I will be back.
Manager Response: cabo1130, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate your kind reviw and rating. Our close proximity to Main St is definitely a nice plus. Regarding the water pressure, our front desk team is available 24/7 in case an issue like this comes up. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Pacific Inn's recent upgrades are terrific!
Summary: I (we) have been staying annually at the Pacific Inn in Seal Beach for around 10 years. Its location is great -- walking distance to Seal Beach's Main Street, with numerous restaurants, coffee shops, other retail, and of course the beach! Plus nearby, on Pacific Coast Highway, a bank, classy supermarket, and pharmacy. The best thing I can say in this review, though, is that Pacific Inn has recently remodeled -- really completely upgraded and refurbished! -- at least several of their rooms (we were in Rm. 329), and the new rooms are really nice. Especially good are the bathroom and the little kitchenette, now with a small sink and a high-quality refrigerator (with actual separate freezer compartment). The bathroom, too, is fully re-done, with excellent and attractive all-new
Manager Response: Charles G, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. we greatly appreciate the kind review and rating! We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Relaxing and Fun in Seal Beach
Summary: Had a fun time at Seal Beach, especially not having to drive to a bunch of restaurants! A short walk to main street Seal Beach from this wonderful hotel. Staff are professional and very nice. Cookies, coffee, and free newspapers when you check in, a fun classy pool and jacuzzi area, and a very nice with hot and cold breakfast options,  with varying menu each morning.  Classy touches include fresh blueberries for your waffles as well as a fancy fresh waffle machine that makes perfect waffles! Yummo. Eggs (different prep each day), sausage,  potatoes, oatmeal,  juices, breads, I could go on but am getting hungry again.  This place is great for families and business people alike. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: PatriotDave, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us. Our close proximity to Old Town SB is definitely a guest favorite.  We greatly appreciate your kind and informative review. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: My wife and I have stayed here a dozen times. The staff is always warm and friendly.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  It is within walking distance to Main street and the pier. That is where you will find great eats, bars, and shopping.
Manager Response: btownbobby, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn in Seal Beach. We are so glad you have enjoyed yet another stay here with us! Thank you for telling us about your stay and for your recurring business. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: WONDERFUL PLACE TO STAY BEFORE CRUISE
Summary: A wonderful hotel that is not corporate owned.  Lovely room with balcony.  Perfect for our stay before being taking to cruise port.  Highly recommend to stay here and not have to rush to catch the ship or exit the ship

Summary: This place is out go to everytime we cruise. They are so accommodating and tons ate always cleaned and inspected before you check in. We love this place and as long as they are open, they will always be our number one place when coming to California.

Manager Response: Debbie W, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach. Our close proximity to both Main St and the beach are definitely guests favorites! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay here with us and look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We stay at the Pacific Inn every time we are in Seal Beach. The Inn is located a few blocks from Main Street and the Pier. The rooms have been updated, are clean and each has a small balcony.  The staff is always friendly and helpful. I especially love the fresh baked cookies at 5:30p!
Manager Response: Rose9889, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We greatly appreciate you telling us a little bit about your stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed at The Pacific in two days before our cruise. The room was extremely clean.  The cleaning crew was very nice and kept our room stocked with necessary items. The  decor was really cute. The hotel is centrally located making it easy to walk or drive to restaurants and shopping. It is also just a few blocks from Seal Beach. The hot breakfast was delish....eggs, sausage, bacon, toast....The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  The hotel even provided transportation to the port.  Our driver was wonderful! She had a great personality. This hotel definitely deserves 5 stars!
Manager Response: Mary T,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you took advantage of our Park & Cruise Package! We greatly appreciate your positive review and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Small Hotel With Lots of Amenities

Summary: We absolutely love Seal Beach, CA. The hotel is close to Main Street and the beach. The parking can be a challenge as space is limited and the spots are smaller. The breakfast surprised us and was very good. The rooms are clean and everyone is very helpful.   I'd stay here again

Summary: Comfortable and clean room, nice free breakfast, close to town and the beach and friendly staff. The reasons that I didn’t give a 5 star is that the parking gets full and can be an issue and the fridge in the Admiral Suite could be improved. Looking forward to our next visit.
