Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Seal Beach
Summary: 2nd stay! Love how convenient this hotel is to Downtown Main St. Easy walk to the beach and pier. Nice hotel, comfy bed, good complimentary  breakfast, indoor pool. Staff extremely accommodating. We will be back!
Manager Response: SharieJ19, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed yet another stay here with us! We strive to deliever excellent customer service for both first time and reocurring guests. We greatly appreciate your business and hope to see you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Love the location so much to do within walking distance!!! The breakfast lady is super sweet! the breakfast is a good variety and a great way to start your day. Love the 24 hour touch screen hot drink machine in the lobby. Clean environment. The reason I didnt give 5 stars is the parking fills up fast and we had some minor issues but nothing that wouldnt keep us from coming back. We will be back!
Manager Response: Loriesnyder, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate your feedback and the insignt of your stay here with us. Our parking can be limited due to the size of our hotel but street parking is also available only a few steps away from our hotel enterance. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: great  front desk service , and rooms very clean and surrounding area very clean
Summary: breakfast , and local resturants close by  breakfast at the pacific inn is to wake up for,,  I hope you will stay and enjoy the location, I really enjoy the closeness to the beach and pier, the shuttle  will take and pick up with 5 miles radius.
Manager Response: Buddy B, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We greatly appreciate your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Comfortable , clean, walking distance to beach, good breakfast!
Summary: Comfortable simple clean rooms, breakfast is good, and has yogurt, cereal, egg, milk, juice, toast etc. typical continental breakfast.  Pool seems smallish and jacuzzi too. Walking distance to the beach and downtown near the beach.  2nd review:   2 nd time staying here; Victoria who does the breakfast is soo sweet, she’s here every time we stay here.   She does a Terrific job with the breakfast. I think she’s been here for years.   Blueberries, strawberries, yogurt, granola, eggs, potatoes, waffle, toast, coffee, tea, fruit,  bagels etc. soo good, clean and small area- but just right.
Manager Response: Nathalietennis, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We take great pride in our little gem by the beach and we are thrilled to know we met your expectations during your stay with us....yet again. :) We greatly appreiciate your kind review! We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to Seal Beach.

Summary: This hotel has a perfect location....is a short walk to the beach, pier, shops, restaurants, & grocery store.  Clean updated rooms with balconies. Great little pool & spa, with nice seating to relax. Safe area. The staff is friendly, accommodating, and most importantly it's affordable with great rates.  They will always price match another site on their hotel.  Includes a nice complimentary breakfast & shuttle service(upon availablity).  Close to the Carnival cruise terminal!  We enjoyed our stay & will stay again.
Manager Response: Love2cruisenow, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We take great pride in providing excellent customer serviceat all times and we are pleased to know that we have exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future

Summary Heading: Great place to stay at the beach
Summary: Nice location.  Close to the beach and downtown.  Although PCH was close, we never heard any traffic.  Very quiet.  Room was clean.  Good hot breakfast.  The menu showed that they serve a different breakfast daily.  The guy at the front desk was friendly and helpful.  He was on duty when we arrived and there in the morning as well.  Still positive.
Manager Response: AprilW1049, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your stay here with us! We greatly appreiciate your kind review and rating! We hope you choose to say with us again in the future.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay here.  Downtown Seal Beach was a quick walk and the rooms were clean.  My room was facing the pool area which introduced some noise to my room but fortunately the fan of the AC in the room drowned it out nicely.  Beds were comfortable as well.
Manager Response: Maxpaste, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay here with us! The rooms around the pool area are subject to a bit more noise in comparison to our hallway rooms. Our front deak team is available 24/7 so if in the future you would like to move to a quieter area during your stay please dont hesitate to ask. We hope you choose to stay with again should you return to the area.

Summary: Couldn;t have been better.  All of us had a good time with great service.  It was a plus to have a complementary breakfast.  Will return soon. Th location is ideal.  We can walk down main street where there are several shops and restuarants.  Then the pier is at the end.  The library was also close.
Manager Response: Msmillicent, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Our close proximity to Main St as well as the Seal Beach pier is definitely a guest favorite! We greatly appreiciate your kind review and rating! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: The pier was just a few minutes’ walk through a variety of quaint shops. There was ample free parking. The hotel was easy to find. Bath & Body products in the bathroom was a nice surprise as were the cute pillow mints. We enjoyed our balcony. The hotel is smaller than I anticipated, which is why it books quickly. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay near the beach. It is beautiful and reasonably priced. We will definitely return!
Manager Response: Janine M, thank you for chooisng The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed all of the wonderful amenities our hotel has to offer! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Great visit, nice size of hotel, parking visible, The coffee in lobby is great!!! Rooms look recently renovated,lots of counter space, love the walk in shower,( large), the amenities of soaps, lotions, scented for sleep were wonderful, and offer of other products if forgotten were in a small jar, makeup remover, Q-tips, etc, loved it! The mint candy on bed for evening. They even offer a setting on your TV to set to wake you up in morning to soothing music. Complimenry breakfast offered with there daily menu, coffee machine in rooms, refrigerator, microwave, in rooms, great prices. I especially loved!!!! the little map to the stores or restaurants on Main Street, which was within walking distance. It was part of the holder for your room key.   Thank you Pacific Inn, for making
Manager Response: Gloriahall2018, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Providing excellent cusotmer service is of upmost importance to us and we are pleased to know that we did not fall short of your expectations. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: I love this hotel. I have stayed here every end of July for about the last 6 years. I keep coming back because of the excellent location, friendliness of the staff, cleanliness of the hotel, and the yummy breakfast. It is a very comfortable and relaxing place. It is a quick walk to Seal Beach, and there are lots of shops and restaurants along the way. Love this place!
Manager Response: Heathertraveler2323, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed yet another stay here with us! We are so pleased to know that you found our rooms to be both comfortable and relaxing during your visit. Our close proximity to Main St is truly an awesome perk of staying at our hotel.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: Quiet, great rooms with balconies, lovely breakfast, nice pool, friendly and accommodating staff, perfect location (near main street, the beach, and restaurants), and sufficient covered parking. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: EchoAlphaLima, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity to Main St is defenitely a wonderful advantage! We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: Clean hotel with a good location.  Walking distance to everything.  Beach not too far but a decent walk.  No complaints but realize your paying for the location.  You can get a fancier hotel farther away for cheaper so its all about how close you want to be to downtown.
Manager Response: Ctmangrum, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay here with us. We appreciate you telling us a little about your experience here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Wonderful - staff, room, amenities, and location
Summary: My husband, dog and I just left the hotel after a wonderful 'stay-cation'.  The staff treated us with kindness and dignity; the room was updated, clean and the bed comfortable; the breakfast was a real treat and was even dog friendly; and located in the heart of Seal Beach allowed us to park the car and leave it parked for the whole stay. This is a wonderful hotel in the heard of a great little city. Everything (including price) we could ask for.
Manager Response: LMcCulloch, thank you for visiting The Pacific Inn! We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay here with us! We strive to deliver excellent customer service as well as a comfortable stay for all of our guests (including our furry friends) We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Our 2nd stay at Pacific Inn. Choose it again because of location and the pool. Room was humid, even with the A/C on but in a good location of the hotel. Downside, it was an adjoining room and we could here the guests next to us as if the door was open. Chairs on the deck were a plus. Breakfast was good. 5-10 minute walk to the pier.
Manager Response: Hmoney, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal  Beach lodging accommodations. We would like to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay here with us. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms. With these renovations, we are increasing the amount of insulation in the walls to ensure our guests are not bothered by any noise in the surrounding areas, as well and an overal update to appliances. Please feel free to let the front desk know of any issues you may have with your room or stay. We will do our very best to alleviate any guest issue. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: We arrived quite early from overseas and were told we may be able to check in at noon, but we were still waiting at 2pm- it was a nice thought but the false hope was disappointing. (Especially as they knew we were waiting and never even bothered to tell us when the room was ready!)  We loved the location, breakfast and clean room with its coffee maker, fridge and balcony with a clothes drying line. No safe in room or any closet or place for hanging clothes, however. The Toilet seat didn’t self-close properly - it hung open half way. But the worst were the paper thin walls- with the hotel being fully booked we heard everything - conversations in the next room at 4.30 AM and 11pm, children playing in the pool first thing and until closing, cars revving at the mechanics next door,
Manager Response: none

Summary: I always enjoy staying here. It's a wonderful location and we can walk anywhere. The breakfast is included! A few things could be addressed as the drywall repairs during their remodel has  never been finished and painted. The pillows are flat and lumpy. There was a very strong natural gas smell in the hallway at night. The staff here is delightful and very helpful and accommodating.
Manager Response: stilltraveling2014, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We would like to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay here with us. These issues have been noted and will be taken care of accordingly. We greatly appreciate your feedback, and kind rating! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: I recommend The Pacific Inn to all my friends!!!  It's truly one of our favorite hotels.  It's family owned, recently remodeled and rooms range from about $140 - $240 a night which is really, really reasonable. It's in a quiet neighborhood and a 5 minute walk to the beach which we appreciate because it saves us money on beach parking and messing around with beach traffic. There is an indoor pool and hot tub under an open roof, an in room Keurig with coffee and a hot complimentary breakfast every morning.  We live in Phoenix (about 6 hours away) and have stayed here on multiple occasions.  We even celebrated our daughter's 7th birthday here!  The rooms are clean and very comfortable.  The staff (from housekeeping to front desk) could not be nicer or more professional.  In the
Manager Response: Liz B, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We take great pride in provind excellent customer service and we are thrilled to know we exceeded your expectations. We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating! We hope to see you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We really liked this hotel.  We stayed in adjoining rooms for two nights and were treated wonderfully by all the staff we encountered. The breakfast was good...small room in which to eat but the hotel is smaller as well. Our rooms were clean, both with balconies, and comfortable.  Our view from the balconies left much to be desired but we were walking distance from the ocean.  Didn't use the pool as it was small and always occupied fully.  The free hot chocolate/espresso machine was a definite perk!  We would stay again.
Manager Response: DeeHeight, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Thank you so telling us a little bit about your stay here with us. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: The Pacific Inn is great! Clean, attentive staff. Complimentary breakfast.  Pool, Jacuzzi. Walking distance to downtown with great shops and restaurants.  Also the Seal Beach Pier. We stay for a get away few months We'll be back soon!
Manager Response: 63FJB, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the various amenities that we offer here at The Pacific Inn. Guest Satisfaction is our biggest priority here and strive to ensure that our rooms and facility reflect that! We agree that having all of the shops and restaurants on Main St., which is just a block away, are very convenient when exploring the local area! We look forward to having you back!

Summary: Super close to the beach, you can smell the ocean! Walking distance to Main Street with great shops and restaurants.   Great location, great staff, good value! We will staying here in the future, we loved it!
Manager Response: Jensine A, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Thank you for telling us a little bit about your stay here with us. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed you time in Seal Beach. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary: The Pacific Inn is one of the best hotels I’ve stayed in in a while. The rooms are clean and updated. The staff was friendly and helpful. The breakfast was even pretty good. It’s close to the beach and many restaurants. Couldn’t have asked for a better weekend.
Manager Response: Sheri S, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We are so pleased to know that you had such an excellent stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: We needed an ADA room for my sister and her husband. The folks at Pacific Inn were very accommodating. The room was perfect and right next to the pool area. So many wonderful things to do within walking distance. Main Street with all it's restaurants and shops along with the Seal Beach Pier were among the favorites. Thank you Pacific Inn for giving my sister an incredibly great experience for her birthday. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: FrannieCulley, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoued your stay here with us. We are so glad you had such a wonderful stay here with us! Our close proximity to Main St truly is a guest favorite! We look forward to welcoming you and your family back again soon!

Summary: We recently stayed at the Pacific Inn with our grandchildren prior to our Carnival cruise. The staff are very pleasant, the room was clean and well maintained. They offer a great breakfast with different entrees each day on their 3rd floor. There's a pool and spa on the 2nd floor so a 2nd floor room is perfect with kids. The pool has reasonable hours so swimmers won't keep you up at night or awake early in the morning. The beach is a block away and the downtown is a block away in the other direction. Both offer a variety of restaurants and shops. The Inn has complementary umbrellas, beach chairs, tubes, boogie boards, etc. as well as bottled water. Right across the street are several fast food restaurants and some kid friendly bar/restaurants for late snacks. Would highly
Manager Response: seapsych, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We strive to deliver excellent customer service to every guest, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach places guests within a short walk of numerous dining and shopping options. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area

Summary: The hotel was very clean.  Reasonable rates.  Excellent breakfast.  Very polite employees.  Other guests were polite and quiet.  I loved having a balcony and enjoyed the fresh sea air.  I would have liked to have had a place to hang my clothes and an iron.  However, that was the only drawback.  We will visit again. (Also, very easy drive to CSULB)
Manager Response: none

Summary: The beds were comfortable and the employees were all very welcoming.  It was nice to have the continental breakfast in the morning.  And the kids loved the indoor swimming pool.  The locations is a nice walk to the beach and nearby Main St., in Seal Beach.
Manager Response: shellproperties, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your positive feedback regarding our breakfast room, pool area, and staff. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and we are pleased you had an excellent experience! Our downtown location puts guests only minutes from many dining and shopping options, as well as the beach! We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

Summary Heading: We have found a wonderful new short getaway spot.
Summary: Our stay at the Pacific Inn, was a an outstanding surprise which exceeded our expectations. We have made numerous day trips to Seal Beach over the years so were familiar with the area, but to be able to enjoy an extended stay in this peaceful beach community was a treat. We appreciated this " Pet Friendly" facility from check in when they gave us a bin with treats, blankets, etc. to the greenbelt across the street, and leisurely walking opportunities with our two babies. We enjoyed meals at nearby restaurants, and the walks on the pier and nearby beach. We were so impressed we quickly sent texts to family and friends to make them aware of this jewel of a travel destination. We are making plans to making return trips in the coming months.
Manager Response: W9489CAdanielo, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know how much you enjoyed your stay here with us. We take great pride in our litte jewel by the beach as well as providing excellent customer service. Thank you for telling us about your stay and leaving a fabulous rating. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: very clean and comfortable and the nicest most helpful employees!  walk to beach, shops, music and restaurants. Easy to park and lots of fun things to do in town.  Swimming pool and small workout room. Delicious hot breakfast!
Manager Response: LaurieABC, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Thank you so much for telling us a little bit about your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Convenient & Clean Stay in Seal Beach
Summary: My kids and I had a great stay at Pacific Inn. The hotel is in a convenient location - 2 blocks from main Street Seal Beach and about 6 blocks from the ocean. The hotel is off a main road but I felt very safe there and walking in the surrounding neighborhood with my young girls. Parking in the covered area underneath the hotel was easy. The staff was friendly, offered us complimentary bottled water and the lobby always had the yummy scent of fresh coffee.  Our two queen room was perfect for us three. It had a wet bar with mini fridge and microwave. The room was a bit noisy because of the location but we were able to sleep just fine. The beds were comfy and the bathroom was renovated and clean.  The breakfast is great, with very thoughtful additions to the main dishes (eggs,
Manager Response: Victoriaf608,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating. Guest satisfaction is of upmost importance to us, and we are delighted to know that we were able to provide you with a comfortable stay. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: The Pacific Inn exceeded our expectations. This place is very clean and comfortable with friendly staff for us and our pooch. Easy walking distance to main street with all the restaurants and on down to the pier. Unfortunately dogs are NOT allowed at this beach, but just15 minutes (drive) down the road is the amazing Huntington Dog Beach, very worth the time to take your pooch here. I would definitely recommend The Pacific Inn to families and dog lovers.
Manager Response: Kalin F, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Thank you so much for your kind review and rating! We are thrilled to know that we have exceeded your expectations during your stay here with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Made my own waffles for breakfast!  Yum!
Summary: Have stayed here several times.  Never had a bad room.  Always clean, well stocked, non-smoking, everything worked (TV, coffee maker, lights, A/C, etc.).  Always our first choice when staying in the Seal Beach, Belmont Shore area.
Manager Response: Kristufek, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed yet another stay here with us. Our waffle machine truly never disappoints and we are thrilled to know you have enjoyed it just as much as we do. Thank you for your kind review and rating! We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: I will definitely be staying here again.  The staff are friendly and helpful, the beds are comfy, and it is within walking distance to everything. We had a great time with no complaints. They serve a hot breakfast every morning and you can make Belgium waffles. Yummy!  Nice interior pool with hot tub.  It is definitely worthwhile.
Manager Response: JackieO019, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad yo enjoyed your stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Seal Beach.

Summary: Great place to stay everything you need is all around you. Perfect place for kids and breakfast was good we will definitely be returning 👍 very clean nice pool. Staff was very helpful. Rates are good and beach is close you can walk 👍
Manager Response: Misssherr, thank you for chooding The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are pleased to know you enjoyed yout stay here with us. We take great pride in providing excellent customer service and we are thrilled to know you will be returning in the future.

Summary: They offer a free shuttle, however we did not pre arrange this service.  The staff went out of their way to accommodate us!  They made it happen!  We really appreciated this!  They also offer a really nice complimentary breakfast!  The hotel is within a few minutes walk to a really nice beach, restaurants and local shops. The rooms were comfortable and CLEAN.  A great place to stay for the $$$.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Ron H,  thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know you enjoyed your stay here with us! We strive  to deliver excellent customer service and we are pleased to know that you had such a memorable time during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: My husband, son, and I had a great first time visit in Seal Beach. The location of The Pacific Inn is wonderful as you can walk to the beach, restaurants, and shops. We visited Knott's Berry Farm while on our stay and that was easy to travel to from The Pacific Inn. Breakfast is delicious with a wide variety. The pool area is nice. The rooms are nice with enough room for the 3 of us. We plan to visit again!
Manager Response: MrsWelling, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. All of our wonderful amenities and short distance to Main St. truly make a pleasant and fun vacation. Thank you for your kimd review and rating.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We had a wonderful time at this quaint, very clean hotel. It was so conveniently located to everything in town. We were able to walk to the firework show, restaurants on Main Street and so much more. It was a perfect get away for the night for our family!
Manager Response: UCLAmomof4, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Although it was a short stay, we are thrilled to know you had a pleasant visit. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: A Touch of Class by the Sea
Summary: If you want to be treated royally from the time you check in until your departure, then the Pacific Inn in Seal Beach is a must. The rooms are lovely, all recently renovated, the staff is there for you, free WiFi, parking, breakfast, warm cookies each night and two blocks from the ocean, shops and great restaurants. Pool, jacuzzi and workout room also included. We celebrate our birthday twice a year here and any other excuse we can make up to return and it doesn’t take much believe me.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I stay at The Pacific Inn several times a year.  The Pacific Inn has great customer service, clean rooms, cruise port shuttle and free parking for the entire week of the cruise.  The Pacific Inn is walking distance to the ocean and various restaurants.  We will continue to use the Pacific Inn in the future!
Manager Response: Vegasman47, thank you for choose The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Our park and cruise package is definitely a guest favorite. We look forward to welcoming you back should you return to Seal Beach.

Summary Heading: Great little place in perfect area !
Summary: We loved it here it was quite and clean the only thing was the bed it was a bit to firm for us but everything else was great !! The breakfast was great also . The staff was super friendly and professional!
Manager Response: 92017traveler, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your kind and honest feedback. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This hotel is a real gem, the rooms are spotless and well fitted, great bathroom and front desk always helpful and friendly.  Definitely would stay there again.  Only downside was the free breakfast which we found disappointing. Another plus was free waters and free sunscreen.
Manager Response: NikkiC1905, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed our rooms and customer service. We would like to extend our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay here with us. We greatly appreiciate your feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve our hotel. We hope you consider us in the future should you return to the area.

Summary: We've been staying at The Pacific Inn for many years and have always been more than satisfied with our rooms and the services provided by the outstanding staff. Many of the rooms have been newly renovated and the free breakfast each morning is rather complete with both hot and cold selections.   The hotel is within easy walking distance to shopping and dining on Main Street and the beach.
Manager Response: lightrays, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you had yet another fabulous stay here with us. We greatly appreiciate your reocurring business and look forward to welcoming you back in the years to come!

Summary Heading: Perfect!! Great place to stay while in Seal Beach!! Professional staff, Clean rooms, and Amazing breakfast!!
Summary: Went to Seal Beach for a conference.  Our stay at Pacific Inn was amazing.  Great location.  Easy to find.  Lots of restaurants and stores near by for all your needs.  Staff is professional and courteous.  Pool, Jacuzzi was good.  Room was very nice. But the best part was the Breakfast!!  Amazing food.  Make your waffles,  eggs, meat, breakfast potato's, hash browns, juice, beagles, coffee. Breakfast area was beautiful and clean.  Kudo's to the breakfast manager!! Thank you for a great stay!!  Aloha!!
Manager Response: GmanKane, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service to every guest, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach places guests within a short walk of numerous dining and shopping options. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We have stayed here quite often.  Over the years it has aged, yet it still has wonderful personnel and a decent breakfast on premise (free).  I'm pretty sure it has been remodeled since everything seems newer and cleaner.  The have a self serve coffee/espresso machine in the lobby that serves up some really nice coffee options.   The free shuttle service was prompt to pick us up at the airport.  Angel was a delightful driver and we were greeted by Max at the desk.  The welcoming was fresh and peasant.  We booked the suite with a microwave, toaster oven and small refrigerator.  A market within walking distance was just about as complete a vacation as anyone would want.
Manager Response: Vegasron5206, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed yet another stay here with us! We take great pride in delivering excellent customer service. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: We just returned from another week in Seal Beach. The Pacific Inn is the only place we stay. It is my happy place. This little gem is perfect for a quick getaway or a week’s stay. The entire staff is friendly and helpful. The rooms are updated and well taken care of. The pool area is lovely and well stocked with towels. Both pools are handicapped accessible. The hot cookies in the afternoon are the best. The coffee machine in the lobby has the best hot chocolate. I wouldn’t stay anywhere else. Planning my visits for October and December.
Manager Response: rlipschutz,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We were thrilled to have you stay with us again and look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Very Nice Stay at Pacific Inn
Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn prior to taking a cruise out of long beach.  The facility was clean, beds were comfortable and they provided a nice breakfast along with transportation to the Port.  There were plenty of places to eat and plenty to see within walking distance.  It worked out perfectly and we would stay there again.
Manager Response: 175daphnep, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We take great pride in providing comfortable stays for our valued guests. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Stayed in one of the remolded rooms. The room was very nice. The pool and Jacuzzi was refreshing after a full day of work. Complimentary breakfast in the morning made it easy not having to find a place to go to. Probably the nicest hotel in seal beach.
Manager Response: Akbadd,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. All of our wonderful amenities are definitely guest favorites! We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating and look forward to seeing you again on your future trips to the area.

Summary Heading: Nice stay at The Pacific Inn
Summary: I enjoyed my staycation at the Inn - the room was updated nicely and included everything I could have wanted, including probably the firmest bed I have ever had in a hotel. My room had a balcony, frig, micro & jetted tub. Location is nice and close to everything Seal Beach has to offer. The breakfast was a nice addition as well. I enjoyed pool & Jacuzzi as well.
Manager Response: Cmh0123,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are thrilled to know that you had just a great experience while staying at our hotel. We appreiciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Best and most convenient hotel in downtown Seal Beach!
Summary: Located a short walk from Main St. which has plenty of shopping and eating alternatives. Great staff and clean hotel. For a nice dinner, try Walt's Wharf on Main St. Their grilled lobster tail is done to perfection.
Manager Response: TjtravelerChicago,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, and we are thrilled to know that your experience was exceptional. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: This hotel was overall a great experience. Very close to the pier and main street. Clean and upgraded. I would recommend this hotel to my friends and family and can't wait to come back and stay on another weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Nmorales1,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad to know that you enjoyed your first stay here with us! Our close proximity to the Seal Beach Pier and Main St is definitely a guest favorite! We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: A very responable hotel.  For business only at this time.  Glad we were able to find this hotel comapred to other the price difference is a whole lot better mostly for down south in the Los Angles aera.

Summary Heading: We love Seal Beach and the Pacific Inn
Summary: We discovered the Pacific Inn as we were delivering our Freshman to Long Beach State and have enjoyed staying with them for the past 4 years.  We love the feel of Seal Beach and the Pacific Inn is an easy walk to the main street shops and restaurants, the beach and pier.  The staff is so friendly and helpful.  The rooms and bathrooms are nice  and have a usable balcony.  The breakfast is good with lots of options.  The hotel is clean and well maintained and has covered parking.  We highly recommend the Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: Margaret A,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed stay here with us! We greatly appreciate your fantastic review and rating! We pride ourselves in delivering excellent customer service in every aspect, and we are pleased to know that we exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: This is the second time I have stayed at The Pacific in while visiting my dad. It is very clean and quiet and accommodations my ESA-and close to a great juice bar! The staff is friendly courteous and helpful. Will stay again next trip to the area.
Manager Response: Lynleerae, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us! Guest satisfaction is our top priority and we pride ourselves on going above and beyond for our guests. Our property location is very convenient, as it is walking distance from local shops, restaurants, boutiques, bars and more! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This is a great location, and the staff are very friendly. I visit here a couple of times a year, and love that I can walk to the beach, shops and restaurants. My only complaint is that they have horrible, horrible water pressure.
Manager Response: Hello Eva, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our location is very convenient for our guests, as it is a short walk from Downtown Seal Beach and the Seal Beach Pier! We would like to express our sincerest apology that our water pressure was not to your liking. In the future, please inform the front desk and we will address any issue you have right away. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We have always loved the Pacific Inn and now they have even improved it. You rarely see that now a days. It isn’t the newest but it is clean and updated enough that it is an awesome stay each time we stay. We LOVE it! The breakfast was awesome with many Gluten Free options! Again, rare!
Manager Response: Quinton, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We have made many improvements to our property in the past few years, including our lobby, breakfast room, and many guest rooms. We are always striving for constant improvement and we are so glad you have enjoyed these changes! We want to ensure all our guests can enjoy our breakfast so we provide a wide variety of options for all dietary needs. Thank you for your feedback and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in the LongBeach/ Seal Beach Area
Summary: Have vacationed in this area for years and the Pacific Inn never disappoints. The staff is friendly and always there to help. The shuttle service they offer is so convenient - they will drop you off and pick you up within a 5 mile radius so having car is not necessary if you want to head to Neighboring Long Beach or Belmont Shores. Rooms are super clean and the free breakfast buffet has something for everyone. They always make you feel welcome at this hotel.
Manager Response: LKV52, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we have to offer. Our complimentary shuttle service can drop off and pick up our guests anywhere within a 5 mile radius of our property. We just ask that guests book these reservations in advance since they are all first come-first served. Thank you for your feedback and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Excellent experience, gentleman checking us in was very welcoming and breakfast hit the spot. Very convenient location was a huge bonus as well as spotless room which was quite comfortable. Can’t wait to go back.
Manager Response: DJGroovin,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and the amenities we have to offer. Our location is very convenient and allows guests the ability to walk a short distance to Downtown Seal Beach and the Seal Beach Pier! We are so glad you enjoyed our staff and our rooms, as guest satisfaction is our top priority. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This is my second time staying at the Pacific Inn.  We had a great experience last year and this year couldn't be better.  We took advantage of their "Park and Cruise" package.  It offers the hotel room the night before a cruise, a continental breakfast, parking for your car while you are on the cruise and a shuttle to and from the terminal.  It make it easy to relax, enjoy our trip and not have to worry about logistics.  The hotel is peaceful and very clean.  They recently did some renovations and the rooms are nicely decorated.  There's also complimentary coffee and cocoa available in the lobby.   The staff is incredible!  Very friendly, efficient and professional.  Ty and Freeman are the best!  We are looking forward to our next stay at Pacific Inn which will be at the end of
Manager Response: Schaffermm,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise Package is very popular with guests due to its convenience and we are so glad you took advantage of this! Please ensure to make your next Park & Cruise reservation as as soon as possible, as we have limited package availability per day. We are currently in the process of updating our property with a more modern, clean, beachy feel and we are so glad you liked what we have done so far. Guest satisfaction is our top priority and we want to ensure every guest leaves with a smile on their face. Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Seal Beach
Summary: We have been coming to visit Seal Beach for several years now. We have stayed at other hotel and find that we really like the Pacific Inn. The rooms are large and updated. The breakfast has something for everyone (eggs, waffles, breads, fruits, yogurt and coffee)!  The hotel is clean and well kept. The best thing is that we can leave the car parked and walk to the beach or Main Street. It makes me happy when our boys ask to walk to dinner or the beach!
Manager Response: Rn4evr99,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so happy to hear that you had a wonderful and memorable stay here with us! We take great pride in keeping our hotel in tip-top shape! We greatly appreiciate your kind review and rating, we look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.

Summary: Great stay! The hotel is clean and in good repair. Breakfast was great they even had gluten free muffins:) my only critique is if you want a late check out they charge you $30,unless it’s a half hour over check out time. And I was hoping the view from our balcony would be nice but instead we were looking right down into a mechanic shop. Not pretty.  But the surrounding area is nice a lot  of cute shops   and in walking distance to the beach.
Manager Response: Bethany,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We do limit our late check-out accommodations purely for cleaning purposes, as well as charge $15 per additional hour after check-out. Since our property is not tall enough to see the ocean, our most requested rooms on our property are 7th Street and Park Side. Your room was on Park Side, but you can see the park as well as the small car shop behind our property. We apologize your room location did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Our favorite place to stay in Orange County
Summary: The Pacific Inn is the perfect place to stay when visiting the Seal beach/Long Beach area. You can walk to the Seal Beach pier along with the shops and, restaurants, and bars on Main Street. The Staff are top notch and you get a free hot breakfast every morning. We stay there often.
Manager Response: Bobbyl280,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed yet another stay here with us! We greatly appreiciate your king review and rating. We look forward to welcoming you back for another stay soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a lovely, fresh and clean boutique hotel within walking distance of all the charms of Old Town Seal Beach. The staff is friendly and personable. Our room was delightful and comfortable. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Rangerthereptile,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Summary: I requested a room with a walk in shower and was very satisfied with the room. We were near the pool which my husband enjoyed each morning with his coffee and newspaper.  We will definitely stay here again. Great location to downtown Seal Beac.
Manager Response: Voyager233876,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating. We look forward to welcoming on your next trip to the area.

The room was clean and the breakfast was more than just a classic continental breakfast. We enjoyed freshly made waffles, fresh fruit and eggs. Easy access to the freeway made it a perfect place to stay. The room was quiet. We will stay there again when visitng family in Long Beach.

Summary: Clean, Quiet, Pet Friendly, Close to everything.  It was exactly what we needed.  There is a smoothie/acai bowl shop right around the corner with a little garden seating area and a sushi spot just a few doors down that we loved.  We'll definitely be back.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel. Clean, quiet well located.
Summary: Great hotel, clean, quiet, nice breakfast, well located. In a nice area with local eateries just over the road.  Always found a parking spot in the underground garage, open air seating around the pool nice to sit in when the sun is out, which is most of the time in LA, unlike the UK.

Summary: Wonderful hotel, staff so nice. Really nice to have transport to cruise line and parking. The room was clean and fresh. Loved,loved spa tub.the only thing wrong was bed a little hard. Great time with family. Desk attendant gave us all cold water for our journey wonderful!
Manager Response: Lou C,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Our Park and Cruise package is definitely a guest favorite. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Always a great stay at the Pacific Inn
Summary: Always a great stay at the Pacific Inn  in Seal Beach California.  I have stayed here many times. The pacific is in a great location for shopping  and Restaurants.  Front desk personnel are always friendly. The bathrooms have been updated as well. There is a refrigerator/ freezer in the room, a microwave and a sink in the room we had . We also had a balcony. Rooms are clean and bathrooms are stocked with amenities.  Cookies and drinks in the afternoon up front as you check in  , Yum! Best Place to stay in Seal Beach ! Will be back again!
Manager Response: Deborah S,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We greatly appreciate your stellar review and rating! It is with great pleasure that we provide great a experience for our valued guests!  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Usually we stay in an executive room but stayed in a deluxe king this time. We found the room to be very comfortable and had all the necessities like coffee maker, fridge and micro included. The bath toiletries are high quality. The breakfast is basic but has a good variety of items and fresh fruit available. Complimentary water was offered at check-in. We have to stay in this area many times throughout the year for family visits and doctor appointments. This is a very good choice of affordable accommodation.
Manager Response: Nwise50,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations.We greatly appreciate your thoughtful review! We are pleased to see that you have returned to stay with us over the years and that each experience with us has been exceptional. It is with great pleasure that we provide great experiences for our valued guests and we look forward to welcoming you again

Summary: Love this place. I come back to it every year.  As soon as I walk in - I feel a peace and I think, I am home. Love the friendly helpful staff. The free breakfast is great! This time I slept in, and wondered if I would lose out on my portion but no, there was plenty enough for me. You will never regret your stay here, it is awesome! This is a dog loving, kid playing, family oriented place!!!!
Manager Response: Snowhite S,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate your kind review and rating. Summary: This hotel was very clean. Employees were very nice. Shuttle to cruise dock. Had a lil mix up & we had to take a taxi back but they paid for it so wasn’t a big deal. Very close  to beach, food, bars, and shops!!  Would stay again & I recommend this hotel.

Summary: Came from New York for 5 days, with no exact destination(except one day in Disney), just wanted to stay near the Pacific. Family gave it all thumbs up from the pool/hot tub to the cookies/coffee at check in. Great waffles every morning! 5 mins to the Ocean and shops! Nice large room and great updated  bathroom in 207, it had everything we needed! We sneaked a look in every room that we could on our stay, and they all looked top notch! The Pacific Inn is on our good list!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Firefighter122,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review and rating! We are delighted to see that you had a comfortable stay with us and to know that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in town.

Summary: Such a nice/hidden gem right in the heart of charming Seal Beach. Location is great, only a 5 min walk to the heart of Main Street. The hotel is very nice, clean, and the staff is always very kind and helpful. Great for couples, business, or family! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Manager Response: Gil C,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We greatly appreciate your king feedback and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Clean rooms, efficient staff, great location.  There's a little too much traffic noise.  Also, the mattress and pillows were not comfortable to me this time.  Staff said they got new ones since my last visit in December.

Summary: We love staying at The Pacific Inn! It is a perfect location to visit our son who attends LBSU.  It is so easy to walk to the shopping area and the beach or go for a run on the trail that borders a canal. The afternoon cookies are a definite plus!
Manager Response: Kara K.,   Thank you for your fantastic review and rating of The Pacific Inn! We are pleased to know that you had an enjoyable stay here with us. Our evening cookies are definitely a guest favorite! We were happy to have you and hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary: We attended an event near Long Beach airport and wanted someplace to stay close to the ocean. The Pacific Inn worked well for this need. Pros: • Friendly, kind and attentive staff • Unlimited free bottled water • 2 min walk to Main Street • 5 min walk to pier/beach • Good free breakfast with surprise of fresh blueberries and homemade salsa every day • Free covered parking  Cons • Inconsistent hot water • A bit rough around the edges overall state of rooms • Vacuuming way to early on weekend (8:30!) • Noise from drive up McDs and Taco Bell on one side  • Noisy sliding doors for bathroom and closet  Other than first item, none of these that big of deal - just to be aware of.  If looking for a beach vacation, I would recommend elsewhere. If some event or need brings you to Seal

Summary: Great location minutes from the beach (unfortunately weather was disgusting) and minutes from the main street where a variety of restaurants were located. Staff were very friendly and helpful, Room was large as was bathroom, Interesting concept for the swimming pool, which unfortunately we did not use because of the bad weather.

Summary: This place is amazing. Clean rooms. Very courteous staff. The bed was so comfort able i wish i could have stayed longer:) all the rooms have private balconys. And are very very affordable. I will definatly be comming back very very soon.

Summary: So glad we chose to stay at The Pacific Inn. Absolutely gorgeous! Perfect location, walking distance to the pier, shops, restaurants and bars. The staff was friendly and very accommodating. Highly recommended!!!

Summary: I have family who live in Seal Beach and I find this hotel to be a wonderful place to stay when I visit. It’s location makes everything walkable - my family’s home, Main Street, the Pier and the beach! I like the fact that the hotel is smaller, yet offers breakfast and has a pool and a hot tub in a welcoming inner patio that is open to the skies above. The rooms are spacious and clean and many have nice sized patio/ decks.

Summary: Let's start with the biggest plus for the hotel: location, location, location! In Seal Beach you are only a 5 minute walk from Main Street and a 10 minute walk from the beach. The hotel itself: - It is on its way back, I had a room on the 2nd floor (same floor as the pool) and it desperately needs a renovation. When I entered the room, there was a weird smell, you know, the one of too much odor remover over the years. - the breakfast: the breakfast room is small and the choice is limited for hotels in that price range  - The pool is small and it is, due to the construction of the hotel, hard to get some sun around it - We booked via a business travel agency, who should have paid the stay in

Summary Heading: Great place for a weekend getaway!
Summary: My family and I used to stay at this cute hotel when I was younger. Last weekend (18 years later) we decided to give it another go and it was still as great as I remembered. The rooms and lobby are now renovated which gives it a nice modern/beachy feel. The breakfast was great, although I wish they had a bigger room to serve it in. We felt a little cramped trying to make our waffles in the morning. The pool area was nice and clean. The rooms were spotless and guest services were quick to respond to any of our needs. Overall, this is a fantastic place for the price and location....5 minute walk to the beach!! You can't beat that. We are looking forward to our next stay here.

Summary: I took my family of four and we all just absolutely loved the hospitality, hotel, and location! The front desk checked us in very efficiently while being customer friendly. I have a large truck and it was so nice that they had special Parking (since my truck would not fit in there garage). The pool was refreshing and not too cold. The hot tub was actually hot ( don’t find that every location anymore). There was plenty of pillows, blankets, and space for our family in the room. The little fridge and coffee was a plus. The complimentary breakfast was very healthy and tasty. The location is walking distance from all the beaches and restaurants. Overall- awesome and truly is a wonderful secret location!
