Summary: The room is fine. Like mentioned before, I'd request a room away from Marina Dr. and the noise from the drive throughs of McDonalds and Taco Bell (numbers about starting  307 odd numbers to 319/321 and 207 to odd numbers 319/321). It wasn't bad but we like to sleep with fresh air and the door open. The housekeepers and front desk personnel were great. Other reasons for the average rating:  They need to really do a strong cleaning of the bathrooms, including replacing the shower head/handheld. Ours the hose was not in great shape. I debated about swinging by Home Depot and swapping it myself. Breakfast was fine/average. The do allow smoking outside of the lobby entrance and in the stairwell area at the far end of the building (complete with chairs). The smoke smell is nasty.
Manager Response: Mattm410,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific In nfor your Seal Beach lodging accommodatins. We would like to extend our sincerest apoloogies for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay here withus. This issues have been noted and will be sent over to our maintenance team as soon as possible. We hope you choose to stay with us again and allow us to remedy these issues. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your experience.

Summary Heading: A great value, location, facilities and staff!
Summary: The upgraded king room was immaculate and stunning. Breakfast was perfect, free shuttle was a rare but valuable amenity. Pool and hot tub area is a delight, staff treats you like royalty. There are many excellent restaurants nearby in this classic little Beach town. Another great stay, this place only gets better each visit!
Manager Response: TravellingmomNyc,  Thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service at all times and we are so happy to know we were able to help make your stay a memorable one. We thank you for your reoccurring business. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Excellent hotel and excellent staff! A small hotel with a very good breakfast -eggs, fruit, cereal, yogurt, bagels, waffles, coffee, tea and personal service. Convenient to Seal Beach Main St and the Seal Beach Pier.
Manager Response: Laurie,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach loging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Thank you for taking the time to send in your review.  We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Pacific Inn for 2 nights and it was great. A very short walk to Seal Beach Main St shopping and dining as well as access to the beach..awesome.   The room was super clean (cleaning staff is great) and looked like a newly remodeled room. The morning breakfast is included (hot eggs/meat, waffles, oatmeal, and cold breakfast (cereal and yogurt) lots of options of bread to toast. And plenty of juices...  Their pool area is relaxing with nice lounge chairs , a cozy pool. And a jacuzzi for the big kids (mom and dad).   The price is so reasonable given all the amenities (and proximity to beach /shopping/restaurants), say compared to the Hampton Inn 3 miles away.  Will definitely recommend and have another staycation.
Manager Response: PatriotDave,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you had such a relaxing stay here with us! We take great pride in providing excellent customer service and we are pleased to know we were able to exceed your expectations! We appreciate you taking the time to tell us about stay. We hope to see you again on your next trip to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: We were planning to visit our son in Long Beach and were looking for a place nearby, when I found the Pacific Inn. Not knowing the area, I did some further research of it's location and Seal Beach, and decided to book our stay.  Our arrival day happened to be my wife's birthday, so I inquired if they had any options for special occasion set ups in the room, unfortunately they did not. To my surprise, the person I was speaking to (Ashlee), offered to pick up flowers and wine, and have them in our room upon our arrival.   I was amazed at their accommodation of my request, and the entire stay just continued to be wonderful. Their daily breakfast, which was included, was great and always included a wide variety of foods and drinks.   Add to that, it's convenient location to beach,
Manager Response: Scarlom4,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad we were able to help make your stay here with us extra special! Our convenient location and amenities are definitely guest favorites. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your stay, and hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: A great casual hotel in a charming SoCal beach town
Summary: The Pacific Inn took us in after a flood in our home 11 streets away.  They accept dogs, and we had two who needed shelter with us.  It is the only hotel in "Old Town" Seal Beach, a sleepy little beach town between Long Beach and Huntington Beach.  Its location is ideal for surfing, relaxing or strolling the shops and restaurants on Main Street, with easy connections to LA and Orange Counties.    But for us, the Pacific Inn became our home away from home for six weeks. We quickly realized a room with two queens was too small for the four of us.  We moved to one of their Family Suites, each of which is a well-sized, updated unit with two large, wall mounted TVs, a large living room furnished with two chairs, a queen-size sofa bed, and a dining table with two benches.  It also has
Manager Response: Suzanne R,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so pleased to hear that you had such a comfortable stay here with us during those 11 weeks. We loved having you here with us and will definitely miss those two adorable pups of yours. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your experience here at The PI and hope you choose to stay with us again in the future!

Summary: From check in to the BEAUTIFUL remodeled rooms, our stay could not have been better! The walk to the beach and Walt’s Wharf for dinner were less than 7 minutes. The breakfast room had a large variety of favorites! The amenities were top notch!
Manager Response: Cydni,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here with us! Your photo of the Seal Beach Pier is just lovely, we will be sure to feature it on our social media page! :)  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Stayed in March 2019.  Pros: +Mostly friendly staff +Pool and spa area is nice.  Pool is very warm. +Breakfast was good, very Holiday Inn Express-like. Friendly attendant. +Free bottled water on request +Complimentary shuttle to downtown Long Beach +Good water pressure +Bath and Body Works amenities +Felt like a safe area  Cons: - NOISY! You can hear everything in the hallways thanks to poor insulation and 1 inch gap between front door and floor. Half the rooms face Marina Dr, which while not very busy, does have a few cars go down every minute, and you hear them as if the window was open. Plus Taco Bell and McDonald's is right across the street, and you can hear the drive thru attendant pretty clearly if you are near the window.  Beg for a room not facing Marina Dr (ask for
Manager Response: Croifer,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed the amenities our property has to offer. Though we are a boutique hotel, we provide many complimentary amenities that a larger hotel would provide. We would like to extend our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay with us. We are currently in the process of room renovations. We have taken guest feedback into account and are further insulating our rooms as we renovate, as well as upgrading our 32" televisions to 43" televisions. Our newly renovated rooms are called Executive Rooms. Not only are they more insulated, but they are located in the most requested areas of the hotel. We are in the process of updating all our online pictures so our guests can view our most current rooms and recent renovations. Our pool and jacuzzi get regularly inspected to ensure chlorine levels are correct and that everything is working properly for our guests. We will pass along your feedback to our inspector. We are always stiving for constant improvement and greatly appreciate the feedback you have provided. We hope you consider us in the future should your travel plans take you back to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: We have been staying at the Pacific Inn for years as we come to Seal Beach to visit with our grandson! The accommatons, staff and cleanliness has always been terrific!  We recommend the Pacific Inn to all our friends and family!
Manager Response: Margemcd,   Thank you for choosing The Pacifc Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so happy to know that you have enjoyed yet another stay here with us! We strive to deliver excellent customer service at all times and we are thrilled to know that we have exceeded your expectations time and time again. Thank you so much for your positive review. We hope to see you again on your next trip to visit your grandson. :)

Summary: Our most recent stay was excellent - with only a couple of minor hiccups. Upon arrival, we were warmly welcomed by the extremely friendly front desk staff. Though our requested room/location had been given to another guest, we were quickly given a pleasant ADA room. Unfortunately, the location of the room and the bed proved to be issues. The inviting looking king bed was exceptionally uncomfortable/hard and the room overlooked a street with a level of traffic noise that made leaving the patio door open to enjoy the evening sea breeze impossible. The room was impeccably clean, on-property parking was easy, the afternoon cookies were delicious and the complimentary breakfast is superior. We had three great evenings here, though next time we'll check the bed and location before
Manager Response: Phil-LindaR,   Thank you so much for your kind review! We are glad you have returned to stay with us here at The Pacific Inn. We would like to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay here with us, and hope you will allow us to remedy these issues on your next stay here with us. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in town!

Summary Heading: Pleasant hotel in lovely Seal Beach
Summary: Our room was clean, attractive, quiet and the bed was very comfortable. We loved walking five minutes to the main shopping streets with lots of cute shops and nice restaurants. The whole neighborhood is charming and was centrally located to Long Beach and LA!
Manager Response: Barbara S,   Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are glad to see that you were pleased with the cleanliness of our hotel and that you found our quaint location welcoming. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back for another excellent stay!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a marvelous spot for many reasons starting with the room. When we walked in we did our little once over for cleanness and overall look of the room. The towels were fresh, the bathroom stocked and the jet tub was awesome. Irma had done a wonderful job getting our room ready for the wifes birthday!.The view of the park on Electric ave. was neat didnt care for the mechanic shop next door but didnt even hear a thing from them. Every member of the staff we encountered was beyond helpful with the highest degree of courtesy and professionalism. The breakfast was amazing and tasty both days and the cookies in the lobby a nice treat. All in all a wonderful time spent at the Pacific Inn with my wife and planning our next get away now!
Manager Response: James B,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for you Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you had such a memorable weekend here with us! We are delighted to know that you found our hotel to be comfortable and that you had an overall exceptional stay. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!

Summary: Easy parking, close to beach, restaurants, grocery store.   Friendly staff and Fast checkin and the room was clean and comfortable bed with a balcony.  For the money in this area, you can not do better than the Pacific Inn.
Manager Response: Brent H,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Our close proximity to Main St is definitely a guest favorite and we are so happy you enjoyed it just as much as we do! We look forward to seeing you again should you return to the Seal Beach area.

Summary: We had a last minute need to book 3 nights for a family event.  The online booking sites stated the dates we needed were unavailable, so I called directly and there were no problems securing a room.  From the initial phone call to checkout, the process was seamless and the staff amazingly friendly.  We have stayed here before, and will again, as it is within walking distance to any amenities you could need.  The beach is a short 5 minute walk.  Seal Beach is a hidden gem in LA, so peaceful and slow paced.  My daughter loved the waffle machine at breakfast and the hot tub in the evening!   My only suggestions for the Inn would be: My 8 year old daughter found the upgraded sinks a little too high for her.  The room we had also had sliding frosted doors for the restroom, which were
Manager Response: Cassmorrison,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay here with us! Our close proximity to to Main St is definitely a guest favorite, and who could ever go wrong with waffles?!  We greatly appreciate your positive feedback as well as your friendly suggestions. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Our go-to place for family visiting from out of state.. love the staff, breakfast and especially the location.. Can’t wait to come again.. never disappointed.. fresh breakfast, heated pool.. kids love it here..
Manager Response: Voyage285652,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad to know that you enjoyed yet another stay here with us! We absolutely love having you and your family as our guests time after time. Customer satisfaction is of great importance to us and we are so happy to know that we have exceeded your expectations once again. We greatly appreiciate your business as well as your positive feedback. We hope to see you again on your next visit to Seal Beach! :)

Summary: My family and I stayed for 2 days while waiting to travel to Honolulu. Very friendly staff and awesome service.It has Easy Access to near by beachs and restaurants. Would definitely stay again.They also went out of their way to send my belongings I accidentally left behind.
Manager Response: Chris R,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We are so glad to know that you and your family had such a comfortable stay here with us! We strive to deliver excellent customer service at all times and we are happy to know that we were able to help with getting your belonging to you safely. We appreciate your positive feedback, and hope to see you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: We stayed at Pacific Inn recently prior to boarding a cruise ship in Long Beach. It was a great alternative to Long Beach hotels. It was quiet and clean and close to nice restaurant and shops. The staff were attentive and the shuttle drivers were great. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: 976terrieb,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and offers roundtrip transportation to the Carnival Cruise Port and parking for up to 7 days. We are also conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Wonderful Service-- The front desk staff very knowledgeable.  The shuttle service drivers were fantastic!  The hotel is also walking distance to good restaurants and downtown Seal Beach. Nicely updated rooms-
Manager Response: carol123081,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to provide exceptional customer service in every aspect, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, Wi-Fi, and shuttle service. Our convenient location places guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Wonderful and relaxing place to stay
Summary: We spent 2 nights at the Pacific Inn in Seal Beach and thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this property.  It is perfectly located so that it is quiet yet only a few blocks from the beach, pier, shops and restaurants.  The staff is excellent - friendly, helpful and very professional.  Our room was clean and in perfect condition and the bed was as comfortable as we have ever slept on.  The pool and hot tub are a great way to relax.
Manager Response: BelmontRich,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are located just a short walk away from both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our staff works hard to deliver excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, Wi-Fi, and parking. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: We enjoyed a pleasant 24 hours at the Pacific Inn . The location is fantastic! Just two blocks from Main Street in Seal Beach . Plenty of restaurants & shops nearby . The beach is lovely & clean . The hotel rooms are large and clean & the breakfast is a good start to the day !
Manager Response: cindyo667,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are located just a short walk from the dining and shopping of Main Street, and just another block from the beach and pier. We strive to provide excellent customer service and accommodations for each and every guest, including our complimentary hot breakfast. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: This was our second time staying here. Everyone is very nice, breakfast is great. Our room was updated. We love that it is so close to downtown, easy walk...Thank you for an enjoyable stay. We will be back
Manager Response: Stephanie, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn on your trip back to the area! We are so happy to hear that we have accomplished yet another satisfying stay for you here with us. :)   We greatly appreciate your positive feedback! We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: It was very clean-great customer service. Friendly- helpful & informative. We came down to visit my brother who lives 8 blocks away & his place too small for 2 more ppl.  They served great breakfasts from 5 am till 10 am- so great to get breakfast before we left at 5:30 am. I will come back again- I’m surprised their rating was so low as it’s absolutely nice rooms & comfy bed with a fridge & a balcony to sit out on 💜😜💜
Manager Response: Melanie S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to provide excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service. Our guests are our number one priority, and we wish for everyone to feel at home during their stay with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: This is the second time we have been here, and will stay here again.  Clean rooms, and great location.  Sitting on the balcony on a sunny morning with a cup of coffee, was a great way to start the day.  Friendly staff.
Manager Response: roadtripping60,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our comfortable accommodations, excellent customer service, and amenities such as breakfast, Wi-Fi, and shuttle service, make us the top destination in Seal Beach. We look forward to seeing you again for many more visits to come!

Summary: We had a very nice time.  Everything is as advertised...perfect location and walking distance to restaurants, the pier and the beach.  The room was spotless, the beds were very comfortable and the linens were very nice.  We enjoyed the breakfast...the waffles were delicious.  Every staff member we had an opportunity to interact with went out of their way to make us feel welcome as their valued guest.  The only negative that we did not like was the opaque glass bathroom sliding door.  We prefer a solid door for better privacy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We are locals and chamber members.  We see each other around town and have always liked them yet have never actually stayed at the hotel over night.  Until we decided to restore our hardwood floors and had to stay off them for 3 days. I stopped by to set up our reservation and was greeted with a friendly face and warm cookies.  Rooms were clean, Jacuzzi hot, and breakfast wonderful.   In fact, the kids want to go back "on vacation" even though we just live blocks away.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Booked again for our Next Vacation!!!
Summary: My husband and I stayed here due to our cruise leaving from Long Beach, which they offer a great cruise parking package at an additional cost, that includes us leaving our car there and the hotel providing us with a shuttle service to and from the cruise terminal. We had a great overall experience the staff is friendly, helpful and has great customer service from the front desk personnel to shuttle drivers.  The Rooms are clean and we loved the small balcony inside our rooms to sit and enjoy the coastal breeze.  The hotel also has a Pool and Jacuzzi that is located in the center of the hotel like a courtyard.  Great location near bars and restaurants, we had dinner at the marina and the hotel offered us shuttle service there and back! Continental breakfast is available and they
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Pacific Inn is situated closely to all the main street shops, restuarants, beach and pier. The area traffic is not to bad and any location you wish to explore is an easy walk. The hotel itself is a little aged but well kept and clean. The pool and spa area located on the second floor is convienient but can be noisy when kids are in the pool. All the rooms face the pool, so the sounds are all focused toward your room. Turning the TV up helps. The rooms are good, refridge, computer desk, iron and board and bathroom is spacious. The bathrooms have sliding glass doors with frosted glass but the doors are difficult to open once they are closed, no handles. The mattress is very hard though.Breakfast is free  and is located on the second floor in a room called The Breakfast Café .
Manager Response: none

Summary: Free hot breakfast bar daily till 10am has almost everything you'd want. Rooms are clean and have a small balcony to sit outside & enjoy the view. Pool and jacuzzi ate located inside the interior, open roof courtyard of the triangle shaped building, offering protection from too much sun and wind. Staff was helpful with local information, and their is a shuttle bus available to guests. Location is around the corner from Downtown Seal Beach, and maybe an 8 block walk to the Seal Beach Pier. Only shortcoming is parking for high-profile vehicles. Clearance is 6 ft & 7 in, too low for my Chevy Van. Occasional free, warm chocolate chip cookies in the lobby too!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not perfect, but just right. So glad I’ve found a place to come when visiting family. The room we got was older and had some issues. After talking to the staff they explained I had an older room that had not been updated yet and offered to replace the slouching bed. Pool was great with open ceiling to the sky (my kids favorite part). Spa may need to be re-plastered, but it was hot! I think they are slowly updating everything around the grounds and inside the rooms. It was clean with a relaxed atmosphere and helpful staff. The Pacific Inn is in a fantastic location, a block away from where I grew up, so it feels like home to me!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place was a great find.  We were traveling as a large group for a tournament. The only downside was we had requested a block of rooms and we ended up separated between the 2nd and 3rd floors.  The rooms were nice and having a refrigerator and microwave was great. Everything was neat and clean. Our kids spent a lot of time at the pool and hot tub.  The complimentary breakfast was good.  Everything was within walking distance.   I loved their coffee/latte maker in the lobby.  The staff was friendly and always smiling.  We will definitely be back next year.
Manager Response: allihazen,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding your group block. With larger groups, we always do our best to keep rooms together when possible; however, with the size of our property, and the specific locations of our Executive Rooms, this is not always possible. Our staff always strives to deliver above and beyond customer service in every aspect, and we are happy you enjoyed all other areas of your stay. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Everything here is top notch! This little hotel has everything you need and is a reasonable price. Everything from the person calling to confirm our arrival, to the quality bath products, and real breakfast included have been excellent. Highly recommend this place. The staff is very helpful and kind. The facility is attractive and beachy, so nothing fancy but absolutely perfect for a beach city stay. Have been here before and will come back again!
Manager Response: Ursula P,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location places guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We strive to provide excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms, and complimentary amenities such as breakfast, parking, and Wi-Fi for your comfort and convenience. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Great room warm and friendly staff
Summary: Wanted to get away for a day and selected this clean and comfortable property near the ocean. Room was recently renovated with balcony and great view. Front desk team member who checked us in was friendly and professional.  It makes all the difference when greeted with a bright smile and warm hospitality. Complimentary breakfast offered waffles, crescents, eggs, canadian bacon and more...Thank you for a great stay..we will be back!
Manager Response: Patricia C,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our customer service team strives to go above and beyond for every guest, providing the most comfortable accommodations possible. We offer complimentary hot breakfast, parking, Wi-Fi, and shuttle service to suit every need. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We've stayed at The Pacific Inn for more than 8 years, and we're heading back there again this year. Everything from the cleanliness, comfort, breakfast cafe, pool and hot tub are helpful staff are excellent. We love walking to our favorite eats along Main Street, strolling the pier and soaking up the sun at the beach!
Manager Response: Beachbabe047,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location places guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We strive to provide excellent customer service in every aspect, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, Wi-Fi, and our pool and Jacuzzi area. We appreciate your business over the years, and look forward to your continued stays with us.

Summary: Stayed at The Pacific Inn 2 times .. We love this hotel !! Great staff awesome coffee hot tub pool full breakfast very comfy beds.. Lots of food choices very close..100% recommend and we will definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Stacy I,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our excellent customer service, complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service, and convenient downtown location make us the top spot in Seal Beach! We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary: We stayed the night before catching a cruise ship out of Long Beach.  We used their stay and park plan which worked great for us.  The staff was very friendly and they accomodated my request for a third floor room.  The room was clean and quiet with a comfortable bed. They provide a free shuttle service to the Carnival Cruise terminal as well as to any destination within a four mile radius of the inn.  We will definitely stay at the Pacific Inn whenever we are in the Seal Beach area.
Manager Response: Doug K,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and offers round-trip transportation to the Carnival Cruise port in Long Beach, and parking for up to 7 days for a nominal fee. We strive to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect and make each guest feel at home. We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us!

Summary: We spent a great week staying at The Pacific Inn.  We always stay there when we visit CA, which is about 3-4 times a year.  I would not stay any where else.  The entire staff is amazing.  The beds are comfy and the rooms are always clean and neat.  My husband loves the complimentary breakfast. There is enough variety for breakfast for a week's stay.  My grandson loves to swim when the weather is warm enough.  The little town of Seal Beach has much to offer. There are many restaurants and little shops to keep you feed and entertained.  This is truly my happy place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here during a visit to Long Beach--which begins just a few blocks away, and is noisier and more crowded than Seal Beach. The Inn is very quiet, and the surroundings, in the old part of Seal Beach, are peaceful, uncrowded, and unhurried. Strolling up and down Main St. was like returning to the 1950s. The pier, beaches, and many restaurants are within easy walking distance. Service was prompt and friendly.
Manager Response: Tony C,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location places guests within a short walk of Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We strive to deliver excellent customer service to each and every guest, and make The Pacific Inn your home away from home. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Flew into LAX for a wedding and had plans to meet friends for dinner and drinks at Ballast Point Brewery. This hotel is right down the road. Convenient free covered parking (which was really nice because it was raining), great breakfast choices for a hot (premade mini omelettes, potatoes, toast, bagels, turkey sausage, waffles) or cold (yogurt, cereal, fruit) meal.  Very friendly staff. Cute balcony that would have been lovely if it wasn’t raining and a little chilly. Some signs of being an older hotel but perfect for what we were looking for location and price-wise.
Manager Response: Kelly J,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are located right in between major attractions of Long Beach, Sunset Beach, and Huntington Beach, and are walking distance from both Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier. Our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, parking, Wi-Fi, and private balconies keep our guests coming back all year round! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Terrific location, decent breakfast, ok pool
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here. We especially liked that we could walk to the beach, to Main Street, to restaurants, and to a medium-sized shopping center (CVS, grocery store, etc). The room was a generous size. The walk-in shower was greatly appreciated. The cleaning crew was very nice and accommodated our “in and out” for breakfast and use of the workout room. Our only surprise was that asking for a one hour extension (late check out) would have cost $50. Needless to say - we did not stay that extra hour!
Manager Response: SMFSanFran,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location places guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the Beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We strive to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, from our well-appointed rooms to complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and parking. We would like to apologize for the confusion you experienced regarding our late check out fee; our late check out fee is $30, and is for a checkout of up to 1pm, 2 hours after checkout time. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: My wife and I booked this hotel based on location, affordability and prior reviews. We can't say enough good things about it. It's an older property but it's spotlessly clean and just exudes California charm. We took advantage of the free breakfast (perfectly adequate with a lot of options), the hot tub and pool and the free local shuttle. Our shuttle driver was fantastic. We walked to the beach in 10 minutes. Downtown is a block away and touristy but not without some charm and dining options for every budget. I travel a fair amount for business and spend a lot of time in four and five star hotels that are always adequate but without any charm or personality. The Pacific Inn on the other hand exudes it. We'll stay here again and encourage everyone we know to do the same.
Manager Response: lordofthehighway,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to incorporate many of the amenities and services you would expect from a larger property with the specialized attention and charm of a boutique hotel. Our complimentary shuttle service, daily hot breakfast, pool area, Wi-Fi, and parking make us the go-to spot in Seal Beach. Only a short walk from Main Street and the beach, you can't beat our convenience! We appreciate your kind words and recommendations, and look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us!

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by this little gem. We spent one night here with our kids.  Amazing breakfast was included with our stay. We were expecting something very basic and were blown away by all the options available to us. Friendly staff, Clean rooms, and it's very conveniently located. Would definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: Perkyfam2004,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our complimentary hot breakfast offers a variety of fresh items. a rotating menu, and seasonal offerings to get your day started in the best way possible, and pride ourselves on offering more than your basic free breakfast. We are conveniently situated within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our staff strives to deliver an excellent experience for every guest, every time. and we look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary: The staff at the Pacific Inn are excellent and were super willing to work with a large group  of people coming in from all over the country.  The rooms are clean and up to date as well. The breakfast is on the lighter side. The location is great as it is within walking distance to all the shops on Main Street and the board walk on the beach.  There are several great restaurants within the area as well. We have been using this location for our annual board meetings for several years and plan to return.
Manager Response: lotsofevents,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure a great stay for every guest, and accommodates groups of all types and sizes. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our complimentary hot breakfast is served daily and offers a variety of items to get your day started. We look forward to continuing to see you here for many more years to come.

Summary: The hotel was in the perfect location. It was about 5 mins to the Main Street area, and 10 mins to the water/ beach. The staff was friendly and we got complimentary parking and breakfast. Sadly it was too cold to get in the pool, but there is a hot tub. I will say, they do allow pets in this hotel so if you have an allergy then that is something to consider. Again, if you enjoy leisure walks and a quiet/relaxing area, this place is great.
Manager Response: 333g,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We work hard to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, including our well-appointed rooms and breakfast service. We are a pet-friendly property, and all pet rooms are deeply cleaned to ensure they are allergen-free, but pets can walk around the hotel. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: You definitely get what you pay at the Pacific Inn. While the hotel is within walking distance to the Seal Beach pier, for someone with mobility issues it could be quite a hike. I would say it’s about four blocks from the ocean. But the hotel is in proximity to all the great restaurants and shops that seal Beach has to offer.   On the positive side, the staff was extremely friendly and they offer free bottled water at the front desk—that was a nice touch. The room itself was clean and you could tell that they made recent renovations.  The pool and spa were the highlight of the hotel.  The pool is clean and heated nicely, and the spa is so nice after a day of walking.  The breakfast room was not bad and had lots to offer.  Especially hot, tasty coffee.    There were a few not so
Manager Response: Skeenka,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We do also offer a complimentary shuttle service within 5 miles to assist any guests who would not like to make the walk. We pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service in every aspect, and we are happy to hear of your great experiences with our staff, pool area, and breakfast. We would like to apologize for the inconveniences you experienced regarding your balcony and bed. Due to the size and location of our property, some rooms have a view that is less desirable than others. We recommend checking out our newly renovated Executive Rooms o your next stay for more park-facing rooms. We offer a variety of mattress types ranging from firm to pillow top, and would have been happy to assist you with different bedding or more pillows upon request. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: This is a quiet, comfortable hotel with guest rooms that have been updated since my last stay over a year ago. I particularly liked the new mattresses.   One issue was wifi access. I tried to connect repeatedly during my two night stay. However, even with some help from the staff I never could log on using the hotel's wifi connection.
Manager Response: Bill G,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We have renovated many of our guest rooms to our Executive King and Two Queens, and we are glad you enjoyed the updates. We would like to sincerely apologize for the issues you experienced regarding our Wi-Fi. I am glad our staff assisted you, but sorry to hear you were still unable to connect. We do not typically have connection issues lasting this long, and did not hear from any other guests regarding this during your stay. We do hope you choose to stay with us again and allow us to remedy the issues you experienced.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel at an Excellent Price
Summary: I had a suite, which included two queen beds, big-screen TV, a full bathroom (tub with jets), and a kitchenette in the main room, then a nice big room with a sofa, two chairs, a coffee table and a big-screen TV.  This was a lovely space, it was very quiet, and I had a great stay.  Also, the free breakfast has a lot of variety (including for gluten free folks).  Worth every penny!
Manager Response: Ann S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to offer excellent customer service in every aspect, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, shuttle service, and Wi-Fi. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your Admiral Suite, perfect for those looking for more space and added luxury. Our complimentary breakfast offers a variety of hot and continental items, including dairy and gluten free options. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: LOVED OUR STAY.....Pet Friendly too with Fee
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at Pacific Inn.   Our room was a little loud because it faced the main road......next time I would ask to face the adjacent Park.   Within walking distance to great restaurants and shopping.   $100.00 pet fee non-refundable.   The hotel website shows dogs getting special treatment for staying.....maybe a chew or something.  We did not get anything??   Each room has a private balcony.   A quant little Park is adjacent to this hotel; great for a quick doggy potty break.  Would stay here again but would ask to face the Park instead.
Manager Response: ColoradoSpringermom,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are located within a short walk of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding the location of your room and the lack of pet products. Feel free to ask about our Executive Rooms on your next stay, as they are newly renovated and face your desired location. We do offer pet boxes with a variety of items including treats, waste bags, and a couch cover, and we greatly apologize that this was not offered to you. We will ensure this does not happen in the future. We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located, reasonably priced and offers attractive perks such as free shuttle drives within 5 miles, free WiFi and parking.   Great-quality breakfast is also included in the nightly rate.  The rooms are clean and comfortable and the staff is courteous and friendly.  I stayed there on a business related trip but have now booked a room to spend a night at this hotel with my daughter.  A word of caution, however, is that the area floods severely when it rains hard.  This is rarely a problem in Southern California but, although the hotel rooms did not flood, the water on the streets that surround the hotel rose to a level to have potentially produced transmission damage to a small sports car that belongs to one of my colleagues who stayed at the same hotel..
Manager Response: cyntrevi,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our team of customer service professionals strives to ensure each guest has a great stay and enjoys all of our complimentary amenities, including breakfast and Wi-Fi. We would like to sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding the flooding. The City of Seal Beach did take corrective action during this time, but the flash flood hit much quicker than anticipated. We have taken measures to protect our property and the surrounding area from this in the future. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Pleasant stay, clean, courteous & accommodating. Will definitely return. No charge for covered parking. Fixtures are a little tired but, everything works!  Very familiar with OC beach communities & hotels and this the best value yet! Many shops, restaurants & bars all within walking distance of the property.
Manager Response: Emmasdad,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff strives to provide excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, parking, and shuttle service. We definitely suggest checking out our newly renovated Executive rooms on your next stay with us! We are located just a short walk from both Main Street and the beach for all of your dining and shopping needs. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: I can’t say enough about the Pacific Inn or Seal Beach. We have been staying here every summer for the past five years.  The hotel is clean and comfortable and the staff is so friendly. My boys love the atrium style pool. It is just a few blocks from the beach and main street. The beach is clean and Main Street has fun restaurants and shops.
Manager Response: LindsayDickerson123,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location puts guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We strive to provide an incredible stay for each guest, from our excellent customer service and well-appointed rooms to our amenities such as hot breakfast, shuttle service, and parking. We appreciate your business over the years and look forward to seeing you again this summer!

Summary: We always stay here when visiting family & friends. It's well kept, staff is friendly & it's a perfect location within 2 blocks of the beach. It's an easy walk to the numerous nearby cafes &  excellent restaurants. Convenient breakfast is included and there's even free parking ! Bed was very comfortable. Very quiet rooms.There is a shuttle available but we didn't use it.
Manager Response: Suz D,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary amenities such as breakfast and shuttle service. Main Street and the beach are only a short walk away for all of your dining and shopping needs. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: This must be my fourth or fifth time staying. Whenever I visit Long beach I like to stay in or around Seal Beach, it's such  cool little town. Quintessentially still a 60s surf town feel. The Pacific Inn ticks all my boxes, friendly, comfortable and clean. The breakfast is a bonus. Good value.  I am simply mot prepared to try anywhere else.
Manager Response: SouthPacificTravellr,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are located in the heart of downtown Seal Beach, just a short walk from numerous dining and shopping options along with the pier. Our complimentary amenities such as breakfast and parking provide guests with all of the comforts of home. We appreciate your loyal business and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We stayed for 4 nights in January while visiting with family in the area. The Pacific Inn has a great location in Seal Beach. It’s close to restaurants, and the beach. The room was clean, quiet, and comfortable. We were upgraded to an newly remodeled room which was lovely. Complimentary Breakfast each morning was a nice touch. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Excursion196754,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our newly renovated Executive Rooms are a popular choice among our guests, and we are happy to hear you enjoyed your upgrade! We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: The staff here are all really friendly and helpful. The room was great. Very clean and updated. The hotel is walking distance to a great beach and a bunch of good restaurants and antique stores. Seal Beach is Orange County's little secret. I would definitely recommend the Pacific Inn to everyone.
Manager Response: DedhedRick,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service to every guest, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach places guests within a short walk of numerous dining and shopping options. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a gem. From the Long Beach Airport shuttle service to the buffet breakfast, hotel staff do everything to make your stay memorable. And the rooms are quiet and comfortable. Numerous restaurants are nearby as well as local attractions.
Manager Response: Marilyn F,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our goal is to make each guest feel at home with as many comforts as possible, such as hot breakfast, well-appointed rooms, and complimentary shuttle service to many local attractions. Main Street and the beach are only a few blocks away, with many dining and shopping options to choose from. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: The Pacific Inn at Seal Beach is modestly constructed and furnished; however it is very clean,  the linens are excellent, the service is friendly, and the location is great. We very much enjoyed our stay. Free parking.
Manager Response: Anna C,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff strive to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, including our well-appointed rooms and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, parking, and shuttle service. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a great place to stay. Clean and comfortable and close to shops and dining. Loved our stay there and will be returning in March. Easy check in, free breakfast and easy access to beach with a short walk!
Manager Response: jfmb311,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, including well-appointed rooms and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach puts guests within walking distance of numerous dining and shopping options. We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary: We loved this hotel, the rooms were clean and fresh.  The location is perfect for walking to shopping, beaching and dining.  It was very quiet at night and the pool was perfect.  We are coming back next month!
Manager Response: Grains567,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff pride themselves on delivering excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service. We are located within a short walk of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit!

Summary: I liked our room. Unfortunately it was facing the McDonald’s drive-thru. The window were thick enough that we didnt hear street noise. It is well located. Close to main street Seal Beach. We could explore the restaurants and small shops to our hearts content
Manager Response: CherieMaeB,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding your view, Feel free to check out our Executive rooms on your next stay, as they face the back parkside area of the hotel, and are away from the busier street. Our convenient location allows guests to walk to numerous dining and shopping locations, along with the beach and Seal Beach Pier. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: I go there almost twice a week. Every time i check in i'm greeted by the friendly staff. The rooms are always clean with fresh towels. The coffee machine in the lobby is a great addition as well to an overall pleasant experience. It has become the hotel of choice every time i'm in Long Beach. I highly recommend it
Manager Response: alexandrub907,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to provide an excellent experience for each and every guest. Our lobby refreshments, hot breakfast, complimentary shuttle service, and convenient location are just a few of the things we have to offer. We appreciate your loyal business, and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Great hotel! Can’t wait to go back
Summary: If you’re looking for luxury look elsewhere. But if you’re looking for a well maintained, excellently staffed, clean and comfy spot. This is a GEM! Walking distance to lots of fun. Free breakfast. I love this spot and can’t wait to come back for a chill weekend by the beach 😁
Manager Response: Ellen D,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to provide excellent customer service in every aspect, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary amenities such as breakfast and Wi-Fi. Our convenient location places guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Booked for a weekend visit to Alamitos Bay Area. Better than expected. Easy booking through their website, room as expected.  Clean, quiet, comfortable and well appointed. Staff friendly and helpful. We will return!
Manager Response: PointLomaMe,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options. In addition, we are only a short drive from attractions such as Alamitos Bay, Long Beach, Sunset Beach, and Huntington Beach. We strive to deliver excellent customer service in all aspects, and are happy to hear of your excellent experience. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Excellent choice of places to stay
Summary: great room, spacious.  bathroom was large and well laid out.  Even had a small balcony if you wanted to sit outside.  Well situated pool, impressive weight room for its size.  Very friendly staff.  And parking for your cruise is free for 7 days and only $5 per day after that.  Fantastic deal.
Manager Response: comiso13,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms and facilities, and amenities such as shuttle service and complimentary breakfast. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular services, and includes parking and round-trip transportation to the Carnival Cruise Port for a small fee. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: This Hotel is located in a prime location just a few blocks from the Pier and Beach. Close to restaurants and bars lots of things to do. Very friendly staff, Clean rooms with balconies. This hotel overall is awesome!!! Has a really nice pool and jacuzzi covered parking, great breakfast bar included. Great if your taking a Carnival Cruise only 15 minutes from Port. I recommend this beautiful hotel to all my family and friends :)
Manager Response: SharonMihai96,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in every aspect, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service. Our convenient location puts guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary: My check-in was the easiest of ANY hotel ever...and I have stayed at the Mandarin Oriental on down. The room was perfect and clean. And I LOVE their automatic coffee machine in the lobby! And the free parking is appreciated...as I was just in San Francisco and paid like $60 per night for my car to sit there????
Manager Response: 879lairh,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff strives to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, from our quick check-in to our well-appointed rooms and complimentary breakfast service. Our guests are comforted by perks such as free Wi-Fi, parking, and numerous dining and shopping options within walking distance. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY HERE.  No safe overnight parking available any where close.
Summary: DO NOT STAY HERE.  If you don’t want to walk blocks to from your car to get to the hotel or chance being towed in a nearby Taco Bell parking lot DO NOT stay here.  They do NOT have parking enforced.  I stayed here last night and after returning around 10pm, found the parking lot to be full.  I went to the front desk and talked to Scott.  He told me that there was a party at the restaurant across the street and there was nothing he could do.  Further, he suggested I park either park on the street several blocks away or across the street at Taco Bell overnight and just to trust him that our car *shouldn’t* be towed.  We paid $150 for a room and received a parking pass, that apparently is not enforced.  He said that towing the non-hotel cars would be too drastic especially because
Manager Response: Jgrocott5,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We would like to extend our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced regarding parking. The customer service you experienced regarding this issue is not our standard, and does not match what we strive to provide to our guests during their time with us. Corrective action has been taken to ensure an interaction of this nature does not happen in the future. Due to the size of or property, our lot can become full on busier nights, but close residential parking is typically available. Our management team has taken steps to ensure that we are able to provide parking for all of our guests. including placing tow-away notices on unauthorized vehicles and monitoring our lot for guest parking passes. We would like to reach out to you directly to remedy this issue and ensure it does not happen on a future stay with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to speaking with you further.

Summary: We stayed here before our Carnival Cruise and booked the park and cruise package.  It's covered parking for the duration of your cruise!!!  The hotel itself is great - friendly staff, clean modern rooms and great breakfast.  It's the little things that count and that's what this hotel strives for, like leaving candy on your pillow and using bath and body works toiletries in the bathroom.  They dropped us off and picked us up from the cruise terminal.  The shuttle got stuck in marathon traffic by the cruise terminal and the hotel refunded us $10 for the inconvenience even though it was beyond their control.  Will stay here every time I cruise out of Long Beach.
Manager Response: calivaligirl,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and provides both on-site parking and transportation to the Carnival Cruise Port in Long Beach. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms and facilities, and perks such as complimentary hot breakfast. We are so happy to hear that our staff was able to make your stay as smooth as possible even under the extenuating circumstances surrounding the shuttle service. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: We stay at Pacific Inn every time we travel to CA.  We love it!!  The staff is friendly & helpful, the rooms clean and we love that it is in walking distance to Main st & the pier!  One of our favorite vacation spots!
Manager Response: Venture00540943202,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff prides themselves on delivering above and beyond customer service to every guest, from our check-in process to our complimentary breakfast service. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: Clean room, nice pool and Jacuzzi, as well as eggs for breakfast! Parking is off street and was very full. One spot left that was big enough for my truck. The staff at check-in and check-out were both very friendly and helpful!
Manager Response: Jeff S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We offer many of the amenities you would expect at a larger hotel, such as complimentary hot breakfast, pool and Jacuzzi area, and shuttle service within a 5-mile radius. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding our parking. Due to the size of our property, our on-site parking can become quite full on busy evenings, and can be a bit more difficult for large vehicles. We do hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: My family and I enjoyed our stay, check in was nice and the lady's that took care of us were out standing. We enjoyed many places walking distance from the the inn. The room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Venture194154,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff prides themselves on providing excellent customer service in all areas, and we are happy to hear of your excellent interactions with them. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Reasonable place to stay in Seal Beach. Was clean and the staff was friendly. Room was fine. Gave us cold water as we checked out, which was nice. We didn't try breakfast, but they do have free breakfast. I should mention we had just come from 2 nights at a resort south of this location, so perspective! Both my husband and I awoke with sore backs and didn't sleep well because of noise. Can hear everything going on in the common area. A basketball team had just rolled in.  BUT, owner and staff acknowledged and apologized. They have some work to do, but overall is a good value.
Manager Response: Laura B,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, from our check-in and well-appointed rooms to our daily hot breakfast. We would like to sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. Although mattress preferences are specialized to each guest, we do try to provide the most comfortable accommodations possible, and are sorry to hear that the bed did not meet your expectations. As for the noise, our staff takes all complaints seriously, and would have absolutely worked to remedy that issue as soon as possible. We do hope you choose to stay with us again and allow us to resolve the issues you previously experienced.

Summary Heading: The perfect place to stay in Seal Beach!
Summary: We always stay at The Pacific Inn when we come to Seal Beach for family gatherings. It is centrally located for easy access to PCH and the freeway and just blocks away from Main Street in Seal Beach. Everyone is very friendly and helpful and we are always greeted with a smile. The rooms are spacious and each room has a private balcony. The rooms have all the amenities that you will need for your stay. I highly recommend staying at The Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: Donna G,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location places guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our staff strives to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, and make every guest feel right at home. We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: A perfect spot in Seal Beach
Summary: Everything about Pacific Inn was near perfect. The staff is all very friendly and helpful. The room was sparkling clean. For a continental breakfast, they do a lovely job. Free parking is an incredible bonus in a spot so close to downtown and the beach. Visit the lovely flower shop directly across the street!
Manager Response: cinthed,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, from our check-in and well-appointed rooms to our complimentary breakfast each morning. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: We visited our family and wanted to be as close to them as possible.  The location was perfect!  We walked everywhere!  The room was perfect-clean and spacious! Loved the balcony.  The free breakfast was great!  Staff was very friendly and knowledgeable. We are looking forward to coming back soon!!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. All of our staff works hard to uphold a high standard of customer service, ensuring each guest has an amazing stay. Our property is also located within a short walk of both Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier for all of your dining, shopping, and beach needs! We look forward to seeing you on many more visits to the area!

Summary: We booked this hotel pre-cruise and left our car for a week. Under-cover parking was NICE. Room plenty big for 4 adults and many suitcases!! Nice walk into Old Town Seal Beach with many nice restaurants and shops. Breakfast area was small but efficient.  Shuttle from hotel to Cruise port was on time.  Coming home from Cruise port to get car, shuttle was overbooked, but hotel said to get taxi (easy) and they paid the bill.  Works for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad that you enjoyed your trip stay with us. Our complimentary amenities such as parking, breakfast, and shuttle service are very popular with our guests, and set us apart from other boutique hotels in the area. The Park & Cruise package being one of our most popular amenities, provides up to 7 days of parking and round-trip shuttle service to the Carnival Cruise port for a small fee. Our customer service team strives to ensure each guest has an incredible stay here with us! We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: We are frequent quests of The Pacific Inn. This is our go to hotel, beach. Guest check-in couldn’t be more professional. Rooms are clean, comfortable. Breakfast is delicious (free). Location to the beach, restaurants, shops is perfect. Highly recommend The Pacific Inn.
Manager Response: dgoller1,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver exceptional customer service in every aspect, including our check-in, well-appointed rooms, and daily breakfast. Our convenient location places guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options. We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary: The hotel is in a quiet area of Seal Beach.  There is so little traffic that I was able to open the screen door and sleep with fresh air.  The room was clean, the breakfast is fine, and the location can't be beat.  I enjoyed walking to the Seal Beach pier and along the beach each morning.
Manager Response: Roving61833100447,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Needed to be out of our house for a few days for termite tenting.  Needed a pet friendly hotel for our dog and The Pacific Inn got the bill! While we were only minutes from home, felt like we were on vacation. Enjoyed it so much we are going to have to return just for fun! Great breakfast and friendly staff!!!
Manager Response: Guide37125050192,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary: Excellent check-in process.  Very clean room and nice quality of linens. Handy shuttle took us to nearby locations. I've stayed here a few times and have always been pleased with the room. The AC works well and is not too noisy.
Manager Response: Traveler29469950243,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are pleased to hear you have enjoyed your stay on multiple occasions, and look forward to continuing to accommodate you in the years to come.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights while in from out of state for a high school reunion.  We were able to walk to the venue which was nice. This hotel seems like it probably used to be an apartment complex that was converted.  Pool was probably the smallest pool I have ever seen at a hotel.  We did not use it so it was fine. Room was clean.  It appeared like the bathroom tile work was all brand new.  Bed was really comfy.  We had a jacuzzi tub but we did not use it.  We also had a balcony but there is not a beach view.  It was actually really foggy both mornings we were there.  Breakfast was mediocre..nothing to write home about.  You can't really mess up bagels after all.  Eggs and sausage looked better than they tasted.  Staff at front desk was nice and check-in was quick.  Check-in
Manager Response: LakeMama18,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding our pool area, breakfast, and property layout. Our pool is of a smaller size, but is typically sufficient for our guests who wish to use it, especially as most will enjoy our close proximity to the beach during the summer months. Once again, we experienced a friendly front desk staff, a clean and comfortable room, a nutritious free breakfast, great parking. We felt so welcomed back!

Summary Heading: The Pacific Inn is almost as popular as the iconic pier.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a California Getaway! Super convenient!
Summary: I wanted to surprise my family with a long weekend trip to California for my husband's birthday.  We are from Vegas and I didnt' want to drive in the LA traffic with 4 kids in tow so I searched and searched for a place to stay that would be close to the airport and the beach and be a decent price.  I was so excited to find the Pacific Inn! It was only a 15 minute ride away from Long Beach Airport and only a few blocks from Seal Beach! And their price per night was WAY better than most every other hotel/airbnb I looked at. (I even had to book 2 rooms for my family of 6 and it was cheaper per night) The best part was how convenient they were! They have a complimentary shuttle that can pick you up from the airport (LGB) and take you wherever you want within 5 mile radius.
Manager Response: Elissa J,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Summary Heading: The best place to stay in Seal Beach
Summary: We have been to the Pacific Inn on several occasions. This time we ended up with a gorgeous room with a large king bed—and surprisingly a jacuzzi in our bathtub. Nice. Other friends stay at a different hotel with a block rate and they all said they wish they would have stayed at the Pacific Inn.

Summary Heading: We have family and friends in town.
Summary: We prefer the 3rd floor and a room with a fun view off the patio, which we use often. The king bed is VERY comfortable and your employees are great. Dick and Sue Hunter

Thanks for always making us feel welcome.

Our park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and offers parking for up to 7 days and round-trip transportation to the Long Beach Carnival Cruise Port. Our customer service team strives to ensure each guest has a comfortable stay, and we always look forward to seeing familiar faces year after year. We will see you on your next trip to the area!

Summary: There are so many pluses to staying at the Pacific Inn.  The most important one for me is the kind of service you receive from the staff and I can only say they were A+++.  The front desk staff was friendly, efficient and very professional.  Check-in was easy despite one other customer being so inebriated that it took several attempts to get information from her to check her in.  I was rolling my eyeballs, but the staff treated her with kindness and respect and I applaud them for their professionalism.  The room was very comfortable.  The decor was soothing and very appealing.  The proximity to so many places to eat was another plus.  The complimentary breakfast was just right and the staff was always refilling and cleaning down the area.  The entire hotel is immaculate.  The
