Our staff strives for excellence every day, and we are happy to hear of your great experience with them. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: If you want to be made to feel really special then the Pacific Inn is the place for you. From the front desk you are welcomed in with a cool bottled water and a smile. Check-in is easy and you are off to one of the tastefully redecorated rooms with refrig., coffee maker, shampoo and conditioner, hairdryer, large screen TV, and a balcony to enjoy the fresh ocean air. Your are a 5 min walk to Main Street and all the shops and great restaurants in Seal Beach. Whenever you return to the room you can be sure that the maids have done a first rate job of leaving the room just as it was when you walked in the first time. You have covered parking and the grounds are lovely and the pool and jacuzzi are a great way to cap off your evening. We return 4 or 5 times a year and are never
Manager Response: rellastern,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Summary: This hotel offers you professional and very friendly staff who will attempt to make your stay and enjoyable one. The place has a nice pool and spa and a little breakfast every morning. Parking is free and within steps to your room. I have stayed here probably 30 times in the last five years. My last stay was today. The room was clean and cozy, had all that we needed. A balcony to sit and watch the sunrise and sunset. And within blocks to Main Street and the beach. I would not stay anywhere else as people that also stay there are always jovial and in a great mood. No security issues in this hotel. Its just a slice of heaven. Cannot wait to go back.

We appreciate your kind words, and look forward to continuing to serve you many times over in the years to come. See you next time!

Summary: I recently had to stay here solo for a course I needed to take for work. I would say the room itself was very comfortable with nice bathroom, good space, and comfortable bed. The view from the room was just of the street and a bit disappointing. Front desk staff was very friendly; free parking was a perk. The breakfast was hot and cold options - like sausage, mini omelets, fruit, bagels, etc. It was decent as far as free breakfasts go. The pool looked a little sad - nothing like the photo. The location was good if you want to be next to the restaurants in Seal Beach. The beach was only like a 10 minute walk from the hotel. No room service, but that's typical of a 2 or 3 star hotel  Overall, I would say this was great for the price (only $200 to be close to the beach).

The only thing that would make it better is if they had more parking spaces as getting a parking space can be a little bit of a problem, other than that, it is a great hotel in a great location.

Summary Heading: My only regret is not staying longer.
Summary: We (two adults & two kids) loved our stay at The Pacific Inn. It's a low key fabulous hotel near a perfect seaside community. Being able to walk to the beach and pier or to the Downtown area to eat & drink is great. The rooms are pretty. I love the thoughtfulness of putting sunscreen in the bathroom and makeup removing wipes. The breakfast that is included is wonderful! My 17 yr old son had no complaints. Plenty of great food to eat. We stayed at a Marriott before arriving here. As we were part a wedding in Long Beach. My only regret is not booking and staying at The Pacific Inn for a longer vacation.

The room was rather spartan but extremely well appointed with everything you could want.  Would be excellent for longer stays as it has microwave, refrigerator and toaster oven. Bed very comfortable and the room has two large outdoor decks. I must say the very nicest thing about the property was the staff - we travel for business around the world (practically) and during our stay never heard the word No for any request from the staff.  Whoever is in charge of hiring/training is doing a

Summary: Went to Seal Beach for a night out decided to stay in the area. This hotel was a good choice. Close to the beach; the staff was very friendly and accommodating to our request of a quiet room. The morning breakfast area was very clean, staff again super friendly and good breakfast.

I forgot to take the car seat out before I left.  I was unable to unattach it.  He came out got the seat and held it until my daughter-in-law could pick it up.  The staff is always helpful and keep the hotel clean and neat.  I love my little room.  I always request the same room.  The candies on the bed where a great surprise.  When I checked in I received a lovely little gift bag.The location of the hotel is perfect.  It's minutes from the center of town and the beach.  There are many restaurants and cute shops.  My husband and I enjoy the complimentary breakfasts.  Lots of good choices.  They are

Summary: Spent the weekend in Long Beach for a high school reunion and stayed at The Pacific Inn. It has a great location - walked to the pier, had breakfast and lunch, lots of quaint shops and friendly locals.. The room was nice - looked a little like they covered up some repairs to rooms or tried to update - it was obvious. But it was very clean, comfortable bed and nice location.

Summary: great staff at front desk, helpful and nice.  rooms clean and comfortable. hotel is walking distance to Main Street and pier.  Lots of restaurants to choose from.  Small town atmosphere.  my husband and i enjoy coming to the Pacific Inn

Summary: We picked The Pacific Inn because of the great reviews and because they would allow us to park our truck at the Inn during our Carnival Cruise as well as taking us the to pier and picking us up.  We were very happy with our room and pleased that we were close to Seal Beach and Main Street which we enjoyed.  The breakfast they serve is great, huge variety of choices. We came down a day before our cruise to enjoy Seal Beach and will be returning again in the Spring for our next cruise.   We had a last minute change of pick up time from the cruise since we got off the boat early and a simple call to the Inn, we got picked up an hour earlier.   Thanks again for a great experience.  Staff was great!
Manager Response: DRojel,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is very popular with our guests, and allows for parking for up to 7 days as well as round-trip transportation to the Carnival Cruise Port in Long Beach. Our team strives to ensure each guest has a smooth trip, and we are glad to hear we were able to accommodate an earlier pickup for you. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, and provide complimentary hot breakfast, parking, and Wi-Fi. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Excellent middle-of-the-road choice in Long Beach area
Summary: If you don't want to stay at a high price, high end hotel, or a low priced dump of a motel, look at this hotel. It had everything we like. Yes, the pool is small and so is the breakfast room, but it's clean and looks recently upgraded, fast check-in, great location.
Manager Response: Kimberly K,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our property has gone through many renovations over the past few years, including our lobby, breakfast room, and our Executive Rooms, to provide the most modern and comfortable accommodations possible. We combine the amenities and comfort you would expect from a larger property with the personalized hospitality of a boutique hotel. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Seal Beach
Summary: We discovered this gem when our daughter attended Long Beach State back in 2005. This is our go to hotel when we travel to Seal Beach. The hotel staff is extremely courteous and efficient.  The rooms have always been immaculate and a recent upgrade makes them even more inviting. The hotel is a couple of blocks away from downtown and just a few more blocks is the beach. You won’t regret staying here.
Manager Response: Paul L,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations, We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver above and beyond customer service to every guest, from our well-appointed rooms and facilities to our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and parking. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach places guests within walking distance of numerous dining and shopping options. We are happy to hear of your long-term commitment to our property, and look forward to continuing to serve you for years to come.

Summary: We had to find a room last minute and with so many summer fun events happening in the area, we booked the very last room available at the Pacific Inn.  A few hours before check in, one of the staff members called me to apologize - there had been a mix up with the room and it would be difficult for them to accommodate our two bed request.  However, she offered us an upgraded room with a king bed and a pull out couch as well as rollaways if needed.  The room was ready and set up as we requested upon our late arrival.  The location is amazing, Seal Beach is a gem.  Will definitely stay there again and recommend.  It's a little pricey for being an older hotel, but good luck finding something else in the area, last minute, during the summer months.
Manager Response: Erika P,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in every situation, and we were greatly appreciative of your flexibility regarding your room set-up. We are glad to hear that our staff handled your requests and had your room correctly prepared for your arrival! Our close proximity to Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier make us a top location during the summer, and definitely accounts for the higher price tag during this time of year. We appreciate your review, and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: The hotel was close to all types of restaurants and only a couple of blocks from Main Street. Plus it was a perfect walk to the pier in the morning. The hotel itself was very clean, the beds were very cozy and the staff was very friendly.  I can’t wait until I can come back again for another stay. They do have a pool and offer a breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: Joan F,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are located just a short walk from both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms and facilities, and complimentary amenities such as breakfast and parking keep our guests coming back all year round! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Stumbled across this hotel on Yelp after a horrible experience at another. It was quite pricey for our 2 night stay ($189/night and then $179/night); however, it was worth it. I love how promptly the staff were at providing what you need.   Front desk staff were always super friendly and so were all of the other members. I also love how the pool sat in the middle of hotel sort of indoor/outdoor setting. Was never too cold or hot when you wanted to go for a swim.   Free breakfast was always delicious. So many options of food/drinks. I would definitely come back here to stay again!
Manager Response: Bup N,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our above and beyond customer service is one of our greatest strengths, and each staff member strives to make each guest feel like The Pacific Inn is their home away from home. Our open-air style pool area allows guests to catch some sun and the ocean breeze without ever leaving the property! Our complimentary breakfast provides numerous hot and cold options, as well as seasonal items, and we are glad you enjoyed it. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: As always, the room was clean, the staff was welcoming, the breakfast was good, and the surrounding restaurants were wonderful! Short walk through a super cute to the beach and the downtown area is charming. We’ll be back!
Manager Response: linkayver,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms and facilities, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, parking, and Wi-Fi. We are also located just a short walk from both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options at your disposal. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Nice, clean, quiet..Tyler at front desk is very friendly and accommodating. Great breakfast buffet too! Bed was a bit hard but that's ok because the room was clean and comfortable. We'll be back for sure.
Manager Response: Julie R,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our customer service team is dedicated to providing an excellent experience for every guest, in every aspect of your stay. Our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, parking, and Wi-Fi, give all the comforts of home. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding your mattress, and our team would have been happy to assist you with remedying this issue. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Wonderful little gem- another great visit. We appreciate this family and couple friendly hotel tucked away walking distance to Seal Beach, the pier, and Main Street shops and restaurants. We enjoy the super clean and updated rooms, the affordability, the delicious hot breakfast buffet, complimentary, and very nice staff. Parking is free and on site. It's a great central place to stay when visiting Long Beach, Seal Beach, or even Huntington Beach. Every freeway is nearby too. We are always happy here.
Manager Response: prayerwar,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach places numerous dining and shopping options within walking distance. Additionally, our complimentary shuttle service travels within 5 miles for guests to explore many Long Beach and Seal Beach attractions. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms, and amenities such as breakfast and parking. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Seal Beach, Huntington Beach, Laguna Beach all within easy reach
Summary: We have stayed at the Pacific Inn many times over the years.   We thoroughly enjoy being able to walk to downtown Seal Beach for the many great restaurants.   The beach and pier are within an easy walk as well.     The upgrades to the rooms are great.   The hot breakfast (not just a continental breakfast) is a great way to start the day.     We will always go back to Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: mswillett1,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach makes your vacation even easier, with numerous dining, shopping, and beach activity options all within walking distance. We have recently renovated our breakfast room and added seasonal items such as fresh berries to our typical hot assortment, and we are happy to hear you enjoyed them! We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We are a family of four looking for a quick getaway to a beach town. The lobby staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. Shortly after checking in, my kids noticed the warm chocolate chip cookies in the lobby.  The main town is just a few blocks from the hotel, which is very convenient for shopping and dining. After spending time in town my children were able to come back to the hotel and enjoy the pool til 10pm. Free breakfast was an added bonus. Overall, it was a great stay.
Manager Response: Sofia T,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure they are delivering above and beyond customer service to every guest, from our check-in and lobby refreshments, to our complimentary breakfast and shuttle service. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options for your convenience. We appreciate your kind words, and look forward to seeing you and your family again on your next stay with us.

Summary: A group of 20 family members recently stayed at the Pacific Inn for a loved one’s memorial service. The staff were very professional - the front desk staff were attentive, the breakfast manager clearly took pride in her work, the housekeepers were efficient and Hannah (Asst. Manager) was positive and accommodating with our many special requests. Aside from the comfortable hotel, the location can not be beat - walking distance to beach & quaint downtown for restaurants/shopping.  I highly recommend the Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: Kimberly G,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver above and beyond customer service in every aspect, and we are happy to hear of your excellent experiences with all of our staff. With our well-appointed rooms, complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi, and parking, we are a go-to destination for groups of all sizes and ages! Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach is an additional perk, with all of your dining,shopping, and beach needs within a short walk. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Walk to beach and Main Street restaurants
Summary: Great hotel in Seal Beach. Comfy beds and updated rooms. Short walk to Main Street restaurants and Pier. Included breakfast has a good variety and is tasty. Close to Mothers Beach and shopping and restaurants on Second Street.
Manager Response: Halfan1992,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. In addition, we are also near many other coastal areas and attractions, such as Long Beach and Huntington Beach. Our complimentary hot breakfast, Wi-Fi, and parking combine to make for an excellent guest stay year-round! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the are.

Summary: The hotel is nicely located within a short walk of shops, restaurants and beach. My room on the top floor had been reserved for me and it was newly updated with a roomy balcony overlooking a pleasant grassy area. The door to the balcony opened fully and a screen was there, so I could leave my door open all night (much more preferable to a/c). Parking was easy, as was walking to reception. Room was quiet except in the early hours next morning, as the room was directly above the garage and three sets of drivers set off very early in the morning.
Manager Response: pauleggleton,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our newly renovated Executive Rooms feature an all new layout and are situated in the most favorable areas of the hotel; we appreciate your positive feedback! Our close proximity to the beach and Main Street, complimentary breakfast, parking, and Wi-Fi make us a go-to destination in the Orange County area all year long! We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding noise from the garage, and  are pleased to know the room remained quiet for all other times during your stay. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: They have a great welcome kit for your pet including treats and even a blanket to sleep on!  They even provided packets of sunscreen when we foolishly ran out.  I'm definitely going back.  A gem in Seal Beach.
Manager Response: kroorda2018,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. As the only pet-friendly property in Seal Beach, we take pride in ensuring each guest and their furry friends feel welcome, with a complimentary pet box provided upon arrival! Our rooms are stocked with comforting amenities from home, including sunscreen for last-minute beach runs. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Loved our room!! Spacious, clean, wonderful patio.  Breakfast was plentiful and good variety.  The bathroom was large and had a wonderful large shower. Very close to the beach and Main Street.  Returning later this week for a few more days.  Free parking!!! YES?
Manager Response: patrone37,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure each guest has a great stay in every aspect, including our well-appointed rooms, complimentary breakfast and parking, and excellent customer service. We are also located just a short walk from both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us!

Summary: We were so happy with this hotel which we arrived to late in the evening. The check-in process was easy and overall during the whole stay, all employee were quite friendly.   Loved the attached garage and was always able to find a parking spot during our stay. On the last day, we realized there’s a back portion as well.   The breakfast options were good and the pool looked nice but we didn’t use it. The room did look like the hotel photos which was a huge plus. The AC works well and the shower is awesome. Reminds you of home. Our room also included a microwave and refrigerator. Many ++++.   The hotel is close to some eateries and within walking distance to a fabulous beach. We loved that we felt safe to walk around at night and the locals were really friendly on the pier.
Manager Response: SonG3,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to deliver exceptional customer service in every aspect, from our easy check-in and dedicated housekeeping service, to our complimentary breakfast, parking, and Wi-Fi. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We are glad we were able to make The Pacific Inn your home away from home, and we look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: A weekend away! Beautiful hotel and amazing location.
Summary: Let's just start by saying this review is a long time coming. We have been visiting Seal Beach for about 7 years now. We actually found Seal Beach and the Pacific Inn by accident years ago. Let's just start by saying the hotel is amazing. It is walking distance to pretty much everything you need. The staff is incredibly helpful and courteous. The breakfast they do every morning is by far one of the best you can get comparing it to a lot of the hotels around. Let's just say this is the only place we will stay every time we visit Seal Beach. Can't wait until the next trip with the family.
Manager Response: W S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to deliver exceptional customer service in every aspect, from our attentive front desk team and housekeeping staff, to our complimentary hot breakfast and shuttle service. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach make all of your beach needs easily accessible within walking distance. We are so thrilled to hear of your long-standing loyalty to our property, and we are excited to serve you for more years to come. We look forward to seeing on your next trip to the area.

Summary: This hotel is a hidden gem, close to the beach and old town with stores, coffee shops and food spots. The hotel rooms are very clean with pool and hot tub. Staff is also helpful. The breakfast that is included is also a great perk. Parking is easy too.
Manager Response: reggae l,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our staff works hard to deliver excellent customer service, well-appointed and pristine rooms, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, parking, and shuttle service. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel and looks exactly like the pictures show!
Summary: Our family of three adults were so pleased with our accommodations of this hotel. The room was spacious, very well kept, large TV, great balcony, wonderful shower, comfortable temperature with nice air conditioning. We had a good breakfast every morning.  And what a plus having a parking garage!  The beach is just 3 blocks away.  We walked to the beach and downtown main street Seal Beach each day.  The staff were very friendly and professional. It was our best vacation ever!  And the area is quiet and not so cluttered with people. We we could have stayed longer!
Manager Response: garyconniej,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad yuo enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in every aspect, from our check-in process and well-appointed rooms, to our complimentary breakfast, parking, and shuttle service. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach make dining, shopping, and beach fun only a short walk away! We appreciate your kind words, and would have loved for you to extend your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: I selected Pacific Inn as a wedding present for two friends and they thoroughly enjoyed their stay and location. They said that the staff were great and an easy stroll to the beach and town.Pacific Inn provided shuttle service to Long Beach Airport.
Manager Response: raymondcX6816OG,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our customer service team works hard to ensure each guest has a comfortable and excellent stay. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options for you to choose from. Our complimentary shuttle service travels anywhere within a 5-mile radius, including the Long Beach Airport for your convenience! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: We have been coming to Seal Beach for many years now.  Once we found Pacific Inn, we knew we would not stay anywhere else.  The hotel is spotless and immensely comfortable.  We park the car and walk everywhere the rest of the trip.  The staff are super friendly and always working to make your stay comfortable. The pool and hot tub area are so relaxing with the open air ceiling.  Already miss it!
Manager Response: susanbird2016,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our customer service team strives to ensure each guest feels like The Pacific Inn is their home away from home, and we are happy to hear you found a comfortable getaway with us! Our location is ideal for walking to both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. For those who wish to stay in, our atrium style property allows for guests to catch some sun and ocean breeze in our pool area without ever leaving the property. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Recently stayed at Pacific Inn.  This is the only hotel we stay at when coming to Seal Beach.  Staff couldn't be nicer.  Clean rooms.  Great free breakfast, coffee, cookies.  I would absolutely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: dgoller1,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to uphold a high standard of customer service, ensuring each guest has an amazing stay. Our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, lobby refreshments, parking, and Wi-Fi make The Pacific Inn feel like the ultimate home away from home. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: Always economizing, I didn't expect the quality of the stay I received at the Pacific Inn. It is quiet and sits back of the PCH, has a complete complimentary breakfast (fresh fruit, eggs, waffles, cereals, toast, bagels and more), offers potable water to guests. The staff were always cordial and available, and the hotel is an easy walk to the beach. I will return.
Manager Response: 18juju18,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our complimentary hot breakfast offers a rotating menu of eggs, potatoes, and meats, along with various breads, pastries, fruit, and seasonal items for your enjoyment. Our staff strives to deliver above and beyond customer service in every aspect, and we are happy to hear you had positive experiences. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach for all of your vacation needs. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Pacific Inn is great!  Service was outstanding.  Breakfast was way above average and included options for everyone!  The pool and hot tub area was comfy and quiet.  Location was great!  Nice little gym.  My kids loved the cookies each night.
Manager Response: Stacy B R,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service in every aspect, and have every guest feel right at home. Our complimentary hot breakfast is served daily, with a rotating menu and seasonal offerings for the summer! Our atrium-style property allows guests to soak up some sun in our pool area without ever leaving the property! Additionally, our close proximity to both Main Street and the pier make all of your vacation needs within a short walk! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Located about two blocks from the beach, rooms are clean and comfortable.  The bed was notably firmer than I or my wife like, but everyone is going to have their own preferences about that.  The room came with free breakfast; a serve yourself-style with microwaved eggs, bacon/sausage, cereal, yogurt, waffles, juice, etc.  The hotel has limited free parking on-site, and free Wi-Fi is available.  We didn’t use the pool or hot tub, but they looked nice enough, and are located in an interior courtyard.  The Pacific Inn is definitely a good option if you’re looking for a place in Seal Beach, near the marina, or the south part of Long Beach (e.g., Belmont Shore).
Manager Response: Dave B,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our complimentary hot breakfast is served daily, and offers a rotating menu of eggs, meat, potatoes, and traditional continental items such as breads, pastries, and fruit. Our atrium style property allows guests to soak up some sun in our pool area without ever leaving the property! The Pacific Inn is a great choice for those looking to explore the Seal Beach, Long Beach, and Huntington Beach areas, and we are glad you took advantage of the location. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: The room was great, beds comfy. Could use a little better shower but it was suitable. The pool was pretty good! The staff though were incredible! Everyone sooo nice and accommodating! The location was great too! Walk to the b act and shops. Would definitely stay here again with my family!
Manager Response: anastasiadopey,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in every aspect, and making our guests feel right at home. We are currently in the process of updating many of our rooms, and encourage you to check out our Executive Rooms for a fully renovated bathroom! Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach make us the perfect spot for families of all sizes to enjoy their beach vacation, with numerous dining and shopping options. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area with your family!

Summary: I've stayed here a few times and it's always a great choice. The staff is friendly, property is clean and well stocked, and the location is perfect. Breakfast is great, as are the cookies in the evening.
Manager Response: Christylea,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to deliver excellent customer service, well-maintained rooms and facilities, and complimentary amenities such as daily hot breakfast, lobby refreshments, and shuttle service. We are located only a short walk from both Main Street and the beach for all of your dining, shopping, and activity needs! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: As a former Seal Beach resident I appreciate the warmth and welcoming atmosphere of the Pacific Inn. It is a perfect reflection of the small beach town that is located. The staff is caring and yet professional,  with attention to detail and prompt response to any request. The atmosphere is informal and relaxing, allowing for guests to mingle at the breakfast and enjoy the pool area (and the gym that I have yet to visit.) My time at the in has been delightful becoming acquainted with the often international clientele-no need for a passport if you visit the Inn! This was my fourth visit and each one a unique and peaceful respite. Pacific Inn is like a hug, not a hotel.
Manager Response: jgal1225,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. As a small boutique hotel, our team takes great attention to make every guest feel at home, and deliver above and beyond customer service. We serve families and travelers from all walks of life, and we are happy to hear of the positive interactions you've had with other guests as well! We combine our individual take on hospitality with our well-appointed rooms, complimentary amenities such as breakfast and parking, and a stunning beach location for the perfect SoCal getaway. We can't wait to see you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: The room, staff, and location were great! Close to the beach, Main Street, and Los Alamitos Bay. Unfortunately our room was next to the gym and at 530am the man cross-fitting and running on the hamster wheel was LOUD. They should invest in sound proofing that room to help make sure the ambitious guests don’t bother us “less than” ambitious, sleep appreciating, relaxing morning vacationers.
Manager Response: Tinasells247,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure we deliver excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms, and complimentary amenities such as breakfast and parking. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach makes dining, shopping, and fun only a short walk away! We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding noise from the fitness room. We have our sights set on making the insulation of this room better to block out noise for our guests; we also recommend requesting a room away from this area for the most enjoyable stay next time! We look forward to seeing you again and remedying the issues you experienced.

Summary: Great location. Excellent friendly service. Never stayed in Seal Beach and the hotel location made it great walking distance to beach, restaurants and shopping. Looking forward to my next stay there this summer.
Manager Response: Lisa F,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our staff works hard to provide above and beyond customer service, well-appointed rooms and facilities, and complimentary amenities such as parking, WiFi, and breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: Hmm, the positives in this Inn include it's location is close to the water, boutique shops,  some nearby restaurants, and it's relatively easy to get to. The rooms were clean. Parking was convenient. Not sure I'd care to walk around the area at night; might be okay, though. The breakfast was a few typical items and a table to eat them at. No atmosphere. The desk attendant wasn't, er, attending. Coming in or down for something, had to ring a bell and someone would eventually show up; reminded me of the after-hours service at a town in the middle of nowhere. The attendants were nice, and helpful; they just weren't attending on the business side of the closed door. The coffee machine wasn't working; was told to come back in 15 minutes. An hour...an hour...later, the coffee was
Manager Response: darrylmakepeace,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our convenient location puts guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options for your enjoyment. Our complimentary hot breakfast is served daily and offers a variety of items, as well as a seasonal menu, in our newly renovated breakfast room. We would like to apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay. Due to the nature of our night staffing, it is always possible that our front desk clerk may have to step away from the desk for moments at a time; however, prompt and courteous service is our standard and we apologize that it did not meet your expectations. Our coffee machine can take some time to reboot between water changes, cleanings, or if under maintenance, and we do apologize that it took longer than expected. In the meantime, our guestroom coffee is always available to you for your convenience. Our atrium style  property does place our pool in the middle of the hotel, and can cause some noise during the day, but no guest balconies would be facing the pool. We appreciate your honest feedback, and hope you choose to stay with us again and allow us to remedy the issues you experienced.

Summary: I love this hotel. This was my 3rd time staying and I’m going back next month. Customer service is amazing, beds are comfortable, breakfast is good and location is also very good. I love seal beach and I love this hotel!!
Manager Response: 430taylarb,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering above and beyond customer service, well-appointed rooms, and convenient amenities such as parking, shuttle service, and breakfast. Our property is also located within a short walk of both Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier for all of your dining, shopping, and beach needs! We appreciate your loyal patronage and look forward to seeing you on many more visits to the area!

Summary: Excellent! Rooms were great! Staff was friendly and helpful! Clean  Check in easy Check out too.. Will be back :) Quiet, clean, reasonable rates! Family and friends lioved staying here ... Thank you thank you thank you!
Manager Response: Ruth S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure each guest has a unique and comfortable stay. We pride ourselves on delivering well-appointed and clean guestrooms and facilities, as well as complimentary amenities such as breakfast, parking, and shuttle service. We appreciate your kind feedback and look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary: This place is a hidden jem!! Great location, great value , n very centralized!  Not to mention price is great!! Very clean , simple , don’t expect a great breakfast but u r in walking distance to lots of great restaurants n the beach !!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our complimentary hot breakfast is served daily, and offers a rotating menu of egg, meat, and potato options, along with seasonal and traditional continental items. We appreciate your kind feedback, and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay at Seal Beach!
Summary: Staff were friendly and helpful, the room was well appointed and spotlessly clean - nice to have a balcony! Excellent breakfast facilities - love the omelets! And of course an ideal location, within walking distance to the beach and all the Main Street restaurants!
Manager Response: Colin B,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our customer service team goes above and beyond every day to ensure a great stay in all aspects, from our well-appointed rooms and amenities to our daily breakfast service. All guestrooms are equipped with a private balcony for your comfort and convenience. Main Street and the beach are both just a short walk away, and we are glad you took advantage of the local area. We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us.

Summary: The Pacific Inn was a great hotel to stay in.  Our room was clean and comfortable.  It is a good location for going up and down the coast.  About 2 blocks from the beach and many restaurants within walking distance.  We would stay again.
Manager Response: Theresa M,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure every room is clean and comfortable, and upholds our high standards. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. In addition, we are perfectly located in between Long Beach and Huntington Beach for further exploring! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Great place for family and friends to stay!
Summary: I recently had my cousin stay at the Pacific Inn and we couldn’t be more pleased with his stay. Courteous and knowledgeable staff. Very clean and lovely rooms and great touches like fresh cookies and coffee in the lobby. They also provide a free breakfast daily. This quaint boutique hotel nestled in the heart Seal Beach is a perfect stay for family and friends.   Elaine
Manager Response: Elaine C,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our customer service team goes above and beyond to ensure each guest has a comfortable stay, from our well-appointed rooms and lobby refreshments to our complimentary breakfast service. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach make us the perfect location for families of all sizes to enjoy the summer weather. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We have family in Seal Beach so we stay here quite often. Always clean and usually we can get adjoining rooms with just a week or two advance notice. Staff is always great and   getting extra towels or whatever is a breeze. Continental breakfast is health minded { light, yogurt, fruit, muffins, cereal, juice, coffee } perfect for getting your day started. They do have a waffle station for kids but if you need sausage or bacon you will have to go off site. Pool and Jacuzzi are clean and they supply towels in this area as well. Parking has a low ceiling { 6'7" } I believe so if you have an oversize rig just be careful and park in the back lot where there is no roof. The location is great as you can walk to Main Street and the beach if you do not have a ton of gear. If so it all of
Manager Response: M6340YWjim,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff strives to ensure every guest has a great stay, whether it be due to fulfilling room requests, providing extra amenities, or going above and beyond to anticipate your needs. Our complimentary hot breakfast is served daily and has a new selection every day, which include an egg, meat, and potato option in addition to our lighter offerings. Our close proximity to Main Street and the beach make us the perfect spot for families of all sizes. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: The room was very clean and nice. the people were hostpitable.We loved the jacuzzi and pool. The breakfast was great too. Location is great. Close to the beach. We would Highly recommend! We would stay here again!
Manager Response: kbolling08,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location, excellent customer service, and complimentary amenities such as breakfast, Wi-Fi, and parking, make us a go-to destination in the area this summer! We appreciate your positive feedback and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Had Fun! Great location, food within walking distance in every direction. Secure hotel in evening as you have to use your card to get in. Super friendly staff front desk, housekeeping and breakfast room. The room was very clean, the beds were comfortable. Lush Landscape in surrounding areas makes for nice walks. I want to give 5 stars, but feel some renovations need to be made.
Manager Response: LetsGoYo1,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our staff works hard to ensure every guest has a unique and comfortable stay in all aspects, from our front desk to our complimentary breakfast service. We are currently undergoing many property renovations, and appreciate your feedback! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: What a nice little getaway retreat :-) The rooms were very clean and inviting. Newly renovated! Less than 5 min drive to the beach, or about a 15 min walk with kids. The pool and spa area is small, but with just our family and 1 other couple it was plenty of space. I think it would be awkward with multiple families present. Book in advance, this hotel fills up quick on the weekends because of its proximity to the shops, restaurants, and beach!
Manager Response: Lina28144,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are currently renovating many of our guestrooms, and we are happy to hear you enjoyed our Executive Rooms! Our atrium-style pool and hot tub area is the perfect place for families to unwind and catch some sun without ever leaving the property, but can definitely fill up during the busy summer months. Our convenient location make us the go-to destination in the Seal Beach area year-round! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Good location in Seal Beach, but not close to the beach itself.  Built around a swimming pool with adequate rooms and good parking.  Good for a business person or family traveling with their own transportation.
Manager Response: SteveConley235,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are actually conveniently located within walking distance of the beach, and are the closest property to Seal Beach. Our atrium-style pool area, complimentary parking, breakfast, and Wi-Fi make every stay comfortable every time. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: nice comfortable room, spa, small pool and work out room. Great location /easy walk to town to shop and  have dinner. staff is really nice.  Continental breakfast has many options. I would recommend this property for a nice quiet weekend getaway.
Manager Response: dgranados70,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on providing excellent customer service in every aspect, and maintaining comfortable facilities such as our pool and hot tub area. Our complimentary hot breakfast is served daily and has a rotating menu, including seasonal items. We are happy to hear of your great experience with us, and we look forward to seeing you again on your next stay.

Summary: This hotel is really a great place to stay at.  It's not far from Seal Beach and the pier.  We had a deluxe room which was very nice and big.  Rooms were very clean and the beds were very comfortable.  Breakfast is very tasty and has something for everyone.  The front desk staff is very friendly and helpful in looking for things to do around the city.  There is a shuttle service as well.  I look forward to my next visit and extending my stay!
Manager Response: danshorty,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach; our complimentary shuttle service operates within a 5-mile radius for those who wish to further explore the area. Our staff strives to ensure each guest has a great stay in every aspect, from housekeeping to breakfast service. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: A Dog Friendly hotel that is a gem to find.
Summary: Small boutique hotel, that makes you and your pet welcome. Great breakfast, plus coffee and treats always available. Location is 2 blocks to Main Street Seal Beach where everything is there for families, couples or singles.   Pier and beach 3 blocks away. Cannot say enough about the friendly staff and welcome attention. Thank You
Manager Response: C G,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach make us the ideal vacation spot for families of all sizes, year-round! We are the only pet-friendly property in Seal Beach, and gladly welcome both you and your furry friends for a comfortable stay. Our customer service team goes above and beyond each day to ensure each guest has a great experience, and we are happy to hear your positive feedback. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Rooms have been renovated recently and are nicely done. Front desk staff is always pleasant. Breakfast room staff lady made me some plain eggs as I couldn't eat the omelets they had. Love staying here. Looking forward to the next time we go.
Manager Response: rseigner,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are currently in the process of renovating our rooms, and appreciate your positive feedback regarding our Executive Rooms! Our staff goes above and beyond to ensure each guest has a comfortable and unique experience, and our breakfast team is no exception. We appreciate your kind words and loyal business, and look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: Another nice stay at Pacific Inn. Was down for daughters graduation. Shuttle to and from hotel was a great help. No hunting for parking spaces. Really enjoy the service that Pacific Inn provides. Looking forward to room renovations. The old rooms with sliding glass doors on bathroom and closet are difficult to deal with and will bite your fingers if not careful. Second floor street side is a bit noisy due to McDonald"s order speaker is loud and starts early and goes late.  Overall, one of the best hotels around. Close to everything. Peanut butter cookies in lobby are my favorite. We will be back.
Manager Response: Steve K,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to provide a comfortable stay for all guests each day, from our lobby refreshments and breakfast service, to our courtesy shuttle which operates within a 5-mile radius. We encourage you to check out out newly renovated Executive King and Two Queen rooms on your next visit, for a completely new layout and a more favorable room location. We appreciate your positive feedback and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Pacific Inn. The hotel was great! Everyone was really friendly and helpful. The room we had was awesome and we would definitely stay here again! All amenities were over the top and the breakfast was fantastic. When we checked in we were greeted by the front desk supervisor who was very professional and greeted us with a Smile(thank you Ashlee!) When checking out we were greeted by Jacqueline who was very friendly and had a huge smile on her face. She asked us how our stay was and made sure that all was too out satisfaction. Overall we give The Pacific Inn 5 stars. You guys ROCK!!
Manager Response: Leslie P,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in every aspect, from our attentive front desk staff to our complimentary breakfast service. We are glad you enjoyed our newly renovated Executive King room, and appreciate your feedback on our amenities and breakfast selections! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Quick In and Out Business Trip
Summary: First time in Seal Beach, great location and very clean hotel, walked to the pier and Main Street.  They even had a convenient shuttle service available.  I slept well, woke up refreshed and enjoyed the breakfast.
Manager Response: JLMeyer0901,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach; our complimentary shuttle service operates within a 5-mile radius for those who wish to further explore the area. We strive to provide the most comfortable and clean accommodations for your convenience, and we are happy to hear of your great experience. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Everyone was so nice here!! We were always greeted with a smile! We had so much fun in Seal Beach. It was such a nice place. They offer shuttle to the Cruise and this helped so much. The rooms were very clean! We will stay here again when we return.
Manager Response: Dana B,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in every aspect, from our front desk and well-appointed rooms to our shuttle and breakfast service. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and provides up to 7 days of parking and round-trip shuttle service to the Carnival Cruise port for a small fee. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary Heading: Trip to Long Beach for Carnival Cruise
Summary: This hotel is very modern, clean and beautiful.  My wife and I stayed here one night just so we wouldn't gave to rush getting to the carnival cruise terminal.  They picked us up at the airport and the next morning took us to the terminal.  They even said their van could also take us from the terminal, when we returned from our cruise, to Long Beach Airport, all for one price.  What a bargain and they were so accommodating, don't find this attitude so often today.
Manager Response: Michael M,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and allows round-trip shuttle service to the port and parking on our property for 7 days for a small package fee. We also service the Long Beach Airport free of charge, and are happy we were able to accommodate your trip needs. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in all aspects, and are happy to hear you had a positive experience with our staff. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: This was my first time staying here. It was in a great location next to main street in Seal Beach. You could actually walk down to the pier from the hotel. The room was very nice and comfortable. Breakfast was included with the stay, which was a plus! I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Catherine H,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our complimentary hot breakfast is served daily with an assortment of fresh and seasonal selections, and we are happy to hear your positive feedback. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Overall we had a good stay. We did have a toilet leak that needed to be fixed. They were very responsive when we called about the problem. Housekeeping was a little inconsistent. Our shower mat looked like it hadn't been washed one day. The staff was very helpful. I was please to see Gluten free options at breakfast, including muffins.
Manager Response: Diane B,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure every guest has a comfortable stay. We do our best to provide as many options as possible in our breakfast selection, including gluten free items. We would like to apologize for any inconveniences you experienced regarding housekeeping. Our staff would have been happy to resolve this issue and provide you with new bath items had it been brought to our attention. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Booked two rooms for a two night stay for my husband and I and our adult son. This was our first visit back since they had renovated. We had executive king rooms that faced the park which were very quiet. Everything was new and clean. We liked having the Keurig coffeemaker and the quality bath products. Staff were friendly and helpful. Pool and hot tub were lovely. We have already booked two future stays based on our positive experience.
Manager Response: nwise50,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our newly renovated Executive Rooms are our most popular selection, and we appreciate your positive feedback! We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in every aspect, from our complimentary breakfast, to our open-air pool and hot tub area. We are pleased to know we made The Pacific Inn your home away from home, and look forward to seeing you on your next visits!

Summary: We wanted a place to stay before catching an evening flight from LAX the next day.  We thought we would try Pacific Inn in Seal Beach and it turned out to be better than expected. The room had everything we could want, a balcony to sit on, a refrigerator to chill our drinks, handy amenities in the bathroom (including sun screen!), and a comfortable bed.  The excellent included breakfast was great for setting you up for the day.  We especially liked the covered parking and being within walking distance of Seal Beach, with its restaurants, shops, pier and beach.  We will definitely be staying here again, when flying out of LAX.
Manager Response: ji6060,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. From our excellent customer service and well-appointed rooms, to our complimentary breakfast and shuttle service, our staff strives to ensure The Pacific Inn is every guest's home away from home. We appreciate your positive feedback, and we look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area!

Summary: My husband and I stay here at least two times a year.  It was recently renovated...last year we were lucky to be given one of the renovated rooms.  The room was and is great! Tastefully decorated, there is a Bar area with Refrigerator/Freezer that is actually big enough for several ice packs as well as a Microwave  We love that there is a terrace. And the best part of the room is the Jacuzzi tub! It is a small 3 Floor hotel.  The Pool and Jacuzzi are in the middle of the 2nd Floor.  Several good places to eat within walking distance, including the BEST Thai restaurant that we have ever eaten.
Manager Response: nina824,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are currently in the process of renovating many of our rooms, and appreciate your positive feedback on our Executive Rooms! We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi, and pool and Jacuzzi area are great for guests looking to stay in! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Great location! Bed too hard tho!
Summary: On our way to Catalina for a few days and stayed here before we left the next day,  Wonderfully remodeled - love the walk in shower - and close to restaurants and the pier.  And you don't have to pay for parking and it is under cover so our windshield didn't get all the morning dew droppings on it.  Can't go wrong with this cute boutique hotel.  Our only complaint and it is HUGE - the bed was so hard neither one of the two couples slept very well.  They might think about putting some sort of a topper on it....
Manager Response: Jan O,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are in the process of renovating all of our guestrooms to provide the most comfortable and modern accommodations for our guests, and appreciate your positive feedback. Our complimentary amenities such as parking, breakfast, and shuttle service are very popular with our guests, and set us apart from other boutique hotels in the area. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced regarding your bed; we do have pillow top mattresses available to alleviate this issue with our remaining firm beds, and encourage you to request this on your next reservation. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Great place to stay before our flight to Los Vegas. Short walking distance to Seal Beach. King bed was huge & very comfortable. Breakfast was excellent. Staff were very friendly. Pacific Inn provided free shuttle to Long Beach airport & Queen Mary.  Tony B from New Zealand
Manager Response: ToneBarnett,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our close proximity to the Main Street and the beach makes for easy entertainment, dining, and shopping, all within walking distance. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service and complimentary amenities such as shuttle service, breakfast, and parking. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: As always, our trip to the Pacific Inn was a delightful experience. From the friendly staff at check-in to the clean and well appointed rooms with comfy beds, refrig. and microwave, coffee maker, great breakfast room (also complimentary), free covered parking down to the great warm chocolate chip cookies served nightly, this hotel goes above and beyond to ensure you have a memorable stay.  We manage 3-6 trips a year and love the fact that you can walk to the beach and all the shops and restaurants. The service and friendly staff will always bring us back.                                 Denise Smith
Manager Response: rellastern,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our dedicated team of customer service professionals strive to make every guest feel like The Pacific Inn is their home away from home, with comforts such as daily breakfast, lobby refreshments, complimentary parking, Wi-Fi, and shuttle service. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are so glad to hear we are your top choice in the Seal Beach area. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip!

Summary Heading: Great Place To Stay In Quaint Seal Beach
Summary: My wife and I have been staying at The Pacific Inn for well over a decade. The staff was very friendly and the service was excellent. Rooms are clean and well appointed. The best thing is the hotel's proximity to the quaint town of Seal Beach. We leave our vehicle in their covered parking area and WALK everywhere in Seal Beach! If you want to see sights further away, the hotel has a van to take you there. The only thing that would improve our stay would be lower room rates.
Manager Response: Greg Z,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. Our complimentary shuttle service operates within a 5-mile radius for guests who wish to further explore the area. Taking into consideration the time of year, our central location, and our recent property and room updates, our room rates have increased accordingly to stay competitive. We appreciate your patronage over the years and would love to have you back! We hope to see you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We've just checked out of this little gem i found this place very accommodating clean pleasant helpful staff the free breakfast was quite substantial with a little bit of everything for everyone only a small critism more tea and sugar in the rooms would be good as im sure there's lots of non coffee drinkers out there i woukd stay again and seal beach area is nice and quiet to come back too after a hectic day in LA
Manager Response: Susan M,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our staff works hard to ensure a comfortable stay in every aspect, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary hot breakfast service. On your next visit, please feel free to let the staff know of any requests you may have, and we will be happy to provide you with extra tea and sugar for your room! We appreciate your kind words and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We had several special requests and they accommodated them. The hotel room was  very nice and clean. Enjoyed having breakfast right down hall on 3rd floor. They are good for pets with a park next door for walking dogs.
Manager Response: bobandkaren46,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff is dedicated to providing the most comfortable unique experience possible, and we are happy to hear we accommodated your needs. As the only pet-friendly property in Seal Beach, we welcome both you and your furry friends for every vacation; our close proximity to a park, Main Street, and the pier makes for great walking locations. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: The Pacific Inn was perfect! The staff was welcoming and the breakfast was good with hot and cold choices. They also allow pets for a 50$ fee. I would stay here again. The hotel is walking distance to many restaurants!
Manager Response: Mary S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are the only pet-friendly property in Seal Beach, and welcome you and your furry friends for every vacation. Our staff is dedicated to providing excellent service in every aspect, including our complimentary hot breakfast. We are located only a short walk from both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options to choose from. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

Summary: We love this place!! been going back for 20 years. super nice staff, great rooms. The town is fun to walk around in, cute beach shops.  The restaurants are excellent with a lot of choices.  And yum an excellent icecream shop!!!!
Manager Response: zanna2,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our dedicated customer service team works hard to ensure each guest has a comfortable experience, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi, and parking. Our close proximity to Main Street and the beach is our most popular feature, and we are glad you took advantage of the local area. We appreciate your loyal support over the years, and look forward to continuing to accommodate your lodging needs!

Summary: I have stayed at the Pacific Inn a number of times. I have always enjoyed my stay. Walking distance to beach, shopping and good food.  Rooms are clean and staff very friendly. Dog friendly.  Cookies at night and a light breakfast in morning are included. Pool area in center of complex is very nice and  encourages sitting out in the evening enjoying fresh beach air. One of my favorite hotels on west coast.
Manager Response: vvsw,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are the only pet-friendly property in Seal Beach, and welcome both you and your furry friends on every vacation. Our close proximity to the ocean is on of our most popular features; our open-air pool area provides sun and ocean breezes for those who wish to stay on the property. We are so glad you enjoyed our customer service and complimentary lobby refreshments and daily breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip!

Summary: Great location, a couple of blocks to Main Street shopping and restaurants, a pleasant walk to the pier and beach. Loved our room and the staff at the desk. Didn't get to try the heated pool and hot tub, but they looked great. Will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Jacqueline D,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our close proximity to both downtown Seal Beach and the ocean make us a great stop at this time of year! Our staff works hard to ensure each guest has a comfortable stay in all aspects, from our well-appointed rooms to our complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi, and open-air pool and hot tub area. We look forward to seeing you again on your visit!

Summary: Clean rooms with friendly and responsive staff in a great location close to Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier and Beach.  Nice breakfast bar that is included and every room has a balcony that is nice to relax on.
Manager Response: Mike L,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining, shopping, and beach activity options to enjoy. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in every aspect, from our dedicated customer service team to our complimentary hot breakfast service. We offer balconies with all of our guestrooms to provide the most relaxing accommodations possible. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: Well maintained and operated hotel in an excellent location.  Easy to walk to restaurants, shops, and marina.  Free under cover parking a significant plus.  On our list for probable return stays.  Freshly prepared good variety breakfast another plus.
Manager Response: cairne2,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options. Our dedicated customer service team, complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, parking, and Wi-Fi, and beach location make us that perfect SoCal destination all year-round. We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us!

Summary: I stayed here for a one night getaway April 19th. Work puts me up here so I already knew how great the hotel was. Checked in early and was fortunate to have a room ready for me. My room was even upgraded to an executive king. Nicer bed and bigger balcony than a normal room but the bathroom is bigger in the non-executive room. Definitely coming back and this is my only choice for a hotel in Seal Beach California.
Manager Response: spadercool,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Executive King rooms are newly renovated and feature the most modern and comfortable accommodations. The brand-new bathroom layout features a significantly greater amount of counter space and additional amenities, although a bit smaller in square footage. This is our most popular room type, and we are glad we were able to upgrade you! We would like to thank you for your continued loyalty, and look forward to seeing you on your next stay with us.

Summary: We live in Montana. Record setting snow and cold prompted my bff and I to make a quick beach trip during what was hopefully our last snow storm of the winter. Check in was fast and we were on our way to our room within 5 minutes. Room was super clean as before (this is our second year we've been at the Pacific Inn) only this time we were surprised to find a connecting room which made us feel guilty about leaving our kiddos at home. But we quickly got over it! Beds were heavenly and put us to sleep after a long day of traveling and beach walking. Morning was greeted with a hot breakfast and a sweet attendant keeping everything refreshed. The little toiletries like qtips, makeup removers and the Bath and Body Works shampoo and lotions are a fantastic touch! And the bath towels are
Manager Response: lainydoll,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our dedicated team of customer service professionals strive to ensure every guest feels right at home here, with comforts such as hot breakfast, luxurious toiletries, and nightly lobby refreshments. We are happy to hear we were able to provide you with an upgraded room, and look forward to seeing the whole family next time! Seal Beach is an excellent Orange County getaway spot all year round, especially to escape the snow! We appreciate your kind feedback on our services and staff, and can't wait to see you again on your next trip!

Summary Heading: Helpful staff, large rooms, close to beach
Summary: Rooms are large and clean, light breakfast is included in the price. There is a free shuttle bus to Long Beach and other areas close by. The staff were very helpful with all of our enquiries. Seal beach pier and cafes are a short walk away and well worth visiting. If you want a quiet break with good food close by, stay here
Manager Response: pjr59,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our complimentary hot breakfast, shuttle service within 5 miles, and close proximity to both Main Street and the beach make us the perfect location for a quiet beach getaway. Our staff works hard to ensure each guest has a memorable and comfortable stay, and are always available to assist with any needs. We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: I grew up in this area, so it's always great to return and visit Seal Beach and Huntington Beach. The Pacific Inn is always a welcoming place and just a short stroll to the sand, pier, and Seal Beach village. We have come as a couple, and also with kids and grandkids.
