There is plenty to do in the area beach-wise, and the hotel also has a pool. They serve breakfast on the 3rd floor in their breakfast room or there are plenty of restaurants within walking distance. The staff are very nice, the rooms and beds are really clean, and it's just a gem of a place to relax, too!!!
Manager Response: prayerwar,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the pier make us the perfect location for any beach getaway, with numerous dining, shopping, and activities to choose from.  Our customer service team strives to ensure each guest has an incredible stay, from our front desk experience and well-appointed rooms, to our complimentary breakfast service and pool area. We hope you choose to stay with us again on your next trip to the area!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at the Pacific Inn
Summary: I love everything about this place! The staff was friendly and very helpful. We used their stay and park package while we went on our cruise and it was a great deal. The rooms were nicely appointed, you can tell they put a lot of thought into the details. I love that every room has a balcony and a jetted tub. The beds were comfortable and I tend to be picky about beds. The kids loved the pool, the hot tub was hot and there was a good breakfast that even included eggs and sausage. We will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Tabitha S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is on of our most popular amenities, and allows guests to park their vehicle for up to 7 days and enjoy round trip shuttle service to the Long Beach Carnival Cruise Port. We are pleased that you enjoyed your upgraded room type with the jetted tub, although they are not found in all of our guestrooms. Our staff works hard to ensure a comfortable stay in all aspects, from our complimentary hot breakfast and shuttle service, to our well-appointed rooms and engaging customer service. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: I just booked my next trip to souther CA and would not stay anywhere else.  I love this little gem in Seal Beach.  The entire staff is amazing.  I always feel welcome, like I'm coming home.  The entire hotel is clean and well maintained.  Any issues that may come up are taken care of immediately.  The pool and surrounding area is lovely and there are always towels available.  My grandson loves to come and swim.  The breakfast room is newly renovated and is well run by Victoria and the other staff who help to keep it running smoothly.  My grandson loves to come for breakfast.  The rooms are also newly renovated and the little patio is a great place to sit and relax.  The beds are so comfortable and the ladies keep the rooms clean and will bring any extras you need.  My trip in
Manager Response: rlipschutz,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. As always, we are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Here at The PI, we strive to ensure every guest feels right at home, and is always welcomed back for all of their travel needs. We have completed many renovations over the past year, including our breakfast room, hallway flooring, and many Executive Rooms! We are always looking to improve and make each experience enjoyable, and we are so happy to have been able to accommodate you and your family over the years. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Great for us and our dog.
Summary: Stayed so we could spend Easter with family, what do we do with our dog(Doogal;) Problem solved stay at The Pacific Inn. Room clean, nicely decorated, and great area to walk the dog. We were very pleased  Look forward to other stays..
Manager Response: janiceandgary,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are the only pet-friendly property in Seal Beach, and we are happy to hear we were able to host your entire family for the Easter holiday! Our close proximity to Main Street, the beach, and a quiet neighborhood behind the hotel make us the perfect place for fun, relaxation, and of course, beautiful dog walks. We appreciate your kind feedback, and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We recently spent four restful nights at the pacific inn in seal beach. The staff were all incredibly helpful. The location is perfect. We were traveling with our dog and appreciated the great walks just out the front door. Breakfast easy, convenient and all we needed. To top it all off, Hannah called yesterday and let us know that she had found my wife’s ring. A happy ending to a great stay.
Manager Response: Steven L,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service to each and every guest, and want everyone to feel like The Pacific Inn is their home away from home. We are the only pet-friendly hotel in Seal Beach, and welcome both you and your furry friends for a relaxing beach vacation. We are thrilled that our staff was able to recover your lost ring and return it safely to you. We look forward to seeing you again for many more trips to come!

Summary: Have stayed here several times previously. Location is perfect - walking distance to beach, shops and a wide variety of eating places and very handy for the Pacific Coast Highway for getting around places to visit. Stayed in a refurbished room - very nice. Pool and Jacuzzi very welcome at the end of a long day !
Manager Response: S P,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shipping options. In addition, Seal Beach is located right in the middle of popular destinations, such as Huntington Beach and Long Beach. Our newly renovated Executive Rooms are a guest favorite, and we are happy to hear you enjoyed it! We thank you for your loyal patronage and look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: First time at this hotel, we were pleasantly surprised. Very clean, close to shops and places to eat. We even walked to the beach. We needed a place to park the car while we were on a cruise.  We will definitely book the hotel again and again. Thanks for a great stay.
Manager Response: Colleen,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you took advantage of our Park & Cruise Package! These packages have limited availability each day, and it's great you were able to utilize our complimentary parking. We are so glad you are going to continue coming back to The Pacific Inn. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel off and on for many years. Stayed in one of their newly remodeled rooms-very comfortable.  I hope they continue the remodel with all of the rooms; they have always been a favorite, reasonably price choice.
Manager Response: Kpage668684,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us over the past few years. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms. These rooms are currently bookable at a different room type and rate, as they are newly renovated, are in the most requested areas of the hotel, and feature newer amenities than our standard rooms, such as a Kuerig coffee maker. Thank you for your review. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for five nights, and I think we liked it better each day!  The staff was so friendly and helpful, parking convenient, and we really appreciated having access to the shuttle.  The beds and linens were nice, and the bathrooms were hip and modern.  Seal Beach is nearby, as wellas other restaurants and amenities.
Manager Response: Alpacalindy,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We pride ourselves on our customer service. We want to make sure every guest has a wonderful stay. We appreciate your review and are hoping to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Clean rooms, shuttle service, microwave, refrigerator, pool, spa, breakfast, and good coffee in the lobby.  There are several restaurants within walking distance from the Inn, from fast food to fine dining.  What’s not to love?
Manager Response: Ray, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We try to provide as many amenities to our guests in order to make every guests stay a great one. Our convenient location makes our property an excellent getaway spot! We appreciate your feedback and are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Everyone we met was beyond our expectations for kind even though we started our stay with the kids taking too many cookies and spilling their hot cocoa!  And yes, warm cookies in the afternoons and unlimited hot drink machine for coffee, lattes, hot cocoa etc in the lobby.  The pool and hot tub were nice.  Outdoor but with a partial roof so you get fresh air but can find shade.  The rooms were large and clean and the beds very comfortable.  Sheets and blankets soft and clean.  Even the pullout bed was super comfortable with a quality mattress.  Breakfast included many options even hot items.  When they learned we were vegetarians, they brought out vegetarian eggs without us even asking.  I noticed gluten free options too.  Boogie boards at front desk and a free shuttle to/from
Manager Response: Amy,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are a family-friendly property and understand that accidents happen, whether that's with spills or taking a few extra cookies at the front desk! We are an atrium-style hotel, meaning our pool area is surrounded by our rooms. We are so glad you enjoyed our breakfast room. We understand that many people have dietary needs and we try to provide as many options as possible so everyone can enjoy our complimentary breakfast. Our complimentary shuttle service can take our guests anywhere within a 5 mile radius of our property and is first come-first served. We are glad you were able to take advantage of this to get picked up and dropped off from the airport! We greatly appreciate all your feedback on our property. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Loved this place! From the reasonable price to the convenient location to the wonderful staff to the amazing breakfast, I can't say enough positive things about this hotel. They have a gym, a pool, a jacuzzi--all very accessible and clean. Our family and our dog were all very pleased with our stay here. Thank you, Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: Sstrong731,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We try to provide as many amenities as possible, including complimentary WiFi, parking, transportation, breakfast room, fitness center and pool area. Plus, for just a small fee, your furry family members can stay with us as well! We want every family member to be able to enjoy The Pacific Inn. Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We stay here every year for the Seal Beach Run event.  Perfect location for the run and Main Street for shopping. Everything is within walking distance.  Rooms clean, nice showers, comfortable beds and they have a small breakfast buffet.  Very good for the price.
Manager Response: Anne,   Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you joined us again this year for Run Seal Beach! This is a great event in the area, and because we are walking distance from the start/finish line, our property makes for a great stay if you are participating in the run. Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: The hotel was very clean and staff was very nice.
Summary: Stayed here as it was a park and sleep before our cruise.  Great hotel and the breakfast was awesome!  Shuttle service to the cruise port was so nice and we actually got to see a bit of the downtown area.
Manager Response: Tonya B,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and offers round-trip shuttle service to the Carnival Cruise Port and parking for up to 7 days for a $10 package fee. The Pacific Inn allows for a place to rest and relax before taking off on the next part of your vacation; our complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi, and pool area help make the start of your trip perfect! We look forward to seeing you again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Lovely Find close to dining and shops
Summary: What a lovely hotel close to old town Seal Beach. Clean updated room with nice little terrace with a park view. Workout room had everything we needed and hot tub in the atrium was a plus. We will definitely stay here again!.
Manager Response: lcollins1960,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our close proximity to both Main Street and the beach provides guests with numerous dining and shopping options, only a short walk away! Our complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast, pool and hot tub, and fitness room are popular with our guests of all ages, and we are glad you enjoyed them! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: We did the park & stay with shuttle service. The hotel was perfect. great pool for the kids to play in the night before cruise. Nice large breakfast. The shuttle drop off service ran smoothly, we also had pick up shuttle service. The drivers were full of conversation, asking about our trip. Great hospitality.
Manager Response: KSJBK,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and offers round-trip shuttle service to the Carnival Cruise Port and parking for up to 7 days on our property. Our dedicated customer service team goes above and beyond to ensure each guest has an excellent and unique stay, and to provide a home away from home on your vacation. Our complimentary hot breakfast, parking, and beach location make us the perfect destination year-round. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: This hotel greatly exceeded my expectations!  I was in town for a conference in Anaheim and ended up booking my hotel very late.  When there were nearly zero rooms left in the area I took a gamble on the Pacific Inn.  It paid off!  Quiet hotel with newly remodeled rooms.  They even upgraded me to the family suite without any reason.  Great location that's walking distance from the pier.   I will remember this hotel the next time I'm in the area!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service in every aspect, from our newly renovated rooms to our complimentary breakfast and shuttle service. Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, The Pacific Inn strives to be your home away from home for every occasion. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the pier for all of your dining and shopping needs. We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the area!

Summary: We were very impressed with the facility and the staff here. The rooms we had were very nice and in good repair. The staff were so friendly you felt like you were a long time customer instead of first timers. We sail often from Long Beach and this will definitely become our choice of where to stay whenever we are in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering an excellent and comfortable experience for each guest, where everyone is part of The Pacific Inn family. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, ad we are glad we were able to provide your parking and transportation needs for the rest of your trip! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary Heading: Great family hotel on the Orange County Coast
Summary: This is a great family friendly, reasonably priced hotel that is walking distance to Orange County coast in Seal Beach.  it's conveniently located just off Pacific Coast Highway, and it's quiet.  The rooms are spacious and very nice.  The continental breakfast is a cut above average with waffles and hot cereal.  The best feature by far is the very friendly and helpful staff.  This was our first stay, and we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Neecy B,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier, with numerous dining and shopping options. Our complimentary shuttle service is available within 5 miles for guests who wish to further explore the area. Our staff works hard to ensure each guest has a unique and comfortable stay, from the lobby to our breakfast room. We look forward to seeing you again should you return to the area.

Summary: I needed a decent hotel and had to be in the Seal Beach area....Because my Starwood points did not have a hotel here, I reviewed some SB hotels and decided on this one because of price and looked clean.  I was pleasantly surprised by the very friendly and helpful staff, the cleanliness of the property and the rooms were spacious and very clean. Also, a convenient, help yourself breakfast buffet. was very nice (a little of everything to stay, or grab and go).  Great value for the price! I would definitely come back, especially because of the welcoming & very helpful staff.
Manager Response: Linda H,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service, well-appointed rooms, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service for your comfort and convenience. Our close proximity to the beach and Main Street set us apart from other hotels in the area. We are always looking to improve our facilities, and appreciate your positive feedback! We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us when you return to the Seal Beach area!

Summary Heading: Pacific Inn is home away from home!
Summary: Very caring and personal service!  We have stayed at the Pacific Inn several times in the past and each time that we arrive here, we are never disappointed.  From the delicious coffee machine in the front lobby, to the wonderful variety of breakfast foods each morning we always look forward to our stay at the Pacific Inn. Our room was very clean with a very comfortable bed and a lovely view of the park. We used to book our stay at the Pacific Inn for only when we would go on cruises, but now we just visit to unplug and enjoy beautiful Seal Beach.
Manager Response: juljoe707,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our customer service team is dedicated to providing each guest with a comfortable an unique experience. From our close proximity to the beach and complimentary breakfast to our well-appointed rooms and caring staff, The Pacific Inn is a treat for the whole family, year-round! We look forward to seeing you again on your next stay with us, either for a cruise or a simple Seal Beach vacation.

Summary: My husband and I just completed a move from Boston to SoCal and needed a landing place while we got settled on a new coast. Jacqueline took immediate and thoughtful care of our situation, was detail oriented in reserving our stay, and really set us for success. The staff here really make the place. They care a great deal from the night manager and maintenance man who welcomed us on our first night to Tiana and Hannah at the front desk. People took care of us. The housekeeping team does an amazing job and they are so warm and friendly when you meet them. When you don't know a soul and everyone you love is 3K miles away at Christmas, the warm companionship from Victoria and Willie over morning breakfast just means everything.  The inn has an ideal location, within walking distance
Manager Response: Heather G,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad that you enjoyed your long stay with us, and that we were able to ease the struggle associated with a difficult move. Our staff is dedicated to ensuring each guest has a comfortable stay, and thoroughly enjoyed accommodating you and your husband during your time with us. Your kind treatment of our staff and welcoming company made your stay just as enjoyable for us! Our close proximity to the beach, Main Street, and numerous dining and shopping options provides the ultimate convenience for guests. We strive to make sure each guest feels at home here with us, and we are so thrilled that we provided that for your family. We appreciate your kind review, and would love to see you again for your first SoCal vacation!

Summary: To start, the staff was so friendly from the minute you walked through the door and hotel was charming.  The rooms had plenty of room and beds were very comfortable. Everyone in our party LOVED the way the hotel was laid out with the pool and seating area being center stage. Close  to great restaurants and shopping. We can't say enough good things about The Pacific Inn, will definitely stay the next time we are in town.
Manager Response: Jill T,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works hard to ensure every guest feels right at home with us and leaves satisfied. Our atrium-style property and pool area provides the perfect amount of sunshine and breeze without ever leaving the hotel! Our close proximity to the beach and Main Street allow for endless amounts of dining, shopping,and ocean activities for the whole family. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: Had an amazing weekend with my sisters, celebrating a birthday.  Love this hotel, have stayed many times and never had a bad experience.  Would highly recommend to all. Just a short walk to the beach and shops/dining.
Manager Response: dgoller1,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within a short walk of both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options for guests to enjoy. Additionally, we offer a complimentary shuttle service anywhere within 5 miles for guests who wish to further explore the area! We are happy to hear that we have been your go-to Seal Beach destination over the years, and we look forward to seeing you on your next stay with us!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a great place to be able to relax and enjoy a wonderful time.  The pool and jacuzzi are well cared for.  The rooms are spacious and well decorated. The staff are incredibly helpful, pleasant and very knowledgeable of the area. Its proximity to the beach is unusual and it is a block from the main street of Seal Beach which is so small town friendly it is nuts!   There are two coffee shops within walking distance but the Pacific Inn has their own coffee brewing machine in the lobby that does a very passable latte and espresso.   I would highly recommend booking rooms here for your next window of time you can get away to Southern Cal.
Manager Response: Greg S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our close proximity to both the beach and Main Street make us the perfect Southern California destination year-round! We also offer a complimentary shuttle service anywhere within 5 miles, including Downtown Long Beach, for guests who wish to further explore the area. Our staff works hard to ensure each guest has a comfortable stay by delivering well-appointed rooms and facilities and excellent customer service. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: When we are in So Cal we always make it a point to stay at the Pacific Inn. We love the location since it is walkable to Old Town and the beach. We have been coming for 12 years and usually visit a few times a year. We love the waffles for breakfast, the pool and covered parking.
Manager Response: Sandra, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us over the last 12 years! Our location is very convenient for our guests, as we are walking distance to Seal Beach's shopping and dining, as well as the pier! We love providing our guests with complimentary amenities, including breakfast, shuttle service, parking and WiFi. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Had my house fumigated for termites, needed a local hotel that allows pets.   I love this place.  Great Location.  Great staff.   Great breakfast.  Room is huge with two balconies, jet tub and spacious layout.
Manager Response: Thomas, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad we could accommodate you and your pet with a room while your home was fumigated. It looks like you were upgraded into one of our newly renovated Executive Rooms. All of our rooms have balconies for our guests to enjoy, but a limited number our of rooms have two balconies. Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed one night while passing through the area. Seal Beach is a great place to spend a night and have dinner and maybe spend a little time on the beach. The staff at Pacific Inn are very friendly and welcoming. Our room was fine, clean, and what we expected for the price ($149.00 plus tax). Our door opened to the pool area, which can be a little noisy, but the pool closes at 10pm so no problem after that. The included breakfast provided a large selection of both hot and cold items which pleased us very much. The only suggestion I have for the hotel is to add to/update the number of electrical outlets available in the room for charging phones, etc. The outlet on the lamp base is too close to allow anything but the smallest usb charger. Sadly, without my realizing it until
Manager Response: buffalo52,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location allows guests to explore Main Street, the beach, and surrounding neighborhood all within walking distance! We are always working to improve our breakfast menu, and we appreciate your positive feedback. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding your room. We are in the process of renovating both our property and guestrooms, and have passed on your feedback to the management team. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: When I travel to California for business I always stay at the Pacific Inn. The hotel is just perfectly located with some nice bars and restaurants in walking distance for some evening entertainment. The staff is always very friendly and ready to help if required... I already look forward to my next stay here...
Manager Response: Remko v,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. With numerous bars, restaurants, shopping, and the beach within walking distance, our location cannot be beat for the perfect So Cal vacation. We are happy we continue to make The Pacific Inn your home away from home while you are on business. Our dedicated customer service works hard to ensure a great stay for every guest! We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Not a luxury property, but well run.  Nice employees, very clean, highly recommended.  Shuttle to local businesses.  Great local restaurants across the street.  Short walk to the beach, quaint downtown.  Rooms are clean, well maintained.
Manager Response: h0ward280,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach; additionally, our complimentary shuttle service travels anywhere within 5 miles, including Downtown Long Beach. With well-appointed rooms and excellent customer service, our staff works hard to ensure each guest leaves satisfied. We appreciate your review, and look forward to seeing you again the next time you are in the area.

Summary Heading: 4 night stay in seal beach CA
Summary: the pacific inn accomodation was very good with a prime location to seal beach ans the rest of orange county, just off the pacific coast highway. good value, light breakfast with a very small indoor dunk pool and spa. only critism is there was no safe in the room
Manager Response: gagesNo1,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located a few blocks from both Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier, as well as a short drive from many Orange County destinations. Our complimentary hot breakfast is offered daily, and our atrium style pool area is the perfect place to relax whiel catching some sunshine. For your future reference, there are safe deposit boxes available at the front desk for small items; these are free to use for the duration of your stay! We appreciate your positive review, and look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area.

Summary: Our group of 6 booked this hotel based on several different factors, including the marks on TripAdvisor.  We also needed vehicle parking while we were on a 14-day cruise, and a home base while we went sightseeing in the Long Beach/Anaheim/Seal Beach/Los Angeles area for several days beforehand.    I am so glad we found this place!  While it's an older hotel it has definitely been updated.  The rooms were boutique hotel chic, with lovely amenities, huge showers, and balconies to enjoy; the guest service desk personnel were super helpful,  and the breakfast was always hot, fresh and very very good!    My only small complaint is that with a large amount of tile in the room,  it feels echo-y and loud.  If we get back to California,  we'll be back to The Pacific Inn.
Manager Response: Gypsywych,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and we are glad to hear we helped make your vacation comfortable and seamless. We have been undergoing both property and room renovations to provide the most modern and enjoyable accommodations as possible, and we appreciate your positive feedback. With our convenient location, excellent customer service, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and shuttle service, The Pacific Inn is a go-to destination in Orange County. We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to the area!

Summary: Pacific Inn Seal Beach  We were travelling with friends and staying just the one night in this hotel.   In the lobby it was clear renovations were in progress, areas were covered in polythene and workmen were assembling a sideboard.  We checked in and were given adjacent rooms to our friends.  We were very disappointed with what we found, for example a frayed and stained carpet, unfilled screw holes in the walls, scratched dark furniture not placed against the walls which left little room at the end of the bed and dreary decor.  We then saw our friends room which had clearly been refurbished, it was a lot brighter with fitted white furniture, painted walls with carpet tiles and a refurbed bathroom.  As we were paying the same price for both rooms ($160 each for the night) we
Manager Response: Jakey15,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We would like to apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. In order to keep our property updated and functional for our guests, we have been undergoing both lobby and room renovations in the recent months. Our lobby renovations have nearly concluded, and our new modern look has been a hit with our guests. Based on previous room blocks, bookings, and requests, we may randomly upgrade reservations the day of arrival in order to utilize our inventory as efficiently as possible. We initially placed your parties as near to each other as possible for your convenience; due to this, one of the rooms happened to be an upgraded room type, our Executive King. Upgrades do not happen solely based on our occupancy, and is most often a random process. In addition, your party was informed of their complimentary upgrade upon check-in. In order to guarantee an upgraded room, it is essential to book the desired room type at the upgraded rate, as complimentary upgrades are random. However, for the convenience of your entire party we were able to move you into an upgraded room free of charge as well. We appreciate your feedback on our breakfast selection, and would like to note that our paper products are eco-friendly and recyclable. As for your charges, we do take the full payment upon check-in, where your party was informed of the total stay charge. The difference you are seeing in room rate versus final charge is simply state and tourism taxes, which we list on your registration card upon check-in as well as your online confirmation. As the two rooms were booked separately, it is possible one of them was booked at a different rate.   We are glad to hear you enjoyed our shuttle service and downtown location. Our staff strives to ensure each guest has an excellent stay, and we apologize that we fell short of your expectations. We hope you choose to stay with us again and allow us to remedy the issues you experienced.

Summary Heading: Friendly, comfortable.  Great place to stay near the beach.
Summary: I've been staying here every other week for 5 months - love it.  It's not a business hotel, but had everything I needed as a business traveler, plus a sweet beach community to walk in every night.  Many restaurants in walking distance.  Friendly, helpful staff.  Only once was the hotel crowded with a rather loud school group that crowded the breakfast room and pool area.  Would definitely stay here in the future.
Manager Response: Jwebred,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our property is perfect for both the business and leisure traveler, with a convenient location that cannot be beat! Our dedicated customer service team works hard to ensure every trip, even for business, is both comfortable and unique. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding a group staying with us. The Pacific Inn hosts various guests and groups throughout the year, and we do our best to maintain our standards of excellence during each group's visit. We are so glad we have been able to accommodate you for your business travel needs, and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Close to the Beach, good Breakfast, Clean rooms, and the Park and sail options.
Summary: This little place was great, it had clean rooms, and was just a short walk to the pier. The staff was professional, helpful and friendly. We made use of their "Park and sail" deal, we stayed one night and left our car parked there while we went on a cruise ship. They provided a shuttle to and from our port. The only issue I had was the car-seat they provided in the shuttle was very dirty, old and most likely expired. I also had to install it as no one knew the proper way to secure it. Overall it was truly a great stay for a family on a budget. I do want to point out an employee that was extra helpful, unfortunately I do not remember his name. He was a tall slender man in his late 20's with curly hair. He made our stay seamless. Thank you!
Manager Response: Mandie S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to provide excellent customer service and well-appointed rooms in addition to our convenient beach location for your comfort and convenience. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities and we are glad we could help start your trip on a good note! We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding the car seat; our staff typically leaves proper installation up to the parents, who know what works best for their child. In addition, we have updated our current stock! Thank you for your kind words, and we hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary Heading: A Great Stay for Your Trip to Long Beach or Seal Beach
Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here one night for a long weekend getaway. The inn had everything we needed, including a good continental breakfast. Our room was nice, and we definitely enjoyed sitting on the balcony.  The best part about this inn is perhaps its location. We took an Uber from the inn to/from 2nd Street and another to/from Ballast Point, which cost less than $7 each ride.
Manager Response: Californiagirlkt, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and everything our property has to offer. All of our rooms have balconies, which allows every guest to enjoy the sunny Seal Beach weather! For future reference, we have a complimentary shuttle service that provides transportation to and from anywhere within a 5 mile radius of our property. These shuttles are first come, first served, but please feel free to utilize this amenity next time you stay! Thank you for your review. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed at the Pacific Inn in December 2017 while visiting L.A. and Disneyland. It was perfect! The location was great. The room was delightful. Well appointed, fresh and clean, and beds were comfy. The staff was friendly and helpful. I will definitely stay again and recommend to family and friends! This was a great find.
Manager Response: Mary S,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our central location allows guests to explore both the surrounding beach neighborhood and many Southern California destinations, such as Los Angeles and Huntington Beach. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service and well-appointed rooms for your comfort. We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit!

Summary: The staff was pleasant and accommodating.  We used the courtesy shuttle several times with great success.  The beds were comfortable.  The shower is very nice - instant hot water!  However, the sink in the bathroom did clog up on the last night.  And, I would recommend putting several hooks and/or towel bars in the bathroom.  There was nowhere to hang towels or swimsuits to dry.
Manager Response: Jarnel,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver excellent customer service and complimentary amenities for your convenience, such as hot breakfast and shuttle service. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced regarding any maintenance issues. Our team would have been happy to assist you with this if it were brought to our attention. Additionally, your feedback on the bathroom layout has been passed on to our team, and is appreciated! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: Partner and i stayed here in November 2017 to attend a sour beer fest at nearby Beachwood Brewery. We brought our dog and during check in, we were met with a bin of supplies to make our dog comfortable --including a cover to put over the couch in the room for our dog to be able to lay on couch.   Clean room ; accommodating staff and overall an excellent stay. It is walking distance to a quaint downtown Seal Beach and also the beach. The hotel breakfast had many options and was well stocked.   Dog owners--there is a small park across from hotel which was convenient for dog walks.
Manager Response: fishbulb321,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are one of the only pet-friendly properties in the area, and our staff goes above and beyond to make sure every type of guest feels welcome and comfortable! Our convenient location puts guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, with complimentary shuttle service within five miles as well! Our breakfast is a guest favorite, and we appreciate your feedback! We hope you choose to stay with us again should you return to the area.

Summary: This is our Go to place when we come visit our family.  The people are very friendly, the rooms are clean and the location is great. Just a few blocks from the beach and walking distance to great restaurants and shops on Main Street. we stay here 3 to 4 times a year and always feel like we are very welcome!
Manager Response: Joanne, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us! Customer service is our top priority. We want to ensure that every guest has a wonderful stay. Our location is very convenient, as we are walking distance from Seal Beach's Main Street and the pier! Our guests love to utilize our complimentary parking to walk around the city. We appreciate your review and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We again stayed at the Pacific Inn while visiting Southern CA. It is a great hotel, walking distance to all the restaurants and shops on Main St. in Seal Beach. The hotel is very reasonably priced and it has a pool, jacuzzi and free breakfast with a friendly and helpful staff. We often stay at the Pacific Inn when we are going to be in the area. I also really like it because it brings back memories of my days living in Seal Beach.
Manager Response: Mike, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Though we are a small property, we try our best to provide similar amenities to a larger property. We want every guest to have a wonderful stay with us. It is great to hear The Pacific Inn brings back memories of you living in Seal Beach. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Enjoyable walk to shops, pier and places to eat.  Town is mellow and bars are fun.  We have been there before and will go again.  The hotel/motel is clean and staff is friendly. A safe place to go with interesting sights to see.
Manager Response: zanna2,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location puts guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, while maintaining a quiet neighborhood feel. Our team strives to deliver excellent customer service and well-appointed rooms for your comfort and enjoyment. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

Summary: I loved the location. The room was not only comfortable and well-equipped, but had the cleanest bedding possible. The balcony was awesome with a chance to have nice fresh ocean air. The staff was also attentive, which is a little hard to find these days. Will be back for sure.
Manager Response: caroledavis66,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our open-air property and guest room balconies allow each guest to enjoy the California sunshine and ocean air. We are located only minutes from both Main Street and the beach, with numerous dining and shopping options as well! Our team works hard to deliver above and beyond customer service, well-appointed rooms, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast. We look forward to seeing you on your next stay!

Summary: We opened our door expecting usual hotel room layout and to our surprise we found a lovely one bedroom suite with huge bedroom and bathroom and wrap around deck. Central location but neighborhood feel and neighborhood quiet. Walking distance to Main ST and beach.  LOVED IT AND WILL RETURN  Cappuccino maker and chocolate chip cookies in lobby sea,Ed the deal!
Manager Response: rodsquad21,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location puts guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach, but maintains a quiet neighborhood feel for the perfect vacation! Our team strives to provide excellent customer service, complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast and evening refreshments, and renovated rooms for your comfort. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your upgraded room! We look forward to seeing you on your next stay!

Summary: All the positives mentioned in other reviews are all true... great staff, very friendly, nice rooms, great location. The remodeled bathrooms look great. The breakfast selections are good, even better is that they start at 5:30am! If you want to walk to Main St. just head out the back and it's only a couple of blocks to shops and restaurants. Seal Beach is a great little community to walk around in. I've been there twice in the last month for work and I'm headed back for another week soon, obviously I'll be staying  at the Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: vanwag,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to combine our above and beyond customer service and excellent location with complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast for your enjoyment. Downtown Seal Beach and the pier are only a short walk from our property, and we are happy to hear you took advantage of it! We look forward to continuing to accommodate you, for both business and leisure!

Summary: Stayed here the night before a cruise.  Even though there are many hotels closer to the Long Beach cruise port The Pacific Inn cannot be beat for value and comfort.  Had a great dinner on Main St. and viewed an absolutely gorgeous sunset at the beach.  Shuttle service to the cruise port was via a very comfortable van driven by a friendly young lady.  Next cruise it's definitely The Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: KennyE70,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Although located a short drive from the Long Beach cruise port, we are a popular destination for cruise guests! Our excellent customer service, convenient beach location, and complimentary amenities such as hot breakfast set us apart from other boutique hotels. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

Summary: We had occasion to stay recently prior to leaving on a cruise out of Long Beach. We had never been there before and yet were greeted like old friends. Parked under the hotel and were shuttled to the cruise port the following day. Our room was very clean, comfortable and quiet. I wish that I had taken pictures. Directly off the 1, and walking to anything you want within a quarter mile (try the cheese steak place across the street , a half is plenty). Breakfast of eggs, meats, waffles, plus continental items.. We had very nice and informative shuttle drivers. We will stay again
Manager Response: 1313karen.  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our Park & Cruise package is one of our most popular amenities, and we are happy to hear you had an excellent experience with our shuttle service! Our team strives to deliver above and beyond customer service, making every guest feel right at home. Our convenient location also provides for a short walk to dining, shopping, and the beach. We look forward to seeing you on your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Desk staff and shuttle driver very friendly and helpful
Summary: Room clean and spacious. Located close to the beach and Main street. Coffee in the lobby is delicious.  Hotel Shuttle very helpful especially for seniors. Receptionist, Nicole, is a treasure, very friendly and helpful regarding local restaurants, etc. The Jacuzzi was especially comforting after a long drive and time spent at the beach.
Manager Response: gramma2four,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location puts guests within minutes of Main Street, the beach, and numerous dining and shopping options. We pride ourselves on delivering excellent customer service and well-appointed rooms and facilities to ensure every guest has a unique and enjoyable experience. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit should you return to the area!

Summary: We have been staying at the Pacific Inn for the last 5 years, this time for a wedding.  Our entire group (8 rooms) loved the place.  Beach, shopping, restaurants, etc. are all walking distance from the hotel. What more can you ask?  I wouldn't stay anywhere else when visiting the Seal Beach area!
Manager Response: tmarkbarry,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our location is definitely one of our most popular features, especially for groups! Our complimentary shuttle service also takes guests anywhere within a 5-mile radius for those who want to further explore the area. We are happy to hear that we are your go-to Seal Beach destination, and look forward to  accommodating you for years to come!

Summary: Not much more you could ask for at the Pacific Inn in Seal Beach.  We are locals and love to hang out on Main Street so it was a no-brainer to stay at the Pacific Inn while our house was under maintenance.  The staff was super friendly and the hotel quiet and comfortable.  Free hot breakfast every morning was an added plus and in walking distance to many restaurants, shops and beach.  We even were able to bring our cats!  We will definitely recommend this to friends and family when they come to vacation!
Manager Response: Sheila C,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are the perfect location for those looking to experience all that Seal Beach has to offer, and we are glad we were able to accommodate you during your home maintenance! Our excellent customer service, complimentary hot breakfast, and pet-friendly property also make us a favorite in the area! We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

Summary: We spent a wonderful week at The Pacific Inn in early October.  This is the best little jewel in Seal Beach.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  The staff is warm, friendly and helpful.  My sink was a little loose and before I could even notify the front desk the cleaning staff had it taken care of it.  The patio is comfortable and has a bright enough light for sitting outside at night.  The furniture is comfortable and I love the little table.  The pool area is welcoming and always stocked with towels.  It is wheelchair accessible and the area is reachable by the elevator.  We stay here every time we come to CA, which is 3-4 times a year.  I always tell the staff that I could live here.  The warm cookies in the lobby around 4 are hot and delicious.  The king size bed has
Manager Response: rlipschutz,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We always appreciate your loyal patronage and kind words, and consider you part of the PI family! Our staff goes above and beyond to give every guest an outstanding and unique experience, and we are glad you have found a home away from home in us! We always look forward to your visits, and can't wait to see you again this holiday season!

Summary Heading: A very good location an excellent value.
Summary: My wife and I stayed for 2 nights.  We found our stay to be a very nice experience.  The staff is very nice and helpful.  The included breakfast was a pleasant surprise including the outstanding waffles.  The room was quiet comfortable and clean.  I can say that we were more than satisfied with our stay.  There was plenty of covered parking and there is an abundance of excellent restaurants in walking distance.
Manager Response: granpagh,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to deliver exceptional customer service, complimentary amenities such as daily hot breakfast and parking, and well-appointed rooms for your comfort. Our downtown beach location is a guest favorite as well! We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Sea Beach area!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is really a very cool retro feel beach town inn.  The rooms are clean and comfortable and for a few $ extra, the "executive" rooms have been updated recently and are really nice.  Simple but good free breakfast and for weekend brunch, one is only a few minutes walk to all the great restaurants on Main Street.  The location is tops and the people who work here are very caring and kind.  We stay here several times a year and would not think of staying anywhere else.  For families, it has a nice pool on the second floor roof/courtyard that is safe and clean.
Manager Response: Dan B,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are dedicated to providing exceptional customer service for each and every guest. Our Executive rooms are a newly renovated guest favorite, and we are glad to hear it met your expectations! Our complimentary breakfast, beach location, and open-air pool area are just a few of our guest amenities. We look forward to seeing you on you next stay!

Summary: This was the first time we had stayed at the Pacific Inn and found it enjoyable.  The location is great as it is within blocks of shops, restaurant and bars. Our room was comfortable but they definitely need updating.  The only disappointing thing was that 5 couples were staying 4 nights each and all going to the Hyatt for a wedding.  We asked if the shuttle could take us and were told it was too far away.
Manager Response: sharonhX2539FE,  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our convenient location puts guests within walking distance of both Main Street and the beach! We are currently in the process of renovating our guestrooms to provide the most modern accommodations for our guests. We apologize for not being able to shuttle you to your destination; a this time, we only service within a 5-mile radius. We look forward to seeing you on your next stay!

Summary: Jacuzzi tub, microwave, fridge, good breakfast.  Best of all a shuttle from our Carnival cruise to hotel and then hotel to Long Beach Airport. No car needed.  We could walk to downtown and the beach in 5 minutes.  We remembered Tiana from our stay two years ago. This beats a chain motel for sure.  All quality people at the desk.
Manager Response: Andrini, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and that you were able to utilize our Park and Cruise Package! We have limited availability for our packages, so the sooner these are booked the better! Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed in the Pacific Inn in 2008 visiting from Ireland.  A family wedding brought us back last week and no hesitation in choosing our hotel.  Convenient to Main Street and my sisters house in Seal Beach.  Very friendly staff, breakfast buffet - a really convenient way to start the day, such a relaxed atmosphere in the hotel and of course the cookies - a big hit with my daughter!
Manager Response: CPTIRE, thank you for choosing The Pacific inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us! We are a very small property and want every guest to feel like we are their home away from home! We try to provide as many amenities as possible to ensure our guests have the most enjoyable stay. We are so glad to hear your feedback on our location, staff, breakfast and cookies! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Returned for the 2nd time!!! Enjoy the location,close to the beach and main street. Short  walk to main street which has many restaurants and watering holes! Walts Warf is excellent for fresh seafood. The staff is friendly and the rooms clean. a small balcony is available for each room. FRESH GROUND COFFEE MACHINE IN THE LOBBY for unlimited refils. We will be back a 3rd time!!!
Manager Response: Gregory, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you chose to stay with us for a 2nd time! Walt's Warf is definitely one of our favorites! Their seafood is to die for! We appreciate your feedback on our staff, rooms, and coffee machine. We are looking forward to seeing you for you 3rd stay!

Summary Heading: We come a few times a year to the Pacific Inn.
Summary: Love that we can walk to beach and town. Also family can drop in to visit and bring their dog. Staff is incredibly nice and helpful.  Breakfast buffet is nice way to start day.  Rooms very clean. Evening cookies are a friendly touch.
Manager Response: Vvsw, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our location is extremely convenient, being that it is just a short walk from dining, shopping, eating and the Seal Beach Pier! We appreciate your feedback on our staff, breakfast, rooms, and cookies! We are hoping to see you again!

Summary: Awesome location, very friendly staff. The rooms are the best & breakfast is great! The Pacific Inn is the best place to stay! I would recommend the Pacific Inn whether it's pleasure or business.  Very short walk to Seal Beach Main St. and to the beach. Great location for what ever your plans may be. Will definitely be back to visit.
Manager Response: Deb, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service and we want all our guests to have a wonderful stay. Our property hosts many guests for leisure and business alike. Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: nice hotel... staff is always very accommodating and friendly...close to main street, pier n beach... little park area across from hotel...fast food across the street and several more restaurants on main street..hotel offers free transportation up to 5 miles away, reservations required...clean rooms👍... we love this place and look forward to our next visit!
Manager Response: Cheryl I, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your positive feedback regarding our shuttle service, rooms, and staff. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and we are pleased you had an excellent experience! Our downtown location puts guests only minutes from many dining and shopping options, as well as the beach! We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

Summary: We stay here whenever we are in Long Beach.  They have the best staff and it just feels like a home away from home. Walk to the beach, Seal Beach has great restaurants, shopping and a small town feel. They are just the best!
Manager Response: 583pam, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff strives to provide each guest with a unique experience and deliver above and beyond customer service. Our location is definitely a guest favorite, and we are glad you enjoyed it! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place, excellent location, will be going back
Summary: What a great place. This used to be Temple' s Nursery years ago. Great staff, let us check in early. We had a 2nd floor room. Elevator and stairs. Quiet, well kept, great staff, FABULOUS location. So worth staying here though it is an older hotel. Easy to get there from John Wayne Airport. Easy parking. Thank you for having us. We will be back.
Manager Response: Kpoulson, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We try our best to accommodate as many early check-ins as we can/ Thank you for your feedback on our property, staff and location. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms and we are constantly looking for ways to improve our property. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Great place, great value. Walking distance to the major spots in town and to the pier/beach. Comfortable room, great amenities. Good breakfast. Only downside, a bit noisy in the morning as rush hour gets going.
Manager Response: Kcrossin317, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you you enjoyed your stay with us. If you have any issues with noise during your stay, please let the front desk know. Someone is here 24 hours a day to assist you. We appreciate your feedback and are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Nice staff. Close to food places and beach. McDonald's and Taco Bell just across the street plus other sit down restaurants.  Convenient location to Seal Beach. Love the Starbucks machine in the lobby. Good size room, we stayed in a room with 2 queen size beds. Nice white lighting. I prefer white bulbs vs the incandescent yellow lighting. Makes the room brighter.  Clean sheets, has TV, microwave, refrigerator, hair dryer, iron. Free parking, wifi and breakfast. Breakfast includes sausage, eggs, potatoes, make your own waffles  and the usual assorted breads, muffins, cereals, juice, coffee, teas. My only negative comment which is not a big deal is a stain in the bathtub. I thought it's dirty and tried to clean it but it's actually stain. Because of the stain, it looks dirty and
Manager Response: Lili892, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are in the process of switching all our in-room lights to soft white LED lighting. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed the new lighting! We would like to express our sincerest apologies for the stain on your bathtub. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms. We will be replacing all the tubs in the near future. We appreciate your feedback and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Pretty great for the price you pay! Walking distance to the pier, beach and tons of great restaurants on Main Street. There is a pool, hot tub and breakfast is provided. Breakfast is more hearty than continental with sasuage, omelettes, waffles  And other snacks. Room is comfortable, towels are soft and AC is chilly. Good Pick!
Manager Response: Brandye, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Within the past few years, we updated our entire breakfast room to include continental breakfast items, hot food items, and dietary restricted food options. We want every guest to enjoy our breakfast even if they may have a dietary restriction. Our property location is a guest-favorite, as we are walking distance from Main Street, which houses many local shops, restaurants and the Seal Beach Pier! Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Business in Long Beach dictated a convenient location and we found a clean, quiet, ideally located hotel here.  The staff was extremely pleasant and helpful, immediately coming to the room to reset the TV when we called.  The room was very clean and comfortable with a large bathroom and great shower.  Breakfast was nicely presented and had a nice choice of items.  We did not use the pool or hot tub but many did until the 10 pm closing.
Manager Response: Sandyarnie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We want all of our guests to have an enjoyable stay. If anyone experiences a problem with their room or their stay, we will attend to it right away to find a solution. We appreciate your feedback on our staff, room, and breakfast. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: This was our third time staying at the Pacific Inn.  The rooms are spacious and comfortable.  The waffles at breakfast are delicious.  I LOVE the Bath and Body Works shampoo, conditioner, body wash and lotion.  Convenient walk to the beach and all of downtown Seal Beach.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dpschuessler, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We recently changed our bathroom amenities to Bath and Body Works. We are so glad you liked them! Thank you for your feedback on our property. We try our absolute best to ensure every guest has an enjoyable stay. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We manage to book a room annually at the Pacific Inn and enjoy our stay immensely.  There's everything you need---attentive staff, plenty of parking, pretty quiet rooms for a beach town location, close to everything.  Have been staying here for decades.  You will be happy to have been there!
Manager Response: Vicki, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us each year. Our guests love our location due to it being walking distance from so many local attractions. Some guests will take advantage of our complimentary parking and not even move their car during their stay! We also have a complimentary shuttle service that can take our guests anywhere within a 5 mile radius of our property. We try to provide as many amenities as possible for our guests. Thank you for your review. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Okay, I travel only for fun and relaxation. The Pacific Inn certainly takes care of that! Located two, maybe three, blocks from town, it a perfect spot to get away.  The staff and crew do a fabulous job of taking care of the property and YOU😍
Manager Response: Drew, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad enjoyed your stay with us. We are in a prime location in Seal Beach, just a few blocks away from Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier. We are the only property in Seal Beach that is walking distance from the beach. We greatly appreciate your feedback, and are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: This is my third year staying at this hotel, and every experience has been a pleasant one. The staff is very friendly and willing to go out there way to make your stay a great experience. The hotel is also located in a great area within walking distance of nice restaurants and the beach.
Manager Response: Westnext2002, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us over the past three years. We pride ourselves on our customer service. We believe that great customer service really makes a difference to the experience of a guest. Thank you for your review. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We were in town for a family birthday event and stayed for five nights. This is a very pleasant place to stay, and the location cannot be beat! Staff are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean; in fact the entire property is well-cared for. The breakfast is much better than at most hotels. The pool area is very nice. Great place!! Please don't make any changes!!  Oh, and animals are welcome. We didn't have ours with us, but we would have brought them if we didn't live so far away.
Manager Response: Seewater2017, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our property to ensure all guests have an enjoyable stay. We are currently in the process of renovating our lobby, breakfast room and all our guest rooms. We are the only pet friendly hotel in the area, and the park behind our property makes our location prime for our guests with furry friends! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Our entire room was very clean with plenty of towels and toiletries. Staff was very friendly and helpful. The pool, hot tub, patio furnishings in the open air lounge patio are inviting and relaxing. It's close to the beach and exciting Main Street with great shops and restaurants. We stay at Pacific Inn every year, and plan to continue our stay for many more years to come!
Manager Response: LoveZ2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us each year. We try our best to provide as many complimentary amenities to our guests, including WiFi, breakfast, parking, and shuttle transportation. We want every guest to have an enjoyable stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and are looking forward to seeing you next year!

Summary: Loved the hotel. Beds were very comfortable, room was clean as well as the bathroom. Close to the beach and attractions. We stayed on the second floor, but was too close to the pool area and a little noisy. Other than that, great place.
Manager Response: Marcia, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. If you are ever bothered by noise or any other aspects of our property, please let us know. We want every guest to have a wonderful stay and will do our absolute best to ensure this happens. Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed at the pacific in for two nights and loved it. Great location, right next to the beach. Will stay again.  The staff was very pleasant and helpful. They assisted me with directions to the local venues.
Manager Response: Adam, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service and want to ensure every guest has a wonderful stay. We welcome guests to ask us any questions they may need answers to and we will do our best to assist. Thank you for your review. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Everyone was so nice and helpful.  The set up of this hotel is different and very pleasing to the eye..Our room was great and also enjoyed the pool and Jacuzzi !!! Delicious breakfast on the third floor.  Lots of breakfast goodies to choose from!!!
Manager Response: Tmattymc2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are an atrium-style property, meaning that our rooms surround our pool area, which is in the middle of our property on our second floor. Each guest can enjoy quick access to the pool as well as their outside balcony. Thank you for your feedback on our breakfast menu. We want every guest to find a food option they will enjoy. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We love this little hotel!! It is clean, quiet, and very affordable!! It is the perfect spot for a weekend getaway!! This hotel is in an awesome location!! It is within walking distance to main street, where you will find some great restaurants and cute little shops. Also within walking distance is the pier and the beach!! Great hotel!!
Manager Response: Calimom2017, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our location is definitely a guest-favorite! Our guests love walking to Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier. Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Upon arrival we met a woman name Nicole who was very accomadating and sweet. We asked if we could swith our king size bedroom with a double queen but unfortunaly she could not switch but after speaking with her manager she switched our room to a suite. We had a wonderful evening and a super breakfast in the morning. We enjoyed the pool as well as the jacuzzi and even took advantage of the weight /fitness room. We have stayed with the Pacific Inn once becore and we will come back again as it was a wonderful experience, thank you so much.
Manager Response: Sabrina, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad we were able to complimentary upgrade you to a suite to accommodate your needs. We try our best to fulfill every guest request that comes our way. Thank you for utilizing our pool area and fitness room! Though we are a small, boutique property, we try to provide as many amenities as a larger property would. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: AWESOME HOTEL SO CLOSE TO THE BEACH
Summary: We recently visited this hotel on a family outing. First, the staff was very courteous and helpful. Second, our room was very clean and we were pleasantly surprised at how nice it was. And the private balcony was great. Third, the breakfast was a "real" breakfast not just donuts and drinks. It was fully replenished and very good. We had such a wonderful restful experience and the price for "at the beach hotel" was very reasonable. With the beach and food in walking distance and the wonderful stay, we will DEFINATELY return:)
Manager Response: Philvernon53, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your feedback on our staff, location, rooms and breakfast! We pride ourselves on our customer service. We want every guest to have a wonderful stay. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Very clean and quiet, even thou its on a busy highway. Walking distance to shops and restaurants, and the ocean, safe area. Comfortable bed, and pillows. Only shower in our room, Typical hotel breakfast. Small pool inside. Nice staff. Will return
Manager Response: Fertues, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We have a few rooms on our property with tubs. If you would like a room with a tub in the future, we would be more than happy to put in that request for you. We greatly appreciate your feedback and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: While recently visiting Seal Beach for a romantic getaway, we decided to stay at the Pacific Inn because of its proximity to the beach, Old Town, and Main Street.  It was our first time at this hotel and we were hoping it would meet our needs for comfort, beauty, and affordability. We were not disappointed.  The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room was great and very affordable, and the location was a dream come true.  The ambiance was very beachy and you could smell the ocean fragrance from the pool and balcony.  And as an extra bonus, the free breakfast was the best we'd ever had at a hotel. This is the ONLY hotel in the beach area and so we were so glad it was such a great experience.  We can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Gregandlaura0415, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. We pride ourselves on our customer service and want to do everything we can to ensure each guest has an enjoyable stay. Thank you for your feedback on our breakfast room! We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast room and menu so any and all feedback is appreciated! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is the perfect place to stay to get away from the heat.  It is a convenient location only a few blocks from the beach and within a few minutes of walking distance to Main Street.  The hotel staff is extremely helpful and friendly.  The rooms are clean and spacious and the rooms have a balcony that you can sit out on and enjoy the beautiful weather.  A continental breakfast of hot and cold selections are served each morning, free Wi-Fi, parking, great pool/hot tub.  Just the perfect place for those of us who want a quiet get-a-way in a charming beach town.
Manager Response: Kim, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Though we are a small, boutique property, we provide as many amenities as possible for our guests. We want each of our guests to have a wonderful stay! Our location is definitely a guest-favorite! Because we are walking distance from many local attractions, our guests can use our complimentary parking lot and walk everywhere during their stay! Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: A nice cozy hotel. They offered free cancellation until the day before check in which was great cause our plans were not confirmed until that day. It was one of the very few hotels that offered free breakfast, WiFi, parking and shuttle anywhere within 5 miles radius. Location is 5-10 mins walk to downtown and beach which is great. Beds are comfy. Would definitely come back.
