Manager Response: Jihan, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Though we are a small property, we provide many of the amenities of a larger hotel. We want every guest to have a wonderful stay. We appreciate your feedback and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This cool little mom and pop hotel, is centrally located in Seal Beach. An easy walk to the main drag, and the beach.  It is very clean. Nice balconies on the rooms, cool interior atrium pool and hot tub makes it particularly nice for families and groups.  Definitely would stay here again!
Manager Response: NASAgirl67, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Each of our rooms has a balcony for guests to enjoy. Though we are not tall enough to see the ocean, we are just a short walk from Seal Beach's Main Street as well as the pier and beach! We appreciate your feedback and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This was an excellent hotel! I was in Long Beach to teach two days of re-certification classes. I found this hotel on Expedia and decided to give it a try. I was not disappointed!!! It was very close to Main St. in Seal Beach, CA. Good restauranst, quaint shops to explore and walking distance to the Seal Beach Pier. I will definitely stay at this hotel again!  Ray
Manager Response: Lauohana123, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you found our property on Expedia and decided to stay with us! Our location is just one reason why our guests love staying with us. Though we are smaller boutique hotel, we offer many of the amenities of a larger hotel. We provide complimentary breakfast, WiFi and parking to all guests. We appreciate your feedback and are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Nice hotel in a perfect location to enjoy the Main Street of seal beach and the seaside as well as major shopping and chain restaurant eating. This place has everything u need. Balcony with a little clothes line for your swimwear and towels, cool pool, warm hot tub in a neat open air atrium setting, waffles at breakfast, free parking, pet friendly, dog walk park right out the back door of the hotel. You need to stay here. Staff was friendly and the price wasn't unreasonable for everything you get. They also accommodated our change in plans and need for an additional night stay at the hotel. That's right we loved it so much we wanted more!
Manager Response: Meken, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, which is just a short walk from Downtown Seal Beach's Main Street and the pier. We are also just a short drive from Long Beach's Belmont Shore. Thank you for your feedback on our staff, pool area, and breakfast room. We want all our guests to have a wonderful stay. We greatly appreciate your review! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We enjoy staying in Seal Beach and this hotel is located very close to Main Street. The room was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed looking out the balcony and catching a cool sea breeze. The atmosphere is relaxed without a stuffy feel. Perfect weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Roxanne, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Though it has been hot the past few months, we are located so close to the beach that our guests get to enjoy the cool breeze from the ocean. Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: I used to live in the Seal Beach area and there is nothing better than to be able to walk down to the Main Street area and experience the shops, restaurants, and of course the beach and pier. Although, I had choices this place is perfect for that feeling of feeling like you are a local. It is an older hotel, but well kept and the staff is very friendly. Seal Beach is also known as Mayberry by The Sea, a quaint friendly atmosphere. So if you are looking for a nice getaway there is nothing more perfect.
Manager Response: Candy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed staying with us. Our location is definitely a main reason why guests stay with us, as we are walking distance from many local attractions. We appreciate your feedback and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We've been staying at The Pacific Inn each time we visit southern California.  It is located within walking distance of the main street in Seal Beach and the beach.  The hotel is really nice and the staff is very friendly, professional, and accommodating. The free hot breakfast is far better than most and is available seven days per week. And don't forget to look for the free cookies in the lobby in the late afternoon.
Manager Response: Lightrays, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us! We pride ourselves on our customer service and want every guest to have a wonderful stay! Thank you for your feedback on our staff and breakfast room. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast menu. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This place was friendly accommodating and the breakfast the staff prepared was wonderful it felt like home. It's very close to the beach and restaurants so you can easily walk they also have a wonderful Thai restaurant next door
Manager Response: FieraHatfield, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are a boutique property and want all of our guests to feel at-home when they stay with us. Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Love the Pacific Inn.  It is one of my favorite places to go. A wonderful getaway place at the beach. The hotel is walking distance from pier and restaurants.  Staff is always nice and rooms clean and spacious. Parking is free.
Manager Response: Zanna2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, which is just a short walk away from Main Street's dining and shopping district. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location, clean, comfortable, free hot breakfast, plenty of parking
Summary: Room was clean, free hot breakfast, free plentiful parking, helpful reception desk, great location in Seal Beach, walkable to everything, quiet, safe location. Microwave, coffee machine and large bar refrigerator in the room, free Starbucks coffee and hot chocolate at reception. Recommend Seal Beach, was the first time we visited, and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Fuifuimoimo i, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Thank you for your feedback. Though we are a small, boutique property, we try to provide as many amenities as a larger hotel. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and chose to stay at our property for your first time in Seal Beach! We hope you choose to stay with us again should your travel plans take you back to the Seal Beach area!

Summary: My mom and planned a trip to Seal Beach and this hotel was in a great location.  The parking is free and convenient. The front desk agent was very nice and offered us cookies and coffee.  They met our request for an ADA room and the agent at the desk brought up the shower stool herself.  So nice!   We had a nice balcony where we relaxed a bit.  The pool furniture was very comfortable too, We sat out there for a few hours after the complimentary breakfast. I was a nice place to relax.  Very enjoyable!
Manager Response: MrsK45963, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We offer complimentary Starbucks and freshly baked cookies everyday! Our treats are definitely a guest-favorite! Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Whenever I'm in town I find myself staying here. It's like a mini vacation. Location is great, service is one of the best, rooms are always updated and comfortable. I recently stayed in one of their newly renovated rooms and they continue to raise the bar. Well worth a stay if you want a mini getaway or you're in town. If you like sweets, their cookies(when available) are to die for. You won't regret giving this place a try. I will continue to stay here whenever I'm in town.
Manager Response: Valued Guest, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. As we are a boutique property, we want all our guests to feel at-home when they are staying with us. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms. Our freshly-baked cookies are definitely a guest favorite and are put out daily around 5pm. They tend to go quickly! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We spent a great week in Seal Beach visiting our children who live in Long Beach.  We make this trip quite often and always stay at The Pacific Inn.  It is my favorite little hotel.  The staff is always friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and comfortable with everything you could possibly need.  The breakfast room is well kept and has a great variety of foods.  The homemade waffles are delicious. There are always plenty of copies of USA Today.  Victoria is friendly and keeps the area clean and well stocked.  She always has a pleasant greeting for the guests.  I always love to sit by the pool and relax.  The area is clean and well maintained.  The furniture is comfy and there are plenty of towels.  My grandson loves to visit the pool and go to the well stocked vending
Manager Response: Rlipschutz, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. It is always great to see you! Thank you for your feedback on our breakfast, rooms, and property. We appreciate all feedback, as we are constantly trying to change and improve our property to ensure every guest has a wonderful stay. We are looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Seal Beach area!

Summary: Love this hotel.  Great staff.  Great location. Love the continental breakfast, fresh, tons of choices.  Have stayed at this hotel numerous times.  Will not stay anywhere else when visiting Seal Beach.  5 Stars.
Manager Response: Dgoller1, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your feedback on our staff, location, and breakfast! We want each of our guests to have a wonderful stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The staff and environment are friendly. Free parking is a plus. Walking distance to the beach and in a nice location.  Our room was clean but noisy and feels "old." Overall hotel looks tired which is how we felt after dealing with noise. The doors on our room didn't seal so every sound came into the room.  If you are looking for rest, consider a top level room or alternate hotel.
Manager Response: Kathy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We would like to express our sincerest apology for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay regarding noise and your room. If any guest has an issue with their room, we welcome them to come to the front desk to express their concerns. We will do whatever we can to remedy the issue, whether that's making repairs to a room, switching a guest's room, etc. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms. We are including an increase in insulation during these renovations to ensure our guests are not disturbed by noise. We appreciate your feedback. We hope you choose to stay with us again should your travel plans take you back to the Seal Beach area!

Summary: We stayed for one night before taking a cruise out of Long Beach. Our room was clean and comfortable. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful. And, the breakfast was fantastic! The hotel has a great location and is only a few blocks away from the beach. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Carolyn, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast menu. Please let us know if there is anything we could have done to improve your stay with us. We appreciate all feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: The only place we stay in SoCal!
Summary: We love staying at The Pacific Inn because of the location to Main Street in Seal Beach and because of the staff's awesome customer service.  They are SO accommodating and friendly.  We travel a lot and arrive at all hours; they always seem to find us an open room.  The breakfast is outstanding!  The jacuzzi/pool is absolutely perfect.  We really cannot say enough about this place.  Being so close to Main Street allows us to park our car and walk to dinner, shop on Main Street and enjoy the beach.  Bonus: It's perfectly priced.  Thank you to The Pacific Inn!
Manager Response: Kiddohana, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We try our best to accommodate early check-ins whenever we can. We pride ourselves on our customer service. We want to ensure that every guest has a wonderful stay! Thank you for  your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I was simply looking for an okay hotel south of L.A. as a pit stop, and I happened upon The Pacific Inn. What a hidden gem! The outside is a bit plain, but the rooms are awesome. The staff was super friendly, too. This was one of the nicer hotels I stayed in, and I do plan to return as I'm in L.A. fairly regularly.
Manager Response: Meegerzeb, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you found our property and enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service. We want every guest to have a wonderful stay with us. We hope to see you again when you are back in the LA area!

Summary: Great breakfast, location, and service. Rooms have great a lovely balcony. Highly recommend this place to stay. I can't wait to go back to be honest and I know my friend would agree. Did I mention the breakfast is free?
Manager Response: Sarah, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Though we are a smaller boutique property, we try to offer as many amenities as possible including complimentary WiFi, breakfast, parking and shuttle service. Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed twice at this hotel in the past month for two different trips. The Pacific Inn is a place we'd highly recommend. If you plan to visit Seal beach, the hotel is within a few blocks of the beach. There are many quaint shops and restaurants in the area.  The hotel room is clean, modern, and comfortable. The pool and hot tub are clean and enjoyable. There is wheelchair accessibility for the pool as well. Parking is plentiful and free. The staff are always pleasant and eager to answer any questions.
Manager Response: Shannon, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our property is the closest to the beach in all of Seal Beach. Our guests can easily enjoy the pier and the beach, as well as all the shopping and dining on Main Street. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms and we are constantly looking for ways to improve our property. Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We searched for a hotel in Seal Beach and came up with The Pacific Inn. It's small, intimate and the staff are wonderful. The rooms are small but seem recently updated. Everything we needed was available. We called to say the air conditioner wasn't working. In just a couple of minutes the fixit guy was there, checked out the one in our room, realized that it was a power problem for the hotel and took care of it. I also called the desk with a question about the coffeemaker and got a fast helpful response.
Manager Response: Susan, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service. If a guest has an issue with their room, we are quick to send maintenance for assistance. We are more than happy to answer any questions our guests have, as we want to ensure each guest has a wonderful stay! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: exceptional.  the staff are friendly and the atmosphere is calming.  Very quiet.  We have been there twice and each time was the greatest.  Very easy check in and employees asked if we needed help.  We will be back.
Manager Response: Rebecca, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service and want to ensure every guest leaves happy! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Awesome inn, great service! Would definitely stay again and do. Come back each summer to spend time with the family. Great location and friendly service:) We look forward to our stay each year and it's always a blast!
Manager Response: Jacquelyn, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us each summer! We appreciate your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you next year!

Summary: We were going on a cruise out of Long Beach and I was looking for a place where I could leave my car and be shuttled over to the cruise port.... well we found this hotel that offered just what we needed. Rooms are Remodeled ( I believe all rooms are king size beds) the staff is super friendly, they offer a great continental breakfast and secured covered parking. Rates are very reasonable for seal beach. We will definitely stay ther again....note to management  find a way to keep families w / little ones on the second floor, we were on the second floor and a family w kids on the 3 floor above us just let there kids run back and forth and we could here it in the evening and early morning a bit annoying when trying to sleep.
Manager Response: Munchman57, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad we were able to accommodate you with our Park & Cruise Package. We have a variety of room types ranging from standard rooms with one king size bed or two queen size beds, newly renovated rooms, as well as one - two room suites. If you ever have any issues with noise or your room, please inform the front desk. We will not hesitate to get the issue amended as quickly as we can. We appreciate your feedback and suggestions. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: From registration to check-out, this facility was first class all the way!  Room accommodation was great, amenities were super, the front desk staff incredibly helpful!   We enjoyed our day before the cruise experience, we decided to stay an additional three days after returning from the cruise!  Can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Cmkratky, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and decided to stay additional nights after your cruise. We pride ourselves on our customer service, as we want each of our guests to leave satisfied and happy! Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Very nice, clean and modern room!
Summary: I chose to book The Pacific Inn due to an error in my flight itinerary which required me to stay in the Long Beach area for an additional day after my cruise. I was not expecting the high level of service, the friendliness of the employees, nor the upgraded rooms, as they were the lowest price I could find in the area. My stay was excellent! The free breakfast was better than some 5-star hotels I've frequented. I cannot think of anything bad to say about this place. I highly recommend this place! - Jennifer Scott-Hawthorne
Manager Response: MrsHawthorne77, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad we were able to accommodate you with a room after your flight error. We pride ourselves on our customer service. Thank you for your feedback on our breakfast menu. Though our breakfast is complimentary, we want to make sure our breakfast items are enjoyable to all guests. Therefore, we provide cold items, hot items, as well as gluten free items. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: My mother and I stayed here recently when joining a large group for a cruise. The hotel is very easy to find. It is close enough to the main road in town to walk to, but far enough away to be away from too much activity.   The staff is very friendly and the hotel is clean. The only part of the building on ground level is the lobby, the rest is parking. You can't get on the stairs without a key card, and you can't get on the elevator without walking right next to the front desk. I liked that extra layer of security.   The hotel is built around a small pool on the second floor, which is open to the outside. The rooms are down a hallway that has a door that can be closed to the weather.   The room was very comfortable. The bedding and pillows were high quality and so soft! We were
Manager Response: Jennifer, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback. The majority of our bathroom doors are sliding, which allows for a greater amount of usable space in our rooms. We want our guests to have as much walking space as possible. All of our rooms have balconies so our guests can enjoy the sunny weather in Seal Beach! Our balcony lights are for safety reasons, as they not only light our balconies but the walkway around our property. Our Park and Cruise package is very popular with our guests. For just a small fee of $10, our guests will receive guaranteed transportation to and from the Carnival Cruise Port in Long Beach, as well as 7 days of complimentary parking. Availability is limited for this package, so we would definitely recommend making a reservation in advance! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Arrived early but they fixed the room for us. Room was not big but very clean and comfortable. Same as pool area. Spa and the pool was great!  Breakfast was ok (American standard), kids loved their waffles. Short walking distance to Seal beach and nice restaurants nearby. Overall a very lovely stay, friendly staff and clean hotel. Would come again.
Manager Response: Susan, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback. We are in the process of upgrading all our rooms to ensure we are optimizing the space in each room. If you are ever interested in this room type, please ask the front desk about our Executive Rooms. Our property is conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach. Our guests get the luxury of taking the short walk to Main Street to enjoy the pier, shopping, dining, etc. We are the only property within walking distance to Downtown Seal Beach. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed overnight when visiting friends. The room is clean. The breakfast is basic but good. You won't leave hungry. I had a roadside room and it still wasn't too noisy. It's a good location, near the water, shops and bars. There's a Walgreens across the street and Taco Bell & McDonalds next door.
Manager Response: KhunBilly, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Thank you for your feedback. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast menu. We have recently upgraded our breakfast room to feature continental breakfast options, hot food, as well as dietary restricted food items. Even though our property is located close to Pacific Coast Highway, we are tucked behind the busy street. Therefore, our property is very quiet. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: This is the perfect hotel for visiting Seal Beach and Long Beach. Not only is the hotel comfortable with nicely updated rooms, the location just can't be beat. A 10 minute walk to downtown Seal Beach and a 10 minute drive to Long Beach's Belmont Shore. 15 minutes to downtown Long Beach.
Manager Response: Tplproperties, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback. Our property is conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach. As you mentioned, we are just a short walk to Main Street, as well as a short drive to either Long Beach or Huntington Beach. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Absolutely loved staying here.  First, it is clean.  Second, the location is awesome.  It's an easy walk to the shops, restaurants, and beach.  And, finally, breakfast was really breakfast, eggs, sausage or bacon on varying days, make your own waffle, yogurt, toast, bagels, juice, cereal, fresh fruit, you name it, they had it. Plus, the coffee is the best coffee I have ever tasted.
Manager Response: M3990TZmargaretm, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback on our location and breakfast room. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach. Our guests are able to enjoy the downtown Seal Beach area with just a short walk away! We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast menu. We have plenty of options to choose from to ensure there is something for everyone! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a great price!!
Summary: LOVED this hotel! It was Spring Break and we were looking for an affordable hotel near the beach. This hotel has a pool and spa, free coffee 24 hours in their lobby, great free continental breakfast and fantastic staff! Everyone I encountered was so nice, friendly and helpful! The room was clean, beds were comfortable. Refrigerator and microwave in room, flat screen TV. Not outdated at all. 2 chairs to relax on the patio. Small fitness room but it has all the basics. Continental breakfast- waffle maker, coffee, juice, fruit PLUS eggs, potatoes and some sort of meat. One day it was sausages, the next it was ham. You can easily make a breakfast sandwich. Free parking, lots of spaces to park. Seal Beach is a beautiful small town. The only downside is Seal Beach is not dog friendly,
Manager Response: Riena, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback on our property. Our goal is to ensure that each one of our guests leaves happy. We pride ourselves on our customer service and we do our best to ensure every guest is satisfied. We are a small property, and therefore our guest areas (pool area and fitness room) are smaller in size. Though Seal Beach does not allow dogs, there are plenty of places in the area to take your furry friends! We also have a park behind our property that is great for pets as well. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The room was always cleaned very well, things were restocked after use, and the breakfast was absolutely delicious. Every staff member was so kind to us and suggested great things to do around Seal Beach. My husband and I will definitely be going back.
Manager Response: Peayher, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your feedback on our rooms, staff, and breakfast. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Since we got there, front desk people service was just outstanding , all service oriented and trying to help in different ways, they helped to make our time there just unbelievable, will repeat it for sure.  Location is also perfect, close to many places and walking distance to get some drinks and food.
Manager Response: Carlos, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service and want to make sure every guest leaves happy. Thank you so much for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I stayed for a weekend at The Pacific Inn. We chose it for the location. The rooms were nice. The breakfast was good for a free breakfast. The employees were very helpful. I'll stay here again. The free parking is a great feature. Seal Beach is a fun community!
Manager Response: Wheatgrower, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback on our location, staff, amenities and breakfast. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Off the beaten track of Long Beach.
Summary: The Pacific Inn, is located about 20 minutes, from downtown Long Beach. A great location, if you don't want to stay down town. A relatively small Hotel with pool and Jacuzzi, located in the center  of the Hotel . Room as are modern and clean. The Hotel is walking distance to downtown Seal Beach, where you will find pubs and small boutiques. Staff super friendly stall, helpful with directions and local knowledge, of the area. Cynthia, thank you. On my list of decent Hotels in the area
Manager Response: Ejs1960, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Though we are not located in the busy downtown area, we are conveniently located just a couple blocks away from the very popular Main Street in Seal Beach. Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: My sisters and I do an annual Sisters Getaway here and always have a wonderful time. The hotel is very nice, the staff are all extremely friendly and helpful, the rooms are quiet and clean, the pool area is great and Seal Beach is a wonderful destination. The whole thing gets an A+++
Manager Response: Kakesie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us. Our goal is to have every guest leave our property with a smile on their face! We appreciate all guest feedback. Thank you so much for your review. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Having seen the good reviews and great location we booked a mid week break. We rang ahead of time to ask for a room with bath. We were told it would be $20 more which we accepted. On arrival our room was not ready so we decided to take in the sights, the hotel would ring us when the room was ready. Having received no call we came back some hours later. Our room had no bath as requested and we were credited our $20 back. A little disappointed we must say the room was excellent, very clean, comfy bed and all the amenities. We loved our stay here and intend to return in the fall.
Manager Response: Daveoloc, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We do our best to accommodate our guests with early check-in requests. If a guest comes to check-in and their room is not ready, we are more than happy to give any guest a call if their room is ready before 3pm, which is our standard check-in time. We apologize you were not given a room with a tub, as we may have switched your room type to accommodate an earlier check-in. We are glad your rate was discounted to a normal standard rate. Thank you so much for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you in the fall!

Summary: Was looking for a place to do an overnight stay in Seal Beach, close to the beach and the stores and restaurants around the Main Street corridor. This was a nice find. Staff was very welcoming and willing to provide recommendations if needed. There is covered parking and there was never a problem finding a spot even though I was in and out several times during my stay.   My room was upstairs, and the layout of the guest rooms kind of circles around a pool in the center of the building. So, you may get some occasional noise from kids having fun during the day or early evening, but not bad at all.   Rooms are clean, comfortable, and quiet. Not much of a view from my room, but that was not high on my list of priorities when making this booking. I did not take advantage of the free
Manager Response: GlenSco19, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad our property was to your liking. We are an atrium style hotel, which means our rooms surround our pool area. However, our pool area closes at 10pm to ensure that guests will not be bothered by any noise late at night. We are a three-floor hotel, and therefore are not tall enough to see the ocean. However, please feel free to ask the front desk about rooms in our most requested areas. Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel a few blocks from the beach
Summary: Was here on a business trip.  The room was nice, the staff friendly, and the breakfast was OK.  The hotel was a couple of blocks from the beach, but not directly on the Pacific Coast Highway, so there was no road noise.
Manager Response: Cerra12, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate any guest feedback. Please feel free to let us know of any areas we can improve on, especially in regards to our breakfast menu. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Great Location in Seal Beach with clean rooms, friendly staff, easy reservations process and check in. Short, easy walk to local groceries, restaurants, mom and pop shops and beach. We always enjoy our stay here!
Manager Response: 4AZFamily, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service and want to make sure each of our guest's leave happy! Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great staff, rooms and centrally located. How about that free breakfast!
Summary: Anytime we are beach bound our only choice is The Pacific Inn. The staff is the best, the rooms are always clean, and they have the best location to town and the beach., a two minute walk to the best shopping and restaurants and another two minutes to the beach and boardwalk. Covered parking and free breakfast make it a no brainer.  Total relaxation and fun is what you're looking for, This Is The Place.
Manager Response: Rellastern, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, which makes dining and shopping extremely convenient for our guests. We appreciate your feedback and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed here several times over the last three years at various times of year, the last being October 2016.  Rooms have always been clean and comfortable with a tv, fridge and balcony. (Films are available but these are chargeable) The bathrooms are large with good quality toiletries and towels. Breakfast is included and of ample quantities with plenty of choice which we found gave a good start to the day (cereals, toast/bagels, fruit, waffles, muffins/pastries, hot foods, fruit, juices and tea/coffee).  The pool area is semi-open air situated in the centre of the hotel. It has a jaccuzi and small pool. From an adult point of view it is a lovely place to chill out with comfortable loungers with large plants. Separate towels are supplied.  If you’re used to staying in
Manager Response: ReviewedItBlog, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us over the last three years. We have completed many upgrades to our property in the past few years, including our rooms, pool area and breakfast room. We greatly appreciate your feedback on our rooms, breakfast room, and amenities. We pride ourselves on our customer service. We want to ensure each of our guest's leave happy! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This place is indeed in a great location, just two blocks from main street with lots of restaurants. I got a last minute room on hotel tonight. The hotel is very large and quite dated. There is carpeting everywhere. I heard every conversation in the hallway and could hear neighbors showering. The beds were comfortable but there was too much noise otherwise. There is a gym, albeit basic, and a pool, which is on the 2nd floor. It's a soaking pool. There's also a jacuzzi.
Manager Response: Robbison1919, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms. With these renovations, we are increasing the amount of insulation in the walls to ensure our guests are not bothered by any noise in the surrounding areas. Please feel free to let the front desk know of any issues you may have with your room or stay. We will do our very best to alleviate any guest issue. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Their recently remodeled room was GREAT. We loved the long counter/shelf along the wall under the TV - plenty of room to place small items. The bed was very comfortable. The bathroom had plenty of counter space and the shower was spacious. The glass shower doors were a nice touch and the shower head was well above my head. The coffee pot brewed 2 cups individually or concurrently, side by side which was very nice; haven't seen one of those before. Breakfast was ample, tasty, fresh and sufficiently hot enough when we visited at 8:30. We also noticed the tile in the bathroom had a dark wood grain look - classy. The parking was open-air under the second floor which provided nice shade. All employees were friendly and helpful including Ashlee at the front desk. The pool being
Manager Response: Mt11634j, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us in our newly renovated Executive Room. Our upgraded rooms are designed to accommodate the most space possible for our guests, as we understand this is a common frustration in hotel rooms. Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in Seal Beach
Summary: Nothing fancy about this hotel, but it is clean and comfortable with typical amenities, parking garage, and in a great location in Seal Beach, easy walking distance to downtown and the beach. I wish this was a bit more affordable, but selection of lodging in this area is very limited. We will stay here again, and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay in this beautiful beach community.
Manager Response: Dkusma75, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our rates remain in competition with the hotels in the area, as well as fluctuate due to our daily occupancy. Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Having just spent a couple nights in the LA area, we were pleasantly surprised that The Pacific Inn, being only a 2.5 star hotel and only about 2 blocks from the beach, was a much nicer and less expensive hotel! The room was good size, bathroom was clearly recently updated (granite everywhere and a sliding shower door and bathroom door), nice, usable balcony, fridge & microwave, great location with a nice short walk to everything. The hotel also offer some discounts to some local establishments! Decent free breakfast was offered plus there was coffee in the lobby and even cookies at least one night. The pool and hot tub looked inviting but we didn't get the chance to use them. The pool, however, is also our only complaint. Most of the rooms are right near the pool, which is open
Manager Response: LittleDogLuvr, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. We try to provide our guests with as many amenities as possible including free breakfast, WiFi, shuttle transportation, fitness room and pool area. Our Starbucks coffee machine is available for our guests whenever they would like, and we provide freshly baked cookies every night around 5pm. If you ever have a noise issue with your room, please let the front desk know. We will do our best to find a solution to the problem. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to stay for Park and Cruise
Summary: The reservation and front desk people were friendly and extremely courteous. Very welcoming.The room was cosy. Clean and fresh smelling The bed was so comfortable, it was like sleeping on a cloud. The bathroom was great, it was stocked with my favorite Bath and Body Works products.  The free breakfast in the morning was plentiful, better than the average continental breakfast.. Yogurt, eggs,ham, fresh fruit and waffles to name a few. We stayed here before our cruise because we could leave our car for the duration in covered parking. The shuttle to and from the ship was included. We were dropped off and picked up at our set times without a problem The drivers of the shuttle were friendly and engaged us in idle chatter on the way to in from the ship. Very refreshing.
Manager Response: Debbie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and that you utilized our shuttle service for your Park and Cruise package. We try to provide our guests with the best products and amenities as possible. Thank you for your feedback on our breakfast room. We are constantly trying to improve our breakfast menu so any guest feedback is extremely appreciative! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Your word is usually your bond...
Summary: One of my biggest pet peeves is when people tell you something and do not follow through.   Upon check-in my fiancé and band mate go to the front desk to get our keys, the front desk guy told us he'd upgrade us to. Suite that had separate room since there were four of us but told us the room wasn't ready quite yet.  We decided to get food and come back a couple hours later.... When we got to the room, it was exactly what we had reserved - no upgrade.  We called the front desk and the same guy swore it was because we got a Keurig and a bed by the bathroom(really???).  I personally went down there to have a chat and he had told me the room had become sold out and that why we got this one.... so basically, you got a paying person and lied to us.  Awesome job on the customer
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you need a place to stay for a night or two, I would say this is the place. Personally, I like a smaller hotel at times for the ease of going in and out. The rooms are adequate with a small pullout sofa. The bathroom looks like it was renovated and the water pressure was very good and hot water came on fast.  They have a free breakfast if you need to get something light and fast. I called the day before and asked if there was an early check in because my fit was getting in early. They said no but you can try to check in when you come and if a room is available then no problem. I got there at 7am. The person said my room wasn't ready (2 queens), but if I wanted a king then I could take that.  It helped my trip out tremendously and I was very appreciative.  Also the parking
Manager Response: sfuj1212, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. All our standard King Room Types do feature a pull-out sofa. This is especially convenient for our guests who have children. We are more than happy to accommodate our guests with an early check-in if possible. Feel free to contact the front desk before check=in and we will have a room expedited as soon as possible. We fulfill as many guests requests as we can. We appreciate your feedback and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: It's not fancy and the rooms are small, but it's within walking distance of Main Street and the Long Beach pier and beach, which makes it just about perfect.  It's not cheap, but none of the hotels around here really are, but you may be able to get a better price on Expedia or Hotels.com.  The pool is not really an indoor pool as it's open air and it's VERY small.  The rooms are off the hallway that links to the open air area from the pool area and can be a bit breezy and loud, however.  The walls are quite thin, but then again, most hotels are.  There are small balconies which I personally liked, but others in our group didn't like overlooking the car port area.  The breakfast area is small but the food was good and adequate with a great variety to chose from.  They served
Manager Response: AZgyrl, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Thank you for your feedback. Our rates remain in competition with all the other hotels in the area. Our sales department manually inputs all our online rates, ensuring that rates are the same on all platforms. If there is a delay in a system update and the rate is at all different, we are more than happy to match or beat the rate that was given online. Our website (www.thepacificinn.com) has a Book Direct & Save package that will guarantee the best available rate compared to all other channels. Our property is an atrium, meaning that our pool is located in the middle of the hotel. We are a small property, and therefore our pool area is smaller in size. Our park-side rooms are the most requested rooms on our property. Though they are located above part of our parking lot, our guests enjoy the park area located right across the street. We bake cookies every night around 5pm so our guests can have a small treat if they would like! Our Starbucks coffee machine is available 24 hours a day. Please let the front desk know if you have any issues regarding your room. Our maintenance team will be contacted and someone will come up to your room immediately or at your convenience. We pride ourselves on our customer service and want to make sure every guest has an enjoyable stay!

Summary: This is our second review of the Pacific Inn. We have stayed here on and off for a few years and the place just keeps getting better and better. Our room was updated and very modern and super clean and quiet. We were in room 333 and stayed for 5 days. We walked into town (5-10 minute lazy stroll) and enjoyed the pier, shopping, and people watching. The best meal we had was right next door at a Japanese place called KOI. I enjoyed our stay. Thanks Pacific Inn
Manager Response: AlWatt, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us over the past few years. We are currently in the process of renovating our rooms - thank you for your feedback on our Executive room type! Our location is conveniently located just a short walk from Downtown Seal Beach and the pier. This allows our guests to dine, shop, walk, and more! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This is my second review of the Pacific Inn.  The last time I visited was 2014 and I have to tell you they have upped their game. My wife and I stayed on the third floor with a single King sized bed. The room and decor has been completely modernized and furnished in a fashion one would expect in a Hyatt Regency.  It was very comfortable, clean and modern.  Once again management is claiming Seal Beach turf as their own with the Pacific Inn's location and commitment to excellence.  As usual, we will be back.
Manager Response: James, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Throughout the past few years, we have been completing renovations throughout our property, including our breakfast room, pool area, and rooms. We are so glad you enjoyed our upgrades! Our property is located in the heart of Seal Beach, so our guests can enjoy the short walk to Main Street and the Pier. Thank you so much for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My husband and I had a great time at the Pacific Inn, so much that we were tempted to stay another two or three days, althrough they are a pet friendly establishment it was quiet and clean.The access to the balcony was great, even through it looked out onto the street and houses in the neighborhood, but was quiet and appealing to the senses.  The staff, from the front desk to the ladies who maintain the rooms were very friendly and helpful.  Whenever we found ourselves at a lost for directions the staff at the front desk were always willing to help us by printing out the directions and they were very helpful with providing information on some of the better places to dine.  It proved to be a very quint little place that was within walking distance to beach and a lot of little
Manager Response: Brandy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service. If our guests need help with anything, we are more than happy to assist in any way we can! We want all our guests to leave happy! Our location is very convenient for our guests, as we are just a short walk away from Downtown Seal Beach and the pier. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed in a King suite for our honeymoon night and absolutely loved it. It had the regular master bedroom, beautiful shower, jetted tub for two, separate toilet, and a complete other room with couch, tv, mini kitchen, etc. The suite was an outside corner room so we had large balconies on two sides. The most convenient part was that our room was right next to the stairwell so we had quick and easy access to the parking garage directly below. We had many ins and outs the day before so this proved to be a great benefit. Many hotels in the area do not allow in and out for parking privileges at no cost.   The only complaint was that the cleaning crew would turn off the air conditioner units in the room after they finished cleaning which meant that the rooms were always hot once we
Manager Response: Kerry, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay in our Admiral Suite. The Admiral Suite is our only room on our property that features a 2-person Jacuzzi tub and a separate shower. We would like to apologize regarding your air conditioning unit and refrigerator. In order to conserve energy, all refrigerators are turned off until a guest checks into a room. However, please feel free to contact the front desk before check-in. We are more than happy to turn on a refrigerator before a guest checks in so it is usable immediately. We are currently in the process of changing our policy on air conditioning units to ensure the units are kept how the guests have left them. Thank you for your suggestions. We appreciate our guests feedback and we will be taking corrective action on the items you mentioned. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Little beachside community between Long Beach and Huntington Beach
Summary: Nice hotel with a decent self-serve breakfast. Rooms updated in the past decade. Our room had a nice flat screen, microwave, fridge, but not enough space to hang clothes. Beds were comfortable and wifi was okay.  Would stay here again if wanting to be in the area.  The other local comparable option would be the Golden Sails Hotel in Long Beach.
Manager Response: Gary, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Thank you for your feedback on our clothing storage - we are currently in the process of placing clothes lines in all our rooms to accommodate more storage. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed there after visiting Catalina. We were going to Aquarium of the Pacific the next day. I thought we would hear traffic or that it would be loud on a Saturday night, but it was so quiet, and we all slept like rocks. The breakfast was good, better than expected for a free breaky. It came with sausage, eggs, bacon, waffles, juice, fruit...etc. all serve yourself. The rooms are situated around an indoor plaza that has the pool and hot tub. Look up and you can see the sky. Nice hotel with good private parking.
Manager Response: Terriwe, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Though we are located close to Pacific Coast Highway, we are back far enough so the street noise does not bother our guests. Thank you for your feedback on our breakfast room. We try to provide our guests with as many options as possible so there's something for everyone! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Location and staff combine to make this a perfect place to stay in Seal Beach. It is within easy walking distance to Main Street with its unique shops and dozens of restaurants, and the beach and pier. The hotel also offers a shuttle service to tourist stops in Long Beach and although bookings are needed in advance, that was not a problem during my stay over 9 nights. The staff at the front desk and in the breakfast room cannot do enough for guests - all problems are solved quickly and with a smile..... though the plastic bowls won't take microwaving with oatmeal in them. The hotel is aging, and the sound proofing is not top notch, but by requesting a room away from Marina, the traffic noise can be reduced. I had to have my mini-fridge replaced because it had a mind of its own
Manager Response: Lesalone, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service and we want to ensure each guests leaves happy after their stay. We provide our guests with as many amenities as possible to ensure customer satisfaction. These amenities include complimentary parking, WiFi, breakfast, shuttle transportation, fitness room and pool area. We are in the process of renovating all our rooms with new insulation in the walls to ensure that noise levels are kept to a minimum. However, because we are in a very quiet area of Seal Beach, it is very rare that noise is a problem for our guests. Thank you for your feedback on our breakfast room. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast menu. Your suggestion about gluten-free items will be passed down to our management team. We appreciate your suggestion! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Very Nice Hotel with a great location in Seal Beach
Summary: This hotel is in a great location to walk anywhere in Town.  The friendly staff upgraded our room, which had been newly renovated. The bed, pillows, and linens were clean and comfortable.  I appreciated  the in room Keurig. There is a pool and spa on the 2nd floor, open to the sky, which we did not have time to use, unfortunately.  There is also a fitness room. We liked the complimentary breakfast each morning, enough to start the day, and the free enclosed parking.
Manager Response: DNWA, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay in our Executive Suite! Though we are a small property, we like to provide our guests with as many amenities as possible. Our pool and Jacuzzi area is the perfect spot for our guests to relax - we hope you will be able to utilize this during your next stay! Thank you for your feedback and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn was a pleasant surprise. The staff is friendly and helpful. The location is great. The rooms are modern and updated and the amenities were perfect. Close walking distance to the pier, beach, shops and restaurants. Central to all that we wanted to see. Short drive down to Huntington and Newport Beach areas, and a little over an hour up to Malibu (depending on traffic). My only issue was that the mattress on the bed was very firm.  If you are not used to sleeping on a hard mattress, you may have a restless nights sleep. Overall, great place.  I would recommend and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Jennie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, which makes walking to Main Street and the pier extremely easy for our guests. Please let the front desk know if you have any problems regarding your stay. We would have been more than happy to do our best to make your mattress more comfortable, whether that's switching the mattress, adding a new pillow-top, etc. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We arrived at about 10 A.M. directly from the cruise ship thinking we would  check our bags and return later to check in but Ms.Amanda who was very cheerful gave us the good news that she could check us in right away, great. We were only staying for 2 days  and they have free area transportation so we didn't rent a car but ended up needing directions to travel farther then their 5 mile limit Ms. Amanda came to the rescue again by insisting on printing the directions for us even though the customer computer was right in front of us. The room was clean with an updated bathroom, the bed was comfortable and there was a refrigerator,  microwave and coffee maker.The hot breakfast presented many options so there's something for everyrone. The pool and hot tub were clean but I didn't
Manager Response: Aaron, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad we were able to accommodate you with an early check-in upon your arrival. If our rooms are clean, we are more than happy to check-in any guest that may arrive early. We like to assist your guests in any way possible, whether that's printing out directions, assisting with luggage, shuttle transportation and more. Thank you for your feedback on our rooms and complimentary hot breakfast. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our property, so any and all feedback is always welcome! Our location is very convenient for our guests due to us being walking distance from the beautiful Downtown Seal Beach area and the Seal Beach Pier. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My husband and I had another wonderful stay at The Pacific Inn.  The staff is always friendly and helpful.  The new rooms are beautiful and very comfortable.  The beds are comfortable and extra towels are always available.  The breakfast room is very comfortable and there are plenty of choices.  I love the make your own waffles.  The pool area is always clean and stocked with towels.  My grandson loves to visit us at the hotel.  He likes the big bed and walking up the comfy (carpeted) stairs.  He also enjoys swimming in the pool.  Hoping to visit this spring.  My favorite place to stay and my favorite area to vacation.
Manager Response: Ms. Lipschutz, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We always look forward to your stays with us! Thank you for being such a loyal guest. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us in one of our upgraded rooms, and that your grandson was able to enjoy our rooms and amenities! Our waffle station in our breakfast room is definitely a guest favorite! Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This older hotel is a hidden gem in a family friendly beach town. We were just a couple blocks from the beach and walking distance to numerous shops and restaurants. The hotel rooms were clean and effective. They had adjoining rooms which are getting harder to find. The complimentary breakfast was great. After a full day at the beach the pool was nice and relaxing. The service was friendly and helpful with directions. We felt safe and enjoyed being able to walk everywhere. We hope to keep this place a secret because we are going back next summer.
Manager Response: Jon, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Though we do have a few adjoining rooms in our hotel, they are limited. If one guest books multiple rooms, we do our best to keep them as close together as possible. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Summer is our busiest season, as we are in a prime location in Seal Beach. We would highly recommend booking far in advance for a summertime reservation! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Older hotel that has been nicely renovated
Summary: This hotel. Is within walking distance of the charming and bustling main street, beach and pier.  The staff was efficient and friendly.  The parking was free and underneath the  building.  The building and common areas have been renovated and updated.  We were were assigned a large newly renovated king bed room with a balcony which overlooked part of the parking lot and neighborhood.  The room was newly renovated and the bathroom was spacious and nicely appointed.  I would love to have a bathroom like this in our home!  There was a mini refigerator, microwave, Keurig coffee maker, iron, ironing board, hairdryer, etc.  The bed was quite comfortable but this structurally is an older hotel so when I neighbors had a disagreement next door and hallway we could hear it in our room but
Manager Response: Hpisles, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed the amenities we have to offer as well as your complimentary upgraded room. We are currently working on renovating all the rooms on our property to look like the room you stayed in. Thank you for your feedback. We would like to apologize for the noise you experienced in your room. During each room renovation, we are putting more insulation in our walls to ensure guests are not bothered by noise throughout their stay. Though your room had extra insulation, the room beside you had not been renovated yet. We would like to sincerely apologize for that inconvenience. We are so glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast menu, so any feedback and/or suggestions are greatly appreciated. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We live in Long Beach and just wanted to get away for the night! Pacific Inn was a pleasant surprise. Friendly, knowledgeable staff.  Clean rooms and loved that it had a Spa in the Pool area.  Great location to walk to restaurants and a small downtown street. I would definitely recommend staying at Pacific Inn Seal Beach!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay-cation with us! We provide our guests with as many amenities as possible. We are so glad that you enjoyed our pool area. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Friendly staff, nice location, clean rooms. Within walking distance of Seal Beach Main Street and Pier. Pet friendly and nice amenities. Was recommended this hotel by 3 different friends in the area whose family stays there when in town.
Manager Response: John, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad your friends recommended us and that you enjoyed your stay. Because we are conveniently located walking distance from Main Street, our guests can easily enjoy the Downtown Seal Beach area. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Our home in nearby Long Beach was getting fumigated so we had to move out with our cat for 2 days. The hotel was so accommodating to all of our needs. We requested no room service during our stay due to our cat and never once did Housekeeping knock on our door in error. The room is very spacious and with a long counter top made for a large space to spread out and not be confined to a small hotel desk. BIG screen TV that swivels and ample covered parking. Microwave and refrigerator included! Unfortunately, our house was not ready in 2 days and the hotel honored our rate and let us stay in our same room for an additional night. The breakfast cafe is fabulous, the work out room is just right, the surrounding area is great for strolling and walking the pier and finally great
Manager Response: Mary, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay in our Executive Suite room type. We are sorry to hear that your house was not ready in 2 days, but we are glad we were able to extend your stay to fit your needs. Thank you for your feedback on our rooms, breakfast, location and parking. We are constantly looking to better our property in any way that we can, so any feedback is very appreciated. We pride ourselves on our customer service, and we want all our guests to leave happy. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Never had a bad stay yet.
Summary: We visit our daughter often as she is a student at CSULB. Always nice staff and good rooms. Walking distance to Main St. Seal Beach. We stay in the Admirals suite, very nice. Also pet friendly for our four legged family member. Will be going back.
Manager Response: Steve, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us throughout your daughters college career. Our location is conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach. Not only is it easy to walk to the Downtown Seal Beach area, but we are just a short drive from Long Beach's popular 2nd Street as well as the CSULB campus. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: It started at the reception = smiling, friendly and courteous personnel. The room was great (King), however not the neighbors whom we heard screaming and arguing  through the double doors, incl. a kid crying. We had to ask for another room which unfortunately was not as nice (had 2 queen beds, different layout and décor). Bed was great though. Plenty of space AND a balcony. Breakfast was very satisfactory. -        At checkout another superbly mannered receptionist. She even gave us water for the road! Overall a very pleasant experience.
Manager Response: Borisrocks, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We pride ourselves on our customer service. Our front desk staff's goal is to ensure every guest is welcomed and happy during their stay! We would like to sincerely apologize for the noise you experienced in your room at first, but we are glad we were able to move you into a quieter area. We are currently in the process of upgrading many of our rooms. If you are ever unhappy with your room layout or decor, please let the front desk know and we will do our best to accommodate your request. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: I'm an ex resident of Seal Beach... So I'm always looking for a great place to stay close to Main Street and the pier... I love to come back and stay at the Pacific Inn... Wonderfully renovated rooms are clean with friendly staff.  All rooms are tech friendly w great internet service as well.  Its right on the green belt or Electric Ave for walking. You can always count on clean fresh linens.  I love the morning breakfast room w a great café machine w perfect lattes in early am.  I will always stay here with my hubby n girlfriends.   You won't be sorry ... I'll be back 😎😎
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are conveniently located walking distance from the Downtown Seal Beach area. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and our complimentary breakfast and WiFi. Our multi-purpose coffee machine is a recent addition to our breakfast room. Thank you so much for your feedback! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Nice hotel in a great location close to Main Street. We had a great room with a new sliding door to the patio that worked very well. Very clean and stocked with all the necessary amenities. The only issue was a very slow toilet that needed several flushing's to clear and the shower faucet handle was loose and felt like it was ready to fall off which was concerning. Other than that had a great stay. The breakfast and coffee was very good and a great addition.
Manager Response: Gary, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We would like to express our sincerest apology for the inconveniences you experienced with your room. Please feel free to contact the front desk if you have any issues with your room. Our maintenance team will be happy to assist you. We appreciate your feedback and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Really nice hotel with very large rooms that have been updated including an incredible bathroom!  Location is wonderful--walk to nearby shops with all the charm of a small beach community. Good (included) breakfast. Great front deskstaff.  Allows you to leave your car there for 1 week free of extra charge and then only $5 per day--a great deal if you are flying out of taking a cruise.  The one  caviate---their shuttle only takes you to Long Beach airport ( not LAX) and the Long Beach Cruise terminal (Carnival) and not San Pedro (Princess).
Manager Response: Robert, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our shuttle service goes anywhere within a 5 mile radius of our property. However, we do extend this radius for such locations as the Carnival Cruise Port, The Pike, The Queen Mary, and the Long Beach Airport. We have one in-house shuttle, meaning our staff is providing our guests transportation. We are one of the very few hotels in the area that provides complimentary transportation. We appreciate your feedback and are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Pacific Inn is hidden gem in Southern California
Summary: Pacific Inn is a relaxing and wonderful destination. The rooms are clean, neat and newly remodeled. Park your car and then walk to downtown Seal Beach for everything you need and great dining or bars.
Manager Response: Jgunnerson, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Because we are walking distance from Downtown Seal Beach, it's extremely for our guests to park and walk! Some guests even keep their car parked for their entire stay! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed at the Pacific Inn numerous times. The rooms are very nice and always very clean the staff is very courteous and professional.They have a great semi indoor pool and Jacuzzi that my son really likes.Seal Beach is really great little beach community with plenty of excellent restaurants.We will definitely be staying at the Pacific Inn again.
Manager Response: Jeff, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have come to stay with us on numerous occasions! We want to provide our guests with as many amenities as possible. Our property is small, but our guests still have the option to enjoy our pool, jacuzzi or fitness room. We are the closest hotel to the beach in Seal Beach, which makes our location very convenient for our guests. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The location was my first draw. It's located in the heart of one of the last adorable, laid back beach towns in California. However, the accommodating staff, cleanliness, and hot breakfast served till 11am puts this place over the top. LOVED it!
Manager Response: Hattie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We keep our breakfast room open for an extended period of time to ensure all our guests can enjoy our complimentary breakfast. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: This older hotel is a block off of the Pacific Coast Hwy and thus is in a good location in Seal Beach; about 5 blocks from the Seal Beach Pier.  Staff was very helpful; good free breakfast on the third floor, starting at 5:30 am; parking under the building is a bit cramped, with multiple support pillars.
Manager Response: P7367RUrichardw, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed the amenities we have to offer our guests. We are a small property and therefore our covered parking is smaller in size. However, our parking lot is specifically designed to accommodate all our guests. Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: My kids I love staying here. Always accommodating and concerned our needs are met. This is definitely our go to place. So, much my youngest wants to move to Seal Beach. The everyone for making our stay the best.
Manager Response: Rebecca, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our location is very convenient for our guests, as we are located in the heart of Seal Beach, just blocks away from downtown, Main Street and the pier. We are so glad you have enjoyed stay with us and we are looking forward to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed there twelve years ago and this time was even better! Liked it then and love it now. Staff is very courteous and attentive. Our room was spotless and nicely organized for our comfort. I would definitely recommend the Pacific Inn to anyone anytime...except when I plan to go back.
Manager Response: Chris, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you chose to stay with us again after so many years. We are constantly upgrading our property to ensure our guests have the best stays possible. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is in a great location, close to old town Seal Beach and the beach. The staff is very friendly, rooms are clean and beds are comfortable. The location is great, close to great restaurants and unique shops.
Manager Response: Karen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our location is extremely convenient for our guests, as it is walking distance from Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier. With our complimentary parking and shuttle service, it is easy for guests to leave their car parked for the entire duration of a stay. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: BEST KEPT SECRET IN SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA!
Summary: I stay here often and have always had marvelous experiences.  The hotel staff is professional, the rooms are spotless, and the free breakfast is truly over the top.  I can't imagine staying anywhere else!
Manager Response: Wacky4frogs, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We pride ourselves on our customer service. We want all of our guests to leave happy. Our housekeeping staff works hard each day to ensure our rooms are in pristine condition for our guests. We like to provide our guests with as many options as possible in our breakfast room - we want everyone to be able to enjoy breakfast! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My husband found Pacific Inn on a business trip.  Raved about it and made sure that he took the family back to this Inn.  What a wonderful place to stay!  Staff always greet us with a smile, and are always happy to accommodate every need we have.  The rooms are comfortable, clean and quiet.  The walking access to the beach and town is perfect and the view off the back is phenomenal!
Manager Response: Susanbird2016, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you and your family enjoyed your stay with us! We want all of our guests to leave happy. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, just a short walk from Main Street and the pier! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn located walking distance to downtown Seal Beach and the Pacific ocean is a cozy, comfortable, clean, quiet and friendly place to stay while visiting Southern California. The location has an efficient and friendly staff willing to do what they need in order to make your stay there as pleasant as possible. This pet friendly hotel has a one time charge of $50.00 per pet which is one of the lowest in the area and make all rooms available for you and your pets not just ones with worn out carpet and a stink of disinfectant. Prices per room are comparable to the average cost in the area. They also provide a parking garage and security at no charge. There is a pool which is located inside the hotel common area that has a tranquil, relaxing atmosphere. I would recommend
Manager Response: Carol, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We pride ourselves on our customer service. We want all of our guests to leave with smiles on their faces. We are one of the few pet friendly hotels in the area. Because we are located in the heart of Seal Beach, we want our furry friends to enjoy the area too! We have plenty of pet friendly locations in the area, including a park behind our property and a dog beach just a few miles away!
