We try to provide our guests with as many amenities as possible, including complimentary parking, shuttle service (by-reservation), WiFi, and breakfast. We want our guests to feel as if The Pacific Inn is their home away from home. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Great location and friendly staff.  We loved being able to walk to the restaurants, beach/pier and shopping.  Clean and comfortable room with a balcony.  The breakfast buffet was nice and we loved the complimentary coffee machine in the lobby area.  We plan to go back next year and bring more friends with us!
Manager Response: Ohiocouple2016, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We pride ourselves on our customer service, and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are the closest property to the beach in the area, which makes our location extremely convenient to our guests. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We re-visit Seal Beach annually; it's where we started dating!  The place changes only for the better as time goes by.  We always stay at The Pacific Inn, enjoying the closeness to the ocean and to top-notch beach town restaurants and shops.  So grateful that the hotel continues to exist!
Manager Response: Vicki, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying with us each year and that you have noticed the upgrades that have been occurring throughout our property. We are always looking for ways to improve the hotel to make our guests stays more enjoyable. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We recently held our women's retreat at this hotel where we reserved the large upstairs family room. The room slept 6 adults comfortably and since we had multiple cars from those who traveled to the retreat the hotel allowed us free parking for multiple vehicles. The rooms were clean and neat and the restroom was beautiful with a stone surfaced extra large walk-in shower. We used the DVD player which came with the room and both refrigerators. There was plenty of space to move around, dance, sing and have fun. The breakfast that comes with your reservation is above average, including freshly made waffles with real butter and real maple syrup...I can't even get real maple syrup at the Crema Café, supposedly one of the best restaurants on Main Street in Seal Beach!! We enjoyed it
Manager Response: Tammie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay in our Family Suite. We try to provide our guests with as many amenities as possible, including complimentary parking, wifi and breakfast. We want our guests to feel relaxed and happy when staying with us. Our two-room suites are sizable rooms and feature a few extra amenities including a DVD player - we are so glad you enjoyed it! We are always looking for ways to improve and update our breakfast menu. Recently, we have upgraded our menu to include seasonal items. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Clean, well maintained, exceptional staff....and outstanding location in this area.  The breakfast buffet is as one would expect, it's ok.....but....like the rest of the hotel is well maintained and again, the staff does an excellent job to ensure your happy.
Manager Response: TCKnowles, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are currently in the process of upgrading our breakfast menu to include seasonal items. We appreciate your feedback. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: This place is amazing.  The location could not be better, you are two blocks from Main Street, half a block from PCH and three blocks from the beach.  A huge amount of restaurant options all within a five minute walk.  Safe streets for walking and the beach is wonderful. The rooms are a good size and all come with a refrigerator and private balcony.  The balcony is awesome at night to enjoy the sounds and smell of the ocean.  Just overall a very relaxing vacation spot.  Great place to recharge.
Manager Response: Martymontano, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our location is definitely appealing to our guests. We are the closest hotel to Main Street and the pier in Seal Beach. Though our property is not tall enough to see the ocean from our balconies, our guests can enjoy the beach with just a short walk away! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We were on family vacation with 3 kids (4yrs, 6yrs, 8yrs).  The staff was friendly and we were able to get an early check in.  The pool and hot tub are on 2nd floor, but open to the outside. Its a quick 4 blocks to the beach.  There is filtered drinking water in the gym, and they also have complimentary water bottles at front desk. They have complimentary warm cookies in lobby too and a coffee/hot chocolate machine. Breakfast is included (good variety, hot waffles/sausage, etc. too). There's a yummy mexican restaurant one block away.  And parking is free!
Manager Response: TaraGarr, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We try to accommodate our guests with early check-ins as best as we can. Please inform the front desk if you would like to get an early check-in so we can expedite a room as soon as possible! We are so glad you enjoyed our complimentary water bottles, coffee, cookies and breakfast! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great place to enjoy Seal Beach
Summary: After moving from Seal Beach, but visiting often, I needed a place that was nearby, but also nice enough to enjoy.  The Pacific Inn was a great place to stay.  The staff was helpful, the rooms were clean and much larger than many hotel rooms.  Great value for the location and right in the heart of Seal Beach.  What could be better.
Manager Response: Surfdave22, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We designed our rooms  to provide guests with as much space as possible, including hidden closets, barn-style doors and more! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is the perfect place to enjoy the Seal Beach area. The accommodations were perfect. The balcony overlooking a park was very enjoyable. The staff was ready and willing to help with our needs. The location to Main Street is just the right distance for anyone. Thank you again for an enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Tabramshe, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our park-side rooms tend to be very popular with our guests. These rooms are limited. Please ask the front desk about our Executive Suites in regards to park-side rooms! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Wish I could have stayed longer
Summary: The location was great.  I was going to attend a wedding and it was right down the street.  They even gave me a shuttle ride to my destination, which was great.  I loved the little village with shops and restaurants within walking distance.  The room and bed was very comfortable and clean.
Manager Response: Marilynn, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad we were able to accommodate you with a shuttle to the wedding you attended. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach and are walking distance from Main Street and the pier! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I love this place!  Was greeted warmly at front desk upon arrival.  My room was very spacious, clean, and had private balcony.  The location is a short walk to Main Street with plenty of shopping, restaurants and the pier.  Breakfast was a nice surprise with great coffee, a variety of items, and very nice hostess. The hotel is quiet,  clean, and has a very nice pool and free garage parking. I wish I  could have stayed longer but plan on booking another trip soon!
Manager Response: Lisa, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. All of our rooms have private balconies for our guests to enjoy. We appreciate your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast we offer. We want to provide our guests with as many choices as possible and are currently in the process of upgrading our breakfast menu with seasonal items. Thank you for your review. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel last year it was such a pleasure I returned to stay this year. Sad to say by boyfriend got called away due to family dealings so I was on my own. Thanks to the shuttle and the walking distance of everything it all worked out well. Thanks to all your great staff. everyone is very friendly. The hotel is very clean. I will be back next year. Thanks again to everyone for making my stay a pleasure. I strongly would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Tammy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you chose to stay with us again! We apologize about your boyfriend being unable to join you, but we are glad to hear you had a great stay anyway. Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We never want a guest to leave unhappy. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Can't beat the price.  Everything is within walking distance.  The beaches are beautiful.  Room was spacious and clean.  Parking is free which is always a bonus in California.  The staff was very nice. Free breakfast. Can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Koosa08094, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our property is within walking distance from many local attractions. We are the closest property to the beach in the area. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights early October 2016 - Lovely room with private balcony - free parking  - great breakfast and really helpful staff.  I would stay again.  Very short walk to main street, the beach and the pier.
Manager Response: Cathycassidy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Everything was close by so we could walk to where we wanted to visit.  The room was very comfortable and spacious and a nice view of a local park area.  We enjoyed the pool and especially the Jacuzzi.   The complimentary breakfast was fantastic.
Manager Response: Dbaker0000fffp, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Though we are a small property, we try to provide our guest with as many amenities as possible, including a pool, jacuzzi, fitness room and breakfast. We are currently working on updating our breakfast menu. Thank you for your feedback! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: I read the reviews on trip advisor and chose the Pacific Inn. We arrived at 3:15 pm and were told we were upgraded to a king deluxe. What a beautiful room. Everything, including the paint, looks brand new. Huge room and shower and very nice bathroom.  The front desk staff was so kind and helpful.  24 hour coffee and coco Machine in lobby. All rooms have a balcony, which is nice because we smoke. Our room over looks a little park.  We left the hotel and walked to eat across street and made our way to Main Street and hit all the shops and on to the pier.  Great find. If I ever come back to Seal Beach, I will stay here. It was a $40.49 Uber ride from LAX in heavy traffic.
Manager Response: Angela, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad we were able to complimentary upgrade you for your stay. We pride ourselves on our customer service. Thank you for your kind feedback. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, which is just a short walk from Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier. We are the closest hotel to the beach in the area, and we are so glad you found us! We are looking forward to accommodating you in the future should your plans take you back to Seal Beach!

Summary: Just got home from from spending a week at The Pacific Inn. We visit fairly often to visit family. I wouldn't stay anywhere else. The staff is pleasant and helpful. The rooms are clean and comfy. The breakfast room has lots of choices and is kept so clean. Free parking can't be beat. Already booked for our next trip.
Manager Response: Ruth, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We were so happy to see you again! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay including the staff, rooms and breakfast. We want every one of our guests to leave with a smile on their face. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Good location for reasonable price, helpful staff including van rides. Easy check-in and check-out. Room clean and maintained very well. Quiet surrounding free coffee and cookies were nice I will return if needed.
Manager Response: Lesdan931, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We do provide our guests with a complimentary shuttle service that transports anywhere within a 5 mile radius of our property. These shuttles are by-reservation and do fill up! We always like to remind our guests to book them in advance! Thank you for your feedback. We are hoping to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Victoria the Manager is great at hospitality service!
Summary: Excellent hotel for the location, quality, service, cost, and free amenities! The breakfast in the morning is great and you get free bottles of water, cookies and hot cocoa/coffee upon check in! They really have put a lot of thought into what a guest would enjoy and the rooms are clean and comfy! Great spot!
Manager Response: Lastodda, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We want to provide our guests with the best service possible to ensure every guest leaves happy. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stay at the Pacific Inn almost monthly to visit our grandson.  We are always greeted with a warm welcome and bottles of water.  The rooms are always clean and ready.  The location is great right off the Main street and a few blocks from the Pier.  They also provide breakfast which is wonderful with variety of warm and cold options.  We have always had a wonderful stay here and will continue to for many years to come.
Manager Response: Margemcd, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We provide many complimentary amenities for our guests including wifi, breakfast and parking. We want each and every one of our guests to leave with a smile on their face. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This place is nicely tucked away in a quiet, pleasant neighborhood and is within a very short walking distance from the quaint downtown village area and the beach. Spacious, quiet rooms and free breakfast. Well maintained facilities and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Jonaleen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach. Our guests love to walk to Downtown Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stay here every time.  The hotel is clean with coffee in the lobby.  Everything in town is within walking distance.  We really feel at home at the Pacific Inn! The hotel is very near the bike trail and you can ride 38 miles if you want to.  Also easy bike access to Newport and Seal Beach.
Manager Response: Redschool22222, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad to hear that you felt at home here - that is one of our main goals at The Pacific Inn! Our location is at great convenience for our guests, being that it is walking distance from Seal Beach's main local attractions. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The location is perfect. The beach, Main Street, several other excellent walk-to restaurants...so close and convenient, and that's why we've been staying there for years.  We love The Pacific Inn pretty much from walking in the door. Staff is welcoming and helpful, our rooms have always been clean, complimentary breakfast (more of a continental style) offers quite a selection, the pool and hot tub (if you can't make it to the beach)...all great!  We look forward to heading back again.
Manager Response: LoveZ2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you've chosen to stay with us over the past several years. Our guests love our location, which is just a short walk away from Downtown Seal Beach as well as the Seal Beach Pier. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: the best place to stay in Seal Beach
Summary: Pros: The staff were uber friendly and welcoming. We were upgraded to a newly renovated room with out asking for an upgrade. The location of the hotel in Old Town can not be beat. The hot breakfast included was very adequate. Coffee, cookies and bottled water available 24/7. The make-up remover and sunblock in the bathroom were very nice touches and we loved the John Danhka art in the lobby. Cons: The air-conditioning unit in our room was very noisy, (316). Some how our room was overlooked for service the first day we stayed, (no, the "do not disturb card" was not up), we alerted the front desk after we returned from our day out and they immediately had it serviced. The coffee in the room is not very good but the coffee machine in the lobby makes very good coffee. We will
Manager Response: Maureen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay in our Executive Suite. Whenever we have upgraded rooms available, we try to complimentary upgrade as many guests as we can. If you come across any issues during your stay, please inform the front desk. Our maintenance team is willing to help any guests with room issues, including loud air conditioners. We would like to express our sincerest apology for your room not being serviced your first night, but we are glad to hear your room was serviced right away. We want all our guests to leave happy! Thank you so much for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: First, the location is just fabulous. A few steps from the beach and the center of town. The hotel itself is nice, but not spectacular. There is carpet everywhere which is not hygienic for a open air hotel near the beach that accepts pets. Our room had a smell of pee which was kind of gross. Walking barefoot in the room, my feel were filthy. The room itself needs some basic updating and deep cleaning.  We asked for for a pack and play for our toddler and it was nasty. Full of food and stains. I had to wipe everything down and cover it with sheets. The breakfast was good. Eggs, potato, and meat every day with your typical choices of everything else. Can't complain, it hit the spot.  Overall the stay was nice, not sure I would stay again.
Manager Response: Nathala-A, thank you for choosing The Pacific inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed the location of our property. We would like to sincerely apologize for the problems you experienced with your carpet. We hold our cleanliness standards very high at The Pacific Inn. We do not want any of our guests to question our cleaning tactics or abilities. We are constantly completing deep cleaning on all the carpeting throughout the property. Our in-house staff completes a monthly deep cleaning of our property carpets. We are contracted with a professional company for biannual carpet cleaning and encapsulation as well. We have recently purchased new cribs for our rooms to ensure they are in prime condition for our guests and their children. Please inform the front desk if you have any problems during the course of your stay, and we will be more than happy to assist you. We take all of our guests opinions into consideration. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Pleasantly greeted when I arrived to check in, got a little upgrade in room, a very nice room with lots of amenities, an overall very experience that I will repeat often. The location is excellent as it is in walking distance to the beach, downtown area, and transportation.
Manager Response: Joelflippen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, as well as all the amenities we have to offer for our guests. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a terrific place to stay.  It's in a great location, close the the beach, restaurants, groceries, etc.  Although the room was a little tired, it was very clean and comfortable.  The bed was super comfortable and the breakfast had everything I needed.    the staff was super friendly and helpful.  I very much enjoyed being able to walk everywhere and just relax and unwind.
Manager Response: Jmhnca, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms. Please ask the front desk about our Executive Suites if you would like to stay in a brand new renovated room! We try to provide our guests with everything they need in our rooms and on our property. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: we stayed there on a  business trip. The people were great. We walked to the restaurants and a small town. Rooms were clean and big Great Wifi Highly recommend it was close to the beach Parking was easy under the garage Parking was free
Manager Response: Hollygranofsky, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our location, which is just a block away from Downtown Seal Beach and the Seal Beach Pier. We try to provide our guests with as many amenities as possible, including complimentary WiFi, parking and breakfast. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: First of all, the staff was very welcoming and pleasant. Room was very nice and very well maintained.  Beds were very comfortable.  The rooms have a balcony with a table and 2 chairs which made it nice to sit outside and enjoy the weather. The hotel is located near Main St, Seal Beach Pier and the beach itself. A lot of good dining places around the area and very close.  I would definitely recommend this hotel and plan on staying there the next time I am in town.
Manager Response: Srhumphreytuc, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We have had beautiful weather over the past few weeks, and we are so glad you were able to enjoy it! Thank you for recommending our hotel, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We have (unfortunately) returned to England after staying 16 nights at the Pacific Inn, Seal beach.....  First of all, the location of this hotel, as many other travellers will tell you, is UNRIVALLED in the area.  It is off Pacific Coast Highway so away from beach and is the single closest accommodation to the shores of Seal Beach, being a less than 5 minute walk from Main Street and a 10 minute walk from Seal Beach Pier.  There are long term (1 month +) holiday rentals on the beach itself, at quadruple the price of course.  The value of the hotel is excellent - it doesn't claim to be 5* Radisson or similar, but they OVER DELIVER in everything from their, polite and well-mannered customer service team, to their efficient housekeeping team, and even the breakfast they provide
Manager Response: AdamandAmyChristophe, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you chose to stay with us for your vacation! We pride ourselves on our customer service, and we want each guest that stays with us to feel comfortable and taken care of while they're here. We do our best to accommodate each and every guest to make their stay enjoyable. We never want a guest to leave unhappy! Thank you so much for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you in 2018!

Summary: The Pacific Inn was just what we needed with two grandsons as a last minute before school starts getaway! Room overlooked greenbelt, which was a perfect play area easy to access. Pool was clean, fun as was jacuzzi/hot tub. Breakfast was more than had anticipated since most places offer sweets and coffee. Easy walk to Marina, beach, shops and pier. Our initial room was under renovation, but front desk easily and quickly changed and accommodated our family to another room. And boyz were able to catch POKEMON.
Manager Response: Socalgrammy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We try to provide our guests with as many breakfast menu items as possible, including hot food items, as well as traditional continental breakfast items. Our maintenance staff inspects our vacant rooms throughout the week to catch any imperfections in our rooms before our guests do. We are glad there were plenty of Pokemon in the area as well! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We spent a full week at the Pacific Inn and loved it. The room was comfortable, quiet, clean and roomy enough for my family.  The courtyard with pool & hot tub was very nice, comfortable, clean and relaxing. The staff was friendly, responsive and accomodating.  There was a nice variety for breakfast- including hot foods & make your own waffles. They offered discounted Aquarium tickets and beach chairs/umbrellas etc. to take to the beach. We were within walking distance of Seal Beach and a short drive to Long Beach and Huntington Beach. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Kir4221, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. Because we are a small, boutique-like property, we want our guests to be provided with the best service possible. We want our guests to feel like The Pacific Inn is their home away from home. We appreciate your review, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Loved the location , was able to walk to the beach, restaurant,s and stores, accommodation great, pool etc very clean, breakfast was good. Don't be to close to 10 am as you will not get all.  Tv in breakfast room was to load, but I'm sure we could of got it turned down.   Things run out at the end of breakfast , this was mentioned to front desk and they compensated very fairly. Would recommend this hotel we were traveling with our two young grandchildren and it worked very well.  Parking is tight but we were driving a large truck.
Manager Response: lknow, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, walking distance from Main Street and the Pier. This provides our guests with a lovely walk to the downtown area. Thank you for your feedback on our breakfast room. We want to ensure all of our food items are available until the breakfast room closes. As it is summertime, our parking lot does get full because we are sold out most days. However, parking is available in back of our property, as well as around the entire building. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This is our 2nd visit to Seal Beach and The Pacific Inn.  The first visit was great and the 2nd time has not disappointed.  The hotel is comfortable, friendly staff, very central and well equipped, pool good wifi, coffee, cookies ... We would certainly come back a third time if we get the opportunity Thanks for a lovely relaxing stay
Manager Response: Cruser58, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We try to provide our guests with as many amenities as possible, including complimentary breakfast, wifi, and transportation. We are so glad chose to stay with us again, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This trip was just my daughter and I. We were celebrating her 15th birthday with a mom only trip. This hotel was picked after much review. I am very picky. The hotel is in a great location for the price! Staff is very friendly. Room was clean. Everything is in walking distance. The location was great for visiting LA. After being in the busy city it was so relaxing to come back to peace and quiet. I'm hoping to come back again one day!
Manager Response: Koosa08312, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you chose to stay with us for your daughters birthday! We want all our guests to feel relaxed and comfortable at our property. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Good location, room was a little tired
Summary: Hotel is in a great location- walk to great restaurants and the beach. The hotel is a little tired- we did not have a renovated bathroom and had problems with it. Ask for a renovated room!! Pool is in the middle of the hotel, lots of shade. Nice spot.
Manager Response: HMakgill, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms, but of course, that takes a lot of time. We would like to express our sincerest apology for the inconvenience you experienced with your bathroom. Our maintenance team is more than happy to assist our guests if there are any problems with our rooms. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we are hoping to see you again in the future!

Summary: We drove in from Las Vegas to celebrate our daughters 30th Birthday. I know the area very well, but never seen this place. Once I checked rates an the various hotel web pages, this was the best value during what is a very busy week in CA. We checked in on a Friday afternoon, and Abraham who worked the front desk was very professional and told us al about the amenities of the hotel . The room was big and very clean and modern. They have a shuttle van that will take you within 5 miles of the hotel. While it is a very short walk to the beach, it was a nice perk when you have a bunch of beach gear and chairs. Spent several hours on the beach then called the shuttle, and they were there in 3 minutes. Breakfast was very good along the lines of a Holiday Inn Express, but better! A
Manager Response: BobLasVegasNevada, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Though located in the heart of Seal Beach, it's easy to miss our property because it is located off Pacific Coast Highway. However, this makes our property much quieter than other hotels in the area. Our guests love taking advantage of our complimentary shuttle service. These reservations are best made in advance to guarantee your transportation, as reservations are first come first serve! Our shuttle has become a popular commodity among our guests. We are so glad you enjoyed this service! Thank you for your feedback. It is greatly appreciated! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Pacific Inn is on the edge of Seal Beach main street.  Great place to walk and enjoy the town.  Rooms are clean and the people are friendly and helpful   Great place for the price and convenient to Long Beach and surrounding area.
Manager Response: Johnesawyer, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our location is very convenient for our guests. Due to our free parking, most guests end up parking in our lot at the beginning of their stay and then either walking or using our complimentary shuttle for the rest of their stay. We are so glad you enjoyed staying with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Overnight at Pacific Inn, Seal Beach
Summary: We stayed at Pacific Inn in Seal Beach for our overnight stay while visiting family. Easy to locate with free parking, very courteous staff, clean and quiet. It is located close to Main Street and the beach offering a wonderful walk to restaurants and shops. The room was fresh with upgrades and comfortable beds. The breakfast was included in our stay with coffee and everything from fruit to waffles. It was a great choice.
Manager Response: K4gaither, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at our property. We are in the process of renovating many aspects of our hotel, including our rooms, pool area, and breakfast cafe. We appreciate your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Terrible, terrible wifi....practically unusable.  The room was large, but could have used some better maintenance.  Toilet needed to be flushed multiple times each use.  Location might be convenient for some.  I won't be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just recently stayed at the Pacific Inn for our very first time. It was an amazing little get away and we will definitely go back again. The staff really made us feel at home, these 3 particularly : Tianna, Hannah and Margarita. And the breakfast was very yummy, several items to choose from both hot and cold. The location is perfect and only 2 short blocks to the beach even closer to Main Street with all the shops. We absolutely love it. Thank you to all the employees who made our stay very enjoyable.                                The Allen Family
Manager Response: Deansharonallen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We pride ourselves on our customer service, and we are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast menu. We want to ensure our guests have plenty of options. The Pacific Inn is conveniently located just a short walk from Main Street, as well as the Seal Beach Pier. We are happy you came to stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This is a place with all the modern amenities you could want, with traditional high- end service from a warm, friendly staff.  We love the location, the pool area, the rooms, and the hot breakfast is a good way to start the day.  I always wish I had something to say when they ask how they could improve, but our stays have always been perfect in every way.
Manager Response: Julia, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We have recently renovated many areas at our property - we are so glad you enjoyed them! We appreciate all our guests feedback, which is why we always ask our guests how their stay could have been improved. We are constantly working to improve in any way we can! Thank you for your feedback and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We had another amazing stay at the Pacific Inn over the last 4 days! We come to the Pacific Inn at leave once a year for the past 6 or 7 years. We love it there! The front office staff is outstanding as is the other staff (housekeepers and maintenance). We love to walk to the beach and to the Main Street and never get in our car once we arrive and until we leave. We love the "family cozy atmosphere" of the hotel and recommend it highly to anyone.
Manager Response: Ellen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad to hear that you have continued to stay with us over many years. We pride ourselves on our customer service - our goal is that our guests never leave unhappy! Our complimentary parking is very convenient for our guests, seeing as we are walking distance from many local attractions. It's easy to park your car at our property so there's no need to find parking on Main Street! At The Pacific Inn, we want all of our guests to feel at home. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We have been staying at the Pacific Inn for many years and have had nothing but an exceptional stay each and every time! The rooms are always clean and comfortable, they have a very nice Continental Breakfast and free Starbucks coffee in the lobby! The staff has always been very friendly and helpful. The Pacific Inn is also located a short walk from Main Street Seal Beach and the Ocean or do yourself a favor and take the complimentary shuttle over to Scooner or Later in nearby Long Beach for a great meal!
Manager Response: Rdouglass1104, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We love hearing our guests feedback! We appreciate your kind words, and are grateful that you have continued to stay with us over many years. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we want to ensure our guests have the best stays possible. Our complimentary shuttle is a very convenient form of transportation for our guests. We are so glad to hear you took advantage of our shuttle service to eat at Schooner or Later! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great Customer Service and ideal location.
Summary: We return often and are always pleased with the staff, room cleanliness, and amenities. The proximity to the beach, restaurants, and shops make this hotel by far, the best around. We've tried other hotels in the area, but they can't compare to The Pacific Inn.
Manager Response: Michellepoulos, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate our loyal guests, and are so glad to hear you have returned many times! We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, walking distance from many main attractions in the area. We are the only hotel in Seal Beach that is walking distance from the beach, Seal Beach pier and Main Street. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We started in San Diego & worked our way to Long Beach area visiting family along the way. This hotel was the best in friendliness immediately upon our arrival. Looking for a beachy feel where we could walk to restaurants, shops etc the Pacific Inn fit that scenario perfectly in a safe area. The pool is situated in the center so we never heard kids playing from our room. We will be staying there again for sure.
Manager Response: KailieGirl, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you stopped at our property during your journey from San Diego. We pride ourselves on our customer service. We want to ensure our guests have the best stay possible. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Second visit and we love it!
Summary: I have been here two time already once this year and once last year and I will be returning I had a very good experience the staff is very friendly and they even upgraded my room to something I wanted! I truly enjoyed my stay here!
Manager Response: Ann, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have stayed with us twice already! On certain days, we randomly select guests to stay in complimentary upgraded rooms. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed this! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Room was ready when we arrived. Beds were comfortable. Great having a refrigerator in the room. All staff were friendly and accommodating. Nice having the included breakfast and newspaper each morning. (Although, also loved when they used to give the breakfast vouchers to Hennessey's.) Pool was clean and inviting. Great to be able to walk downtown and to the beach. Nice touch having the free Starbucks coffee in the lobby.
Manager Response: Tfroeh, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our breakfast room has been recently updated and now features hot food items such as waffles, sausage, bacon and omelettes. We used to hand out Hennessy's passes because our breakfast room did not offer such items. After the update, our guests tended to stray away from Hennessy's. Our Starbucks machine is definitely a guest favorite! We are glad you enjoyed it! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Stayed just one night at this lovely hotel...next time will be a longer stay! Terrific location, just a few blocks to great boutiques, unique shopping/restaurants, and the beach/pier only a few short blocks further.   Our adjoining rooms were very comfortable and had nice balconies.  Every staff person we encountered were friendly and helpful!  All of the reception staff were very professional and we truly felt like guests!  What a great find! Thank you for your excellent hospitality!
Manager Response: Pieceofmind2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your one night stay with us, and that you are already looking forward to a multiple night stay! Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We never want our guests to leave unhappy. Our staff is willing to assist our guests in whatever they need to make sure they have the best stay possible. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for the 4th of July holiday. Staff was friendly, location was superb, walking distance to the beach or the many shops on Main Street and our room was clean. Breakfast was standard and clean. The rooms are a bit old and in need of updating but the bed was really comfy. We left our IPad in our room and when we called, the maids had found it and turned it in. To me, that screams high quality staff and I appreciate honest people and companies. We will absolutely stay here again.                                   Ps.. We ate at a 320 bar. Best food ever!
Manager Response: Travelnut_10_1, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms; please ask the front desk about our Executive Suites next time you stay with us! These rooms are newly upgraded and will be more to your liking. Our housekeepers ensure that any items they find are properly retrieved and stored. We are so glad you were able to get your IPad back! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn for 3 nights. The room was newly renovated, clean and comfortable. The staff was amazing! They even treated us to freshly baked cookies is the evening like a B & B would have. I will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: OhBenita, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are in the process of renovating all our rooms. We are so glad you enjoyed them. Our freshly baked cookies are a guest favorite! We want our property to feel like a home away from home. We like to add small touches to ensure our guests are happy and comfortable. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We've stayed here before and plan to stay here again.  The inn rooms and public areas are clean.  The staff is very friendly and attentive.  The location is great - near the beach and a few blocks from town's main street.  Also, they offer a good, free continental breakfast.
Manager Response: Lightrays, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We appreciate your review. Our housekeeping staff works tirelessly each day to ensure all areas of our property are clean and orderly for our guests. Guest satisfaction is our top priority. Our Guest Service Representatives are more than willing to assist our guests in whatever they need so that each person staying with us can have the best experience possible. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Overall, this was a decent stay and both family and budget friendly. Located around 2 to 3 blocks from the beach and one block from Main street. Rooms were clean. Beds were okay and pillows lumpy or hard. There was a 4 towel limit per day that was annoying given that we are a family of girls and really needed two towels each. Free hot breakfast was usual fare with cereal, packaged oatmeal, waffle machine and catered pre-made eggs, sausage and potatoes that were along the line of McDonald's quality. Very friendly staff. If your going to Seal Beach and plan to be out most of the time, this hotel works. But if your used to higher-end hotels, this will feel like a step down and you'll be anxious to leave.
Manager Response: FamilyFun4Kids, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We would like to express our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. We are here to assist our guests in whatever they may need. With that being said, we are more than happy to retrieve any new items for our guests if they are not enjoying the current ones. Though our housekeepers put four towels in each room, we are more than happy to accommodate our guests with extra towels if need be. Thank you for your feedback on our breakfast items. We are constantly trying to improve our breakfast menu, and your feedback will be taken into consideration.

Summary: I called the desk for early arrival and they were more than happy to see that our room was ready early! The hotel was easy to find, centrally located, and was in excellent shape.  The covered garage was a welcome sight keeping my vehicle out of the direct sunlight.  The room was nice and large and even the bathroom was larger than usually found in hotels. The breakfast had plenty of food, and was constantly being refilled by an attendant.  I look forward to finding an excuse to stay there again.
Manager Response: James, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are more than happy to accommodate early arrivals, just as long as your room is clean. It is great that you asked for an early check-in in advance - it helps us expedite your room as quickly as we can! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Friendly staff, clean rooms, good continental breakfast.  We have enjoyed the Inn for many years and continue to do so. The town of Seal Beach is fun to walk around.  There are several good restaurants and bars downtown. We will keep going!
Manager Response: Zanna2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have enjoyed staying at The Pacific Inn for many years - we appreciate our loyal guests! We try our absolute best to keep our guests happy by providing great customer service, clean rooms, complimentary breakfast, complimentary shuttle service, and much more. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This is an older hotel, but it is well kept. Staff is extremely helpful, and the room was clean and well appointed. I did appreciate the bathroom shampoo, lotion, and even sunscreen--nice touch! The bed was so comfortable, I had made a note to see what kind of mattress it was!  The breakfast served is okay...better than the Hampton Inn, where we stayed on our last visit.  This hotel is walking distance to anything in Seal Beach, which is such quaint beach community.  I was a little disappointed in the rate, which seemed higher than the last time I stayed and higher than a comparable room. Otherwise, I would have given it 5 stars.
Manager Response: TandPVM, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed our rooms and all the room amenities we have to offer. We have recently replaced all our mattresses. Thank you for your feedback on them! Because it is summertime, our rates are a bit higher than other months of the year. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Nice hotel with balcony and little swimming pool on walking distance from the pier. There is a free public parking place by the hotel. Free breakfast in the morning completed ouer one night stay. A fine place to be.
Manager Response: Eelko65, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our hotel amenities, as well as our convenient location. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Just got back from a wonderful stay at The Pacific Inn. The redone rooms are really nice. Love the makeup remover and suntan lotion packets in the remodeled bathroom. We had two small issues that when brought to the attention of the staff were taken care of very promptly. Love sitting by the pool and reading. My grandson loves the pool and e joyed his nap in the very comfy bed. Looking forward to our October visit.
Manager Response: Ruth, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations, and thank you for being such a loyal guest! If any issue is brought to our attention, we tend to it immediately, ensuring our guests are satisfied with their stay and our service. We are looking forward to seeing you in October!

Summary: Great location in Seal Beach close to a lot of shopping areas and restaurants.  Very quiet and nice pool area.  The room was nice and the continental breakfast had good selections.  Parking was free and available.
Manager Response: ABF49ER, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We try our best to make our property feel like a home-away-from-home. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: I have reviewed this property before, but wanted to share my experience staying here with my wife and 3 children.    When I called in to reserve 2 nights for 2 rooms, as I chatted with the person on the phone, they mentioned that we might prefer to have their 2 room suite instead of 2 joined rooms.  It was also a little cheaper this way too.  The room was huge.  Half of the suite was just like their typical 2 queen bed rooms.  The other half had a very nice "living" area that had a sofa bed.  We had plenty of room for the 5 of us and having a second TV in the room was great for late night relaxing.  It is an easy walk to the beach/pier from here.  Lots of great places to eat in walking distance.  We really love this hotel and had a great night sleep on their comfortable beds!
Manager Response: M00k3y, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you have chosen to stay with us again! We are more than willing to assist our guests in finding the perfect and most budget-friendly room accommodations. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay in the Family Suite. Downtown Seal Beach is a lovely area for our guests to enjoy, with it being just a short walk from our property. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My stay was in February 2016.  The hotel was very nice.  My favorite part was the nice large shower.  They'd removed the bathtub and replaced it with floor to ceiling tile and sliding glass door.  It would have been a little better if they'd included a small corner seat.  It's hard for us women to shave our legs without it!  The only negative thing was that there were brown spots on the bathroom floor when I arrived.  I am pretty sure it was human feces.  I always pack Clorox Wipes to wipe things down in hotel rooms, so I was able to take care of it, but it was disgusting.  The cleaning staff obviously did not mop the bathroom floor.    Since that stay, I've been making a point of checking housekeeping carts to see if they even have mops.  Most hotels do not.  Apparently most
Manager Response: Phoenix1037, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our rooms feature a variety of bathroom designs, including rooms with jacuzzi tubs, walk in showers, and handicap accessible showers. If you would like to stay with us again, please ask the front desk for a room with a shower. We will be more than happy to accommodate you! We would like to express our sincerest apologies for the cleanliness issue you experienced during your stay. We will be taking corrective action with this issue. Our housekeeping staff tries their best to ensure all rooms are extremely clean and ready for our guests. Our housekeepers have a very specific cleaning routine which includes washing all our bathroom floors. Again, we would like to express our sincerest apologies. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Great place for a relaxing stay, the reception staff were top notch as were the drivers on the local shuttle provided by the hotel to surrounding places. The complimentary breakfast was fine with the usual American choices and the small swimming pool and the whirlpool hot tub ( both open air ) were a great way to relax at any time of day. The only let downs were the air con in our seemed unable to cope with the heat so the room was a little too warm and we had a problem with the room servicing not being done however when this was mentioned at reception the staff could not have done more to help to rectify the matter even though the housekeeping staff had left, with out these two problems it would have been 5 out of 5
Manager Response: Futsanglung, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are so glad our staff provided you with great customer service. If you ever have any problems with your room, please ask the front desk, and we will send our maintenance team to help you right away. We try our best to accommodate all our guests as best we can. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: drove from bay area. hotel offered free 7 day parking and shuttle to our ship in long beach. staff wonderful.. hotel modern clean. the pool area a little oasis..  beds comfy.. walking distance to beach and restaurants.. in wonderful safe area..morning breakfast a nice extra.. and great coffee 24 hr at front desk.. will come again for sure
Manager Response: Sharonbnana, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad we were able to accommodate you with our park and cruise package. We try our best to provide guests a clean, quaint and comfortable atmosphere. Main Street is a very popular area for our guests, seeing as it is just a short walk from our property. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel with wonderful helpful staff
Summary: 3rs stay in 2weeks , would love to have stayed for a complete week but hotel is always full and had to grab dates available, good breakfast, good location and clean hotel with pool and spa, all staff helpfull and keen to get feedback , we had a problem with the booking for the next hotel we were going to and the receptionist was more than helpfull here allowing us to use the phone and dialling the numbers for us we are not familiar with the area codes as not from USA, we even stayed another night till we can sort out another booking else where as they are fully poked gin for nextv2 nights,but so helpfull, 5tars xxxxx
Manager Response: Fiona, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Because Summertime is here, it is best to book a room with us as far in advance as possible. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We do our best to assist our guests in whatever they may need, including phone calls, directions, suggestions, and more. Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Free freshly baked cookies and coffee in the lobby while I checked in. The employees at the front desk were very friendly and accommodating. My room was on the second floor... nicely decorated, handicap friendly, clean and QUIET. The location was wonderful! It was my first visit to Seal Beach and the inn is a short walk to the Main Street shopping, restaurants and pubs. We had a few drinks, played pool and afterwards ate ice cream at Cold Stone. My daughter and I took a lovely walk at sunset. When I wasn't out enjoying the town, I watched television in my room, took a bath and enjoyed the balcony. The pool and jacuzzi is sheltered from the sun...a nice place to relax and hangout. The staff was great and I will definitely return!
Manager Response: Wildorkid, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Our 24 hour complimentary coffee machine and nightly fresh-baked cookies are definitely a guest favorite! Main Street is a very popular area in Seal Beach. Since we are conveniently located just a few blocks away, our guests love taking the short walk to enjoy the shops, restaurants, and the Seal Beach pier. Thank you for your review, and we are looking forward to see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel is only 7 minutes from Long Beach University and in a nice neighborhood. Diving to 2nd street with all the restaurants and shops takes just minutes. The staff is very friendly and accommedating. We even got updated to a family room. Our family will be back soon.
Manager Response: Urlaub1000, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Long Beach State is extremely close to our property. Second Street in Long Beach is a main attraction for our guests - as well as Main Street right here in Seal Beach. We have plenty of local spots for our guest to enjoy. We are so happy you enjoyed your complimentary upgrade. Thank you for your review, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We love this place. Perfect location . We want to stay again  I t is in walkable distance to everything Love the sea and the restaurants. This feels like home to us. We will be back.  We are looking to stay in the a area andglad that they have this hotel.
Manager Response: John, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed our convenient location. We always want The Pacific Inn to feel like a home away from home. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I have stayed at the Pacific Inn in Seal Beach about 6 times now and have always enjoyed the stay.  The staff has always been friendly and helpful.  The breakfast room was kept stocked and clean and had a good assortment of items.  The shuttle service to and from the Cruise was excellent.  We were off the ship 2 hours early and called to let them know and someone was there within half an hour to take us back to our car that was parked at the Pacific Inn.  The room was clean and ready for us when we arrived the night before our cruise.
Manager Response: Denise, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so happy to hear that you have enjoyed staying The Pacific Inn, causing you to return 6 times! We appreciate our loyal guests. Our Park and Cruise package is extremely popular. However, these spots are limited. We are more than willing to change shuttle times as long as we have the availability. We advise our guests to book their shuttle reservations in advance as possible to guarantee a time slot. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The room and breakfast are good. The room was, modern, clean and spacious. The breakfast fresh and gave a better choice than what I've experienced in most other hotels. The lobby and setup of the hotel can be improved. The price/quality can be improved
Manager Response: Brian, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and our clean and spacious rooms. We would like to express our sincerest apologies that you were unhappy with our lobby and hotel set-up, as well as our prices. We are an old property, though we try our best to remain as clean and contemporary as we can. If you have any further suggestions on how we can improve, please let us know. We greatly appreciate all guest feedback. We always make sure our prices are comparable to the market. We understand that our rates can be a bit high. However, we are located in the heart of Seal Beach, and have completed many hotel renovations within the past year. We hope you choose to stay at The Pacific Inn in the future.

Summary: I have stayed at Pacific Inn 4 times. I just stayed again over Memorial weekend. I brought my son and daughter. The hotel is clean and nice decor and renovations make it up to date. We had a good breakfast. They provide a lot of variety in food offered and my vegetarian son had many options available to him. The staff is the best! Very friendly, professional and helpful. We needed razors and a sewing kit and both were provided promptly. The location of the hotel is perfect as it is one short block from Main St. and next to a nice little park. Love this hotel and will be back!!
Manager Response: Laurab50, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We love hearing feedback from our guests. It is greatly appreciated. We try to provide our guests with many different options to fit all needs. Therefore, we provide both meat and meatless options in our breakfast room. We are so glad to hear your son enjoyed it! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a great hotel located within walking distance of downtown Seal Beach. The staff was friendly and recommended visiting the local shops and restaurants. The rooms were clean and the free breakfast was perfect before heading to the beach. I was overall very well pleased with my stay and plan to return again soon.
Manager Response: Beverlyfnp, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We try our absolute best to accommodate our guests as best we can, including recommending local shops and restaurants in the area. Our guests love the downtown district area of Seal Beach, and it's conveniently located just a short walk from our property! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We are familiar with the Long Beach area, having visited family there over the last couple of years.  While all the hotels we stayed in have been good, I would rate this hotel the highest.  Seal Beach is a fun place and this hotel is just a few blocks from the beach and Main Street.  Friendly people, comfortable rooms, a pool and hot tub, balconies, parking underneath the hotel and a good breakfast make this the place to be.  Plus you are a short 5-minute drive from 2nd Street in Long Beach.  When we come back for a visit we will certainly book a room here.
Manager Response: Tim, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Long Beach is a great area, but the downtown district of Seal Beach, just walking distance from our property, definitely has a homely, quaint atmosphere that is hard to find. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at The Pacific Inn. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we strive to keep our guests as happy as possible. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I took my family on a Disneyland vacation, and we planned for an additional four days outside of Disneyland to hang out in the orange county area. I booked this hotel based on the reviews, and the price range that it was in, and all I can say is that I'm glad I did.  First, the hotel is in an awesome location and is a 10 minute walk from Seal Beach. It's also about a two minute walk from the historic downtown district of Seal Beach with tons of restaurants and shopping.  Don't let the exterior of this hotel fool you, it is nicely renovated inside and the rooms were very well done with excellent large showers in the bathrooms. This came in very handy when it came time to give my two kids showers. The pool is quite small, but let's face it, you're 10 minutes from the beach are you
Manager Response: Danandchenae, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We're sure your Disneyland experience was a blast, and we're hoping your time here in Seal Beach was just as fun. We are a small property. Therefore, some of our guest areas (pool area, fitness room) are smaller in size. We like to keep our guests entertained with as many amenities as possible. We are glad to hear our front desk was able to assist you with directions to the Catalina Ferry. Our Guest Service Representatives are here to help! Please ask them any questions you may have! We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: This is a great hotel -- clean and quiet, and the staff were all friendly and helpful. It's a short walk from restaurants and shops in Seal Beach, and easy access from the highway. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Luke, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We do our absolute best in accommodating our guests in any way possible. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We stay here annually, and have loved it every time! It's great for couples, friends, and/or families. Great location; staff has always been accommodating! Love this place! We have always been able to get price deals that have been reasonable
Manager Response: FarmGirlAL, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. With our location being in the heart of Seal Beach, it makes it easy for our guests to enjoy one of Seal Beach's most popular areas: Main Street. We are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean Relaxing Place By the Beach
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Pacific Inn to celebrate one night for his birthday. We chose this hotel due to the close proximity to Main Street in Seal Beach. Main Street has restaurants, bars and shops. We were so pleased at our stay at the Pacific Inn. First, the room was clean and spacious. It had a flat screen tv., balcony with two chairs, clean bathroom , and comfortable bed. They offer free Wifi, free parking, and complimentary breakfast. We felt so relaxed the entire time of our stay. We love the location. It is only a five minute walk to the beach and shops. The front desk is very friendly. We will definitely plan to return to re live the pleasant experience we had at the Pacific Inn.
Manager Response: Peaches321, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We hope we made your husbands birthday celebration a memorable one! We try to provide our guests with as many amenities as possible. With our small, boutique-like hotel property, we want our guests to feel like The Pacific Inn is your home away from home. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: A loud standing ovation for the Pacific Inn!
Summary: After a 40 mile bike ride, hotel staff were more than just helpful. They were gracious and very accommodating by allowing my wife and I to store our bikes downstairs rather than hauling them upstairs to our room. Excellent pool & jacuzzi w/hot breakfast included. I will stay again and again...
Manager Response: Halbonilla1, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. A 40 mile bike ride is extremely impressive. We are more than willing to hold anything for our guests! We are glad we were able to store your bikes! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I love this hotel.  It was my first time in California.  It was walking distance to everything and the staff was super nice and free breakfast in the morning.    They upgrade us as well to the family suite.  I will return!!!
Manager Response: Aocon1215, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We hope your stay with us made your first trip to California memorable! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We had a lovely experience - we arrived to discover that our standard room had been upgraded, free of charge, to the admiral suite, with a hot tub, standing shower, kitchenette, sitting room and wrap around balcony.  A lovely surprise!  The hotel was very clean and very affordable.  The breakfast room was average but free, and the staff there were very helpful.  The hotel was easy walking distance to the main drag - so close that when our shopping got too heavy we just ran back to the room, dropped it off, and went out again.  If you want dinner, go to Taco Surf and try Frankie's Scorpion Chowder!
Manager Response: Lauren, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your complimentary upgrade to the Admiral Suite! Our guests tend to love our two-room suites! We are constantly looking for ways to update and improve our breakfast menu. Please let us know if you have any suggestions. We would love to hear your feedback. There are so many restaurants within walking distance from our property. Taco Surf was a great choice! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: With Seal Beach being such a walkable village chock full of shops, restaurants and, yes, the beach; the Pacific Inn is the ideal place to stay. Used to be, location was 90% of the reason one would want to pick this spot, but they've upgraded the rooms, the breakfast and, well, the staff couldn't be more professional and friendly.
Manager Response: Richreilly2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our convenient location seems to be an attraction to many of our guests because we are walking distance to so many local spots. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I found out about The Pacific Inn through some co-workers as I had a business trip to the area.  The location is perfect for getting around via car as Highway 1 is right there or if you are looking to go for a walk, you can walk around the corner to the main street in Seal Beach.  All the shops and restaurants are very close so no need to go drive unless you want to.  The staff was great and accommodating.  The morning breakfast was fine but they do have a little chocolate chip cookie snack in the lobby every night.  There is a small gym for those of you who want to get your workout on.    The rooms are quiet and the the beds were super comfortable.  Everything I needed in my hotel room I had access to.  There is a small balcony that you can open up and sit out on for a nice
Manager Response: Brantleyb68, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad your co-worker referred you to us! We are always interested in our guests feedback, particularly in regards to our breakfast menu. If you have any further suggestions, please let us know! We are constantly looking for ways to better our property. We are glad you took advantage of our location and walked to Main Street! Our guests tend to love how close we are to Downtown Seal Beach. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My wife and I are well-traveled seniors who were delighted by the consistent friendly, professional staff, the peaceful ambiance, the large comfortable room (best bed I slept like baby), bordering on luxurious (especially the bath), a hot and diversified selection for breakfast better than most restaurants, 2 minute walk to lush city park, two blocks from main street with great restaurants, shops, small town vibe, short drive to beach, easy access from I-405 and I-5, in a quiet neighborhood, plenty onsite parking, and our new-found favorite place to rest and refresh when we visit the coast from Dana Point to Long Beach.
Manager Response: Richard, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed our staff, ambiance, Jacuzzi tub room, and complimentary hot breakfast. We are located right in the heart of Seal Beach, and there are many local attractions within walking distance from our property. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Hidden Gem in a great location
Summary: I usually stay in 3-4 start hotels, and this place was EXCELLENT by any standard. The beds were comfy, the pillows great, each room had a balcony and the location can't be beat. The front desk staff was exceedingly helpful and friendly, especially Summer. The bathroom amenities are top notch, and the entire place looks to be recently renovated. The rooms were sufficiently soundproofed and we slept great.  I will definitely be staying here again!
Manager Response: Shari, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We want to make our guests as happy and comfortable as possible. Therefore, we take in any guest feedback about how comfortable our rooms feel, especially in regards to our beds. We have recently replaced all the mattresses in our rooms. We are happy you enjoyed them! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This was our second time here.  It has aged since our first time 3 years ago but overall still a decent boutique hotel.  Our only complaint was very low water pressure in the shower.  Location is great - a short walk to restaurants, shops and the beach.
Manager Response: 34catlover, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We have made many changes to our property within the past 3 years, including newly renovated rooms, new lobby and pool furniture, and a brand new breakfast room and menu. Please ask the front desk about our new rooms if you are interested! Because California is in a drought, we do have limits on how much water we use. Please ask the front desk for assistance with your water pressure. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The staff couldn't be more friendly and helpful. It's the only place my wife and I stay when we come to the beach. Great location and reasonable price. We've stayed here many years and the quality stays the same.
Manager Response: Johnshu, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Thank you for being such a loyal guest! We are so glad to hear that you have enjoyed staying with us throughout the years. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Clean, comfortable rooms. Attentive staff. Nice pool and jacuzzi. On the downside, no bathtub and low water pressure in the shower. Still, walking distance from the beach and Main Street. Better than any other hotel in the neighborhood.
Manager Response: RML1, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We do have some rooms with tubs. Please ask the front desk about our Jacuzzi tub rooms, and we will be more than happy to accommodate you. Because California is in a drought, we have limits on how much water we use. However, we are more than willing to fix your water pressure through the course of your stay. Thank you very much for your feedback! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: If you're heading to Seal Beach or even Long Beach for anything at all then I highly recommend staying at this hotel. The staff are so incredible that you feel so welcome. The rooms are large, clean, quiet and the bathrooms and modern. The hotel offers a free shuttle to Long Beach which, in my case, was great as I was heading there for the Indy Cars. The free breakfast was great and the pool an added bonus. The local area is awesome. Book this place if you're heading anywhere near the area.
Manager Response: Nick, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Though all of our rooms have a new and modern feel, we now have Executive Suites, which have been renovated within the past few months. I would highly recommend asking about them for your next stay! Our shuttle service is complimentary, and goes anywhere within a 5 mile radius of the hotel. We are glad you utilized this service! It is always great hearing guests feedback on our breakfast menu. Thank you for your kind words. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Perfect accommodations...trendy decor, clean, extra friendly staff, great café and pool area. We had a last minute trip due to a family emergency and the front desk and reservations couldn't have been more kind and helpful during this stressful time.  I definitely will return!
Manager Response: Maryehrlich77, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are very sorry about your family emergency, but we are glad we were able to accommodate you with a room. Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This was a last minute trip. We headed to long beach but turned out that long beach hotels were all booked due to the grand prix event so had too/decided to go a little ways out and found this hotel. For a last minute, late night, tired and having a child with this couldn't have been nothing but a good hotel. Clean, comfy and check in was all good. We will stay if around the area again.
Manager Response: Muneca076, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are extremely busy during Grand Prix weekend, but we are so glad we were able to accommodate you with a room for you and your family! Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!
