Summary: We stayed for the night before our cruise and was very happy with the service, shuttle service and the breakfast. I would recommend to family and friends. Close to seal beach and shopping. Shuttle picked us up at the airport and also took us to the cruise terminal the next day.
Manager Response: Acain4, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Our Park and Cruise Package guarantees transportation to and from the Carnival Cruise Port in Long Beach. However, these spaces are extremely limited. If you would like to use this service again, please book as far in advance as possible to have a guaranteed spot! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Wonderful place. Clean.  Quiet.  Great staff, helpful and friendly.  Freshly baked chocolate chip cookies. Starbucks coffee. Very little traffic. Nice park across the street for our two little pugs. Large and clean room, nice layout. Can smoke in the open air stairwells where there are comfortable overstuffed chairs. Great breakfast.  Ample on-site parking.  Located within walking distance of beach, pier and Old Towne Main Street.  What's not to like!
Manager Response: Comm2dee, thank you for choosing The Pacific inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Our freshly baked cookies and Starbucks coffee machine are definitely big hits with our guests! We are the only pet friendly hotel in the area. We are so glad you were able to bring your two pugs to stay with us as well! We are hoping to see you and your pugs again soon!

Summary: We stayed here while visiting our son in Long Beach. What a find!  Seal Beach main Street is just 2 blocks away where you can find cute shops and all dining options.  Our room was very quiet facing small park. We left our sliding door open at night and could hear palm tree leaves in soft breeze.  Our room was updated with simple clean interior. Nothing fancy but very practical with mini fridge, microwave and comfortable bed. Pool area nice and clean. Breakfast was decent with warm egg, potato, waffle option along with usual bread, cereal and fruits. AC noise quiet. Easy access from LGB airport. We'll difinately stay here again next time!
Manager Response: Neko1inu2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are conveniently located next to many local attractions, including Main Street and the Seal Beach Pier. Our park-side rooms are highly requested, but they are limited. If you would like to stay in one of these rooms, please ask our front desk staff about our rooms that can guarantee a park-side view. We try to accommodate our guests as much as possible, which is why we include such items as refrigerators, microwaves, coffee, and irons in all our rooms. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our pool area and our complimentary breakfast. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Very nice and very close to the beach!!
Summary: The employees are very friendly and helpful. The room was very clean and comfortable. The hotel is only 2 blocks from the beach an easy 5 minute walk to the pier if you don't get distracted by the best small town Main Street I've been to in a while.  I can't wait to visit seal beach again.
Manager Response: Jessica, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us in the lovely town of Seal Beach! Main Street is one of the main attractions in this area because of its quaint atmosphere. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Clean, good breakfast, lovely service. Attention to details. I would go back. Great price too. Love the location, 22 minutes from Disneyland, close to the beaches too. Nice town.  I drove up and down the coast. Huntington,    Newport, Long Beach, Seal Beach, all the way to Santa Monica, lots of things to do.
Manager Response: Maria, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and have taken advantage of how much this area has to offer! I'm sure your drive up and down the coast was beautiful. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is the most convenient place to stay in order to enjoy the best Seal Beach has to offer. The hot breakfast included omelettes sausage potatoes and waffles as well as the standard continental type fare. The room was upgraded.
Manager Response: John & Maryan, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Our hotel is conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach. We are glad you took advantage of this, especially for Run Seal Beach! We are constantly looking for guest opinions on our breakfast menu. Thank you for your feedback! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Seal Beach is delightful and Pacific Inn a great place to stay
Summary: The location was excellent for visiting Seal Beach, Naples, and Long Beach on foot if you are a walker and certainly by car. There is also a city bus stop only 1 block from the hotel and the hotel also provides shuttle service within 5 miles. While you can tell that it is an older hotel it is well maintained and clean. The site is 3 floors. The ground floor is reception and covered parking. The second floor is rooms and swimming pool / hot tub in an open atrium, and gym. The third floor is rooms and the breakfast room. In my opinion the best rooms are on the 3rd floor either overlooking the little park across the street or the neighborhood housing across the street the other way. I would not want a room along or overlooking the pool. Many if not all rooms have a balcony.
Manager Response: Hello Booptraveler, thank you for choosing The Pacific inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are so glad you took advantage of what The Pacific Inn has to offer! We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, and are extremely close to many local attractions. Our park-side rooms are highly requested, but they are limited. Please ask our front desk staff for our specific room types that can guarantee park-side rooms. However, our rooms overlooking 7th Street and the beach houses definitely give off a beach cottage feel. We apologize for our tubs being too deep for your liking. Since our shower heads are non-adjustable, we will look into providing adjustable shower heads in our rooms for guest convenience. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Chose this hotel as they offer free shuttle service to the carnival cruise port .Impressed at check-in by the friendly staff, free internet access and coffee machine in the lobby. Booked well in advance and only request was a room on the quiet side. Had 2 adjoining rooms with family and enjoyed the free breakfast. Extremely disappointed upon return of cruise however. Shuttle was over an hour late to pick us up at the cruise terminal, room was not ready so we walked to town to get lunch and when we returned we were assigned rooms on the 3rd floor just over the indoor pool and not together plus facing the loud busy street and listened to the children screaming in the pool. Two very different experiences. I would recommend if you could ensure where your room location would be, the
Manager Response: Cruz4ever, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Starting in 2016, we do charge a $10 package fee for transportation to the Long Beach Carnival Cruise Port. Because our shuttles can get very hectic, we have a new system in which our cruise terminal transportation spots are very limited. If you would like to use this service again, please make sure to book as far in advance as possible to guarantee transportation. We greatly apologize for our shuttle being late for your pick-up and for your room not being ready when you arrived back at the hotel. Our check-in is at 3pm, and though we would like to accommodate every guest, we cannot guarantee a check-in before that time. We try our best to keep our shuttle as on time as possible. However, there are many unforeseen circumstances that can cause a delay to our shuttle, such as traffic. Though we are more than happy to put in a request for a park-side room, we cannot guarantee any specific area in the hotel. Please ask our front desk staff for our specific room types that can guarantee a park-side room so we can fulfill all your requests. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Fabulous ocean access and friendly staff
Summary: We had ocean views, comfortable room and nice breakfast selections. Pool was great as was location. Covered and locked parking provided peace of mind. Several good restaurants are walking distance. Terrific weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Jacqueline, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed the short walk down to the beach to experience Seal Beach's beautiful ocean views. We are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We spent several days here,  we wish it could've been for longer but time didn't permit.  Lovely walk to the beach, passing by quaint beach houses. Nice daily breakfast, but if you're a coffee drinker though I suggest the coffee maker in the lobby the coffee in the breakfast room is weak.  The room was very comfortable and clean, the daily maid service was great.  Our room overlooked the park, it has potential to be a quiet, pleasant view however a maintenance worker smashed 4 sliding glass doors in the dumpster below, not the quietest of areas.  We would stay again overall.
Manager Response: AZMOM65, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you took advantage of our location and took a walk down to Main Street! The coffee in the lobby is from Starbucks, and therefore guests tend to like that coffee more than our Wolfgang Puck coffee in the breakfast room. We would like to express our sincerest apology for our maintenance throwing away supplies throughout the day. We only allow things like this to happen during business hours to avoid disrupting our guests. However, we will definitely talk to our maintenance about being as quiet as they can when using our dumpsters. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel to walk to town with a dream breakfast.
Summary: The check-in was friendly and efficient . We stayed 4 nights and our room was clean with plenty of space, a small balcony with chairs and a small table. There was a  small refrigerator to keep foods for the beach or hiking.  It was an easy interesting walk to shops, pier, and beach. The breakfasts included a hot and cold buffet you dream about.
Manager Response: Jczar2014, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We try to accommodate our guests with as many amenities as possible. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn, in December and Jan as we were celebrating the new year..  What a lovely Inn,  there is so much to do there, we walked downtown Seal Beach and so many shops and restaurants, not to mention the fact that the beach is walking distance... We watched M n M Surf school, conduct their business and what wonderful owners Micheal SR n Jr, and a great instructor Jonathan, (Jonnie) very personable..  Yes we will be back!!!!
Manager Response: Madelyn, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, and are walking distance from many local attractions. We are glad you utilized our location! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed at Pacific Inn after our not so great 4 day Carnival cruise to Catalina island and Esenada Mexico out of the Long Beach.  We rented a car upon arrival, we drove from LAX to the Pacific Inn. We parked our car there for FREE and they provided transportation to Long Beach port for FREE. I set up a time to have us pickup from the hotel and they were prompt! We were dropped off at the port and everything went smoothly! After we returned from the cruise, I called and we were picked up by Freeman (nice guy) and transported back to Pacific Inn for FREE, our room was already ready when we arrived that morning. Our car was fine and we had no issues with parking in the garage. Our room was fine, clean, and comfortable. The Pacific Inn is an older hotel, it was clean, and it was
Manager Response: Shaws2much, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Though we do provide transportation to and from the Carnival Cruise Port in Long Beach, our spots are extremely limited. I would highly recommend making these reservations as far in advance as possible! Also, starting in 2016, we have a $10 package fee to guarantee cruise transportation. If you would like to take advantage of this again, please keep that in mind! We are pet friendly. However, we do have a pet contract, and if a guest is ever bothered by a barking dog, we are more than happy to contact that guest to get the situation amended. The safes we provide at the front desk can be quite small, but we are more than willing to hold any electronic devices and/or larger items in our back office. We have sliding doors on our bathrooms. If both doors are slid to the side, it will reveal our closets, which do have ironing boards and irons. If you ever have any questions, please do not hesitate to ask our front desk staff! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed one night at the Pacific Inn and was treated very well. The room was clean and quiet. They offer free parking, wifi, and breakfast. They're walking distance to the beach and shops. I would only suggest that they install a little shelf in the shower to put shampoo etc on. The rooms have all been remodeled which is a plus and the price is great for what you get. I would stay again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Iroll, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback. We are conveniently located within walking distance from Main Street. We try to accommodate our guests with as many amenities as possible. We are so glad you enjoyed these! We are currently working to improve all our rooms. Though we do have shelves in some of our showers, we will look into getting them in all our rooms! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is very conveniently located. You can walk to the restaurants as the beach. Staff were very cordial. Breakfast was included, but would not was average at best. Rooms were comfortable. This hotel is about location and it delivers that.
Manager Response: John, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast menu. Your comment will be taken into consideration. We are so glad you enjoyed our location, and we greatly appreciate your comment on our staff! Guest satisfaction is our top priority! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stumbled across this hotel on a search of hotels near Long Beach where we could park our car safely for a week while on a cruise, and we feel like we hit the jackpot. The hotel doesn't impress from the outside.  It's small and retro-looking, but we parked our car in the covered adjacent garage, walked inside, and were treated to wonderful service from start to finish.  Front desk staff were friendly and helpful. We absolutely adored the town of Seal Beach, and the hotel was just a few blocks from the beach itself and from the cute Main Street shopping and dining district.  The room was large and very comfortable, with a remodeled bathroom, comfy king bed, in-room fridge and microwave, pool and fitness center--the hotel price was an excellent value too!  The hotel not only let
Manager Response: Fernandez21, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for you recent lodging accommodations. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We try our best to ensure all our guests leave happy! Though we do provide Park and Cruise Packages to guests, these spots are limited. If you choose to stay with us again for a Park and Cruise Package reservation, please book with us far in advance to guarantee a shuttle spot! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We drove in from Phoenix for a night, as our 3 year old wanted to visit the beach. I use to live in Seal Beach, so I really wanted to stay in the area, as I knew it pretty well.  The location is great! Rooms are clean and updated. The bathrooms are very nice but the door is a little iffy--but cool at the same time. The beds were hard for my liking but my husband loved it. So each their own on that, but definitely on the harder side. Breakfast was decent, nothing special. Same old, fresh, decent choices. Coffee was AMAZING! (I must say my reviews always include coffee). The pool was clean and warm, along with the hot tub.  Front desk was great, (I cant recall the names, but...) A young cute male and a beautiful lady were super friendly, well knowledgeable of the area, and very
Manager Response: CheewyBrooke, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay! Our bathroom door design is unique, but it is also a great space saver. We wanted to give guests as much floor space as possible. We are currently in the process of replacing all our mattresses. We apologize they were a bit hard for your liking. Our rates are determined by occupancy. Therefore, they change from one day to the next. We are so glad you enjoyed our movie selection! Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Small hotel, but very nice and within walking distance to main street Seal Beach (about 3 blocks over to the start of Main St.).  You can also walk to the pier just beyond the main part of town.  There are lots of restaurant choices within walking distance, and fast food options just across the street,  We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Gerald, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, specifically regarding the location of our hotel. We are conveniently located in the heart of Seal Beach, which provides our guests the chance to experience all the neighborhood attractions, including Main Street! Thank you for your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Great beds & linens, which is SO important!  Nicely remodeled bathroom, large flat screen tv, and fridge & microwave.  And having a balcony with outdoor furniture is really nice. The staff was very friendly & helpful.
Manager Response: Go E, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are in the process of renovating all our rooms, and we always appreciate guest feedback! We are so glad you liked these changes! We like to accommodate our guests in any way that we can. Thank you for your review! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Well, this is a 3 star hotel but don't let that put you off. OK so they don't have a bar and they don't have a restaurant for evening meals but they don't need one. There are loads of great places to eat within a couple of minutes walk from the hotel. The rooms are spacious and extremely clean, the staff are all friendly and overall a very nice place to stay.  Best of all, you can be at the beach within 5 to 10 minutes walk from the hotel so the location is fantastic if you are a fan of the beach. I would certainly stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: MPickering97, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay! We are a boutique hotel, and therefore we are limited to the amount of amenities that can be provided at our property. However, because we are walking distance from Main Street, most guests prefer to spend their time there and at the beach. Thank you for your review. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Walking distance to main St and beach
Summary: Only stayed here one night but could easily spend more time. The area is relaxed and friendly. There are great places to eat breakfast lunch and dinner in the area that are really good value and quality. The room was very clean and tidy and well maintained. The bathroom roomy and clean, Towel soft, The bed was very comfy with a selection of pillows avail. There was a pool, we did not use it but saw others enjoying themselves
Manager Response: Kitemad, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn for 7 nights in the Family Suite which although the décor is a little dated is perfectly comfortable and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The hotel is well positioned with many restaurants nearby as is a beautiful sandy beach. The hotel staff were brilliant and the free hot and cold breakfast was the icing on the cake. Would definitely stay here next time I am visiting LA!!!!
Manager Response: Paul, thank you for choosing The Pacific inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are currently in the process of room renovations, and we apologize about our Family Suite room decor seeming dated. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We come every year for the Special Olympics. It's centrally located. The rooms are nice and clean. The staff is professional and courteous. We always stay at the Pacific Inn. We wake up early and have a nice breakfast, it's a wonderful way to start the day. You are also walking distance to downtown and the beach.
Manager Response: Memolly143, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We stayed here for my husband's 30th yr class reunion.  It was a great little hotel!  Rooms were clean and comfortable.  Staff was very nice and helpful.  Breakfast had a nice selection of items.  The BEST feature was the LOCATION!! It was within walking distance to the beach and the main street of Seal Beach.  There is a small pool with hot tub that our 3yr old twins loved!    My only negative was the "tip jar" in the breakfast room.  I found this to be very tacky and almost pushy.  If breakfast is included, the guests shouldn't be made to feel obligated to tip. We generally DO tip at these types of hotels, but usually on the last morning we are there as a "thank you" and we always hand it directly to the person working the breakfast area.
Manager Response: RbMcG, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Though we do have a tip jar in our breakfast room, we would never want our guests to feel obligated to leave a tip. Since our breakfast attendant gets very busy, we thought the jar would be a simple and convenient way for guests to get their tip to the breakfast attendant if they wished to leave one. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: I stayed for over a week in January.  They have remodeled many if not all of the rooms.  The room I was in was very nice.  The King size bed had 5 pillows on it, ranging from firm to soft.  The mini fridge worked great.   They have a nice selection of "free" on-demand movies.  The breakfast in the mornings is usually some type of potatoes, sausage and egg.  Plus they always have cereal, fresh fruit, juices, coffee, waffle, yogurt and breads that you can toast.  The hot tub is not real big, but the couple of times I used it was not a problem.  I never saw the hot tub full.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  Free starbucks coffee in the lobby 24/7.  My favorite part of the stay here was that I was a 5 minute walk away from the pier.  Lots of good restaurants in the local
Manager Response: M00k3y, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback. We try to keep the hotel as quiet as we can after 10pm. Please do not hesitate to call the front desk if there is any noise bothering you. We have a representative present at all times, and we would be more than happy to assist you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean and close to the beach
Summary: It's an older hotel with clean rooms, remodeled baths and its about four blocks from the beach. Good location and reasonable rates. They have a pool and hot tub. Free wifi, breakfast and newspaper. Microwave in the room. Nice bed linens and pillows.
Manager Response: Ian, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a great location!
Summary: We love The Pacific Inn. The location is great, the staff is great, rooms are nice and clean! We visit Seal Beach every eight weeks and never stay anywhere else. The hotel is walking distance to Old Town Seal Beach with great restaurants and shops!
Manager Response: Karen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad to have you as a loyal guest! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Favorite Family vacation spot, book the Family Suite!
Summary: We come back home twice a year, we always stay at The Pacific Inn. we love the location and all of the conveniences within walking distance, this year we had family come down from Central Cali and we stayed in the Family Suite (5 People Total) and it was more than accommodating for all of us, we will back in 2016!
Manager Response: David, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay in the Family Suite! We are looking forward to seeing you again this year!

Summary: My Husband and I have been coming there for along time now. Love everything about it. Stafff is very helpful, Rooms are very clean and great for weekend getaway. We stay there at least 5- 8 times a year. Do not plan on stopping anytime soon.
Manager Response: Karen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Thank you for being such a loyal guest! We are looking forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: Always enjoy my stay at the Pacfic Inn
Summary: Visit family and friends 1 or 2 times a year and always stay at the Pacific Inn. Lived in the area for most of my life so I  like staying close to the beach, restaurants and shopping.  Clean room, good breakfast and nice people which work there.
Manager Response: Vicki, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We had a great anniversary ❤️ We got picked up at the airport for free and even a upgrade on our room for our anniversary. We just love this hotel . We stay 2 or 3 times a year . Best place to stay in Sesl Beach
Manager Response: Robin, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Happy Anniversary! We are so glad you enjoyed your upgraded room! We will see you soon!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with a great location
Summary: We've stayed at this hotel a handful of times. Great location- easy access to the beach, restaurants and shops. Rooms are clean. Nice free breakfast in the morning and the ladies that work there are very nice. The pool area is kept clean and stocked with clean towels. Our family will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Angcast271, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This was the 2nd time my wife and I had stayed at the hotel . We love it . Staff are awesome and the location is great . We plan on coming back again this year . Highly recommend staying here . Great value ,very clean and all you need in a hotel 👍🏾               Alasdair Watt ,Ma
Manager Response: AlWatt, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope to see you again this year!

Summary: When we come back to our old neighborhood to visit our family and friends, we always stay here. The rooms are nice, and the employees are helpful, friendly. Hotels location is a big plus, walking distance to the pier and nice restaurants and bars. We stay here every 4-6 weeks.
Manager Response: David, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Thank you for being such a loyal guest! We will see you soon!

Summary: Pacific Inn is a friendly spot for both dogs and their human friends.  It is neat, clean, and serves a nice breakfast.  Another bonus is that it is within walking distance to the quaint town of Seal Beach, another very dog-friendly place
Manager Response: Donnaesperon, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you and your dog enjoyed your stay! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: A great find at short notice!!
Summary: I was on a business trip that had me in a groddy hotel the first night.  I called up Pacific Inn and asked if they could put me up on short notice, and I was lucky they had a room!  Was very pleasantly surprised by the quaint atmosphere in a very clean and convenient setting.  The front desk staff was great, and the breakfast was very good.
Manager Response: Khine1, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad we were able to accommodate you with a last minute reservation! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: A very nice hotel in the charming community of Seal Beach.  Just steps from great restaurants, shopping and the public pier and beach.  Courteous, laid-back staff.  Comfortable, clean rooms.  Our family of eight adults would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Christopher, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We had room 225. It's a spacious corner room with two balconies. HVAC worked well. The bathroom was a good size. My husband is tall and big so a large shower is always a plus. Room was newly remodeled. The king bed was comfortable and the flat screen TV was large (over 40".) There was a long counter instead of a dresser. I liked it. I dumped all our carry on stuff and my purse there. The couch was also nice and stiff. The only thing missing was a toilet paper holder in the bathroom. There's a small bar sink, microwave, fridge, coffee maker. Freezer doesn't freeze ice packs. (I have a bad knee.) The drinks in the vending machine were reasonably priced, I thought. I wish all hotel rooms were like this one: spacious, clean, comfy and bright.   Our friends, however, weren't as
Manager Response: Staci, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your upgraded room. We would like to express our sincerest apology for the inconvenience your friends experienced. Our maintenance team leaves at 10pm, but we are more than happy to assist you to the best of our abilities. We are currently taking corrective action with the issues you discussed. Again, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Very nice facility.  Loved the room.  Great breakfast.  Hannah was super sweet and helpful.  Will definitely stay with you again.  Clean neat lived the Bath and Body works toiletries.   Bathroom was really nice!
Manager Response: Julie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We have recently changed our toiletries to Bath and Body Works. It's great to hear that you enjoyed them! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is fantastic and the staff is always extremely helpful.  It is very close to the beach and many great restaurants.  The bed was very comfortable and parking was very close to my room.  The woman assisting, (I think her name was Willi) in the breakfast room was so friendly and seemed to know what I needed before I asked for it.
Manager Response: Cary1573, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Your kind words will be relayed to our breakfast attendant, Willie. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay here- outstanding customer service. Very clean rooms. Great breakfast and coffee:)  Loved the cookies in the Lobby for an after dinner snack.  I normally rent a condo in Newport Beach for my family's Spring vacation, this year I will be going back here!!
Manager Response: Raina, thank you for choosing The Pacific inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: We booked to stay here prior to our cruise because we were aware they offered a complimentary shuttle bus (found out through  Trip Advisor reviews). From the moment we walked through the door the hotel has been amazing. Firstly, the staff....the girls at the front counter (Jackie & Tiana) were friendly and super helpful to us. We arrived early as had to return a vehicle to LAX. We didn't expect our room to be ready, but they arranged everything so we could offload our luggage and get into the room as quickly as possible. Jackie also helped us arrange an Uber ride from LAX back to the accomodation. This was definitely beyond the call of her duty but she was wonderful and we were so appreciative. Secondly, the location of this hotel is brilliant. In less than ten minutes walk
Manager Response: Taj543, thank you for choosing The Pacific inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and greatly appreciate your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The location is perfect (close walking distance to restaurants, shops, bars, the beach), but the hotel is worn.  Reasonable clean rooms for a hotel in a beach community.  Late checkout strongly discouraged (hourly rates can apply).  We heard foot noise above our 2nd floor room, so would recommend staying on 3rd floor.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a budget hotel w/ upscale prices. Shuttle to cruise port poorly contrived, be warned! Breakfast was ok, nothing special. covered parking is ok, if you need more nicks in the side of your car. Area is quaint with lots' overpriced restaurants and antique shops. Will look for a better value next time!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came in at night and was greeted with a heated front lobby and fresh baked cookies. I'm partly sold. The person behind the desk checked us in with no issues and informed us well. The front lobby was clean and accessable. There are two carts near the door so you helped yourself. I guess if you really needed help, you asked and they might help you. I got help from a stranger though.  Rooms are clean that I can tell, but it probably needs a deep cleaning. The shower floor needed some cleaning and sanitizing. There was dust ontop of the headboard and the wardrobe. With the heat/cool blowing it blowed the dust and dirt so it messed with the allergies. The heat/cool system was easy to use. With the shower I loved and appreciated the dual shower adjustable detachable heads.  I liked
Manager Response: PeonyRoze, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We greatly appreciate your feedback, and are currently taking corrective action on the cleanliness of our rooms. Thank you for letting us know what you observed. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are hoping to see you again!

Summary Heading: Love, Love, Love it here at the Pacific Inn!
Summary: We always stay at the Pacific Inn when we visit our daughter in Seal Beach area. Our room was clean, well appointed and great warm sunny view facing 7th Street. Beds are very comfortable, and the decor is updated with a modern touch. Sliding patio doors have been replaced with new ones, which glide easily (unlike the old doors). So happy about that. Property is very well-maintained and perfect for a beach town getaway. Casual and good vibes here. Breakfast was adequate, but we prefer the Hennessy Breakfast coupons offered during our past stays. Ideal location, and very friendly and helpful staff. we will stay here again and again. Feels lie home to us, and we cannot wait t return.
Manager Response: Hello KandT261, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We spent 3 nights between Christmas and New Years. Room was on 3rd floor overlooking street but no road noise was noticed at all. Room was clean and well appointed, refrigerator came in handy for restaurant leftovers. Breakfast included was basic but fine. Location is excellent, can walk to main street, beach, pier and Long Beach marina. Parking was not a problem. Used fitness center with no issues as well as Jacuzzi, pool was a little too cool this time of year.
Manager Response: John L, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We greatly enjoyed our stay at the hotel. The staff were extremely friendly and accommodating and the location of the hotel is ideally close to good restaurants (along Main Street or even across the street from the hotel). The price is also reasonable especially for a beach town.
Manager Response: Giennyb123, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are hoping to see you again soon!

Summary: Pacific Inn is centrally located in Seal Beach, which is a plus when parking in the village is so limited.  You can easily walk to Main St. dining and shops, as well as the beach and pier.  We were scheduled to take their shuttle to the Long Beach Catalina Express boat, but that was cancelled due to high winds. That foiled our plans to stay on Catalina Is. for two nights.  Staff here was quick to provide us with a room for the extra night at a slightly discounted rate.  The pool setting is unique being "indoors" but open to the air above.  Covered parking and breakfast are bonus.  Highly recommend and hope to stay again.
Manager Response: Roamingnoni, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We apologize about your Catalina trip being cancelled, but we are glad we were able to provide you with a room for another night. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Recently returned from a week's stay.  As always the hotel met our expectations.  The rooms were clean and neat.  They just added comfy pink blankets that do not produce static.  Breakfast is plentiful with a good variety of items.  The staff is friendly and very helpful.  The holiday decorations added a nice touch to the lobby.  When I suggested they add a menorah next year, my idea was graciously received and I feel certain when we visit next holiday season there will be a menorah included with the decorations.  We are looking forward to an early spring visit.  Happy Holidays to the entire staff.
Manager Response: Rlipschutz, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Thank you for your feedback. Happy  Holiday's and we are looking forward to seeing you in the Spring!

Summary: We decided to stay here based solely on the location and it was perfect.  We were walking distance to the Main St. shops and restaurants and the ocean.  The staff were all very friendly and helpful.  The accomodations were average - nothing fancy but not too bad.
Manager Response: Melissa, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we hope you choose to stay with us in the future.

Summary: We stayed over Thanksgiving the rooms were great and the service was perfect I have stayed here before and will again on my next trip to Seal Beach. The hotel is walking distance to main street with all kinds of shops restaurant's and bars great spot.
Manager Response: Jaztender, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We appreciate your review and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The terrific Pacific Inn. We had a great stay at this very well placed location. All staff were friendly and accommodating, especially Victoria who greeted us every morning at Multi option breakfast. Great facilities too, and the free parking and wifi was a big bonus. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Chantharding, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we appreciate your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Best Hotel I Have Ever Stayed At!!!
Summary: Better than what I expected. We weren't so sure about the hotel at first, upon arriving we were treated very well. It felt like we were visiting someone's home not a hotel. We were upgraded to a two bedroom suite. The rooms were so pretty and nice. There was a hot tub!!! Breakfast was amazing. No packaged food, it was hot and tasty. We are going to keep booking with this hotel for a while. It was truly amazing.
Manager Response: Leslmen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I really loved this little place. I needed a vacation badly and so the amenities that may seem simple to others (like free breakfast, bottled water at the desk or a Starbucks machine in the lobby) were luxuries to me! And much appreciated.   The staff was really nice and welcoming and went out of their way to help or answer questions. I felt well taken care of.  Great location. I was going to an event down the street at the Community Center neat the Marina. The weather was gorgeous and I could walk there in 5 minutes! Nice surprise. The next day, I didn't really know where I was in relation to Main Street, but it turns out I was, again, a 5 minute walk, if that. So cool.   They also have a free shuttle service within 5 miles, and lots of info/brochures about the area, which is
Manager Response: Jamie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your amazing review. We greatly appreciate your feedback! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Price increase lowered value of experience
Summary: We have stayed at the Pacific Inn many times while visiting friends in the area.  It is a neat little hotel in a great location.  However, their room rates have been escalating out of sync with other hotels in the area.  Yes, they have added a warm breakfast, but it leaves something to be desired and definitely isn't worth the cost that's been added to the room. The carpet was frayed in our room and there was grit left on the bathroom floor.  For the price we paid on our last trip, we would expect a 5 star experience.  We did book late and it was the Centennial weekend - so part of this was our problem.  However we mentioned we were regulars with AutoClub discount - and they didn't flinch or offer a coupon or anything.  I've lowered my rating from an excellent to an average. If
Manager Response: CalifCoupleSanDiego, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We would like to express our sincerest apology for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay due to our price increases. Due to many upgrades we have completed this year and the price increases of our local hotel competitors, our daily rates have increased as well. We are currently running monthly sales, and therefore no other discounts can be applied on top of this discounted rate, including our usual auto club discount. However, our discounted room rates are currently lower than what an auto-club discount would have been. If you every experience any inconvenience during your stay, our front desk staff will be more than happy to assist you. Again, we apologize for the inconveniences. We hope you choose to stay with us in the future.

Summary: This Hotel is only a few miles from where I live and I have stayed there as well as had friends who did. I love that you can walk to Main Street In Seal Beach and have so many choices for dining. The Beach is a little walk but you can do that as well. The staff is always nice and competent.
Manager Response: Peggy, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We just got off a cruise ship and weren't ready to make the drive home so we stopped at The Pacific Inn. The beds are comfortable, rooms are alot more better looking then from looking at the exterior of the hotel.
Manager Response: Alex, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We hope you choose to stay with us again soon!

Summary: A gem in Seal Beach! Stayed there with the family. Clean and crisp room. Great jacuzzi tub. Comfy beds. Great staff! Great pool! Outstanding all around! Even the location was perfect - close to the beach, close to delicious restaurants, and close to Main St. It's small but wonderful!
Manager Response: Kimberly, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a great little hotel! The location is fabulous, you don't need a car for anything if you stay here. Great restaurants, shops, bar, beach, etc. are all within a two block walk. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Karen, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: An Inside out funky fun hotel
Summary: While aspects of this hotel were bizarre (the pool is an olympic size bath tub (= very small) and is located on the second floor in center of ring of rooms) there is so much about it which is charming and sincere.  Everyone I met who worked there was very genuine and caring going well out of there way to help.  The rooms are remodeled in a style which, though inconsistent with the rest of the hotel, is very pleasant.  A sort of wannabee zen chic modern, but it works!  The art on the walls was unpretentious and sweet, the shogi glass doors to bathroom and closet were fun and let light through pleasantly.  The rooms were clean and very functional with micro and fridge and little eateries and markets near by with a walk to the beach and the charming La Bolsa avenue.  I really liked
Manager Response: SPBSanFrancisco, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad our hotel made you feel like you were at your home away from home. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Because we are a very small hotel, an atrium style set-up was the best fit for the property. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our tribe of 2A+2K had 4 nights here recently at the end of a 4 week trip from Australia.  We looked for a hotel which was near the beach, shops, Disneyland, restaurants etc and this one ticked all the boxes.  Neat rooms with nice amenities, great indoor pool and spa, and a tremendous location adjacent to Main St, with all the restaurants and the pier.  Only downside was extreme noise from aircons on the balcony and we found an unopened bottle of vodka and soda under the cabinet.  Would recommend this hotel and stay there again.  Mick T. Melbourne AU
Manager Response: Mick T, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and would like to express our sincerest apologies about your air conditioning  unit. In the future, please let the front desk know about any issue you may come across, and we will assist you right away. Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn.

Summary: The Pacific Inn is a fabulous find. It is convenient to the beach and quaint shops and mom and pop style restaurants.  There is a CVS within walking distance also.The hotel is clean and staff is friendly.  Fantastic place!
Manager Response: 4AZFamily, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We were visiting from the UK & I booked this hotel on strength of reviews from trip advisor- We were upgraded to a suite when we arrived which was a lovely surprise-we cud spread our bags out and sort them out. Lovely bathroom & very clean.  Staff at check in were friendly & helpful.  In foyer is Starbucks coffee and cookies for free-made use of these. Breakfast was ample tho waffle maker was broken that day.  Undercover parking which was great.  All in all a pleasant stay.  Thank you Pacific Inn
Manager Response: Mel, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and sincerely apologize about our waffle maker being out of service during your stay. The next time you stay with us, the waffle maker will be up and running! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Very nice stay before our cruise. Awesome staff and atmosphere. Rooms were perfect and clean. Lots in the vicinity as far as food, pharmacy, and grocery. Also easy access. We are definitely staying here again. Pool and hot tube area is very clean and has an adjacent bathroom. The rooms are also quite and never heard another guest
Manager Response: Carl, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is located just off of the PCH. It is walking distance to the beach, marina and downtown Seal Beach. The Inn has a unique pool area and a fantastic hot breakfast. The rooms and public areas were clean and inviting. Excellent staff that went above and beyond. Best value for your dollar hands down.
Manager Response: BethaViking, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Guest feedback is very important to us. We appreciate your great review. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We had a large family wedding in Seal Beach and most of our out of town guests spent 1-4 nights here. Pacific Inn made our stay so pleasant first by the amazing front desk staff to the impeccably clean rooms. The location is fabulous and within walking distance to great food and shopping and of course the beach. Parking was perfect everytime we ventured out there was a space found for parking when we came back. Great hotel, great rates, and great staff. Thank you for a wonderful weekend.
Manager Response: Mary, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your group accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed staying with us, and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I was so pleased with our stay here.  We had 5 rooms for 1 night.  The staff couldn't have been more helpful or pleasant.  We left our 5 cars there for 4 days while we cruised, free of charge and under cover parking. They also shuttled us to and from the cruise ship for free.  The rooms were clean and nice. We all enjoyed the pool area and several places to walk to and eat. The free continental breakfast was ok., but there are other choices close by, if you want more.  The front desk people, Abraham and others, were especially nice. would stay here again...
Manager Response: Syann6, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The only reason I didn't give 5/5 is because, in the rare event that Southern California gets heavy rains (as it did on the morning of my check-out), the parking lot floods with 6-8 inches of water. I ended up removing socks and shoes and hiking up my pant legs to get to my car. Otherwise, clean room, decent breakfast, actual hd channels on the tv, excellent customer service.
Manager Response: Richard, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We would like to express our sincerest apology for the flooding that you experienced at check-out. We are not used to the rain! We hope you will choose to stay with us again!

Summary: We frequently visit Seal Beach and this is the hotel we have chosen each time.  It is convenient to restaurants and shops on Main Street, walking distance to the pier.  The rooms are clean, the staff is very helpful and parking is plentiful.  The breakfast was nice, basic continental breakfast items with waffle makers, cute little eating area.  Overall, great place to stay.
Manager Response: Julikins55, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We appreciate your review. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This hotel was spotless.  The coffee machine in the lobby made delicious coffee.  We enjoyed the Jacuzzi and pool.  Both were extremely clean.  The bathroom is large.  The room has a balcony with a table and chairs.  The bed was very comfortable.  They serve a free breakfast. It was very quiet and romantic.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Bonnie, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Very good motel--clean, spacious, and all of the people were extremely friendly and helpful.  We stayed two nights.   The renovated rooms make it a very good value considering the price  Good location, I highly recommend.
Manager Response: Japlack, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your feedback on our renovated rooms. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The staff was very friendly. Location is great with easy access to PCH/405, short walk to the beach, and great restaurants all around. The rooms were good. And interior pool area is very comfortable for relaxing or working. Solid breakfast included.
Manager Response: 111Tom, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My husband and I have enjoyed staying at the Pacific Inn for years.  The staff is friendly and the rooms spacious and clean.  The Inn is walking distance to restaurants and the Seal Beach Pier.  We highly recommend.
Manager Response: Zanna2, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your Seal Beach lodging accommodations. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you have enjoyed staying with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location by the beach. Our home away from home. We are coming back
Summary: We spent 5 nights here when our daughter started at CSULB. I originally  chose the Pacific inn on one criteria only - proximity to CSULB and Seal Beach.  The location is excellent. We have been delighted that the hotel has delivered us so much more. The pool spa area. Easy parking, very comfortable bed , quality bed linen, quiet abs very clean room,  convenient and comprehensive self help breakfast. But the  thing that really stood out was the staff; reception, breakfast and cleaners. They were all helpful,  professional and efficient, but most importantly genuine to deal with  Our experience started when our internatinal flight was delayed,  then it took 1.5 hours to get our rental car. Instead of arriving at the Pacific Inn at 11.30pm as planned we arrived at 3.15am  tired and
Manager Response: SouthPacificTravellr, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent Seal Beach lodging accommodations. We appreciate your kind review, and are glad you enjoyed your stay. We are looking forward to seeing you in September!

Summary: We recently spent 5 nights here. The accommodations are clean, the property generally well maintained and the staff is helpful.   That said, the walls are very thin and noise from the hallways easily bleeds through. Since we were near the pool (room 205) this was an issue. Also the main door to our room was very challenging to shut quietly and the sliding glass doors that close off the bathroom and closet are also very loud (not good when some else is sleeping in the room) and easy to pinch fingers in. The water pressure in the shower is poor. The blackout drapes do not close completely and, since the light on the outside balcony cannot be turned off, there is a constant irritating strip of light bleeding into the room.  Also the 'continental breakfast bar' is of fairly poor
Manager Response: none

Summary: Convenient to the beach, restaurants and other activities. Hotel is  comfortable and the Suites were perfect for family gatherings.  Hotel staff is outstanding and service was exemplary - provided extras (chairs, tables) for us and each family member greeting with welcome kit upon arrival. Would hold another event there.
Manager Response: D R, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your family reunion with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Favorite place to stay, Hands down!
Summary: We come back to California twice a year and always stay here, home away from home for us! staff is always friendly and accommodating and I have always bugged them for early check-ins and that have always made it happen. Arguably the best location in the Long Beach/OC area....if you are on the fence about staying here, just do it, you will be glad you did!
Manager Response: David, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for you recent lodging accommodations. We appreciate your feedback, and are glad you have enjoyed staying with us. Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We arrived at 1pm and were able to check into our room right away. Our room was clean and had a balcony. The hotel was about a 10 minute walk to the beach, through a quite and safe neighborhood. The breakfast was decent and had several hot and cold choices. Coffee and hot cocoa were offered in the reception area all day long. There was a nice pool and hot tub area with lots of seating. We paid $300 for the 2 nights on Expedia. Which is really a deal for a decent hotel in CA. Free parking was a nice bonus. We did travel to LA one day which ended up taking over 2 hours each way on the crowded highways. You need to have a lot of patience and expect that you will stop at every stop light if you plan on a day trip there.
Manager Response: Dvbassist, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We appreciate your review and feedback. The Los Angeles traffic can definitely be tough, but we hope your day made up for it. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Just had a great week at the Pacific Inn. Always warm, friendly and helpful. Comfy beds and nice breakfast. Looking forward to our October visit. Great location. Close to beach, restaurants and shopping. We visit all the time and are always looking forward to our next visit. Did I mention parking is free.
Manager Response: RlipSchutz, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We appreciate your great review. We are looking forward to seeing you in October!

Summary: I love it! all as very good! the room was clean, the staff, the food!!! everything was so good!! the bad thing was that i've made my check out today.. i wanted to stay more days there! We arrive on July 27 ( Monday ) and... there was a girl at the front desk... a pretty beautiful and kind girl! she changed my room for another to my family and i without any problem.. but i forgot to ask her name... but tell her that thanks for all!!!  i hopeto see her again someday!
Manager Response: Nicolas, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We appreciate all guest feedback. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We came here as a mini vacation with our dog to get away from the Las Vegas heat.  The Pacific Inn is located in a terrific area as it is quiet and peaceful and has easy access to a lot of things.  We had a room with a king size bed and the room was very clean and the bed comfy.  The rooms also have a refrigerator and microwave.  The bathroom is spacious with great water flow.  Enjoyed the ocean breeze while sitting on the balcony reading.  Breakfast is very good as the hot and cold selection is impressive and fresh.  Enjoyed it very much. Loved sitting by the pool/spa after coming back from the beach. The staff of the Pacific Inn are awesome!  They are very friendly and helpful.  I could not figure out how to get the balcony light on and maintenance came right up and fixed it
Manager Response: Kim, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for you recent lodging accommodations. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate the great review! We are looking forward to seeing you during your next Seal Beach visit!

Summary: First let me state there is no ocean view but otherwise a great location. You can walk to the beach, restaurants, Main Street. The service was great. Our room, #320, was spacious, had everything we need, quiet, and comfortable. It is not a new hotel so you can see caulking in the bathroom but it is good sized with nice vanity.  Have stayed here before and will definitely return.
Manager Response: Ava, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for you recent lodging accommodations. Since we are a smaller hotel, we are not tall enough to see the ocean. However, we are the closest hotel to the water in the Seal Beach area. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: The staff are delightful, the pool is small but kids didn't complain.  Rooms are nice and large.  Breakfast is a typical hotel-style.  Near shops, cafes, banks, pharmacies and the beach.  Mattress is very soft (if you like that).  A bit run down but perfectly acceptable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family (of 4) stayed here for 3 nights and thought our experience was nice. This is our second year in a row booking this hotel and we like the location (walking distance from Seal Beach), continental breakfast in the morning and covered parking is nice. The shower was spacious as it fit my little kids and an adult to clean up from the beach. The balcony is roomy for relaxing and the staff and housekeeping personal were friendly. The room was clean. The hide-a-way bed was very useful in our room too. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Make The Pacific Inn Your Getaway!
Summary: This hotel is just-right! Clean rooms, fresh sea air comes in from the balcony, a pool/spa area for relaxing after the beach, close to everything that makes a beach getaway perfect! When you wake, the American breakfast awaits you with made to order waffles and a feast for all to enjoy. A 5 minute stroll will get you to the Main Street and beach pier. be sure to ask the front desk for a boogie board, too. Seal Beach is a GEM! There is a lovely greenbelt/park directly across the street, and whatever you need, you can walk to get, as a grocery store/bank is nearby. Don't forget the shuttle service that is offered, but you might want to ride the public transit "Aquabus" to the LB Aquarium and Queen Mary. The location is ideal and hotel is an affordable luxury. Look no further!
Manager Response: Justsayjules, thank you for your great review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We offer a complimentary shuttle service that can take guests to the Long Beach Pike area, which includes the Queen Mary and Long Beach Aquarium. We are happy to accommodate you in the future, We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Whilst it is quite a basic hotel we thought it was good value.  The reception staff were helpful always.  Free coffee (and sometimes cookies) in reception nice touch.  The breakfast was basic and you had to be there early as many items ran out. But given it was included and always trailed as a basic breakfast this was fine.  Room was ok. A little dated. Air con unit very noisy.  Shame no room safes. I really don't understand why the hotel doesn't have these. They had limits safety deposit boxes at the reception but this isn't ideal.   Hotel location good as well, near shops and the main street with restaurants etc . Only a couple of blocks from the really pleasant seal beach too.   We picked this place as a good base whilst exploring LA but getting away from the city .   Would
Manager Response: Visit10, thank you for your review. We bake cookies daily for our guests. They are set out around 5pm. These are a guest favorite, so they go fast! Most of our guests do not request safes, and therefore we do not provide them in our rooms. We are more than happy to accommodate guests with our safes at the front desk. We are constantly looking for ways to improve our breakfast room. We appreciate your feedback and will definitely look into the issue, Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn. We hope to accommodate you in the future.

Summary: While the hotel isn't the biggest, it definitely was warm and inviting.  Tracy at the front desk was amazing with the best personality everrr.  The rooms were super clean and the maid service was awesome.  This hotel also had a great hot breakfast served daily.  The location hands down was the best for the price.  Small walk to main street for shopping, food, and 5 minutes from the ocean.  The only negative thing I have to say would be the parking.  We arrived back late from Disneyland one night and had nowhere to park.  I would definitely book there again!!!
Manager Response: Brett, thank you for your great review. We appreciate your feedback. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Unfortunately, we do have limited parking. Some guests have to park multiple cars which can take up space. However, guests are welcome to park anywhere around the building, as well as in our shuttle spots. We are happy to move our van to accommodate guests. We are looking forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: I only stay here when I'm in LA area. Its centrally located, the town is quaint, plenty of good places to eat within walking distance. The rooms are always clean and the bed is very comfortable. If your traveling with dogs there is a cute little park right outside the hotel. The breakfast is excellent!! They have lots of (FREE) covered parking. The most important thing is I always feel safe here.
Manager Response: Debbie, we appreciate your review. Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your recent lodging accommodations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Guest safety is extremely important to us. We are constantly working to improve our breakfast menu. Thank you for the feedback! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Just had the best stay in Seal Beach, California at the Pacific Inn. I've been staying there for over 20 years and have enjoyed it each time. The staff is great and I love the whole Seal Beach experience. Only two blocks from the beach and great shopping and restaurants within walking distance. The rooms at the Pacific Inn are lovely and I will return every time I'm beach bound.
Manager Response: Mary, thank you for your great review, and for being a loyal customer over the last 20 years. That is very impressive! We are looking forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a perfect wedding
Summary: We stayed here on Saturday night, June 27, 2015. The place was packed but the exceptional customer service never waned. The building isn't much to look at from the outside but it's so much nicer on the inside. We stayed for a wedding and the hotel even offered a shuttle to the wedding. The extra touch of a note under the door welcoming us with a shuttle schedule and some candy made our day. Thanks to the stellar employees for making our stay perfect!
Manager Response: Sarah, thank you for your great review. We are very busy during summer months, but I'm glad our staff was able to accommodate you. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Spent 4 nights at the hotel.  Seal Beach is such a great town. Laid back with a great beach and atmosphere. The staff at the hotel are so friendly and helpful. The breakfast is great to fill up on to start your day. The hotel is in walking distance of the beach and town centre so park up your car and let your feet do the walking. The rooms are large and we had a recently refurbished one which had a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The bed was large and very comfortable. This was our second stay and we will stay again if we return to Seal Beach.
Manager Response: Michele, thank you for your great review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We do provide refrigerators, microwaves and coffee makers in all our rooms for future reference, and we are currently in the process of renovating every room. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is the only hotel within easy walking distance of old town with its restaurants and the pier. Easy free parking, very helpful staff. My room had just been updated, and was very pleasant with a clean, contemporary feel. The fridge and microwave are nice, the wifi free, and a nice breakfast included.  Definitely the place to stay if you want to spend time in old town.
Manager Response: dhinfo, thank you for your great review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us in one of our newly renovated rooms. We are in the process of completing these renovations in all our rooms! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: One night stop on way to San Diego
Summary: Upgraded to family suite at no extra cost which was very spacious for the two of us . Lounge area with TV and sofa. Nice pool and jacuzzi and close to shops . Beach a short drive which is nice also . Hangout cafe serves some great food and the ice cream creamery on next corner is sensational . Breakfast at hotel was also good ... Plenty if choice and not busy and nice to sit overlooking pool area.  Only downsides were wi fi not good at the time and a little noise from room above .
Manager Response: Weaver510, thank you for your great review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us in your complimentary upgraded room. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I stayed a month at the hotel and had a fantastic experience.As usual my room was on the top floor,last one at the end;the balcony overlooked the park just behind and in the afternoons the sunset would unfold as I enjoyed a beverage outside the sliding screen doors.The room itself had everything needed for a long stay including microwave and fridge and featured a comfy king bed,an excellent shower and bathroom plus a high quality large flat screen television.The breakfast room was also on the top floor and overlooked the indoor/outdoor pool,and a lovely lady named Victoria provided a cozy and welcoming way to begin the day.There was Wolfgang Puck coffee on offer as well as several kinds of 100% juices and cereals available and even breakfast burritos.I should mention that in the
Manager Response: CoachPaulbball, thank you for your great review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Nice room all the bells & whistles. Fridge, microwave, coffee maker, & balcony. Good bed. Great free breakfast every morning served by the very courteous Victoria. Clean room & free parking nice pool area. Good location shops and restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Lou, thank you for your review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed you stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Having a meeting in Newport, did not like the hotel prices down there and it is very noisy so decided to check out this little place near where we used to live. We had to rebook because our schedule had changed but they couldn't have been better. The room was nice. Very comfy and quiet. The A.C. worked very well. Plumbing and electrical was very good. Breakfast wasn't fancy but very tasty and there was a nice variety. Eggs, Canadian Bacon, Waffles and plenty of bread. They even had very good soda biscuits. It was filling. The coffee was very good also. The breakfast room is situated on the 3rd floor and very small with some tables on the walk way in the open area. It would be great to see a larger eating area. They pack a lot into a small space. This is a very nice property and
Manager Response: Johntrak, thank you for your great review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The staff at The Pacific Inn are fantastic. They are friendly and super helpful. We arrived after a 14 hour international flight and a day travelling and they happily organised our room do we could check in early. The complimentary breakfast is extensive and everyone should find something to satisfy them. Rooms are comfortable and well appointed - king bed is the way to go!
Manager Response: Rachel, thank you for your fantastic review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: If you are looking for the perfect getaway, look no further than this quaint hotel.  The staff was friendly, we arrived way ahead of check-in time and our room was still occupied.  As soon as it was ready they gave us a call to let us know.  It's location is within walking distance of the pier and all the mainstreet shops. We had a private balcony that overlooked a peaceful park.  There was covered parking that made it convenient.  In the morning we enjoyed a great complimentary breakfast which enclosed sausage, waffles and fresh juices.  Loved it so much, going back In August for my birthday.
Manager Response: MsCin1959, thank you for your great review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you in August!

Summary: First and foremost, I will say that the customer service that has occurred was absolutely remarkable and I am very Happy with the immediate responses and help that was needed.. I will be returning. Thank you all very much  On another note: This is a beautiful place and the rooms are great.  Loved that we could walk to Main St. and enjoy and then walk back to our room..  Thank you so much .... Tina and Family..
Manager Response: Tznitup, thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This place is really nice but reasonable. It's near downtown and we've been coming for 20 years. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They have a continental breakfast, which is perfect for those of us who just want some coffee and not much else in the morning.
Manager Response: Johnshu, thank you for your great review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I've been staying at this place for years, and last weekend was as good as ever. However, it was the first time I stayed in a "jacuzzi room," and was slightly disappointed that the jacuzzi was just a regular bathroom tub with a whirlpool.  I expected something grander. In the future, I'll opt for one of the regular rooms, which have fantastic showers.
Manager Response: MR02460, thank you for your great review. We really appreciate your feedback. We try to inform all our guests about the size of our Jacuzzi tubs, and I apologize you were uninformed of this. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Hotel staff / concierge at the front desk was extremely friendly, polite, and professional. After checking me in, she offered me a bottle of water and told me about their shuttle service within 5 miles. Room was neatly kept and clean. Blackout curtains were perfect for sleeping in. All the basic amenities were provided and maintained.
Manager Response: M Y, thank you for your review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Hotel stay before a 7-day cruise embarking in Long Beach
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Pacific Inn before and after our two cruises in January and April.  Excellent customer service each visit.  There is shuttle service to and from the ship.  The king size bed was very comfortable. Room was clean and enjoyed the balcony.  Small gym area. Breakfast is standard continental. And enjoyed walking to some of the good local restaurants.
Manager Response: Mari, thank you for your great review. We appreciate your feedback and are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Stayed here night before our cruise
Summary: This hotel was by far thee best place I've stayed at for customer service! Nice breakfast as well. Clean & walking distance to everything. They even got a larger shuttle for our party to and from the ship. Everyone was very accommodating and nice, from the min we checked in and out.
Manager Response: Mzzqueenbee, thank you for your review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!
