Summary: For the past 7 years, we have kept coming back all the way from France, to this nice hotel, so conveniently located. Being on my own this time, I was upgraded to a suite. Rooms are large, very clean, bedding is comfortable, breakfast is nice. We will definitely come back next year!
Manager Response: Fidjidomino, thank you for your review. your feedback is greatly appreciated. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My husband and I were very pleased with our recent stay at the Pacific Inn. We spent one evening in Seal Beach on our honeymoon, and we were very pleased with the accommodations. Pricing was reasonable, and the room was nice and quiet. The room itself was pretty standard, but the bathroom was quite nice, and the free parking was a major bonus. The staff was especially friendly and helpful. I spilled a little milk while trying to juggle a few items at breakfast and someone came to help me clean up in seconds. I was very impressed with the demeanor, and attentiveness of all staff members that I encountered. The area also had some great restaurant options, and the pier was less than a mile down the road. Breakfast was essentially standard continental, but they also had a waffle
Manager Response: Alex, thank you for your great review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Highly recommend this hotel if you're going to the Seal Beach area.  I am picky about things I want in a hotel. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The room was very nice. The entire facility was clean and has plenty of free parking.  The breakfast  was probably the best hotel breakfast I've had (period).  3 kinds of coffee, 4 kinds of juice, scrambled eggs, fried potatoes and sausages.  Several cold cereals. Hot cereals, bagels, muffins, fresh waffle batter to make your own waffles, yogurt, hardboiled eggs and more.  Maybe an 8 minute walk to the beach. Recommend you call for directions as Marina Dr is easy to miss where it meets the Pacific Coast Highway.  Will stay again when going to that area.
Manager Response: Chuck, thank you for your review. It is greatly appreciated. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I have stayed at the Pacific Inn in Seal Beach 3 times within the last year.  The staff is exceptional!  They are always there if you need help.  The rooms are beautiful.  There is a huge shower, tv, microwave, fridge, hair dryer and much more.  They have a breakfast room that offers a small variety of foods which is nice since they are a small place and a lot of the smaller places offer nothing for breakfast.  Love the entire layout of the Pacific Inn. They provide shuttle service to the cruise port and have packages that allow you to leave car with them while you cruise or fly out of town.  If you need shuttle service please make sure that you set up your reservation ahead of time so they know you need it.  I just booked again for January.
Manager Response: Denise, thank you for your great review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My husband, my sister, my dog and I stayed here one night.  We were travelling down the coastline and found this gem by sheer luck.  The room was nice, the staff was excellent and the whole experience was fabulous!  Pacific Inn YOU ROCK!
Manager Response: Hairtoni2907, thank you for your great review! Guest satisfaction is our top priority and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great location. We were able to park the car and walk everywhere, which was very relaxing. The cleanliness of the Pacific Inn impressed me immediately. I loved being able to open the balcony door and smell the fresh ocean air. The staff was very friendly! This is not a luxury hotel, but a very comfortable hotel that fits into the relaxed ambience of Seal Beach.
Manager Response: 338maryg726, thank you for your great review, we really appreciate your feedback! We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My husband and I were attending a family function and just by chance came across The Pacific Inn.   Perfect location ---easy walk to Main Street Seal Beach.  Nothing too fancy, clean but average rooms---we had a small balcony where we had dinner one night.  We will return---best kept secret.
Manager Response: ShadowmanArcata, thank you for your great review. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We had a great weekend relaxing here. The front desk was wonderful, even when dealing with very difficult guests. The entire staff was attentive to our needs and made the stay very easy and relaxing. Going back next month!!
Manager Response: Randy, thank you for your great review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Always the ideal location for me to do business and for a safe and wonderful environment. Main street is within walking distance where you'll find the great shops, wonderful restaurants, and much more!
Manager Response: Troylerew, thank you for your great review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: The "very good" rating is for location and reasonable price...average accommodations
Summary: We've been before, will undoubtedly go back.  Very reasonable, well-located, friendly.  Average rooms...average or below breakfast. Clean, quiet, considering where it is.  Walking distance to Seal Beach and to the beach itself. Good
Manager Response: Eugene, thank you for your review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we appreciate your feedback. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: This was the ideal hotel for our needs, including proximity to the beach, restaurants and shopping without needing our car.  It's easy to find, in a safe neighborhood and the staff was very helpful.  We were able to add an additional night without previous arrangements at the same rate as we had booked on Expedia. The breakfast was warm and filling and the pool and hot tub were clean and not crowded. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Chris, thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn, and thank you for your excellent review. We appreciate all guest feedback, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our family of 6 went on a wonderful Carnival Cruise last week.  We wanted a nice place to stay before and after our cruise that's close to the beach with a breakfast,  pool, free parking for an entire week, free shuttle to our cruise, and 1 room where all 6 of us could stay so I wouldn't have to book 2 separate rooms.  We got ALL that at The Pacific Inn.  WOW!!  The neighborhood is super clean and the homes all around the area are so beautiful!!  They let us check in early.  They had boogie boards for the beach.  We used their free computer to print our tickets.  We were all driven to our cruise and picked up afterwards while we left our truck in their covered garage.  The entire staff was awesome.  We enjoyed their hot tub both nights after the beach. We were happy to get the
Manager Response: SouthernUtahTraveler, thank you for your amazing review! Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we are happy you enjoyed your stay with us. I apologize about the bathroom door and dim lighting. We will definitely look into these issues! Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Pacific Inn was perfect for our weekend beach vacation. Walking distance from many shops and stores. and just blocks from the beach .. We had a fantastic time. The Rooms are good sized and bathrooms are updated.
Manager Response: Lorie, thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Wonderful place to stay! I would definitely book this hotel again! Seal Beach is a quiet little beach town, close to the other beaches (Huntington, Newport), but a nice little retreat away from the noise and crowds----a great place to enjoy the ocean and weather!
Manager Response: Michelle, thank you for the fabulous review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Seal Beach, itself, is such a beautiful place ... I just expected more from The Pacific Inn. The room was basic, marginally clean, no views, service was not good ... you get the picture. I think if you had kids to enjoy the (very small) swimming pool & hot tub, it might have been OK. We did not. I'll stay somewhere else, next visit.
Manager Response: Richard, thank you for your review. We appreciate all guest feedback, and would like to express our sincerest apology for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. Guest satisfaction is our top priority, and we will look into the issues you have expressed. We are currently in the process of renovating all our rooms to increase guest satisfaction. Since we only have 71 rooms, our hotel is quite small, and we apologize for the size of our pool and hot tub. Since we only have three floors, we do apologize for our lack of views. Thank you for choosing to stay at The Pacific Inn.

Summary: We learned about the Pacific Inn on one of our many trips to Southern California.  It is conveniently located near Long Beach and Huntington Beach and is within walking distance to the quaint Seal Beach downtown area.  The rooms are clean and comfortable, and breakfast is included.  I now don't even consider other properties when visiting, the Pacific Inn has it all.
Manager Response: Lisa, thank you for your kind review. We are happy your enjoyed your stay at The Pacific Inn. We are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice place close to shops and beach
Summary: This property has some of the nicest staff who will take care of you.  We arrived late night and was greeted by a very bubbly front desk who was actually at the desk and not behind a door.  She offered us waters and asked if there was anything she could do for us.  We were upgraded to a jacuzzi tub room which was nice even though we didn't use it.  Had an issue with the fridge not working and we had food and medicine needing to be cooled.  Front desk had maintenance put a new one in within the hour!  Then called later to make sure it was working.  The rooms are nice and the beds were comfortable.  Liked how close it was to the shops and the pier.  We will be coming back soon.
Manager Response: April885, thank you for your kind review. Guest satisfaction is our number one priority, and we are glad you were pleased with our staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We spent a wonderful time in Seal Beach and at the Pacific Inn.  As always the room was clean and the staff was very helpful.  We are planning a visit to the area in April and we have already booked our stay.  Can't wait to visit again.  Making my reservation was fast and easy with the very efficient front desk staff.  Making plans for our stay already.
Manager Response: Rlipschutz, thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: We only spent one night here but wish we had have had more time, as we loved the area and the hotel was so clean, modern rooms, quiet and in a great spot to be able to walk and explore the area  The cookies available was a nice touch, so was the free shuttle bus to take you into long beach
Manager Response: EssexladyRomford, we are happy you enjoyed your stay at The Pacific Inn. Thank you for your review. We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: I have stayed here many times with my husband, and we are always satisfied with our stay! We even have our favorite rooms to stay in! The rooms are very clean and the beds are extremely comfy! Each room comes with a microwave, mini-fridge, and a balcony (which is my favorite part!). The Pacific Inn has a personal feel because of it still being independently owned and operated. The staff is friendly, the rooms are very clean, free hot breakfast is offered each morning, and you can walk to the beach and Main Street in a couple of minutes. Can't beat it!
Manager Response: Colette, thank you for your kind review. We appreciate any and all guest feedback. I am glad your stay went well, and we look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: The Pacific Inn is situated in the most ideal location if you are looking to visit Seal Beach. But, their friendly service is most definitely the reason why I keep coming back. The front desk always greets everyone with a smile, offers each guest a complimentary bottle of water, and check-in is easy and efficient. Each employee is more than willing to go the extra mile when it comes to guest service. Whether you are traveling alone, with friends, or with your significant other, Seal Beach has an activity to offer for everyone; and The Pacific Inn staff with make it feel like home.
Manager Response: Good evening Tammy. Thank you so much for your amazing review. Guest satisfaction is our top priority and we are very grateful for your kind words. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Our room had been recently remolded, it was terrific,clean & very comfortable. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The property is within walking distance to the beach and Main Street. The Seal Beach area is very relaxing, family friendly, lot's of dinning options, beaches are clean. We'll be back.
Manager Response: Bryan, thank you for the great review. We appreciate all customer feedback. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Little above average but generic. Rooms are large and clean and bed very comfortable. Bathroom in updated with glass barn door on runner which would slide shut on it's own. Quiet location and easy walk to main street for dining and shopping,but they do offer free transport to anywhere within 5 miles of the hotel which is a very nice option. For me the downside was the breakfast which was the typical make your own cereal/waffle or bagel ordeal. Adequate for quick start to your day but not something I would like if staying more than one night.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We are currently in the process of making our full hot breakfast fully functional, so we will have other options besides cereal and bagels.

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel many times before over the last three or four years. This last visit was the worst. When we first walked in our third floor room it had a bad smell, like bad water. Once I had turned on the water the I notice a smell coming from the faucet. Not the most inviting to wash your face let alone brush your teeth.  The bathroom needs bad updating. The sink and shower faucets are old and grimy. The water pressure in the shower was the worst. It was a slow trickle and it was so hard to get the faucet at the right temperature.  The bed was very uncomfortable and the pillows looked like small mini throw pillows. The stairway had a bad smell it and the spa was not looking the best color either.  You are paying for the location because its close to the beach and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and feedback, SFF29. Guest satisfaction is our highest priority and we will ensure that these issues you mentioned are taken care of to avoid this from happening again in the future. Thank you again for giving us the opportunity to improve our product and service.

Summary: Checked in last minute. This hotel is very clean and well maintained. Nice pool area with hot tub.close to beach and very helpful informative staff. They have a shuttle that will take you anywhere within 5 miles and puck you up.the breakfast was good with a lot of choices. I would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!!

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights and everything went well. The rooms are very clean and the room is spacious. The furnishes have good taste and the bathroom is ample and everything worked perfectly. Great hot water for those chilly mornings we had on February. The best was the bed, both beds were extremely comfortable, it's always great when the hotel invests in good beds. The only downside is we didn't want to get up in the morning as we were very comfortable. Most of the staff in the lobby is very friendly specially the girls. The cleaning ladies did a good job, though I wish they weren't so loud in the morning as the door to the hallway doesn't do a very good job of keeping noise out of the room. Talking about doors it would be nice if the bathroom had a bit more privacy, as the
Manager Response: We really appreciate such a detailed review! Thank you so much and we hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: We revisited this hotel and stayed in a room at pool level, facing 7th street.  The layout was the same, shell shaped soap instead of the cute handmade seal shaped soap.  They were switching out all the queen size beds to new ones.  I was very impressed with the breakfast selection.  It had everything from the usual cereal bar, fruits, juice, waffle maker to hot food served...as well as breakfast burritos that could be micro there or at your room.  The staff in the breakfast area was very attentive and extremely helpful.  Yes, the room was a bit small but there were tables outside where you could see the pool and there is always an option to eat in your room.  The front desk staff was very helpful when we needed to switch rooms after checking in.  The location is good if you
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!

Summary: We arrived too early for check-in, but left our car in the FREE parking lot, and got a FREE shuttle ride to our local destination--all in a matter of minutes.  Inn is walking distance to Main Street and many shops and restaurants, also walking distance to the pier and beach, which saves having to struggle to find a place to park.  All desk clerks were very friendly and helpful. Room was updated and clean (except for water-stained window valance).  Kingsized bed was clean and comfortable.  Bathroom was very contemporary with a huge walk-in tiled shower and fluffy white towels.  FREE breakfast included scrambled eggs, boiled eggs, toast, waffles, sausages and more.  We would definitely stay here again.  We enjoyed our short stay in Seal Beach.
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed it! Thanks for the review!

Summary: The Pacific Inn's website makes it look sexy--huge atrium, beautiful balconies, etc. This is not that kind of property. It's a nicely updated motel with some amenities. The bathroom renos are exceptional. Ask for a room facing south - Marina Drive is loud and not too attractive.
Manager Response: Thank you CatchLimit for taking the time to review The Pacific Inn.  Last year a TripAdvisor Photographer did come to the hotel to take pictures of the property and posted about 300 photos.  We can see where a professional picture taken at a flattering angel and or with great lighting can make a photo appear Photoshopped.  While we do not have control over these photos, there are pictures posted by the hotel management team that have not been altered for guests to see.  Regardless we can understand your frustration.  We are sorry that we failed to meet your expectations and would love to discuss how we can make your stay a 5 star experience should you decide to return in the future.  Thank you for your feedback!

Summary: Check in staff was super friendly. But as soon as I got in to the room I saw some old sheets. But whatever, it was midnight. I needed to hurry up and get some rest.  Morning comes and breakfast room was really a room.  About 200sqf only and was limited. Had an omelet and a slice of bread. 2 hours later felt sick and couldn't go to the tradeshow.  Next day spoke with an associate that stayed in the same place. Same thing happened to him.  Due to the design of this Inn, all rooms surround a very small pool. So as children play and scream until night I can hear everything.  Bad design and insulation.  I can also hear everyone out on the other side of the room while they drive in the parking lot.  Motor in the bathroom vent needs to be changed. Squeeling sound when it is on and
Manager Response: Dear Vinny614, thank you for reaching out and sharing your feedback.  As a property we appreciate constructive views and are pleased that you found the hotel staff to be friendly.  We are also very sorry that you did not enjoy your time at The Pacific Inn. Had we known about the issues you listed during your stay we would have done everything in our power to ensure that the situation was resolved and you left feeling satisfied.  It is our goal to ensure that all guests are completely pleased with their accommodations and strive to constantly improve the overall property and guest experience.  Unfortunately, that was not the case during your stay.  We have looked into the issues that you experienced to ensure that they are not repeated.  We have also begun renovations in an effort to better sound proof all of our rooms and provide our guests with a modern and more upscale design.  We would like to invite you back to see the new direction that The Pacific Inn is moving towards.  Thank you again for giving us the opportunity to improve.

Summary: We took advantage of the stay a night and get free shuttle service and parking while on your cruise out of Long Beach.  The hotel staff are really nice, the location is great! Walk over to Seal Beach's Main street, down to the pier, restaurants etc.  There is a pool in the courtyard with a hot tub, not the best location for sun, but great if it's a windy day and your not interested in getting windblown at the beach
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!

Summary: Just like the title says, awesome "mini" vacation me and the mrs had. Stayed here for the weekend and had a blast. Location is great if you want food, beach, and quiet. Staff is nice, rooms are super clean and very modern. Almost like a suite. coffee machine and cookies saved my life after a long day. Hopefully it'll be warmer when I visit next so I can try the small pool they have.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review!

Summary: We stayed here while on a business trip. The location was perfect. We walked to the little shops, and restaurants several times a day and the beach.   Hotel staff were friendly and helpful. Room was clean and comfortable, although they could use new pillows.  My only real issue was the smoking. Every time I opened my door to the balcony our neighbors were on their balcony smoking.  Constantly smoking. Having health issues means I can't be anywhere near smoke. Soooo, that was miserable. We just left the hotel. I don't know what the hotel can do to fix that?
Manager Response: I'm sorry you experienced this issue with your stay. Unfortunately we do allow smoking on our balconies as long as the balcony door is closed, so there is nothing we can do to prohibit your neighbors from smoking. However, if you do find this to be a problem, never hesitate to contact the Front Desk with your concerns and we will try to solve the problem- such as moving you to a room with new neighbors for the remainder of your stay.

Summary: The location is only a short walk to the ocean.  It is clean, the employees are friendly, and is a great value for being by the ocean.  It's set just behind a small trip mall but is very close to the Main Street area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!

Summary: This is the second time I have stay here,first time with the family and this time by myself.  the location is great and it is a good price.  The free breakfast is good.  It is close to the PCH and to downtown.  Clean rooms and quiet
Manager Response: We appreciate the review!

Summary: First, I must say that I spoke to several staff members in my 24 hour stay (Thanks for the early check in!) and each one of them was cheerful, helpful and accommodating. The motel as a whole was clean and pleasant. There were areas that need a little TLC and maintenance (bathroom floor could use regrouting), but overall a great place to stay. The free shuttle was very helpful to me, and wasn't offered at other area hotels. I enjoyed being a short walk from the beach. There were several interesting restaurants in the neighborhood, too. I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your response and will definitely take a deeper look into our bathroom maintenance.

Summary: Nice quiet clean motel within walking distance (4 blocks) of the beach front restaurants and 2 blocks of downtown Seal Beach shopping.  Nothing spectacular, but clean and friendly staff.  Careful about the double queen beds, they are more like double full beds, but it all works out!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! Our standard room type is a room with either a single King Bed or 2 Full Beds. We do also have rooms with 2 Queen Beds for just $10 more than the posted rate of that day.

Summary: Spent 4 nights there.  Room was OK.  The pool is in an atrium, open at the top and it was a little cool for the pool, but the hot tub was hot.  The pool is in the middle, with the room wing off it, so hall noise carries and the hall got cold, due to the weather.  The maids chattered too early in the morning, so no sleeping in.  The breakfast was OK, but was the same every day, needed VARIETY if you were staying for an extended period,   make your own waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage patties, potatoes.  Their pet fee is pretty hefty at $50 if you stay one night or multiple.  Have never paid that much before.  There is a park a block away that is pet friendly for leashed dog walking.  NO dogs allowed on the beach even in winter.  The nearest dog freindly beach is in Huntington
Manager Response: We appreciate the review! We have actually just placed an order to add a variety rotation to our breakfast room, so that will be implemented in the next week or so. Unfortunately, the beach of Seal Beach is not a dog beach, but there is a small area designated for dogs just a 5 minute drive up to Long Beach, much closer than Huntington Beach. Once again, we appreciate the review and hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Booked a government rate double full bedroom for NYE. I was attending an EDM event that was being held at an events center at another hotel. However, that particular hotel had nothing but bad reviews and I'm glad I chose this hotel instead. As soon as I walked in to Pacific Inn I was impressed. A beautiful and friendly receptionist welcomed me and checked me in. The room was on the second floor and very clean and fancy. No rowdy guests to be found, this hotel maintains great privacy and comfort. Free computer use and printer, most hotels force you to use a credit card for access and printer use, not here! Amazing complimentary breakfast the next morning, best I've ever had. They literally had everything! Left a tip for the sweet lady that prepared the breakfast. Check out was
Manager Response: Thanks for the incredible review! We're glad you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Room was decent when we arrived. Damage around the corners of bathroom walls was rather sad. Odd that the tub/shower is raised so high. Returned to our room about 2 am and the smoke alarm battery decided to die at 6am. Front desk asked me to remove it myself. Really? Then the toilet started leaking across the floor. I was never offered anything for our inconvenience,  not even a sorry.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear you experienced these issues. As we are an old property, we are in a constant state of renovation and appreciate the note about the bathroom corners. If you had a Jacuzzi tub in your room, sometimes the jets shoot excess water onto the walls which ricochets onto the floor. As for the response from our front desk staff, that sort of remark is definitely not to the standards we hold here at The Pacific Inn and we will be speaking to all of our front desk staff about this matter. I would like to apologize once again for the issues you faced with your stay but do appreciate the sincere and honest review.

Summary: You can easily walk to Seal Beach n the shops n restaurants on the Main Street. Reasonable, clean but a little dated. Quiet location without a view. Free parking, WiFi n breakfast.  Try Cafe Crema for a great breakfast or 302 Main for Happy hour!
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!

Summary Heading: Great location for exploring Seal, Huntington and Long Beach(es)
Summary: I've stayed here four times in the last seven years or so.  The hotel has an unusual layout and the corridors are not particularly warm or inviting, but the room was clean - no view available.  I didn't go to the breakfast which was available during my mid-week stay.  The desk clerk was very friendly and helpful.  Check-in was quick.  The best part about this place is its proxiity to the town of Seal Beach.  It's walking distance to the Seal Beach main street with shops and restaurants and the beach/pier itself.  It is a close drive or bike ride to Huntington Beach and the 2nd street/Belmont Shore area of Long Beach.  In all, this is a great location for a weekend getaway!
Manager Response: We appreciate the review!

Summary Heading: LOVE this place…such a close walk to the best of Seal Beach
Summary: I always stay at The Pacific Inn every time I'm in town.  Love the luxurious feel of this boutique hotel and the personal attention of the staff.  GREAT place!  Close to restaurants, bars and walking the town!
Manager Response: And we love having you! Thanks for the review!

Summary Heading: Clean hotel, nice room, affordable price.
Summary: We used to live in Seal Beach and never noticed this hotel tucked away off of Pacific Coast Hwy.  Stayed here for the first time while visiting son in Huntington Beach, and will definitely return.  Room was clean, well appointed including fridge, 42" flat screen, free wifi, a very comfortable bed with four pillows.  Many of the rooms surround an atrium containing a pool, hot tub and comfortable lounging area.  The included breakfast is great and includes eggs, sausage, waffles, cereal and pastries.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review!

Summary: We stayed at The Pacific Inn in October. As always wonderful. The staff is always so friendly and helpful. Looking forward to our visit in December. Great location and hot cookies in the late afternoon.
Manager Response: We look forward to having you again!

Summary: Seal Beach is a cute beach town with good nightlife in the summer. Kinda quiet after Labor Day. Not a lot of tourists. Main Street is the quintessential Main Street, USA.   Had a pleasant stay at Pacific Inn. Clean room with a balcony overlooking the street.
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay! Thanks for the review!

Summary Heading: Comfortable, affordable and in an ideal location ...
Summary: We stayed for almost two weeks and found the room to be very comfortable with a balcony and fresh air. The breakfast spot was well serviced with a variety of breakfast dishes and convenient to our room on the third floor.  There were a couple of cosmetic things that needed be fixed; for example the fly wire on balcony.   The staff were very friendly and willing to help out with reasonable requests.  And to top it off the location was excellent - so close to lovely restaurants and small shops in Seal Beach. The beach was well looked after. And walking out on the peer at sunset is a lovely memory.
Manager Response: I appreciate the great review! Glad to hear you enjoyed your time in Seal Beach with us!

Summary Heading: It was perfect for our needs!
Summary: We were looking for a place to enjoy three days near the beach and down near the Long Beach cruise terminal prior to our Carnival cruise that included free parking while we cruised and a free shuttle service to the Long Beach terminal prior to and after our cruise. The location was perfect. Seal Beach is an awesome, small, safe, clean and quaint community. The hotel service staff were super friendly and very helpful. We needed to make copies of our cruise luggage tags which they did for us for free and also gave us tape to tape them to our bags. They provided us free continental breakfast with quite a bit of selection all three mornings we were there (waffles, eggs, bacon, juices, cereal, bagels, toast, fruit, etc.) They provided us with free internet (sometimes we lost the
Manager Response: We're very pleased to hear that you had a wonderful stay! We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

Summary: We usually stay in the big brand hotels in Huntington Beach when visiting family in the area but this trip we decided to give the Pacific Inn a try.  Wow, what a delight! The front desk staff was very welcoming and efficient. The hotel is a few blocks from the beach but the stroll down Main Street past all the funky beach town shops and restaurants was very enjoyable. The room was large and clean and although we were on the side of the hotel opposite some fast food restaurants we did not experience any noise that other reviewers have mentioned.  The free breakfast is very nice however the hot food choices weren't very good. I believe the hotel is working on revamping the breakfast menu.  Overall a great stay with a great staff and we will definitely be back to the Pacific Inn.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review! We look forward to seeing you next time!

Summary: Not bad, not great and not quite 'Just RIght.'  It is not a destination hotel but it does serve the needs for a road weary traveler that desires a simple overnight stay.  It is better than Motel Six but quite short of a Hilton.  That being said everytime I visit Long Beach I choose to stay at the Pacific Inn because it really is centrally located and just a few short blocks from the beach.  The staff is very friendly but maintenance needs to up their game.  Don't get me wrong, the rooms are clean but the patio screen door was broken, the through the wall AC had a gap around it and the sliding 'asian style' door to the bathroom was difficult to slide open.  The credenza style entertainment cabinet sagged in the middle which cause the Refrigerator cabinet door to hang out of plumb
Manager Response: I appreciate the detailed review and will pass the notes along to our Maintenance Department. I assure you that these problems are not to the standard we hold here at The Pacific Inn and will see about getting them fixed as soon as possible.

Summary: The Pacific Inn is clean comfortable and gracious. The only problem is the streets that surround it are busy with car and bus traffic. The beds are nice, the rooms are clean and they have a cute little pool and jacuzzi in the courtyard on the 2nd floor. The continental breakfast is sufficient. It is a good 4 blocks to the beach which is a nice walk but found the relaxing aspect to be missing due to the street noise.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review. I'm sorry you experienced an issue with the street noise levels. Should you stay with us again, I would suggest requesting a "Parkside" room. While requesting does not entirely ensure you will get one of these rooms, many guests will make this request as they find the rooms to be some of the most quiet rooms we offer.

Summary: Neat ,medium size hotel in Seal Beach. Rooms are good size, breakfast was good. Only negative was the sound of the AC which was a little too loud.Close to the ocean and downtown Seal Beach ,which is a neat little town.
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: Looking for a place to stay that is a few blocks from the Pacific Ocean in a charming southern California town?  What The Pacific Inn lacks in glamour is more than made up for in service and amenities.  The shuttle will take travelers without cars to the Long Beach Airport, the Aquarium, Museum, and shopping.  There is a nice area surrounding the semi-indoor pool where groups may meet whether they are swimming or just enjoying a cocktail before dinner.  (BYOB).  We found the desk staff very friendly and courteous.  The rooms were cleaned promptly and quietly each day.  I would recommend The Pacific Inn for reunion groups, families, and those who are interested in a place to relax and enjoy Seal Beach or Long Beach.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review!

Summary: Rude desk help with an attitude. Awful free breakfast ( powdered eggs! cardboard sausage...blech! ). Actually a motel at hotel prices. Awful off-site wifi. lumpy bed with bean bag pillows. No bottled water and no water glasses.
Manager Response: I appreciate you taking the time to voice your concerns in regards to the experience you had at The Pacific Inn. I take guest satisfaction very seriously and am very sorry to hear that you feel as if you were treated rudely. That kind of behavior is not tolerated.  In regards to the Complimentary Hot Breakfast items, we are in the process of getting altering the current menu to ensure that our breakfast options are of high quality. Additionally we do have free water bottles and glassware at the lobby which is available upon request. I apologize if these items were not offered to you upon your arrival. Plastic water cups are located in each guest room near the coffee maker. Regardless, I understand that you did not enjoy the accommodations here, and for that I am sorry. It is my goal that each guest leaves The Pacific Inn pleased. If there is anything that I can do to help rectify this situation I would be more than happy to speak with you. Thank you for your time and consideration and for giving The Pacific Inn an opportunity to grow and improve the services offered here.

Summary Heading: Great price, location, staff and rooms
Summary: Very large rooms, comfortable beds, balcony with palm trees outside, covered parking and very nice staff. Breakfast was possibly somewhat sparse in choice for someone used to continental breakfast in Europe but there was enough chices for the week we stayed and the service very friendly. This is really just a remark just find anything less from perfect.  The area was quiet but not dead, lots of surfer cars gining a kind of 60s feeling in the morning when watching them from the balcony.  The location was in a quiet area, close the the small town with several good restaurants and shops. 5 minutes walk to the beach and the pier with a classic diner at the end.  All in all, this hotel provided excellent value.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review!

Summary: We stayed here to be close to a friend who lives in Long Beach. The hotel is very handy to everything & we were surprised at how nice it was for a great price. 10 minutes walk to the beach & the pier. Pools were on our floor & were lovely. Breakfast is basic but good. Free wifi. All good.
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed your stay!

Summary: We love The Pacific Inn. It is within walking distance to the beach, shops , and restaurants. The free breakfast is delicious and the coffee and cookies in the lobby are a nice touch. They have a kind and courteous staff. Thanks for a fabulous stay. We will be back soon!
Manager Response: We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed it! See you next time!

Summary: I made a group booking for 22 family members for a nearby family wedding. As the majority of us reside outside the US I managed the bookings for everybody, the procedure was a complex, would have been easier with booking.com. My wife and i had a total of 7 nights at this hotel. it was as advertised. I we found the rooms comfortable and clean, the gratis breakfast was OK, the pool area was nice and relaxing and the staff could not do enough for us, they were great. The shuttle service was also fantastic, our group made a lot of use of it, all were very happy. Out of our group I was the only one who had any issues, first our door always jammed, I needed to shoulder charge it to get it open. The second day the hotel repair man worked on it, at first we thought it was just sticking
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and are sorry that you experienced these issues with your room. We will look into fixing these problems, but we're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us nonetheless!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel at the beginning of a 2 1/2 week road trip for 3 nights.It spoiled us for the rest of the holiday. From the start when we booked in we were made to feel welcome and nothing was too much trouble for the staff. The rooms were a good size, comfortable and clean. The hotel provide a shuttle car which was so useful it even took us to Target! A big thanks to Angel who gave us useful directions to Disneyland.Breakfast was good,varied selection of cereals, bagels and muffins and my favourite make your own waffle! I would highly recommend The Pacific  Inn as a base to stay.
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed your stay! We will also definitely pass along your thanks to Angel!

Summary: I have little to no experience of a beach tourist town, so I wasn't sure what to expect from a no name brand hotel. I have to admit this did not meet my customary expectations (maybe because I live in Las Vegas and am spoiled?). Firstly, I hated trying to park. The car park may be free but it sucked. Was always full and the small size of the bays and the location of the building's columns as well as other people's poor positioning of trucks and SUV's made it very hard to park. I ended up on the street more often than not. I just never got used to the "inside/outside" layout of the building. The room itself was OK, although I did not like the weird closet arrangement with a pull out retractable space saving hanger and the sliding bathroom door that couldn't open unless the hanger
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to give us a review and will definitely take these notes into consideration. Thanks for the review.

Summary: This hotel was recommended by friends - so glad we made it our first hotel we stayed in on our tour of California.. Staff so friendly and helpful. The free shuttle service was a real bonus along with complimentary coffee and bottle water . I enjoyed the breakfast it was such a relaxed atmosphere.  I was sorry to leave
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!

Summary: We stayed at the pacific inn for my cousins wedding. The room was updated vas very nice. However, We did have a couple of issues. 1. The wifi was terrible! My husband had to do work and ended up having to go to Starbucks to work. 2. The spa was disgusting! We complained about it and the staff didn't seem to care. 3. The TV went back to the preview channel after every 15 min of watching. We had to turn the television off and back on to reset.
Manager Response: We appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention. As you spoke with our front desk staff about these issues as you checked out, we have already began the process to resolve them. Thank you again for the review, we greatly value all of our guests' input.

Summary: I used Booking.com to book our 4 night stay in the accommodation.   We were on a 10 day California baseball stadium tour. It was my husband, our 13yo son and me. This was the tail end of our trip.   I grew up in a beach tourist town, I kinda of have an insiders edge of what to expect from a no name brand hotel. I have to admit this exceeded my expectations.   We arrived at the hotel around 1 and our room was ready. We were even "upgraded" to a jacuzzi king bed room. We did have to ask for a roll away for the kid. Since we had to be at a baseball game that evening we didn't have time to really check out the room. However upon entering the room we could clearly see the spaciousness of the room. It was very clean, roomy. We moved around some of the furniture to make room for the
Manager Response: Thanks for the incredible review! We will definitely look into those splash guards for our showers, as you recommended. Thanks again!

Summary: Clean, friendly hotel with well equipped rooms.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  Nice touches like free cookies in the afternoon and free coffee in reception which is tasty.  Surrounding area -lovely beach, good choice of shops around he area and the Main Street variety of food is good with a nice family feel.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review!

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel in fabulous Seal Beach
Summary: We stayed at Pacific In for 2 nights during our road trip from San Francisco to San Diego. We had been recommended to visit Seal Beach and it is well worth the visit, we would love to go back, it is a small town with beautiful beach and main street with many individual restaurants and cafes. Pacific Inn was in excellent location few minutes walk from the beach, lovely friendly staff and swimming pool for a relax on the sun beds as a change from going to the beach. Our room was spacious and comfortable. Breakfast was adequate, with a waffle machine to do your own waffles. We would not hesitate in recommending this lovely hotel and will definitely visit again on another California trip.
Manager Response: Thanks for such an awesome review!

Summary Heading: Great hotel in the spirit of quaint Seal Beach
Summary: We were surprised by the size of our room, which was actually a suite. Spacious living area, room and bathroom complete with a jacuzzi tub. Loved the small but well appointed pool area but didn't have time to use it. All the staff were delightful. One of our outlets did not work, we told the front desk and it was fixed by the time we returned. Not super fancy, but really nice, especially for the price. Location is perfect if you want to walk to the beach, check out Main Street or drive down south to Orange County on PCH.
Manager Response: We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, Nanette!

Summary: My family and I have stayed at The Pacific Inn now for a few years in a row.  We very much enjoy our stay there, the staff is always friendly, accommodating and the location is excellent. The rooms are always well kept, housekeeping is always professional and do a very good job. The pool is small but the beach is just a 5 min walk. The breakfast is very good. Free parking and Wifi which is always a big plus since most hotels now charge for each.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review. We look forward to (hopefully) seeing you again next year!

Summary: Our friend booked us in to this Hotel just around the corner from her house since she didn't have any room for us at the time.  She very generously paid for us so I don't know the cost but it was lovely.  Great locatioln, wonderful facilities and fabulous breakfast.  The lady who looked after the breakfast had been there 17 years so I guess that's a reflection of loving her job too.  Only critisism was that we had a family next door and they were noisey on our first night - not what you want after a long flight, plus staying up for the day to get into the right time zone. However, that's to be expected everywhere I guess. 9/10 - great place.
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed our breakfast! We will definitely let Victoria know that you enjoyed her company, as well.

Summary: Stayed overnight on a Sunday while attending an evening  function at the park near the beach. The property is older (mid 70s?) and shows it, but they are trying. Staff was nice, parking and Internet free. Many restaurants nearby and it's a 5 minute walk to the main drag leading to the beach which has at least 4 Irish pubs (?), cute shops, coffee and gelato places etc. The safe, west of PCH location is really the main attraction here. Our room was clean, our bathroom had been "remodeled" but was still a little funky; carpets are old throughout the public areas. We were in an adjoining room and could hear EVERYTHING the guests next door were saying (at midnight), even with a towel covering the air gap. The pillows were uncomfortably too hard and high for me. I also thought it was
Manager Response: We appreciate the review and will definitely look into these matters. Thank you.

Summary: Thanks to all the managers and staff of this nice hotel for all their help and cooperation in arranging an event for our family and friends to get together here.  Our family booked seven rooms here, a year or so in advance, so we could "take over" the pool area on a Saturday for our event.  My sisters got the idea on another stay here and saw a family even using a barbeque at the pool for their event.  We did not do that, but the hotel put up tables and chairs for us, the pool area has great furniture and umbrellas, we were able to put up signs and balloons.....it was festive.  I'm sure there were some hotel guests intruded upon, but anyone could still use the pools, we were a group of maybe 35 people tops.  Everyone enjoyed their rooms, the breakfast served daily, the friendly
Manager Response: We loved having you with us! Hopefully we get to see some of you again!

Summary: We were back at the Pacific Inn in late June into July.  As always a great time.  We booked our room and were unable to get 3 of the nights we wanted.  Upon arrival we were informed that our complete reservation was available due to a cancellation.  We were in the air when the cancellation occurred and the staff immediately updated our stay.  What a relief.  They said we were first on the cancellation list and they were true to their word.  Wouldn't stay anywhere else in the Long Beach/Seal Beach area.  Love the hot cookies in the late afternoon.
Manager Response: We're glad we could get you your full stay with us! We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Friendly staff, clean rooms, affordable prices, good restaurants and beach within walking distance.  We have been many times and will go again.  Free parking if you stay in the hotel, how often do you get that?  Loved it!
Manager Response: We appreciate the review. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My daughter suggested this hotel while we were on vacation in CA. Catherine took VERY good care of us. All staffs are friendly and very accommodating. We got a very clean, comfortable room with microwave and frig on the second floor. They even have Starbuck coffee for all the guests!!!! I was surprised to find good varieties of breakfast they provide in the morning. These are some of the services they provide that we love: 1. Early check-in 2. Late check-out 3. Complementary breakfast 4. Complementary Starbuck coffee 5. Complementary shuttle to and from Carnival dock 6. Complementary internet 7. Complementary parking I would be looking forward to stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: We're pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary Heading: This place could be a real gem, BUT........
Summary: **SPOILER ALERT** There were some significant problems with our stay here (more on this below). We probably will not stay here again. First time in 8 years that a choice made from Tripadvisor recommendations has been a disappointment.   First, let me say that I really, really wanted to like this place. We have family in the area, but it is no longer practical for us to stay with them when we visit. We have been staying in higher-priced accommodations in other nearby cities, and I have been looking for a long time for something in the northern Orange County coastal area that was good quality but not outrageously priced, and accepts dogs without an outrageous fee.   I had high hopes when we arrived at the Pacific Inn. Fantastic location - two blocks west is a terrific beach, and
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear that you experienced these issues during your stay. Unfortunately with complementary wifi comes a lot of guests taking advantage of this amenity, which can often result in a slower connection. As for the housekeeping and room maintenance issues these are definitely not standards that we hold here at The Pacific Inn and I will be seeing to these manners immediately. I appreciate the extensively detailed review and once again apologize for the issues you experienced.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in quiet quaint Seal Beach
Summary: We have been staying at The Pacific Inn for years.  The service is great, the motel is well maintained, and the weather is very mild and pleasant.  You are able to walk all over town while leaving your vehicle parked in their covered parking garage.  This is a very big plus because parking is in very short supply in the town of Seal Beach.  We recommend The Pacific Beach Inn to those who want a quality stay in this coastal town!  The only improvement we would like to see is in the quality of their complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review!

Summary: Stay was over Fourth of July holiday. The room is spacious, clean, comfortable. The only issue we had was when you step out of the shower you need to be aware that the tile floors are very slippery. Having a fridge in the room is a great perk. The location is great for going to the beach or walking thru the shops on Main street.
Manager Response: I'm glad you enjoyed your stay! We do provide bath mats in each of our rooms to be placed on the floor, and have additional mats available on request. We appreciate the review.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in a wonderful little coastal town
Summary: Clean and well maintained and the staff are wonderful.  Close to Long Beach attractions and the State University.  Seal Beach Main Street is two blocks away. Walk to dining and the ocean.  Live music at the pier on Wednesday evenings.  We will most certainly return.
Manager Response: We're extremely pleased to hear about your stay. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We tend to stay more at a Hilton or Boutique hotels. We found Pacific Inn due to the close proximity to the beach to surf and close to where our friends live. I was a bit dismayed when I drove up but that soon went away.  Service is outstanding. No charge for parking.  Rooms are remodeled and extremely clean and comfortable and its literally 2-3 blocks away from the beach. Breakfast is a plus and FREE.  I would absolutely stay here again!!!  Thank You!
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review, Xanthe, We hope to see you again!

Summary: Seal Beach is a lovely town, the fairly quiet beach with pier and "main street" are all within walking distance.  The town is much bigger than it appears with plenty of shopping and restaurants in a short driving distance.  I was disappointed to find that the pictures of both the hotel and the swimming pool area on the website were exaggerated.  The pool was very small and lukewarm. The hot tub was nice and a great temp.  The pool area is actually in the center of the hotel on the second floor and visible to all guests entering and exiting their rooms on both the second and third levels.  There is no solid roof above the pool, but in June the temperature was warm enough to not matter.  We also experienced the same issue with towels as "longday1."  Every day we had two washrags,
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you took to give us such a detailed review. We will definitely take these issues into consideration to be resolved.

Summary: Considering all the other sub par hotels in the area this place is great! Very friendly staff, always ready to help and happy to go the extra mile yo explain things. Rooms were very clean, TV worked fine location was great. Only thing is Internet was working great on the day for which staff apologised profusely! Recommend!
Manager Response: We appreciate the review! We hope to see you again!

Summary: That pretty much says it all. Just a couple of blocks stroll to restaurant row and the beach made this a fantastic stopover. The hotel itself though? Meh, not so much.  Despite booking in as a family of 4, the room was set up for 2. Repeated calls and visits to the reception desk about extra towels and the needed roll-away bed (that was noted on the reservation) took up way more of our relaxation time than it should have. We were told that the bed couldn't be delivered until the shuttle driver returned, so I guess the poor guy does double duty. Yet, we didn't receive the bed for hours after his scheduled return which was just a hassle.  The pool claims to be indoor heated, which I guess may be technically correct if you, like Pharrell Williams, feel like a room without a roof.
Manager Response: I am terribly sorry to hear you had such a disappointing stay with us. Here at The Pacific Inn, we pride ourselves on the guest service we provide as we feel it is one of the more outstanding features of our hotel. We would love to get in contact with you so that we may better understand where exactly our service was lacking in your stay. Please do not hesitate to give us a call at (562) 493-7501. We look forward to hearing from you and once again I do apologize for the issues with your stay.

Summary: This was my first time at this hotel and my husband and I would stay here again.  It was very close to Main Street with many cute shops and places to eat.  We found parking to be a bit of a challenge on the property, but street parking was available.  We would definitely stay here again as the beds were comfortable and the rooms were decent.  We look forward to staying here again!
Manager Response: We appreciate the review and look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: This hotel is about 2 blocks away from the ocean. The rooms are great, with modern finishes. Small microwave and mini fridge. All rooms have a balcony. Pool area was great, with hot tub for soaking after a long day at the beach. Breakfast area is small, about 6 tables, but enough food for everyone, including waffle maker, eggs, sausage, hashbrowns, juices, cereal. They were so accomodating, and provided us beach chairs, boogie boards and water bottles to take to the beach.  Very friendly staff.  This was our second trip to this hotel. It's a well kept secret at a great location, within walking distance to Main Street for lots of shopping, and the beach.
Manager Response: Thanks for the incredible review! We hope to see you again for a third time!

Summary Heading: Attentive and Friendly and very convenient.
Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel. We have taken our son to the Catalina Sea Camp the last couple of years and stayed here before we dropped him off for the week. We really enjoy the atmosphere of the entire Seal Beach area. The hotel is very close to Main Street where all the action is and a few blocks to the beach. We even walked to Church that we found, no need for a car even though they have a nice covered parking area. This year we asked if we could rent a boogie board and some beach chairs to spend some time at the beach and the just loaned us some. It made our visit to the beach much nicer. The hotel is not super luxurious, but very comfortable a good value for what we paid. The pool is nice, but the only things that may need improvement for the value
Manager Response: I'm glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! We just recently updated our breakfast room and are working to perfect its new selections. If you have any suggestions for what we should change we would love to hear them!

Summary: This hotel was in a great location. Just a couple blocks from main and a few more to the beach. If you are looking for a luxurious hotel, this is not it. If you are looking for a friendly staff and a clean room in a convenient location, this is definitely it. We had an issue with a clogged toilet but it was resolved very quickly. I was on the 3rd floor and it was mostly quiet but I will warn you that the walls seem to be pretty thin at least where the adjoining room doors are.  I could hear some conversation from my neighbors pretty clearly but I assume they were standing by the door. Overall, I had a good experience and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review! As our property is very old, we are constantly striving to achieve the "luxurious" feel. Any feedback or suggestions are greatly appreciated on how we can improve this factor!

Summary: We've been in this hotel for 10 days in October 2012. Good value for the price paid, nice position (not far from the beach, and not far from the downtown). Rooms are essential but confortables and clean. Breakfast is not full but, not so bad. Nice jacuzzi pools.
Manager Response: I'm very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay! Since your stay with us, we have greatly improved and updated our breakfast room. We hope that you'll stay with us again to come check it out!

Summary Heading: They Go Out Of Their Way For You
Summary: It's a mediocre hotel. Nothing luxurious here. But the obviously know that because they go out of their way to make you feel very special and accommodate to your requests. I was put into a junior suite but since I could hear the person above me moving around all the time, they upgraded me to their MASTER SUITE, at no extra charge. Food choices nearby are not impressive (some small diner and a Taco Bell) but if you're willing to walk towards the ocean for 15 minutes, you'll find a ton of restaurants that pop up. There is no room service. There is a basic complimentary breakfast. Those usually make me sick (the kind where eggs are obviously not eggs, but just yellow mousse texture) but they had fruit and cereal and yogurt options as well. I came during a week of extreme heat wave,
Manager Response: I'm glad you enjoyed your stay, Elizabeth! I do apologize for the issues you experienced with your noise. We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: We wanted somewhere close to the Aquarium of the Pacific in Long Beach and reviews about the town of Seal Beach really intrigued me---and after reseaching places to stay we decided on the Pacific Inn and after a delightful one night stay I can definately say we made a great choice.      Spacious rooms with free wifi, Disney Channel, fridge and microwave. Free parking and lovely continental breakfast.(although would prefer hot cooked eggs instead of boiled) There is a lovely spa and pool area in the centre of the hotel---so you are shaded from the elements. There is a free shuttle that will take you and pick you up anywhere within a 5 mile radius of the hotel. We used this service to visit the aquarium and they picked us up right on the prescheduled time for the erturn trip. Wi
Manager Response: Thanks for the very detailed review! We appreciate the time you took and will take your thoughts into consideration.

Summary Heading: favorite Place to stay when we come back home :)
Summary: I am from Long Beach originally and I now live in the midwest, I think that tghe Pacific Inn has the best Location in the area. The staff is super friendly and always quick to help.  see you again in a few months!
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review, David. We'll see you in a few months!

Summary: My husband and I have made our yearly getaways to the Seal Beach, CA area for several years now. Besides being quaint and charming, we have to say that staying at The Pacific Inn has helped in making our decision to return. It has never disappointed us. The rooms (clean and spacious), the inviting indoor/ourdoor pool and Jacuzzi, the complimentary yet personal breakfast, the amenities (chairs to use while sitting at the beach, bikes, etc) and the proximity to some of our favorite restaurants, make our yearly trip a happy, restful experience. We are already looking forward to our reservation to stay there in a few weeks!! And, we'll be back again! Russell and Sandi Adams
Manager Response: We're extremely pleased that we could make your stay in Seal Beach that much better Mr. and Mrs. Adams! We look forward to having you back with us :)

Summary Heading: A really nice stay in central Seal Beach
Summary: We had a very enjoyable two night stay at this Inn. Great room & amenities. The fresh grind in brew Starbucks coffee in the lobby 24 hours a day is a nice touch. Close to wonderful shopping, restaurants and the beach all an easy walk to get to.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review!

Summary: We had a lovely quiet room on the third floor, recommend asking for the third and parkside. Also we heard someone complaining about noise from an adjoining door so I suggest asking for a room without one. Internet was good. Fridge in the room was handy. Free shuttle was great, very accommodating. Heaps of restaurants in walking distance - highly recommend Walt's on main street and Koi just across the road. Gorgeous little shops along main street. Heaps of nail places, hairdressers and a good day spa very close by.  They gave us a 2pm late check out no charge as we had a shuttle later. Breakfast was ok, could have been better. It ran until 10am but by the time we got there around 0930 a lot of it was gone. Still lots of options though to be fair, we should have got up earlier! We
Manager Response: We're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn for a short trip. Half of our group was there on business, half for pleasure. The hotel is very conveniently located near the major highways and walking distance to the beach, passing through the quaint downtown. Nothing great to look at, nor is it picturesque in and of itself, but convenient.   The pool and hot tub are located in an interior courtyard that at first appears to be an interior space, but is actually open air. Funky, but cool.  Breakfast was OK. More variety than it appeared at first. We especially loved the hotel shuttle, covering a good distance of the region and even returning for pick up when we called. We also got great discounts on area attractions when buying our tickets at the hotel.   Our suite was large and clean. Kind of
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate such a detailed review. We hope you come visit us again!

Summary: We stayed here for a short trip to the area. Staff was very friendly . Our room was great size and clean  with balcony , refrigerator , toaster and a microwave, flat panel tv .. The wifi here was fast!  Good continental breakfast on the 3rd floor. Pool and sauna ....Walking distance to main.st. with restaurants and shops, the pier and beach! Perfect stay!
Manager Response: We're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Pacific Inn.  It is clean, has a nice pool area, and great value for the money.  The location is perfect for going to the beach and shopping.  We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: I'm pleased to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us! We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Best deal for park & stay (cruise) out of Long Beach!
Summary: We love Pacific Inn!  For $139 we stayed in a lovely, clean room with a balcony, securely parked our car for 6 days, enjoyed timely and friendly rides to and from the cruise terminal in Long Beach AND had breakfast for three.  You just can't beat this deal, and the staff is amazingly friendly at all hours of the day.  The beach is just a two block walk, and restaurants are directly across the street, as well as many places up and down the main road - which your room is NOT on!  CVS is just down the street (easy walk) for any incidentals.  A great choice for any cruisers, or anyone visiting CSU Long Beach -- just about 5 minutes away.
Manager Response: I'm glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! I hope you choose us again if you ever visit Seal Beach again.

Summary: Good value, nice clean rooms, and good breakfast. Less than 6 miles from Long Beach. Free Internet, free parking and close to beaches. Seal Beach has some great restaurants, and if you have time, the main street is wonderful. The staff were very polite and helpful. I'd go back.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review! Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Enjoyed my stay here. Rooms are very comfortable and clean. The property is well maintained. The hotel's location is ideal for strolls to Seal Beach Pier and Main Street dining, plus it has easy access to Pacific Coast Highway, the Marina and nearby attractions.
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We hope you come visit again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, close to main st
Summary: I stayed at this hotel with a friend so we could walk to the bars on main st and not have to drive home. The hotel exceeded our expectations in every way. The room was very clean and nice and the furniture and linens looked new. The balcony was an extra perk. The pool area was inviting. What we loved was how close the hotel was to Main st in Seal Beach. We walked to the restaurants  and bars in just a couple minutes, which was awesome. Definitely the best way to enjoy the area. I will stay there again.
Manager Response: We're very excited to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in town.

Summary: This is without a doubt the best place I have ever stayed in Ca. My travels bring me here often and I discovered a hidden treasure when I found Pacific Inn. The staff here is beyond describing. They are so friendly and helpful and must be a true blessing to management. You can't imagine my pleasure when I found my room had been upgraded on my very first visit. Cleanliness is a key amenity and breakfast was great. I will come to Ca just to stay here  This is a vacation in its self.
Manager Response: We're extremely pleased to hear you had such a fantastic stay with us! We look forward to having you stay with us again!

Summary: All I have to say is WOW!  I can’t stop telling everyone how great this hotel was!  We came down with a large group of disabled adults and the staff was so accommodating and friendly….when we arrived they had all of our keys ready with names of guests on the cards and they even made up a Rooming List for our group leaders to have.  Upon arrival they passed out goody bags to all of our clients, boy that sure did make our day!  This hotel has a free shuttle to local attractions and we used this service on Friday night and it was a real pleasure not to have to drive our huge bus to the restaurant…they were prompt and friendly upon drop off and pick up!  The rooms…..each room had a private balcony with table and chairs…this was a real perk, it was a spacious balcony to boot!!  The
Manager Response: I'm very glad to hear that you guys enjoyed your stay! I know our whole staff enjoyed having you all stay with us and we hope that you come visit us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary Heading: Always good value in a great location
Summary: We are loyal customers of the Pacific Inn - staying there when we visit extended family in Seal Beach.  By far and away it is the best hotel near the Main Street and pier area of this wonderful beach community.  It's quiet, clean and the remodeled rooms are very nice.  We haven't used the spa or indoor pool - but they look clean without too much chlorine smell.  Not only do they serve a continental breakfast - but they also give vouchers for a full breakfast at a restaurant on Main Street - which is also good.  We've had no problems with the wi-fi.  Front desk is always helpful and friendly - and they appreciate customer loyalty.  Recommend that you book early - fills up for local events.
Manager Response: We're so glad to hear that you continue to enjoy your stays with us! We look forward your next stay!

Summary: I love staying here! The staff are super friendly and helpful. Beautiful indoor pool, shuttle offered around town until ten pm, Breakfeast daily, wifi included, plus many other amenities. The room is very basic, but pristinely clean.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the review, Sandra! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We came with a large group and this hotel was just perfect for us. The kids loved the swimming pool and jacuzzi. The breakfast is complimentary as well as the Wi-Fi, parking is free too. No hidden costs. The front desk was always friendly. Rooms clean. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We're so glad that you enjoyed your stay! We know that some of our front desk staff loved having your family stay with us. We hope to see you in the area sometime again!

Summary: Pacific Inn is in a good location near to the beach and the Main Street restaurants. I've stayed there twice. Some things I don't like:  1. the WiFi doesn't work well - the rooms keep losing signal, the system seems to log you off at random intervals, and it is very slow when it is working 2. the rooms are built around a swimming pool/indoor courtyard which seems to amplify the noise of anyone even talking around the pool into the rooms. When kids are playing in the pool it can be unbearable.
Manager Response: I'm sorry to hear you experienced these issues with your stay with us. We have, however, just newly updated our wireless network to work out all the preexisting bugs that guests were experiencing. As for the pool, we are aware of this issue and do have plans to lower the levels of noise that carries to the surrounding rooms. We do hope that you will stay with us again in the future, as we would be more than happy to accommodate your needs for a different room placement.

Summary: We have stayed at the Pacific Inn many times.  It never falls to be a great place to stay.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  Love the hot cookies in the late afternoon.  They are right on top of getting things done.  There was a small problem with our shower and before I knew it, it was fixed and working perfectly.  Can't wait to visit again.  I even have a favorite couple of favorite rooms.  Great location.  Lots of places to walk and many good restaurants.  Love the breakfast and am looking forward to the newly completed breakfast room.  Hope to see you soon.
Manager Response: We're so glad you enjoyed your stay once again! We look forward to having you and you family here next time!

Summary Heading: Great Location and Perfect for Cruisers
Summary: Recently stayed there prior to our cruise, you park your car there while you cruise and they have a free shuttle. The rooms were very clean and maintained. The location is perfect for great walks to restaurants and shops. My only complain about the room would be the room door, you can hear everything and anyone walking in the hallway. Free breakfast is ok for being free but i would go out and eat. The free coffee and cookies are excellent. I will go back on my next cruise and stay there again and would recommend it.
Manager Response: We're so glad you enjoyed your stay with us before your cruise. We're currently in the final stages of adding a hot breakfast selection to our breakfast room so it will be new and improved on your next stay with us. See you then!

Summary: My stay at the Pacific Inn was just perfect.  The room was very nice, clean and hotel staff very accomodating.  The location of the hotel was just perfect, walking distance to the perfect little town of Seal Beach.  I enjoyed morning walks on the beach and strolling through town as well as their annual christmas parade.  Perfect stay and I plan to be back again!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thanks for the fantastic review! We hope to see you again soon :)

Summary: Have extended family in Seal Beach and stay at the Pacific Inn when visiting. The location is perfect for walking! The staff have always had a "can do" attitude. They did a remodel a bit ago and the rooms are very welcoming. The main downside is the parking. Small spaces if you drive a big vehicle. Looking forward to their new breakfast room. That is a great customer service many places don't offer.
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that you enjoy staying with us! We look forward to seeing you next time!

Summary: My Wife and I travel to CA to visit with family and to get a little beach time in, we love The Pacific Inn's location. Everything you need is within walking distance and that alone sold me on staying there, the staff was very professional and attentive. We will be returning in April 2014 for another short getaway and will be staying here again.  Thanks!
Manager Response: I'm glad you enjoyed your time with us, David! We look forward to seeing you in April!

Summary: First timers @ Seal Beach, made reservations off the internet at Pacific Inn.  Great location, free breakfast off site one morning and enuf coffee and cereal to get you going each morning the rest of your stay. Rooms were nice and clean, as was overall property. Smooth check in and check out. You really can not beat the loction for both the beach, Main St, and getting on the PCH both North and South. Will be back
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review, Winston. We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: On arrival was upgraded to the Admiral Suite however it wasn't ready so had to wait which took the edge off the upgrade.  Large bedroom with separate lounge and Jacuzzi bath and separate shower.  Was at end of building so quiet with balcony that wrapped around the corner and overlooked the street.  Quite dark in lounge as lighting low powered.  Wifi worked ok but sometimes slow but this could be position of room in hotel. Swimming pool appears clean but did not use as too small to swim lengths.  Jacuzzi by pool seemed to be in use every time we passed.  Ideally located to walk the half mile down the old historic main street to beach and pier.  Lots of interesting shops, bars and restaurants.  Nice friendly little town.    Recommended.
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed your stay, Moneyfools. We do apologize that the Admiral Suite was not ready for you when you arrived to check in. We hope that you choose to stay with us again!

Summary: The hotel is located off the main road in a residential area and its walking distance to Seal Beach pier and restaurants.  The hotel is simple but clean and it’s in a good location. Hotel staff was very friendly and professional.  I would recommend this hotel for a weekend getaway.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review! Hope you choose to stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Excellent service... I am from PANAMA
Summary: I stayed for a week .  The people are really nice. Specially at the front desk and the shuttle driver. Everything was clean, the breakfast was ok for the price. At the lobby they have hot chocolate, coffee, cookies and candies every day.
Manager Response: We were happy to have you stay with us, Carmen. Thank you for the amazing review!

Summary: I enjoyed my stay.  The bed and pillows were very comfortable as was the room.  I booked a room with a spa tub, which I enjoyed very much.  Its only problem was water always getting on the floor if I used the shower.  The breakfast selection could be improved.  There were minor maintenance repairs needing to be done, but not unexpected for a place so close to the ocean.  Great location for walking to the beach and local eateries.  The air conditioner was noisy as can be expected from individual units.
Manager Response: I'm very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay, Mary. As requested by many of our guests, we are actually currently in the construction process of improving our breakfast room. We hope to see you again so you can check it out!
