First of all we would like to thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your lodging accommodations.  We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not exceeded.  We are located less than a half mile from the Beach in Seal Beach and take great pride in being apart of this quaint community.  Our property was established 24 years ago and has been The Pacific Inn for about 8 years now.  During this time we have done extensive renovations to ensure that we are providing the best services possible for our customers.  Guest Satisfaction is our highest priority here.  While we do strive for perfection in every aspect of our facility, we understand that you were not satisfied, and for that we apologize.    We appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention so that we can fix these small items to maximize our guest’s happiness.  We are constantly evaluating our facility to provide the best possible service for our guests.  Thanks for taking the time to let us know how you feel.  We appreciate customers who let us know when things are not right so that we can please our guests.  We would like to invite you back to our hotel for your next visit to the area.  Sincerely,  Gene Sugita Manager

Summary: OK hotel in an ideal location.  Rooms are comfortable although starting to show some signs of wear.  Our room happened to be on the open courtyard which unfortunately made it very loud at times to the comings and goings of other guests late at night. The continental breakfast is very convenient and a welcome addition.
Manager Response: Dear flinty808,  Thank you for the feedback on our hotel. We really appreciate it when our guests let us know what they love about our hotel or what we can improve on. We agree with you about Seal Beach being the perfect location. It has so much to offer for family vacations. We apologize if your room location was not ideal. On your next stay with us, we would gladly be happy to locate you in an area where noise is not an issue. We hope to see you soon!  Best Regards,  Gene Sugita General Manager

Summary: This hotel, while not by any means fancy, was perfectly situated just blocks from the beach and Main Street's funky shops and restaurants. We had a lovely view from our room. It was reasonably priced for its location and the staff was friendly. The free continental breakfast was just enough to fuel us up before we started our day and the cookies in the evening were a treat (but they were grabbed up quickly!) If you're looking for a posh, waterfront experience, head down the road to Huntington, but if you want eclectic, beachy and affordable, The Pacific Inn is a great deal.
Manager Response: Dear Laura D.,  First of all, thank you for choosing the Pacific Inn as your lodging accommodations. We appreciate that you consider us as "eclectic, beachy and affordable". That is definitely what we want our guests to get a feel of. We are also happy to hear that you took advantage of the cookies even if they ran out quickly! We definitely hope to see you again!  Best Regards,  Gene Sugita

Summary: Great Hotel in a perfect location, walking distance to the beach and Main Street Seal Beach with great restaurants and shops! Staff are very helpful, friendly and attentive! Rooms were very well appointed and modern, clean and comfortable! Love this place, you wont find a better facility at such a great price in such a great location in this area!
Manager Response: Hello Seabee1966! Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate our returning guests like you. We are glad that you found our staff to be beneficial during your stay. We strive to go above and beyond to make our guests stay more enjoyable. We also agree with you about the location. Seal Beach as a perfect little town that has so much to offer. We hope you come back and visit again :)

Summary: Great hotel for the price.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Convenient location.  Good breakfast items.
Manager Response: Thank you jbg37 for your feedback. We strive our best to meet our guests needs by providing reasonable rates, service, and amenities. We hope that your expectations of our hotel met your needs and hope that you stay with us again!

Summary: The Pacific Inn at Seal Beach, California is a great place to stay while seeing the sights in Southern California.  We recently returned from a 4-day trip to the Seal Beach area and stayed at The Pacific Inn.  We especially liked the friendly hotel personnel and the convenience of everything.  The bathroom in our room was beautiful - very modern and nice.  The room was clean, the bed was comfortable, and the overall feeling was one of convenience - from a complimentary morning paper, to a nicely located breakfast room, to a coffee maker in the room.  They also had an indoor/outdoor pool area that was very nice.  If I could change anything, it would be the hallways.  They were a little dark and tired looking, but certainly not enough to detract from our overall feelings about the
Manager Response: Thank you Judy C. for taking the time in writing a review.  We are very happy that you found our hotel to be very convenient for you. We are also glad that you took advantage of the amenities that our hotel has to offer. We like to make sure our guests have everything they need during their stay. Also thank you for the feedback on our hallways. We appreciate it when our guests point out things for us so that we can improve in our appearance and service. We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Nice little hotel near the beach
Summary: This hotel isn't anything fancy but it is the best location for a hotel in the city.  You can walk on the beach which is an easy walk from here.  It is also close to Old Town Seal Beach so there are tons of restaurants and boutiques to explore.  The  breakfast is good and the staff friendly.  I especially like the Jacuzzi.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you like our location. Seal Beach, Ca has so much to offer for our guests whether it is shopping, dining, and recreation. This is what makes our location so unique. We are also happy to hear that you enjoyed and took advantage of our jacuzzi facility. Little small things like that can always make a difference in somebody's stay with us. We hope you consider staying with us again when you are in Seal Beach.

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn twice this month.  Both times we were very pleased.  First time, we requested a quiet room at the back - and that was great.  Second trip, was spur of the moment, no reservation.  They honored our previous internet price, but our room was on the side with the strip mall.  That wasn't a problem though - the curtains blocked the light from the businesses and really that part of Seal Beach is quiet.  The king bedrooms are a nice size, and the beds were super comfortable.  I slept like a rock.  We like being close to Main Street and far away from the freeway.  The hotel will shuttle you any where within five miles; we didn't use that -- but given the parking problems during the summer in Seal Beach, that would be a big plus for beach going vacationeers.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We truly appreciate our returning customers. Although you didn't use our shuttle service during this stay we encourage you to use it next time you are here with us. We love taking care of our guests and are happy when they have a great stay with us. Hope to see you soon!

Summary: We got two adjoining rooms for our kids and ourselves. The rooms were nicely furnished and well kept. The beds were extremely comfortable. Each room has a nice small patio. Service was friendly and professional. Breakfast was minimal as was the breakfast room. Basic continental breakfast but had a waffle maker! The free wi-fi was a bit flakey, so don't count on it. Overall a very nice and comfortable stay. Clean, heated outdoor pool and hot-tub a very nice ammenity.
Manager Response: Thank you Scott R. for taking the time in writing a review. We are happy to hear that you and your family had a great stay at The Pacific Inn. We always strive to accommodate all types of groups especially families. We sincerely apologize if the internet wifi was not fully at your service during your stay. Feedback like this allows us to fix and improve on things. Our staff would be happy to welcome you back again soon, so I hope you’ll think of us when planning your next trip to Seal Beach.

Summary: Stayed here for one Saturday night in November. The hotel is conveniently located within walking distance of Main street, which leads to the pier. Check in was pleasant and efficient. The room was a nice size and well-appointed. Most important, I could sleep. There was no excessive noise coming from either outside or from other rooms.   The only criticism I have is of the bathroom. On the plus side, it was one of the few hotel bathrooms I have experienced that actually had room for my toiletries. There was a small set of shelves in the bathroom that was perfect to hold my razor, cleanser, etc. The bathroom was a decent size as well. But those crazy doors! A pair of glass sliding doors service both the bathroom and the closet and they don't work well. Sometimes they just seemed
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate hearing customer feedback; it gives us the opportunity both to respond and improve! I sincerely apologize if you found your room unsatisfactory; please accept our apologies for your less than perfect experience. It is through feedback such as yours that we are able to improve our level of satisfaction. We hope you still consider staying with us. See you soon!

Summary: The Pacific Inn has the best location for staying in Seal Beach.  You can walk to the shops and restaurants on Main Street or down to the ocean and pier.  The staff was very friendly and gave me the quiet room I requested.  Check in was smooth and efficient.  My room was spacious, the bed comfortable and the free wi-fi worked just fine.  My only complaint is the cosmetic condition of the remodel of my room.  The edges of the tiles on the floor and in the shower were left unfinished and this gave the room a broken-down feeling.  Several of the floor tiles were cracked and chunks were missing.  Too bad because I really liked my room but this was a little distracting.  If you are looking for a great patio dining, breakfast experience walk down to Main Street and Crema Cafe.  Great
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us here at The Pacific Inn. We are happy to hear that our friendly staff was at your service and that you enjoyed beautiful Seal Beach. We apologize for any minor inconveniences of the bathroom. We appreciate you taking the time in pointing it out since we always are trying to find ways to improve our hotel. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Walk To Restaurants, Shops and the Beach!
Summary: The Pacific Inn is located just of Pacific Coast Highway in Seal Beach, California!  We have stayed here many times because our daughter and family are lucky enough to live in this charming beach town! The staff is always helpful and pleasant, the rooms are nicely decorated and a free daily breakfast is included in your reasonable rate.  Also they offer a free daily newspaper and wifi, and your kids will love the indoor, outdoor pool! Most important is the location...Main Street is a short walk, with many shops and restaurants, not to forget the beautiful beach added to the Pacific Inn amenities! We would highly recommend this hotel to family and friends!
Manager Response: tizzytam we appreciate you taking the time in writing this review. We are very pleased that you enjoyed our convenient Breakfast and that our staff exceeded your service expectations.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We reserved several rooms for family for my mother's 90th birthday party this weekend. Our relatives arrived over a 3 day period from all over the U.S. at all hours - even 1:00 a.m.  Everyone raved about the Pacific Inn - the rooms, the friendly staff, the continental breakfast, the free bikes, the breakfast coupons for Hennesseys, the location - everything was perfect! We took gift baskets in before everyone's arrival, and the staff had them all in place. They emailed me and asked if we needed shuttle service to our Saturday night dinner. They even arranged a wheelchair rental for my uncle. The location is perfect - everyone enjoyed being able to walk to Main St., Yucatán Grill, and McKenna's. Thank you Pacific Inn for a perfect weekend!  And best of all - we got an incredible
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review SpanishteachCA! We are happy that everybody from your group enjoyed what our hotel had to offer. We hope your mother's 90th birthday celebration was a success. There are so many wonderful restaurants within walking distance of our hotel, we’re glad to hear you enjoy them as well. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Old & Tired - you get what you pay for
Summary: We stayed one night after flying in from NZ, arrived around 7-30pm. The young lady at reception was very cold and needs lessons in greeting their guests. She did not give out any info freely, we had to prize it out of her.  The king size bed was very comfortable and the shower was great. Howevewr the building was tired and this flowed on into the rooms. There is a lift however.  Breakfast was very basic and the lady in attendance was not helpful at all. Being new to USA style breakfast, everything was new and strange to us. She could of been more helpful and explained items to us, instead of just standing there watching us.  We tried the so called Thai restaurant just down the road, which was recommended by the young lady in reception. It turned out to be Japanese, however we
Manager Response: Dear Customer:  We take our customers’ problems seriously and are glad to hear from you.  First of all we would like to thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your lodging accommodations.  We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not exceeded.  Guest Satisfaction is our highest priority here.  While we do strive for perfection in every aspect of our facility, we understand that you were not satisfied, and for that we apologize.  We are disappointed that you didn’t enjoy the various amenities that our hotel offers.  We appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention so that we can fix these small items to maximize our guest’s happiness.  We are constantly evaluating our facility to provide the best possible service for our guests.  Thanks for taking the time to let us know how you feel.  We appreciate customers who let us know when things are not right so that we can please our guests.  We would like to invite you back to our hotel for your next visit to the area. We hope you come back.

Summary: The manager as well as the staff at this fine hotel, go out of there way to provide you with comforts that might make you not want to go home. I've stayed in a lot of places in my travels and this is my favorite.
Manager Response: Doublevc68 Thank you for your lovely review! I’m so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to give every guest the best possible experience, and I’m thrilled that your stay with us exceeded your expectations. Our staff would be happy to welcome you back again soon, so I hope you’ll think of us when planning your next trip to Seal Beach.

Summary: This was my first time staying at this hotel, I did like it.  Only one bad things to say, we requested a king room with jacuzzi but, it was a just a jetted tub.  Not what i was expecting but was satisfied with everything else.
Manager Response: Hello tobby04. Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate hearing customer feedback; it gives us the opportunity both to respond and improve! I sincerely apologize if you found your room unsatisfactory; please accept our apologies for your less than perfect experience. It is through feedback such as yours that we are able to improve our level of satisfaction. I will use your feedback to improve in the future. The Pacific Inn hopes to see you soon!

Summary: I have been staying at the Pacific Inn a few times a year for the past 3 years.  It's an independent hotel with no bar or restaurant on site, but well managed, neatly manicured, private balconies, nice, clean rooms, friendly staff and ideal location.  If you like Seal Beach and being close to the ocean, this is the best place to stay.  Right across the street are a few fast-food restaurants as well as other upscale places to eat.  A few blocks away, you'll find a shopping center with a supermarket and Main Street.  Main Street has a variety of restaurants to choose from as well as many cute boutiques to shop in.  I mainly stay at the Pacific Inn in Seal Beach rather the the Waterfront Hilton in Huntington Beach (where my business meetings are) because I feel so at home in that
Manager Response: Thank you Ridley Girl for taking the time in writing this review. We really appreciate hearing feedback from our guests. We really value our returning guests and are glad to hear that you find Seal Beach very convenient during your stay. Seal Beach is a relaxing and beautiful. I'm glad to hear you love staying here with us. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Once again we have had a perfect stay at the Pacific Inn in Seal Beach.  Our last trip to Seal Beach was in Oct. 2010.  Some things in Seal Beach had changed for the worst others as perfect as ever.  Among the perfect was our stay at the Pacific Inn.  You will not find a better value within walking distance of the Beach, Resturants, shopping and Night Life.  As a plus to those of you with pets it is pet freindly at a resonable cost.  The staff to a person is professional, helpful and fun.  The rooms clean and comfortable with a modern decor.  From check in to check out nothing but a pleasant experience.  We love Seal Beach. It is not as commercial as so many of the other beach communities.  We actually schedule our trips to availability of a room at the Pacific Inn.  This trip
Manager Response: Hello Osobad! Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We truly appreciate our returning customers. There are so many wonderful restaurants within walking distance of our hotel, we’re glad to hear you enjoy them as well.

Summary Heading: Well-managed hotel off the beaten path
Summary: This was our first visit to Seal Beach.  We stayed at the Pacific Inn on advice from experienced friends.    Parking is mostly covered, easily accessed but not secure.  Check-in was friendly and efficient.  At check-in we were given a coupon for 2 free full breakfasts at Hennessey's Tavern, a short walk to the main street.  Freshly baked cookies & coffee in the lobby area each evening was a nice treat.     We stayed in one of the newer remodeled rooms which was quite nice.  I'm not a fan of jacuzzi tubs, but it was there along with a pedestal bathroom sink which was oddly high and somewhat awkward to use.    We thoroughly enjoyed our free breakfast at Hennessy's and returned several times for other meals.  Specials every night - be sure to try the BOGO burgers on Tuesdays.
Manager Response: Hello AZspaLady!! We appreciate you taking the time in writing this awesome review. We are very pleased that you enjoyed our convenient Breakfast and that our staff exceeded your service expectations.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Hotel is fine, but make sure this is the right location for you
Summary: Clean and tidy hotel, good value and with very friendly and cheerful staff who work hard and go out of their way to help. They run a free shuttle bus for example. It looks like it's an independent hotel and they are working hard to upgrade it - nice new furniture in the rooms and upgraded bathrooms for example. No bar or restaurant and tiny breakfast area. However, make sure this is the location you really want. it was just a bit too far from where we wanted to be for us - my fault as I was the one who chose it. It's not Huntington Beach and too far from Santa Monica/Venice Beach to be convenient for LA visiting too.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review Lou_Mike! We’re glad you enjoyed our clean, refurbished rooms and new furniture.  We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed Seal Beach and that our friendly staff helped to make your stay a memorable one.  See you soon!

Summary Heading: We've stayed here twice and really like it.
Summary: Our room was very comfortable and the pool and hot tub were great! The shuttle service was excellent and the drivers are really friendly and informative.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review Lindal52! We are glad to hear that our hotel facilities were beneficial for you. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: There are so many positive things to say...this is our 2nd time at this hotel and we do plan on coming back. The beds are very comfortable, free continental breakfast and afternoon cookies. After a relaxing day at the beach what is better then coming back to a heated spa with hot fresh baked cookies waiting for you. This hotel is in walking distance from main street, about 8 blocks so you don't even have to drive to enjoy a night in the town. This hotel is a hidden treasure and reasonably priced.
Manager Response: Thank you Bevegas1 for the positive review of our hotel.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed our convenient amenities and that our staff exceeded your service expectations.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Friendly service and newly remodeled rooms!
Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn with our one-year old son.  Right away at check-in I was impressed with the friendliness of the staff.  The room was spacious and stylish -- the bathroom had been newly remodeled and had a modern flare -- very cool.  We chose the hotel based on its proximity to the marinas and restaurants, and both were just nice little walks away.  We also chose them because every room has a balcony, and we like to have a place to sit together and have a bottle of wine after our son falls asleep.  A perfect stay!  Loved it!
Manager Response: Thank you  Knitquip for your lovely review! I’m so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We strive to give every guest the best possible experience, and I’m thrilled that your stay with us exceeded your expectations. Our staff would be happy to welcome you back again soon, so I hope you’ll think of us when planning your next trip to Seal Beach.

Summary: very well positioned for Main Street and the beach - a quiet "small town" place to stay in LA
Manager Response: Thank you fromnorthernCA for your great review!  We look forward to welcoming you back to the LA/Orange County area for another great  trip to the beach!!!

Summary: I needed 15 rooms for family for our daughters Long Beach, CA wedding. (July 2011)    After parking in close- FREE- covered garage, I entered the clean lobby with a cheery welcome and smelled fresh coffee and cookies too.  Their wonderful manager; Shari, SOLD me on her  tour and we had 35 guests that were so glad I chose The Pacific Inn.  2 words describe this property... LOCATION and SERVICE!  The staff was VERY helpful with extra luggage and greeting people kindly from all over the U.S.  They helped deliver "Welcome Bags" and even reserved their FREE shuttle for us to make the rehearsal and the ceremony in near by Long Beach.  A pretty, 3 block walk to Seal Beach and the peer is a treat.  Old Town is only 2 blocks and our guests spent 1/2 their time there.  Belmont Shore (2nd
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We ALWAYS stay at the Pacific Inn!
Summary: My husband and I visit the Seal Beach area several times a year for pleasure and also because our son goes to college at CSULB and we come down to visit.  We always choose the Pacific Inn because it's clean, quiet, has a great jacuzzi and pool, and it's very reasonably priced.  We wholeheartily recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing The Pacific Inn!!! It is always so nice when a guest takes the time to let others know about their experience here!  We look forward to having you back here again in the near future!

Summary Heading: Conveniently located simple hotel in Seal Beach
Summary: I stayed here over a long weekend while visiting family in the area. The hotel served our needs perfectly, in that it was a comfortable and clean place to stay within walking distance of the charming town of Seal Beach.   The hotel offers the basic amenities, including a continental breakfast, a computer in the lobby, and a pool. We did not have a chance to use the pool, given that the weather was rather chilly while we were there. We did check out the continental breakfast and decided to walk into town for a meal at one of the local restaurants instead.   The rooms were adequately sized with upgraded amenities, including a flat panel TV. The bathoom had been recently remodeled, and we all loved the large stone shower. The sliding door to the bathroom was a bit odd and made a
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the kind words idahoprincess8!  We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the various amenities that we offer here at The Pacific Inn.  Guest Satisfaction is our biggest priority here and strive to ensure that our rooms and facility reflect that!  We agree that having all of the shops and restaurants on Main St. which is just a block away are very convenient when exploring the local area!  We look forward to having you back!

Summary: First time staying here and will not be the last. It truly has it all and is a great value. We are making plans to visit again and can't wait. All of the staff was outstanding from start to finish. WELL DONE!!! Thanks!!!
Manager Response: Thank you JMatney! I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay here! We are so excited to have you stay with us again! You are a valued guest here at The Pacific Inn. We appreciate your continued business! Your satisfaction is of the utmost importance. Thank you for choosing the Pacific Inn.

Summary: I have stayed here three times. This hotel is very conveniently located to the beach and Main Street, which has several restaurants, bars, boutiques, etc.  The service has always been friendly and helpful.  The rooms are nicely decorated.  The beds are very comfortable.  The TVs are nice with several movie options.  Balconies are nice for getting fresh air.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn.  We agree that our location is wonderful when staying in the Seal Beach area!  We appreciate you taking the time to write about the service that you have received here.  We strive for to exceed all guests expectations here.  It is nice that you were able to enjoy all of the amenities offered here in addition to your very own private balcony which makes the fresh sea air that much more enjoyable!

Summary: Located less than 1/2 mile from the water and recently renovated, the Inn is a pleasant stop in the greater LA area.  The rooms are a comfortable size with a big walk-in shower, balcony and the usual motel amenities.  Rates include Wi-Fi and continental breakfast (waffles & breakfast burritos among other things).  The staff are welcoming, and there is a small open-air courtyard pool.  A complimentary shuttle will take you to places within a 5 mile radius.
Manager Response: Hello Thrall!  It is so great of you to point out the positives you experienced with our great location, new renovations, and vast amenities.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed our convenient Breakfast and that our staff exceeded your service expectations.

Summary Heading: Cute hotel in a great location
Summary: Really enjoyed our recent stay at the Pacific Inn! It's a clean and cute place in a great location. Our room had a private balcony, fridge and microwave. The updated bathroom was nicely done. Breakfast was provided and the hotel and hot tub are a nice perk. We loved being able to walk to town and the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you AustinK14!  We are so elated that you enjoyed your stay here.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Really nice hotel. Only stayed here 1 night (went on a cruise next day). The rooms were newley updated and had very nice amenities. The pool and hot tub were small but nice to relax in. They have free shuttle service to go anywhere within 5 miles. Also had free continetal breakfast. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: great location, clean, appealing room w/nice amenities.
Summary: Recently updated rooms, very comfortable beds, nice view of town, walking distance to restaurants, beaches, marina, shopping. Clean and comfortable. Continental breakfast provided. Coffee available in lobby all day long.
Manager Response: Thank you Bakofamily!  Our location has just recently been completely remodeled and are so pleased that you enjoyed the upgrades.  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel!  We would love to have you back here at our location.  It is so wonderful when guests take the time to share their positive experience with others!  We really appreciate you doing so!

Summary: After an expensive day at Disneyland, we wanted to bypass the big hotels & crowds by the interstate and find a nice, reasonably priced place near a nearby beach. That's not exactly a combination that's easy to find these days, but the Pacific Inn more than delivered. The location isn't beachside, but it's got great walkable proximity to the cozy Main Street of Seal Beach, which is like a beachside village within metro LA. It's about a 5-minute walk to Main Street and about 10 minutes to the beach -- shorter if you rent one of the cruiser bikes parked next to the check-in desk.   The Pacific Inn is right on the edge between a quiet, destination residential neighborhood  and the busier strip of the PCH. Our room happened to face the backside of a McDonald's where we heard a
Manager Response: Hello BienBoulevardier!  I am so glad to hear that you were able to come and enjoy Southern California and all that it offers!  It is nice to know that you were able to enjoy the amenities and wonderful location of The Pacific Inn.  We agree that this boutique style hotel is a great place to end an exciting day at Disneyland or a great escape when visiting the LA or Orange County Area.  Being able to relax and enjoy the beach in at our upgraded facility are just a few of many great attributes here.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and also that you took the time to share your experience with others.  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn!  We look forward to your next stay here!!!

Summary: I chose this hotel because i thought it had an indoor pool. although it wasnt really, it was a great pool. lots of comfortable seating poolside. they said that the pool was heated, but it was still very cold. the kids didnt mind though. because the pool is situated between the buildings, there was no wind and it was quite warm. the kids really enjoyed it. the room was nice. we all slept well.  we were allowed to check in quite early, and the hotel offers discounts for the aquarium. the location was central to places that we visited. the breakfast upstairs was good. the waffles are good, but there was no protien to speak of. they offered cereals, frozen breakfast burritos, and various muffins and bagels. not bad for being free! overall, i had no complaints with the hotel. free
Manager Response: Hello thoogenbosch! Thank you for the taking the time to tell others about our hotel!  We are very pleased that your family was able to not only use our newly renovated pool area, but enjoy our comfortable rooms and breakfast as well.  Our amenities like free parking and Wi-fi are just a few of the things that set our hotel apart from the others in this area!  We look forward to your return!!!

Summary Heading: it will only get better with their renovations
Summary: We will want to stay here again next April.  They keep improving and renovating to make this a super place to stay.  Kathleen and Sean at the front desk were so friendly and helpful. good breakfast and free wifi!
Manager Response: Hello Lovetotravel99203! Thank you for the positive review of our hotel.  We are very pleased that you like our renovations!  As an older property we are constantly striving to improve our facility so that guests satisfaction is the highest.  We appreciate your kind words and look forward to having you back at The Pacific Inn!

Summary: This place was very nice, our room over looked a small park , lovely view and we liked the balcony. Forgot our wine opener and they actually had one at the desk we borrowed! Breakfast room was very nice, just perfect. Nice pool area...hotel was very quiet and the beds were so comfy! We are certainly planning another trip . The beach is just a couple blocks and so are many good restaurants. All around good stay...staff was so nice in the evening and morning, more than helpful! I would recommend this place to anyone!
Manager Response: Hello Youngergang!  It is always so nice when someone takes the time to positively comment on their stay.  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn.  We are very pleased to see that you enjoyed your accommodations in Seal Beach and that our friendly staff helped to make your stay a memorable one.  I agree completely that our convenient location is truly a great asset.  We look forward to your next stay in the area, and hope to be considered again!

Summary Heading: Great value. Wonderful service. Great amenities
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. For the price you can't beat it.  It's not glamorous but clean, comfortable, friendly helpful staff. Our priorities for our anniversary weekend included location, comfortable bed, good value.     Location was terrific. Walking distance to beach, food, shops on Main St.  Convenient drive to Long Beach or Hunting Beach for variety.  Pillow top bed very comfy. Complimentary continental breakfasts (including make-your-own waffle), free breakfast for 2 @ Hennessy, free parking, free local shuttle, OUTSTANDING free cookies @ night all made for great value.    When our heater wasn't getting warm enough for us during a cold snap they brought us their own ceramic heater to supplement. Always had prompt attention and service.
Manager Response: Hello Abbychia!  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your anniversary at our hotel.  We agree that The Pacific Inn is the best product for the best price in the Seal Beach area.  I am pleased to hear that the staff was helpful and that the room/hotel amenities and location made your stay nothing but comfortable.  Thank you for letting us be apart of such a special day for the two of you!  We look forward to your return and appreciate the positive review!  Thank you!!!

Summary: Booked this hotel through www.hotwire.com.  Hotwire showed this hotel as a 3-star, which I don't agree.  More of a 2.5 star.  The rooms were average, disappointed that there were 2 double sized beds, queen beds would be a lot more comfortable.  Unfortunately we were given a room that connected to another.  We could hear the neighbours talking & flushing their toilet.  Didn't like the sliding bathroom door that had no lock.  Carpets didn't feel clean enough to take off our shoes. On the plus side, the rooms had a balcony.   Hotel has continental breakfast which included fruit, yogurt, cereal & waffles. The location is right off Pacific Coast Highway.  Across the street there is a McDonalds (woken up @ 5am by the McDonalds delivery truck) & Taco Bell/Pizza Hut.  We tried Yucatan
Manager Response: Hello Hmoney!  Thank you for your review and for recommending our location for business travelers.  We are also very pleased to hear that you enjoyed our convenient Breakfast as well as one of the many surrounding Restaurants.  It is great to hear that you utilized your private balcony as well during your stay.  We are so glad that you were able to stay with us at The Pacific Inn.  I understand that you booked your accommodations through Hotwire.com and do apologize that you do not agree with our star rating on Hotwire.  As you know we are an independently owned hotel located in the heart of Seal Beach in a residential area off of Pacific Coast Highway on Marina Drive.  We are constantly striving to improve our hotel, and since the start of this year, various operations have been undertaken in efforts to move towards better accommodations for all of our guests.  It is our goal to make a guests stay as comfortable as possible.  I apologize that this was not realized while you were here and that the room was not up to your standards.  We take guest issues very seriously and are working towards making the appropriate changes to avoid guest dissatisfaction in the future.  We would like to thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn at Seal Beach.  We would like to invite you back to our hotel for your next visit to the area.  If you have any questions, I would like to speak with you personally so that we can help pinpoint any further issues so that we may take care of them for you.  You can reach me at (562) 493-7501 ext 105 or at smeredith@thepacificinn.com.  Thanks for caring so much.

Summary: We always stay at the Pacific Inn now and are completely satisfied.  The people are friendly, the location is great, the breakfast is good, the rooms are always comfortable and the pool area is a big plus.  We haven't had our pets with us, but they are pet friendly which is a big plus in my book.
Manager Response: Hello eli90803! Thank you for the positive review of our hotel.  We are very pleased that you have chosen to stay at The Pacific Inn when you are in the Seal Beach Area!  It is always nice to hear that you enjoy your accommodations, and especially the newly renovated pool!  We hope to see you again soon, and maybe with your pets too!

Summary Heading: Cool staff, helpful, clean motel and very great prices..
Summary: The whole staff here always is nice and helpful, even when busy.  We have stayed here about 4 times now and it is consistent. A 3 minute walk to downtown, 5 to the beach. Try Nick's Deli for burritos every morning.  The rooms are not big and not small, just a solid room. Maybe some more hooks and towel bars to hang clothes and the many towels that build up. Two kids and two adults can make it feel smaller for us. The place has a good feel, and the morning food room is  full of good choices.
Manager Response: Hello Emith! Thank you so much for the encouraging review of The Pacific Inn hotel.  We really strive to exceed all guests expectations are are glad to hear that you enjoyed the various amenities we offer here.  Thank you for choosing our location!  We look forward to having you here again in the future!

Summary: My husband, son and I stayed at this hotel and had a pleasant experience. The room was nice and clean.  The bathroom was large with a walk-in shower. The breakfast was enjoyable and constantly being restocked with fresh fruit, cereals and bread.  The location of the breakfast was on the third floor overlooking the pool with an open roof which was nice with the sun shining down.  We could walk to the shops and pier of Seal Beach and  several restraunts were across the street.  One thing the front desk did when we check in was to provide us a roll a way bed for my son as we had booked a king size bed instead of a double.  That was nice.
Manager Response: Hello aussiefan03!  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience!  It is always great to hear when the hotel staff does an exceptional job.  It is our goal to exceed guest expectations.  Because we are an older property, we are constantly looking to improve our facility, and am glad to hear that you like our newly renovated rooms as well as our location.  We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Cozy lodging that warrants much more publicity than it receives.
Summary: The Pacific Inn represents a charming lodging nestled in the seaside town of Seal Beach, California.  It's characterized by a style more characteristic of years gone by.  Locals claim it's the "best-kept secret that most people know about."   Too bad others don't know as much - they're missing out on something.   The Inn is conveniently located within walking distance of the quaint shops and restaurants on Main Street in old town Seal Beach.  And it's only a few block from the beach.  A complimentary Continental breakfast is available daily, attended by friendly, professional staff.  I have stayed at the Pacific Inn a number of times and my most recent visit included being blown away by the elegance of the new recreation area comprising swimming pool, jacuzzi and upscale
Manager Response: Thank you DonSundeen!  You are a valued guest here at The Pacific Inn, and we appreciate you taking the time to review our facility!  We hope to have you back again in the future!

Summary Heading: Definitely where you want to spend your time
Summary: Very friendly staff and met my every need as well as my every want. Staff takes time to show they care about each and every customer. Great little inn with a pool centered on the second floor in the center of rooms with a half open roof top. Nice to find a place to tan but also enough shade. The pool has just been renovated to make an even better stay. For breakfast, stay in the hotel and head to the continental breakfast that is held in a little cafe room. Very cute! The location is just a short walk from seal beach and a short drive to hunington and long beach. Several places right around the hotel to have a nice dinner and nightlife is down on main stree just 2 miles away.
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for the positive review of our hotel.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay at The Pacific Inn.  It is always great to know when our guests expectations are exceeded, because overall guest satisfaction is our number one priority here at the hotel.  Thank you for taking the time to to tell us how you feel.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: There are certainly better hotels one could stay in. This is just a glorified motel. Kind of run down. Would not recommend it to a friend. It does have good (and free) WiFi, however. Some kind of a giant fan or compressor kicked on several times in the night outside of our room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response.  We apologize that your expectations were not met.  We boast an older facility that has been completely remodeled within the last 2 years.  All of our rooms have been redone to reflect a modern touch and our entire pool area has been refinished as well.  We take great pride in providing the best accommodations, the best location, and at the most affordable price in the Seal Beach area.  We are sorry that your needs were not realized here at The Pacific Inn.  Thank you for your honesty, and thank you for letting us know how you feel.  If you have any other questions please feel free to contact me personally at info@thepacificinn.com or at 562-493-7501.  We appreciate your comments.

Summary: We have stayed at Pacific Inn in the past and have enjoyed our experience.  On this occasion however we checked in to find that major rennovations were in progress.  No pool, jaccuzi, elevator, and workers using heavy machinery from 9-5pm with plastic walls not containing the dust or noise entering our room.  We were stunned because we were not made aware of this at the time of our reservations.  The managers did move us when I noticed a harsh paint odor in Room #1 but nothing could prevent the intrusiveness of this work in progress at Pacific Inn.  The room itself was less than clean, bed skirt dirty, loose toilet seat, hair in shower.  Then, noisy neighbors checked in next to us with adjoining door the persons might as well have been in our room.  We couldn't wait to leave.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us how you feel.  I understand that you were disappointed with the services that The Pacific Inn offered during the duration of your stay.  While I understand that an apology will not change the experience that you had, we do appreciate you informing us.   I realize that your reservation was booked online.  Our online reservation center did have a message informing all guests who booked a room about the present renovations.  However, I know that it is less than ideal to arrive expecting certain amenities only to find they were out of use when you should have known prior to your arrival.  Upon realizing your dissatisfaction with your first room, the hotel staff did assist you in finding a room to better suite your needs, in addition to a large reduction to your nightly rate for your accommodations.  We take great pride in providing the best services for our guests and have mailed you a complimentary night stay here so that you may come and enjoy the newly renovated pool area upon its completion.  Our property was established 24 years ago and has been The Pacific Inn for about 8 years now.  During this time we have done extensive renovations to ensure that we are providing the best services possible for our customers.  In maintaining an older building Renovations are essential to remain competitive in today’s market, however, I also understand the severe inconvenience of your accommodations due to the construction.  Thank you for being honest.  We appreciate your input.

Summary Heading: An exceptionally QUAINT Inn for all ages, walk to the beach!
Summary: The service for our 8 day stay was exceptionally outstanding thanks to the entire staff and manager, Mr. JP Ferguson. Unlike huge hotels, the Inn's 3 story size is perfect, no waiting for elevators, no lines to stand in, no hustle bustle, very relaxing and quaint. Everybody is super friendly, you feel like family.   There were 3 females stayiing in the room, a senior, adult and 9 y/o child, we were all very comfortable.     The free shuttle was so appreciated which takes you to many places of interest including Long Beach's Queen Mary.  Superb location, walking distance to the beach, many restaurants, Main St.. For seniors thinking about retiring in Seal Beach, Leisure World is nearby, check it out.   The pool/ jacquzzi spa indoor room is awesome! The website's photo does not do
Manager Response: Hello! Thank you for the positive review of our hotel.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed our Location, Shuttle Service, Convenient Breakfast, Pool Area, and that our staff exceeded your service expectations.  It was so nice of you to take the time to let us know how we are doing. 	We appreciate guests who let us know how they feel.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I chose this place swayed by all the positive reviews I was reading online about this charming "hidden getaway" within walking distance of the beach.  My SO and I ended up very disappointed.  The location is nothing to enjoy and there is no view.  The rooms have a gap under the door so you can hear everything from the outside.  I got the feeling that ones experience depends on which remodeled room you are placed in.  The room we got had a sliding door to the bathroom from the 70s that didn't close fully so when the main door is opened everyone can see you, and the shower was the kind you had to step up in.  The shower head was some cheapo Walmart plastic thing sitting in a holder that would not stay put so I spent my shower time trying to get under the stream of water.  There
Manager Response: Dear KasuKasu: Thank you for your review. We take our customers’ problems seriously and are glad to hear from you.  First of all we would like to thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn for your lodging accommodations.  We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not exceeded.  We are located less than a half mile from the Beach in Seal Beach and take great pride in being apart of this quaint community.  Our property was established 24 years ago and has been The Pacific Inn for about 8 years now.  During this time we have done extensive renovations to ensure that we are providing the best services possible for our customers.  Guest Satisfaction is our highest priority here.  All of our rooms have been remodeled within the last year, and we are currently undergoing pool renovations as well.  While we do strive for perfection in every aspect of our facility, we understand that you were not satisfied, and for that we apologize.  We are disappointed that you didn’t enjoy the various amenities that our hotel offers.  We appreciate you bringing these issues to our attention so that we can fix these small items to maximize our guest’s happiness.  We are constantly evaluating our facility to provide the best possible service for our guests.  Thanks for taking the time to let us know how you feel.  We appreciate customers who let us know when things are not right so that we can please our guests.  We would like to invite you back to our hotel for your next visit to the area.  If you have any questions, I would like to speak with you personally so that we can help pinpoint any further issues so that we may take care of them for you.  You can reach me at (562) 493-7501 ext 105 or at smeredith@thepacificinn.com.

Summary Heading: Excellent Value, Perfect Location, Staff Superior
Summary: We just finished out stay at the Pacific Inn and  I can not say enough positive about this hotel.  It is a mid -range hotel, and while the exterior and lobby will initially give you concerns, ignore and enjoy,  the rooms are much more upscale.  Nice size, great beds, very clean.  The little balcony is a nice touch.  The staff, and I mean everyone I came in contact with, is by far the most pleasant I have dealt with in years. You truly feel as if they appreciate your business.  The location is absolutley perfect.  Close to everything.  Free internet, free underbuilding parking. Nice little Continental Breakfast. Use your intetrnet, we were able to book for $139.  We will never stay anywhere else when going to the Orange County beach's for the week-end or business. As a plus they
Manager Response: Thank you so much Osobad for taking the time to review The Pacific Inn.  We appreciate your comments and loyalty here.  Guest Satisfaction is our highest priority, and I am glad to hear that our staff was accommodating.  Your happiness is of the utmost importance and we are glad that you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for choosing the Pacific Inn.

Summary: We stayed at the Pacific Inn when going to a wedding in downtown Long Beach (just ~10 minute drive).  It was pretty affordable and surprisingly nice for the price.  The rooms are pretty spacious and have a little balcony off them.  The air conditioner worked well and was not too loud (unlike some other cheaper motel chains).
Manager Response: Dear Photokate, Thank you so much for the wonderful review.  It is so nice to hear that you had an enjoyable stay.  We take great pride in providing lodging accommodations for all of guests.  You are a valued guest here.  We are glad that we were able to be apart of your stay in the Orange County area.

Summary: Stayed with my mother in this hotel whilst visiting family, for ten days.  The hotel is situated in a lovely location within walking distance of eateries/shops/beach.  The staff were very helpful.  The room clean and refreshed on a daily basis.  The complimentary breakfast adequate. (I use the word adequate only because I like a good fry up on holiday). The Pool looked inviting but on this trip i did not manage a dip.  The complimentary shuttle was used by my mother to attend church and she was impressed by the service. The free wifi was easily accessible/speedy and a bonus.  All in all a thoroughly enjoyable stay and would definitely return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello Lorraine55: We appreciate your wonderful review.  We are very pleased to hear that you were able to fully experience all that Seal Beach has to offer while staying at our location.  It brings great joy to our staff when guests are pleased with the services and amenities offered here.  Thank you for choosing The Pacific Inn, we hope that you will be able to come stay with us again, and use the pool.  We just started our renovations and by 12/10, we should have a completely new and updated pool area.  Thank you again!

Summary: The hotel is well located, next to shops, restaurants and the beach. The front of the hotel and the hall would need a serious renovation.  The rooms are much better than expected.  They are spacious and bathroom was great with a nice big shower, nice little terrace.  Unfortunately the room was around the pool, so a bit noisy because of the floor tiles. The acoustic of the room was bad, thin walls.  I could hear the upstairs’ neighbor walk. The breakfast was simple but OK for the price.
Manager Response: Hello Foyolle!  Thank you so much for staying with us at The Pacific Inn.  We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the hotels ideal location.  We take guest comments very seriously and thank you for giving our hotel such a great review!  We are pleased to inform you as well that we are currently in the process of completely renovating our pool area and will no longer have brick floors but a much quieter and stream-line flooring material, as well as bigger glass walls in efforts to minimize the noise level of the pool for surrounding rooms.  Our goal is to constantly improve our hotel and we really appreciate your time and consideration in regards to making our facility better.  You are a valued guest and we are pleased that we were given the opportunity to provide your lodging accommodations.

Summary: The Good: Location, as everyone has mentioned Pool & hot tub Free Parking, Internet, continental breakfast Completely remodeled bathroom (not just repainted but gutted to the studs with very modern finishes) Price/Value Friendly staff computer in the lobby  The Not so Good: Paper thin walls Uncomfortable beds (I travel over 100 nights per year for business and can usually sleep on anything) Though the balconies are big and good to have, they either overlook Taco Bell, PCH or a parking lot - feels a little ghetto Though updated, has a motel feel  I did not request/need one but got a handicapped room,  The shower head was a hand held one mounted to the wall near my stomach.  To take a shower/wash hair had to hold nozzle above my head - why the heck do they do this to people.  Of
Manager Response: Hello travelfreak2007! Thank you for the positive review of our hotel.  We are pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy our Newly Renovated Rooms, Great Location, Pool Area, Parking, Internet, and Complimentary Breakfast, and that you find value at our location.  We take great pride in having competitive rates and a genuinely friendly staff.  Thank you for taking the time to realize and write a review reflecting these amenities and services that The Pacific Inn offers.  Thank you for choosing to stay here.  We do strive for complete Guest Satisfaction, and take all comments, positive or negative seriously and are glad to hear from you.  We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not exceeded.  While we do strive for perfection in every aspect of our facility, we understand that you were not satisfied, and for that we apologize.  We appreciate customers who let us know when things are not right.  We would like to invite you back to our hotel for your next visit to the area.  If you have any questions, I would like to speak with you personally so that we can help pinpoint any further issues so that we may take care of them for you.  You can reach me at (562) 493-7501 ext 105 or at smeredith@thepacificinn.com. Thanks for caring so much.

Summary: nice and helpful staff! Great location...steps away from shops and restaurants and about a 10 minute walk to seal beach! The hotel and the room was very clean.  I wouldnt say there were any problems with this place only the pool was very chilly...its not heated just through the atrium when the sun shines down on it.  My two year old was pretty cold and didnt stay long in it.

Summary Heading: Great Boutique Hotel Close to Downtown Seal Beach Recently Improved
Summary: I have been coming here to the Inn for about 5 years since my sister lives innthe area and we like to walk to all the downtown restaurants and shop; have a drink and not have to worry about driving. This is THE ONLY  place walking distance to down town Seal so it gets pretty full on weekends so book ahead. They offer a locals discount  so ask if u call  for reservations. They recently painted the hallways.!!  Before they had a horrid gold color that I used to complain about everytime I was here.. They finally heard me. Now it's a lovely warm 2 tone brown. Rooms are always clean and all have a nice balcony. and free wifi!! Summary: The Pacific Inn was recommended by a friend from Long Beach and it was ideal for our one night stay. The room was comfortable, clean and had free internet access. We were able to park the car in the hotel car park and not have to use it until we left. The hotel is ideally located for all that Seal Beach has to offer and is only a few blocks from the beach. A complimentary continental breakfast was included and was ideal, plenty of choice including making your own waffles! All staff were friendly and helpful.

Summary Heading: A very pleasant stay at Pacific Inn
Summary: The Pacific Inn is the ideal place to stay when visiting Seal Beach.  We have family there and have previously rented houses when we've gone to visit.  From now on we will stay at the Pacific Inn.  All of the staff are pleasant and helpful.  The dead bolt on our door didn't work and a hook in the bathroom was loose.  We advised the front desk and the maintenance man immediately took care of everything.  Cleanliness is my No. 1 concern and the Pacific Inn surpassed my high standards.  Every part of the hotel is clean and neat.  The housekeeping staff do an outstanding job.    We enjoyed the complimentary continental breakfast provided every day. Summary: This hotel has a perfect location, the rooms are very nice and spacious, and all the employees we encountered were extremely friendly and helpful.  There was a small mix-up with our room, but it was handled quickly and professionally.  We wll surely return.

Summary: My wife and I have stayed at several places in Orange County and enjoy them all.  Seal Beach and in particular The Pacific Inn, will become a favorite.  The property is very well located with just a short walk to a variety of shops and the beach.  The staff was uniformly pleasant and professional.  Rooms are large and have very nice balconies.  A very nice amenity is the breakfast which is very well organized.  You can eat outside over looking the pool if you so choose.  Parking is free and convenient to the rooms.  The hotel is located in a residential area far enough away from Pacific Coast Highway as to be very quiet.  Several good restaurants are located a 10 minute walk away.  The beach at Seal Beach is clean, broad and well maintained.  The property is also a very

Summary: The Pacific Inn is one of the most charmming Hotels.  It is the complete package and well worth the stay.  Our room was excellent  the  friendly staff  always made sure we were enjoying our stay. The Inn was  walking distance from the beach, pier, and town.  They offer shuttle service to and from the Long Beach Airport .  This was our first trip to Seal Beach but it won't be our last .  We will be back :) Thank You Pacific Inn

Summary Heading: Great hotel, kind and helpful staff!
Summary: I stay at the Pacific Inn when in town for business.  I recently had a medical emergency and had to get to an urgent care.  The staff was caring and very helpful, and not only assisted me in finding the urgent care, but also drove me there and picked me up.  This kind of service is on par, or even superior, to a five star establishment.  I very much appreciated their help and kindness!

Walk to Main street and beach...lovely restaurants across the street-great place for guests who are visiting or if you just want a weekend at the beach without driving!  Balcony rooms overlooking the park are nice.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.  Love it!  Overnight stay includes breakfast at one of the popular spots on Main street-delightful!

Summary: The location of this hotel to downtown Seal Beach and proximity to the beach cannot be beat in Seal Beach.  Everything is within walking distance, which makes using a car obsolete (rare in So Cal).  The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.  This isn't the kind of place I would want to spend too much time in only because the pool is small and surrounded by the building and the views are of the local neighborhood.  It was just the perfect place to shower and sleep.  Our toliet didn't flush properly when we arrived and we had to wait about an hour to get service to repair it.  Nothing major, but just a minor inconvenience when we were anxious to take a nap for our evening fun out with friends.
